name: Don Marsh
text:
I was referred to Blue Reef Watersports by a close friend who had visited Golf Shores. Honestly had not considered Golf Shores for a vacation destination but was very nervous to try para sailing.

We set up a fly time before leaving for vacation. The second day of vacation we showed up at Blue Reef's location. Knowing that vacation destinations that involve the beach can sometimes run on "island time" we showed up early. The staff had our confirmation and were ready for us when we arrived. Perfect!

Once on the boat, the captain made feel safe and relaxed. With music playing on the boat we (my wife and I)were strapped in and off to see the beach from an aerial view. It was a blast and I have the picture they toke to prove it.

We have been back once since and met up with the staff at Blue Reef once again. This time we rented jet skis and played in the water. We had a great time!

Thanks again,

See you next time.

name: Travis Keedy
text: Friendly, fun staff!  I hatched a plan to propose up in the air while para-sailing and Blue Reef was incredibly accommodating and helpful.  We had a blast!  We are semi-local and will be returning to this outfit for more water-fun.

name: Tammy Murphy
text: Parasailing was awesome!!! We love the beaches in “Sweet Home Alabama!  My boyfriend and I went out with Blue Reef Watersports and we had a blast! The crew was great and kept us laughing the whole time! They had a good picture deal and we were very glad to have them :) I’m definitely  a fan for life and will be back soon!

name: Christian Neal
text: Before the main Jet Ski guide passed away and this place closed down, this place was the absolute best. I sure wish they would open back up.

name: Woodrow Beavers
text:
** Beware **
While most of the staff at Blue Reef Watersports are nice enough, the concept of customer service is completely foreign.  We paid for he photo package, but when our children returned from their parasailing, the staff said that the camera card had been misplaced...check back in an hour.  OK, we thought, no big deal.

We checked back in an hour, still no card, "we'll bring your card to you when we close up shop for the night."

No such luck.  They neither brought the card by nor called me to let me know what was going on.

The next morning, after finally reaching a manager, and explaining that we were departing that day, they agreed to take our kids back up during the lunch-hour just long enough to snap some pictures.

Another call back from the manager, however, and their story had changed again...the only slot open for the re-fly was 4:30pm.  As we were leaving after lunch, we simply couldn't accept that.

Our twins enjoyed the ride well enough, but the company's response to their mistake is simply inexcusable.

I encourage everyone to take their business elsewhere.

name: Judy Davis
text: Fantastic Experience It was awesome fantastic experience in itself. Ride was smooth and great fun. It was my first experience parasailing, and to tell you the truth, I’m a little afraid of heights.  Well, the crew was re-assuring and really helped me…I think my fear of heights might even be gone now. I would love to do it again sometime :) Blue Reef Watersports is first class…

name: Daine Smith
text: Low and short parasail flights. Don't waste your money here. 5 to 7 min flights. Go to another supplier.

name: Kim Garaux
text: I would not recommend this place, very unprofessional, we had appt at 10 am, they called and running 1 hr behind, so we got there at 11 and we were told it was now 12pm for departure time for parasailing,  we asked if there would be any other delays and we were told no unless there was unforseen wind or if the boat blew up and sank, who says this things? Anyway, we then got a call saying the boat was broke and did we want to reschedule? Hell no I don't want to, I just want to cancel. I didn't even want to give a 1 star, but there was no 0 star rating.

name: Annett Northrop
text: We had a great 6 hour fishing tour with Nate as our first mate and Brett as the Captain! We hit 3 stops and had great fishing at all three. Nate is the best at getting everybody’s fish in the boat and keeping everybody baited and untangled! It was such a fun trip!

name: Michael Callies
text: Couldn't have asked for a better experience. Captain Ben & 1st mate Timmy showed me and my family a great time on the water today. Put us on fish all day long and kept us entertained with their light hearted banter. Will definitely book another charter with them in the future!

name: Axley Bros
text:
13 of us had anEXCELLENT day with Capt. Brett and first mate Peyton on the Southwind. We did and 8 hour charter and limited out. One of our group caught a 36" 23 Lbs. Red snapper a real Quality fish. We had many 5-7   Lbs. fish that tasted really good. These guys know what they are doing and do everything they can to make your day enjoyable. Tight Lines Capt. Brett

Thanks

name: Summer Seymour
text: Thanks Capt. Tom and Sam for the great time we had yesterday on the water dog. Highly recommend these guys!

name: Tony Mccloud
text:
Thank you for the third year in a row for more fish than is needed for a fish fry
Had a very awesome captain and first mate. Thank you Sam good luck with the duck hunting
Year 2021 Sam is no longer the 1st mate he is a awesome captain and has a great 1st mate. Thank you Sam and Kyle. We will be next year. If you want the fishing trip of a lifetime see captain Sam. Thank you

name: Chris Jenkins
text: Went out on the water dog with Captain Ben and Carlton on a 8hr , don't let their age fool you these guys are great ,best trip I've ever been on . The boat is perfect for 6 ,plenty of room and a good ac. Good tackle. I highly recommend these guys . I'll definitely hook back up with these guys .

name: Jason Cardin
text: What a day!!! Captain Brett and Kyle were fantastic. We have been on some gulf charters in the past but this was the best. They went above and beyond to make sure we  had a great day on the water. Looking forward to booking them again next year.

name: Gary Jarvis
text: Capt Tom is a extremely professional Captain and a very good fishermen.Its impressive at the professionalism he and his crew exhibits . Capt Tom and crew have a demeanor and skill working with first time anglers that makes us want to fish with him again. I recommend that if you want to take your family fishing for the first time this is the guy you want to introduce your kids and significant others to saltwater fishing. Top notch equipment and nice boat and Captain Tom's personality all add up to a great day on the water. I cant wait to go fishing on the Fairwater 2 again later this year when red snapper season opens

I cant wait to go fishing on the Fairwater 2 again later this year when red snapper season opens

name: Jonathan Eaton
text: Capt Darrel is one of the nicest people on the island and will work as hard as he has to , to get the fish had a great time and highly recommend

name: jimmie barton
text: Picked a date back in February and Mother Nature had other plans for that date. Seas were rough and it poured on us most of the trip. Radio traffic indicated even seasoned guides were not finding many fish, let alone bites. Captain Joe and Deckhand Dallas did a great job locating and getting us on several species. We did not wast half the trip travelling. We caught a bunch among all three of us, unfortunately the trigger fish was out of season and most of the snapper were not legal length. My wife even landed a large amber jack. We brought home meat and had fun in spite of the weather. Would definitely book them again.

name: John Collins
text: Great trip with an experienced captain and a crew that kept us on fish. We took eight first-timers who all caught fish. Excellent trip. Definitely recommend a trip on the Cool Change.

resp.text: Thank you and hope to see you and your group again next year!

name: John Muhlhauser
text: Absolutely had an amazing time!! Cpt. Nash was able to put us right on the fish! Even with the other boats around we were the only ones reeling in catches! We ended up catching 5-6 different types of fish.  Afterwards he fileted our catches to prepare them for use to eat. Overall we had an amazing time!

name: Chris Weaver
text: Capt Joe was awesome. Very personable and super friendly.  Booked a last minute inshore charter since my new boat is still in rigging.  We had a great morning smashing big sheepshead and redfish. Even got a keeper black snapper. Joe was very forthcoming about different areas to catch’em when I get my boat eventually.  There is fine fishing inshore at Orange beach and Joe can put you on them. Pic is my buddy’s 1st redfish. Highly recommend cool change!  Thanks Joe.

resp.text: Thank you Chris be seeing you again when you get your new boat!

name: Chris Fryar
text: Great day on the water, caught a lot of fish with a party of 12, crew never let us down, always had us ready to fish!!!

name: Austin Greene
text: Went on a 4 hour trip this evening caught some Spanish mackerel and a king trolling and ended up doing a little bottom fishing and got on some red snapper!! Deckhand did an awesome job def gonna be coming back!

name: Brian Waggoner
text:
We took 15 people, varying experience and age (from 12-70). Everyone landed atleast 20 fish. We hit our limit on Red snapper quick, and filled up on vermillion snapper.
Aiden was an amazing hand. With that many lines all landing fish, he kept up and kept us fishing. I've taken several charters and never had a deck hand as good as Aiden. Take this charter and you will have a great time!
Thanks for the best experience we could ask for!

name: Cody Gaston
text: Captain Joe Nash and his deck hand Ryan were both awesome and kept us catching fish. It was a great trip and something that I hope to do again some day. I highly recommend Cool Change Charters.

resp.text:
Thank you Cody hope to see you again, pass my name
along to anyone comming to Gulf Shores and Orange Beach Al

name: Joe Fuller
text: We went "fishing" or should I say a 6 hour boat ride on July 13th. It was a horrible experience for a group that has fished all over the globe. I attempted to resolve this with the owner of the boat and he has just been given me the run around for a month. Highly recommend using another fishing charter.

name: Eugene Hostetler
text: Our family had a wonderful time fishing on the Cool Change. Bryan and Sam worked really hard to get us on fish and we were able to limit out on red snapper.

name: john doe
text: these guys are great!!!  Bottom Fishing was a bit slow Captain Joe worked hard to find fish.  Deckhand Sam was very personable and family friendly.   Definitely will be back and book with Cool Change Charters!

name: Danny R
text:
BEST. TRIP. EVER.
Nine people from my family recently took a six hour trip on Cool Change.  Captain Joe Nash was professional and personable.  And the dude knows how to find the fish!  I have previously gone on several deep-sea fishing trips (in three different states), but this was by far the most successful and enjoyable!!
Joe, thanks again for a trip we will never forget.  We will definitely be seeing you in the future!

name: Al Cummins
text: We had 8 of our family to go fishing this morning. The 3 girls out fished the 5 guys today!!! Our whole crew Limited out on a 5 hour trip. Hospitality was awesome. Captain Joe was great to work with and really worked with us to give our family a great experience. We will definitely be back to fish with Cool Change.

resp.text: Thank you Al ,I hope I get the pleasure of taking you and your group fishing again, the guys need a little practice lol

name: Chris Raborn
text: Setting out on one of the clearest days in the midst of a few weeks of rough waters, Captain Nash accompanied but deck hand Ryan, navigated his way to a day of plentiful fish catching. Not a member of my group left without reeling in a trophy of a fish and we were not disappointed with the hospitality. I would definitely recommend the Cool Change out of Zekes charter for anyone who wants to enjoy a relaxed day of good fun and the thrill of fishing. Thanks again Captain Nash for a wonderful morning!

resp.text: Thanks for fishing with us Chris and hope to see you and your group again

name: Joe Nash
text:
I am the owner /operator and would like to hear from my customers. We provide a fine fishing platform for our customers. I have over 30yrs of full time charter fishing experience and love to take people fishing.
This review was posted just to check my link.
Hope to take you fishing soon.
Capt. Joe Nash

text: Great fishing charter!! The Captain/Owner has good team working price right for private group. Kids/ old kids had a great time. Yes book it!!!. Jim from the Midwest.

He was able to locate and put us on fish giving everyone on board the opportunity to work the rods. I would recommend Cool Change Charters to anyone seeking a well equipped fishing rig.

We had a blast thanks again Joe & crew!!!!

text: We had a great trip fishing with Captain Joe. Had a group of 12 and we limited out on red snapper in 45 minutes. He then put us on some Amberjack for fun and we caught a mess of those monsters too. Been fishing with Joe for several years and would recommend him to anybody looking for a charter!

text: Wow! That is all I can say about this trip! This was my bachelor party and thanks to my best man Chris and a few of the other guys, I had the best trip any guy can ask for! Not only is this my first offshore fishing trip, but it was the first fish I have ever caught! 5 stars for both Captian Nash and Deckhand Ryan for supreme service and quality fishing! Totally recommend these two for any type of fishing you want to do!

text: I fished with Joe in 2014 and had a blast. They were very helpful and patient as we had a large private group of adults and children. I plan on booking him again this summer. Can’t wait!

name: Corey Crawford 8430
text:
I have tried quite a few off shore fishing charters and nothing comes close to Capt. Nash and his crew! He put us on the fish after a very short time and we caught our limit of quality red snapper within an hour or so! Many captains will tell you they are going to do some trolling back to shore but Capt. Nash helped us catch 9 keepers on the way back in. We ended up with Spanish Makrel also!
The first mate was also top notch! He was stern enough to keep 8 14-17 year old boys in line but also very helpful when needed! We will be back next year!

resp.text: Looking forward to next year Corey!

name: Gina Ferguson
text: We had a great time deep sea fishing. Great captain & crew. It was our first deep sea fishing trip. Will definitely go again & will definitely use Cool Change!!

name: Zac Shipp
text:
We had a wonderful trip with captain Joe in early May. We aren’t experienced deep sea folks, and they were able to really put us on the fish! We had a wonderful time and can’t wait to get back out there next May.

We went on the 6 hour trip, and caught Spanish and Kings on the way out (and in!!). We caught triggerfish, Amberjack, black snapper, and HUGE red snapper. The guys on the Cool Change over delivered! The boat was nice and they made sure that we were comfortable from start to finish. Great people that I highly recommend.

name: cha Do
text: Really enjoyed Joe Nash taking us out.  He put us right on two great fishing spots. Will definitely book another trip with him.

resp.text: Looking forward to taking you on your next trip, thank you for fishing with me.

Great fishing on the Cool Change with Captain Joe's

text: I have now gone on charters with Captain Black for the past 4 years. He's very personable and knowledgeable and works hard to make sure that everybody has a great time. name: Josh Parmer
text: Our family highly recommends Reel Attraction charters!!!! The captain was patient, fun, and personable. All 6 of us, both kids and adults had a blast! Captain didn't want to waist our time in spots that weren't hitting, and kept us all smiling the entire time!!! Would most definitely choose Reel Attractions again!

name: Dylan Walters
text: Me and my 3 sons had a great time on our fishing charter with Captain Black. It was all business from start to finish. Limited on Red Snapper in about 30 minutes of fishing. We will be fishing with Real Attraction Charters again in 2018 !

name: Vicky Bowerman
text: Very prepared and organized.  Had a great plan for catching fish. Very knowledgeable.  Would highly recommend him to others and will be booking with Captain Ron again.

name: Sam Bright
text: We did an all day trip! Morning trip out was incredible! Put us on some nice bull reds (big redfish) that put up a nice fight! Some of the guys on the boat had never been saltwater fishing and Captain Ron did an amazing job explaining all the different fish species and telling everyone about the gulf! We went back out on a afternoon trip to deep drop on some snapper and once again captain paid off! We pulled some slobs of snapper off a reef! I highly recommend using Captain Ronnie to take you fishing. As a local of the gulf coast he did an amazing job! Thanks Capt!

resp.text: Thank you Sam! Really enjoyed having you and your friends out. Also enjoyed having you help with retrieving the fish and thank you for the help keeping the boat clean. Call me anytime and we will do it again. Thank you!

name: Billy Daugherty
text:
Reel Attraction Charters & Captain Ronnie Black

Excellent experience with superb customer service!

If you’re going deep sea fishing in or around Ft. Morgan, AL and want to have a great experience and get your money’s worth, this is your charter! Our experience was worth this extended review.

Prior to this week, I had been deep sea fishing only once and that was on a “party boat” of sorts. It was an overall bad experience being on a boat with 30 or more people, lines all tangled up, people getting sea sick, etc.

My wife and I had a totally opposite experience with Captain Black. As a matter of fact, we booked and fished three separate charters with three separate companies during our week at the beach. While each experience was pleasurable, for the most part (come on – it’s fishing!), our charter with Reel Attractions was by far THE BEST overall charter experience. The customer service was second to none. From our initial phone call to discuss and schedule the charter, to the phone calls in the days and hours before the charter to discuss weather (Hurricane Nate), Captain Black was prompt, courteous, and patient with all our questions. He was at the dock waiting for us when we arrived (early). The boat was a perfect size with all the necessary amenities. He took time to explain everything to us. We didn’t want for anything. Captain Black was very attentive to our every need, he is very, very personable, he made every effort to make sure we were catching a variety of fish (and we did), he operated safely, and he did a great job cleaning our fish. Captain Black is a consummate professional and my wife and I highly recommend him and Reel Attraction charters.

On a side note, you don’t have to just take my word for it. Not only was our experience with him a stand out of the three experiences we had this week, but it was later validated when we took our haul to a local restaurant who will cook your catch for you. The restaurant staff was asking us about our experience and complimenting the variety of fish we had. Without us even saying his name, the waitress asked, “who did you go fishing with, Captain Ronnie Black?” You might have chosen a reputable charter when the locals attribute a successful catch to certain charters!

resp.text: Thank you for an awesome review!

name: Andrew Collins
text: Ron took my wife and I out on Wed 6-22-16 in the afternoon I caught 2 king mackerel and 3 keeper red snapper one about 8 pounds. Wife got sick and had to bring her back to the dock, Ron took me to fish in the bay, no luck. Over all very good trip! The fresh fish tasted Great!

name: Caleb Greenberg
text: We had a great time with captain Ron!!! He made the experience fun and made sure we caught plenty of fish. Would highly recommend him to anyone on vacation who wants a great deal and a great experience!!!

name: Chandra Stebbins
text: We had no trouble booking our outing with Capt. Ronnie initially.  However, on 5/29/2017, the day that we were supposed  to go out, there were storms off the coast and we could not.  OK,  we understand.  Capt. Ronnie said he would call around to a couple of his Captain buddies to see if someone could take us out on the  31st or June 1st, he never called us.  We had to call him...then he acted like he never heard of us.   Since our trip was cancelled due to weather we have not been able to get in touch with Capt. Ronnie for a refund of our deposit.  We are very disappointed in Reel Attractions.

name: Candice Myers
text: My husband and I had a great time and caught our limit on redfish. Couldn't be happier and will definitely book again!

name: elizabeth1228
text: Had a great time. Caught a lot of fish. Looking forward to the next fishing trip.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Buddy Lawson
text: Had a great day caught our limit.Ron Ron is a very knowledgeable and courteous and his boat is very comfortable to fish from.

name: Alex Moore
text: Had a Great time fishing ! Captain Ron did an excellent job putting us on fish early and often!

resp.text: Thank you Alex! Had a great time with you guys this Eve!

name: Jennifer Johnson

text: Scheduled a trip out and the captain decided to cancel all trips for our day. We never heard from him. We still showed up and called him and he didn't even write us down on the books.

resp.text: Their was a miss communication and so sorry for that. I did offer a discounted trip for Friday. I'm sorry for the misunderstanding and hope to hear from you at a later date.

name: Richard Wright
text: 6 hour trip we caught 3 fish, very small, very expensive and won’t be using them again.

resp.text: Mr. Richard Wright I looked on our reservation book and do not see you as a guest. I rarely do 6 hour charters and if i do and the fish are not biting that day I cut them trips much shorter and prorate the charge. If you departed from Fort Morgan Marina you did not fish with us. I'm sorry you had a bad day when the fish were not active and if I can help you in any way feel free to contact me. 2514228665 Capt. Black.

name: Clare StackpoleMcGrath
text: it was breath taking awesome

text: Captain Scott made a great and enjoyable day for us! We had 3 people all together and caught PLENTY of fish. We will be coming back next year to see him again! Highly recommend

text: Great experience with captain Scott. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for a good time and to catch a lot of fish.

name: Chris Mesker
text: Captain Scott was great. Put my kids and I on some nice fish and a great variety. Trout, Sheephead, Red and Drum and that's just what we kept.

name: Robert Miller
text: We had a wonderful time with Captain Scott! I'll definitely be going on another tour with him again.

name: Luke Newell

name: T Chris
text: Wow...such a great time for my young family (wife and kids 10 and 8) this morning.  We did a 5 hr trip with Captain Scott and the time flew by as we were having a great time.  Scott is a great guide, very knowledgeable, and patient/helpful to put us all in position to catch fish.....and that's what we did.  Many Redfish & Trout and some others....and then my 10 yr old landed a 40lb black drum after a 10 min fight to bring him in (thanks to some coaching from our guide!) On top of great fishing, Scott has a good eye to spot dolphins and we got some great up close sightings of a pod of dolphins feeding a short distance from the boat!  Really awesome to see!  We are not experienced fisherman....just beginners and this was really fun.  Highly recommend when visiting Gulf Shores!

name: Alan Miller
text: Had the best time fishing and talking and told a few jokes. I limited out on red fish and my wife caught a monster black drum. Cant wait for the next trip.  Thanks for great memories.

text: My girlfriend, her father, and I all boated around with “Scott” this morning. We’re on vacation here in Gulf Shores for the week and were just looking for a laid back fishing venture. Scott assured our time was spent well; we caught many red fish, black drum and some speckled trout. My girlfriend and I know very little about fishing, but Scott was eager to serve us. By the end of the trip, I felt as though Scott were more of a friend, than a fishing guide. We HIGHLY recommend Scott as a fishing guide; We’ll likely come back to see him next time we visit Gulf Shores.

text:
I have fished with Little Lagoon Fishing "Scott" for the last three years. I have fished for many years and many places this is by far the best fishing experiences I have ever experienced. Scott is very passionate and takes pride in his charter business, Scott makes you feel very welcome to be on his boat, not only does he not give up he works as hard as he can to put a fish on your hook. Not only does he make you feel welcome he, Scott always puts safety first to make sure you are well taken care of.

Looking forward to seeing you next time buddy.
Thanks, Brad.

text: Great Fishing

name: M Williams
text: Just got back from Orange Beach where we went fishing with Captain Pete on the Yankee Star. We caught our limit of fish and had a blast doing so. both Captain Pete and his deck hand were super professionally and so helpful. We will be back.

name: Sean Eubanks
text: I booked a trip for my wife and I on July 23, 2021. We arrived early and was welcomed aboard. This was hands down, by FAR the best fishing trip I’ve ever been on. The captain had us on fish The entire 5 hours and his first mate worked his rear end off making sure we had bait, keeping lines in the water and helping us in any manner we needed. The crew was very polite, engaging and a pleasure to be around. They made us feel right at home and truly made the experience unforgettable. I would recommend Yankee Star to anyone and will be sure to use them for any future trips we take. Thank you!!!

name: Lauren Bethancourt
text: Highly recommend! This is the ONLY fishing charter we will ever book again! We have been out twice and both times the captain and deck hand were awesome! Put us right on the fish, cleaned them for us at the dock, and sent us home happy with lots of fish to cook! Worth every penny and make sure you take care of your deck hand when it comes to tipping! He definitely works hard and earns it!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Lauren! 😃

name: John Patrick
text: Had a great father son trip with Capt. Pete and deckhand Ricky. Got out fast and had fish within 30 seconds of dropping the first hook. We had plenty of work to do and even though little man got nauseous so we had to cut short, Capt. Pete was first class in making sure my man wouldn’t be miserable for hours. I looked around on lots of places reviewing these charters, but Capt. Pete’s actions in the situation will have us hooking up with Yankee Star anytime we plan to go for life. His integrity and Ricky’s keeping our arms burning is worth every penny for the trip! Thanks for an awesome memories! Almost forgot, got a tip about a place to go to get our fresh filleted red snapper cooked (Mikee’s Seafood) and we all left stuffed from the excellent grub (blackened, grilled, and fried), thanks for the hookup Yankee Star!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, John! 😃

name: Sam Golden
text: This was my first time out offshore fishing. A group of 6 of us went out for 6 hours. We caught our limit of red snapper and a few others. The captain put us right on the fish, and the deckhand was a big help. They clean the fish for you to take home. I highly recommend this boat! We will definitely be back!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Sam! Come back anytime 😃

name: Fred Mapp
text: I want to thank Ricky an the Captain for a wonderful day! We caught our limit on red snappers, we definitely will be  coming back to Yankee charters! THANKS

name: Pat Guy
text: Thanks Captain Pete and deckhand Ricky for an unbelievable trip on 5/31/20. This was one of the best trips I’ve ever been on and you guys got a 7 year old hooked to deep sea fishing for life. Highly recommend! See you guys again next year.

text: Great charter fishing experience 5/23/2020. Boat, captain and 1st mate were all wonderful. Highly recommend fishing with this boat.

text: Capt. Pete sure knows how to locate the fish and Ricky is fun and on the ball helping the fishing customers.  We wasted no time waiting, just catching fish the whole time.  When Capt. said pick up, we did and he moved us to anther spot and kept catching fish.  Ricky works hard to make sure everyone is taken care of.  Cleaned fish and sent it home with us.  We recommend this boat and crew. (to be real, the only thing I would say is if you are allergic to cigarettes, you will encounter some on this boat). Great job guys.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, MP! 😃

name: Jimmy Michels
text: I highly recommend these guys! This was my first experience deep sea fishing and these guys made it a blast. Put us on fish the whole time never a dull moment. Even caught a 7ft shark. Highly Highly recommend the Yankee star

text: Fantastic experience! Went with a small group. Crew made us comfortable and were friendly. Took the time to make sure everyone was familiar with the rods and tackle and also how to keep our balance and how to handle the fish. Those brief lessons paid off handsomely as we caught our limit of vermillion and then trigger fish, moving on to larger variety including multiple large red snapper and a bull shark. No wasted time waiting for fish to bite, Captain put us on the fish and kept us on them all day. I highly recommend this Captain and vessel to ensure you have the best experience!

These two are  extremely friendly, knowledgeable, and they make sure you have fun while catching a lot of fish. We caught so many fish that we lost count. They are extremely good with kids and I would highly recommend a fishing trip on this boat. We look forward to our next fishing trip on the Yankee star!

text: What a day! I traveled from NC to go fishing with my parents and was a little crushed to see that the weather was not expected to cooperate on our scheduled day. A terrific host, extremely knowledgeable person about a lot more than fishing, and just an overall pleasure to hang out with. I'd highly recommend him if you're in the area and in the market for a guide/charter. Thanks Jason!

name: Brad Hall
text: Captain Jason Gamble is very knowledgeable about the area. He comes highly recommended on previous reviews and they are all accurate. Will definitely be fishing with red sky and Captain Gamble again.

name: MLE K
text: I wanted a super relaxed fishing and private tour around Mobile Bay, and that's exactly what Jason gave me. Professional, approchable, knowledgeable, and fun, Jason runs an excellent charter service. Although he is a professional, sponsored fisherman, if you're hoping to lay out on a beautiful, comfortable boat and enjoy the scenery, Red Sky Fish Co is the way to go!

name: Olivia Borlovan
text: Based on reviews I read prior to booking my fishing trip with Captain Jason, I was confident I had found the best charter along the Gulf Coast in my area, and he did not disappoint! Jason is extremely amiable and down-to-earth..He was so accommodating and did absolutely everything in his power to ensure we were comfortable the entire time and had the best fishing trip possible! Safety and giving us a fun trip were his priorities. Jason is an extremely experienced fisherman, captain, and guide and knew the waters and fishing spots better than the back of his own hand. He was so knowledgeable and helpful throughout the entire trip that I had no qualms putting full confidence in everything he told us. We found Jason to be a very honest, trustworthy and personable individual we cannot wait to fish with again!  I think it's safe to say that he took me on the funnest, most enjoyable fishing trip of my life! His passion for fishing shows and doesn't allow him to do anything but provide his customers with the best experience possible! If you're thinking about booking a trip with him, stop thinking and do it!!

name: Patrick Hugh
text: We had a great fishing trip with our Captain Jason. He is so experienced and knowledgeable about the fishing details. He was very pleasant and courteous. I highly recommend him and would definitely book another charter with him again.

My 4 year old daughter loved every minute of it and he was great helping her catch some fish. Our last trip, my wife and I caught tournament size Red Fish, my daughter caught a Baby Drum and we all caught Speckled and White Trout. If your looking for a fishing charter with someone who will go above and beyond to get you what you want, Red Sky Fish Co. and Captain Jason Gamble are the fishing charter you need and deserve.

name: Andrew Kuykendall
text: Incredible fishing trip. Captain Jason put us on plenty of reds and trout and we had an absolute blast. Great guy and great times with a group of 4. Young guy with a lot of energy and interest in making the trip a blast for groups of all ages. Highly recommend Red Sky Fishing Co Mobile.

name: Doug Young
text: We were in from out of town and had an awesome day on the water with Jason. He is incredibly knowledgeable about the area and brought us to some great spots — none of us left empty handed! The boat is great, the ride was smooth, the fishing was 💯 and we had all kinds of fun. Thank you!

He has patience with her and takes the time to really teach her how to fish. This was our 3rd trip and we are already planning a 4th trip during the fall! I will not go anywhere else. You get more than your moneys worth here; take advantage of it! Captain Jason is knowledgeable, respectful, motivated, and an all around great guy.

text: Captain Jason is an awesome guide!  He put us in the best spot, and we hammered some fish.  If you are going to be in the Mobile Bay area and want to go fishing, Captain Jason is the man!

text: Jason is a professional. Best money I have spent in a really long time.

name: Jackie Roberts
text: Had an amazing trip T J and Tyler did an amazing job.I would recommend them highly enjoyed every minute thanks guys

name: Jamie Hirtz
text: We got down to Destin on Saturday, our 5 year old and 6 year old decided they wanted to do some fishing so we called around and everyone was booked but we were lucky and got a spot with High Cotton a few days prior to them taking us out and making time for us! We wanted to do a shorter trip, as we didn't know how the kids would do. Shorter trips were unheard of down here but TJ was all for it! We scheduled for a 2 hour and were playing by ear a 3rd and 4th hour. Our oldest wasn't doing great with sea sickness, but our 5 year old was LOVING it and every time we caught a fish, TJ cheered out and was so excited for our son! In the 2 hours we were our, we caught 7 fish and a good sized bullshark! Captain TJ and Tyler were awesome and got us exactly what we wanted for our boys! Highly recommend and we will be using him every time we come back.

name: Lenny Michaela
text: We have chartered the High Cotton at least 7 times now over the years.  Captain Chris owns and operates the boat which fishes 10 people fairly comfortably. We have consistently had huge catches of Red Snapper along with Mackerel, Trigger Fish, Amberjack, Wahoo, Mahi Mahi, and several fish per trip that we couldn't even get off the bottom!  If you want a quality trip,  go fishing on High Cotton!

resp.text:
Man THANK YOU LENNY
It has been great getting to know you’re family. I can’t wait for next year.
Chris

name: Leslie Burrow
text:
I can't recommend High Cotton Charters enough! I haven't been on the water in 30 years and it was a first for my son. Captain Chris Garner was the best host and his crew never skipped a beat!

And that 23lb Red Snapper didn't hurt either!!!

name: Brian Cartee
text: Best charter ever. We were on the fish all day. Limited out on big fish. First wahoo I ever put in the boat.  No doubt I'll be a repeat customer.

name: Jeff Sanders
text: Been on plenty of trips with High Cotton. Capt Chris and his crew work hard to provide unique solid offshore fishing trips. Had yet to have a trip where we don't come back with fish! If you've got a specific experience your looking to accomplish offshore give Chris a call and he will give you the best solution to your offshore fishing experience. If you want to catch wahoo, king mackeral, mahi mahi, amberjack, red snapper, grouper, sharks, tuna, or whatever else is out in the Gulf... he will give you the best solution to what time is best to go and seasons. Plus his boat is phenominal. High class fishing on a high class fishing yacht. You won't be disappointed.

name: Tyler Keeley
text: Had a great experience fishing with Captain Chris and first mates Holt and Shawn.  We had around 13 people and had no problems getting everyone fixed up and fishing.  The boat was great and had plenty of room to sit inside if it got too hot or someone wanted to relax.  I even took a nap on the way back to land in one of the bunks. It was awesome!  I would highly recommend High Cotton to anyone coming to the area to do some fishing.  Lot's of fun!

resp.text: Glad you had lots of fun! Lets do it again. Thanks for the review!

name: jacob moseley
text: Our first trip on the High Cotton was an awesome experience.  We caught our limits of Snapper and Beeliners. We fished nine people comfortably. The boat was super clean and plenty of room to get out of the sun while traveling. Captain Chris,  First Mate Holt, and deck hand Mattie were unbelievably organized and insightful. They were busting it all day keeping us hooked up and reeling. Very good boat, even better people, I will definitely be calling them again for my next trip.

resp.text: Thank you, Jacob! Let's do it again!

name: Jason Thomason
text: Chris and his guys put us on the tuna.  We were the guy's that smashed them on the dock today. They worked hard to make sure we had a great trip

name: john russell
text: have fished with these guys on multiple trips... always make fishing fun, great crew, Chris does a great job... likes to teach and talk about what is going on during the trip... would use again in a heart beat

name: Keith Royer
text: We had an excellent time on this Orange Beach fishing charter.  We caught tons of fish on the nicely setup fishing boat and our Orange Beach fishing trip is one we will tell our friends about.  We're coming back in May for another Alabama fishing charter.

name: Thomas Rucker
text: First time fishing offshore for me. Had a great experience and already planning for the next trip.

name: Trevor Stockholm
text: This was the best Orange Beach Charter fishing trip we've been on.  Captain Chris knows his stuff!   We've been on several Orange Beach fishing trips and this one was off the hook...

name: Dave Schreier
text:
Fish with High Cotton every year, 6, 8 and overnight Tuna.
Captain, Vessel​, equipment and crew are first class.
Do yourself a favor and check this charter out

name: A Green
text: Great business and great people! Recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for your support!

name: Stephen Parker
text:
I had recently did a preserve pheasant hunt with Intercoastal Safaris.  I mainly duck hunt and never went on a pheasant hunt before.  It was great and the hunt went like a well oiled machine!  We scratched out a bunch of birds, before an awesome BBQ lunch, and had enough time to go enjoy the beach for a bit afterwards!

The guys at Intercoastal Safaris are great and a big part of a bird hunt is who you are around.  I really had a great time with them!

I’m looking forward to hunting with Intercoastal Safaris again and I highly recommend them!

resp.text: If you liked the Pheasant hunt your going to cover our duck hunt in a few weeks. Thanks again for trusting your "Uniquely Coastal Hunting & Fishing" memories to Intercoastal Safaris.

name: Lendon Webb
text: Awesome business with awesome guides.

name: Matt Murrell
text: Consummate Professional from start to finish. With a couples offshore fishing trip, Stephen insured all necessary amenities and helped my wife through sea sickness to catching the biggest snapper of the day.

resp.text:
Thanks Matt. I always enjoy helping people enjoy the Uniquely Coastal Hunting and Fishing our beautiful gulf coast has to offer.

#HuntFishParty

name: Andrew Porter
text: This was my wife’s first duck hunt, and it couldn’t have been more perfect!!! We had an absolute blast!! Everything was great from the start... the Guide was great,  the ducks were on fire and Steven was very knowledgeable and accommodating throughout the whole gig!! There couldn’t have been a better way to introduce my better half to the sport I love!!! Thank you guys!

resp.text:
Andrew -

Thanks for the kind review. I know we both tried several times to make this hunt happen. Lauren and I enjoyed hunting with you and Amy as well. Our duck preserve is a great way to introduce new Hunter to waterfowl hunting.

name: Tyler Brantley
text: Took a last min fishing trip with these guys. That listened to what I wanted and made it happen. That alone makes them true pros in my book.

resp.text: Thanks Tyler, we hope to see you again!

name: Ken Beck
text: Steven and Smokey were awesome guides, and made sure our group had an awesome hunt! They're an experienced crew who knows the area well and will make sure you have the best shot to fill your quota. They put us right on the ducks and made sure we had fun the whole time out on the water. Would highly recommend going with Intercoastal Safaris for your next hunt.

resp.text:
Man,  we absolutely love what we do and it was a blast spending time with you in the duck blind. Next time your looking for a "Uniquely Coastal Hunting & Fishing" adventure, look us up. We would love to have you back. #HuntProud

-Stephen Lee

name: Brett Campbell
text: Went on the thermal hog hunt with Paul last week. The first trip was an apparently rare strikeout for even seeing hogs, but Paul invited us back a few days later for a second chance. I’m not much of a hunter, but MAN was it a blast. We had opportunities at two different fields and took 5 hogs total. Having that thermal scope out in the pitch black field sneaking up on those hogs feels like too much fun to even be legal. I would recommend this trip to anyone, even if you’ve never hunted a day in your life. If you’ve made it to this website to read this review, then you are going to love this trip.

resp.text:
Brett-

Thanks for the kind review. I'm glad Paul was able to get yall on some pigs the 2nd night. These night vision hunts are among my personal favorites. We look forward to seeing you again for another 'Uniquely Coastal Hunting & Fishing" adventure.

- Stephen

name: Jose Sifuentes
text: Fantastic operation! I would recommend their charters to everyone serious about fishing. We went out for red snapper and caught huge fish. Captain Aaron was amazing and extremely knowledgeable. Jeff was easy to work with and runs a solid operation. All in all, a fantastic experience.

resp.text: What an amazing trip you and your wife had! We hope to serve you again soon!

name: Mr Dees
text: Our family has always had great experiences with Intercoastal Safaris. This company literally goes out of their way to provide great coastal experiences. They are the only fishing charter I've called that answers their phone and calls back promptly. I would recommend their services to anyone looking for a stress free experience. I wont call anyone other than Intercoastal Safaris for my coastal fishing needs.

resp.text: We will do everything we can to create first time customers into repeat customers. We feel honored to know you had such a positive experience with our company and look forward to future business.

name: Brandon Knox
text: Went down for The Bachelor Party Bash during Mullet Toss Weekend. We had a group of 10 guys and Intercoastal Safaris was able to take care of everything from accommodations in a beachfront condo, VIP passes to The FloraBama for each night, a great golf outing and an epic day of fishing in the gulf ending with a custom cooked dinner at Salt using the fish we caught. When we Arrived the fridge was full of beer and there were snacks to help get us through the weekend. If you want a fun trip without the headache of planning, Intercoastal Safaris is the way to go, they take care of everything. Stephen Lee and Jeff were great and took care of everything for us. Thank you Intercoastal Safaris for such a great trip!

resp.text:
Brandon,
It was a honor to be able to plan and make your bachelor party the best it could be. Thanks for taking our advice and planning it during the Mullet Toss weekend. We look forward to serving you again in the near future.

name: Alan Lee
text: Steve and Captain Smokey, are truly a pair of enjoyable guides and made my first duck hunt an incredible memory. They are honest, professional, and most importantly highly knowledgeable. I was very impressed with their guiding and look forward to my next hunt with them.

resp.text: Alan, thanks again for the opportunity to assist you on your 1st duck hunt. Helping our clients capitalize on "Uniquely Coastal Hunting & Fishing" opportunities here on the gulf coast is our sole mission. Yall were a fun group and rest assured im calling on you for some advice on my hunting trip to Hawaii later this year. If we can ever be of any further assistance please let me know. - Stephen Lee

name: richard arbuckle
text:
Dear Paul & Eric,
When my son and I booked the hunt through Intercoastal Safaris (thanks Jeff) my original objective was to experience 2 events: #1: Hunting with AR-10's/nightvision (which is not permitted here in Canada), and #2. Hunting feral/wild hogs.  While were able to experience both what made the hunt truly memorable is the knowledge, sportsmanship, professionalism, and dedication of both Paul and Eric. Thank you for being our guides on the recent nighttime hog hunt. My son and I had a great time. You two are a class act.

resp.text: Richard - Thanks for hunting with us.  Paul called me to let us know he very much enjoyed hunting with you and your son. If their is any way we can help on your next "Uniquely Coastal Hunting & fishing " excursion pleas don't hesitate to call. I'm sure Jeff will be glad to help. -Stephen

name: Katie Stewart
text: During the summer I went on a charter with Intercoastal Safaris and it was so wonderful. The captain was extremely helpful, and I caught my first ever fish! I was so excited! I honestly am the worst at fishing, but the experience was fantastic and I will definitely be using them in the future!! Thank you for a wonderful memory!

resp.text: Thanks so much for allowing us to be your first fish memory! It can become quite addictive when you're matched with one of our solid fishing guides. Look forward to serving you on your next fishing trip with us.

name: Brandon Hill
text: Great time in Orange Beach this weekend with Intercoastal Safaris. This was my second weekend in a row with them. The first was an awesome offshore trip in Destin. We caught over 75 keepers, and probably 30+ that we had to throw back. This weekend was a bachelor party trip. We had a ton of fun Bow fishing, and even though weather didn't allow for the inshore fishing on Saturday, Stephen and Jeff made sure the trip was still a blast. I look forward to going back.

resp.text: Thanks for fishing with us! Looking forward to future business with you!

name: Damon Wofford
text: From the moment you meet Stephen Lee you can tell that he is passionate about hunting and fishing. His commitment to providing an unforgettable experience is second to none. He and his staff work tirelessly from start to finish to provide the ultimate hunting and fishing trip. I would highly recommend Intercoastal Safaris!

resp.text: Thank you Damon for the encouraging words. Your absolutly right we love what we do. I have found that a little bit of profesionalism goes a long way in the outdoors industry. If there is any way we be of assistance in the future please give our office a call 850-375-2223 #HuntProud

name: Pierce Abercrombie
text: We just got back yesterday from my buddy's bachelor trip. These guys put together one hell of a party for us. From the condo to the offshore fishing trip to the nights out at the Florabama, it was an awesome weekend. I have no complaints and will definitely be using Intercoastal Safaris in the future.

resp.text: Pierce, we look forward to continuing a relationship with you and your friends. Great times were made on the Gulf Coast!

name: Patrick Renna
text: From booking to the hunt I had a great experience. Our guide Paul gave us opportunities to shoot some really big boars along with a few smaller hogs. Myself and my party had a great hunt with plenty of fun & exciting stories to tell our friends

resp.text: Patrick, On behalf of our entire team, thank you for trusting your hunting & fishing memories to Intercoastal Safaris. Were glad you had a great time. If we can ever help you create more "Uniquely Coastal Hunting & Fishing" memories please give us a call. Sincearly, Stephen Lee

name: Dalton Brandt
text: I just booked a family vacation with these guys. Our family has never been treated better. The communication has been on point. I was referred to these guys by a friend who has been in the past and I'm very much looking forward to the 1st class experience that I have no doubt that is headed my way!

resp.text: Loved having you Dalton! We hope to see you and your family soon.

name: Hannah deVilliers Gatlin
text: We had such an awesome duck hunt with Intercoastal Safaris, defiantly if you are in the area its a must! The Guide Stephen and all the boat captains and deckhands were super friendly and helpful. My husband and I were hunting duck for the first time ever and both shot and killed ducks.

resp.text: Hannah, it was great to finally meet you and your husband face to face. I speak on behalf of the entire team when I say we love taking people duck hunting for the first time! We look forward to seeing you and your husband back in our duck bond in the near future. #HuntProud

name: Colleen Freeman
text: Booked a deep sea fishing trip and had a blast! We all caught fish and came close to our limit. I would recommend Intercoastal Safari's to anyone looking for a guaranteed great time. Thanks Stephen and Jedf!

resp.text: Thank you Colleen. I'm glad I had the pleasure of joining you on your trip that day. What a great way to celebrate a birthday. Looking forward to having you back on the coast!

name: Nick Wallace
text: These guys went above and beyond for my bachelor party!! Caught some awesome red snapper and had a fishing trip of a life time! Stephen, Jeff, and captain John know what they're doing and how to make your trip world class! I can't wait to go back and fish with these guys! Anyone looking for a trip of a life time, hit them up and get ready to have a blast! Also the chef at Flora Bama yacht club is top notch and knows what he is doing! He prepared some of the fish that we caught in a way that some would call emotional lol. Definitely the best fish I have ever tasted from any restaurant. Give these guys a call for your next hunting or fishing experience, I promise you won't regret it!!!

resp.text: Nick, yall were a great group of guys to party with. I think it's safe to say we all had fun that weekend. Whether it's another guys trip or a hog hunt we definitely look forward to your next "Uniquely Coastal Hunting & Fishing" experience here on the Gulf Coast.

name: Jeff Sanders
text: A great place to work at. I've been learning so much about hunting and fishing to my prior experiences in the industry. The amount of attention to detail that Stephen is focused on is what make Intercoastal Safaris completely different from other hunting/fishing businesses. Proud to be apart of this incredible business experience.

resp.text: Jeff- Thanks for the vote of confidence. As you well know by now a little bit of professionalism in the world of hunting and fishing can go a very long way. I look forward to working with you for the years to come to create "Uniquely Coastal Hunting and Fishing" memories for all our guest.

name: Eric Blanton
text: these guys are awesome. Every bit of this trip was incredible. They run and awesome business. The condo was great. The fishing was phenomenal. The flora/bama was amazing. These guys took care of every detail and it made all the difference. I seriously recommend them if you want a stress free  memorable trip! I'll never forget this trip. And the boys and I look forward to planning another trip with them sooner than later

resp.text: Looking forward to seeing you guys again soon. You're all a blast to hang out with!

name: comcam25
text: These guys are top notch! I had trouble keeping my original booking, they went above and beyond to get me rescheduled with Paul. I have hunted all over the world at various times in my life, but to chase a hog down with dogs and “stick” it was probably more excitement then I have had in 20 years! This is by no means an easy hunt, lots of running (or fast walking if you are a little chubby) through downed trees, muscling hogs out of undergrowth all while the dogs are baying and the catch dog fighting with a very irritated boar. It was a hoot!! The guides were professional, knowledgeable and all around just awesome people, at no time did we feel like things were out of control...crazy, chaotic...hell yeah but a very controlled chaos! I would have no problem recommending these guides to anyone, we killed 2 boars, one over 200lbs before 8am! Mr.Stokes took us to a local slaughter house where the guys skinned them for us, “HIGHLY” recommend just to listen to their stories if nothing else! We will be back to hunt with them in the near future!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a detailed review. You bring up a very good point. There are many more moving parts to providing a positive sporting experience to our guest than most people realize. On behalf of our entire team thank you for your business and we look forward to earning your repeat business.

name: greg kessell
text: Did the Ultimate Cast and Blast with my son and father in law. Ee are all experinced hinters and fishermen. What a great experience!  Steven Lee, Jeff and Capt. Aaron were great.  Attentive to our group's every need.  The accommodations were fantastic and came with all the amenities we needed for fun and stress free experience.  Their attention to detail was obvious and appreciated.  The duck hunting was fun and beautiful and offered a unique setting to hunt ducks.  And the fishing was great as well.  Our group is bringing home plenty of fish. A truly first class organization that takes the needs and desires of customers very seriously.  I highly recommend Intercoastal Safaris!

resp.text: Greg, you and your family made it easy on us, yall we're a lot of fun to hang out with and we look forward to doing it again in the future. Jeff tells me he sent Hunter the photos and video. I look forward to seeing what Hunter can do with them. If we can ever help in anyway please give me a call directly on my cell phone. We would love to have you guys back down anytime.

name: Mick Dees
text: Awesome fishing trip experience with these guys. Highly recommended company to work with. It's easy to see these guys love their job, which means you're in for something good.

resp.text: We had a great day of inshore fishing, glad you were able to be apart of it!

name: dugglach
text: Awesome, all inclusive trip.  The price was intimidating at first, but it turned out to be worth every penny.  I've already made glowing recommendations to several of my friends.  I will definitely be back.

resp.text: We appreciate your honesty when it comes to our pricing, we believe that we hold the value of our trips and we are glad that you gave us an opportunity to prove that.

name: Maddox James
text: Not what I expected at all. Overcharge, and bring you to locations all the locals know about. Find better deals on craigslist.

resp.text:
Maddox -
Terribly sorry to hear that! If you would like to discuss this further, please contact us at (850) 375 - 2223.  We look forward to speaking with you and working towards earning back your business!
Thank you,
Intercoastal Safaris

name: Don Allen
text: Great personal service. They did a very good job taking care of us. They put us on ducks and fish. The guides were awesome.

resp.text: We had a blast hanging out with y'all for the better 1/2 of the week. Look forward to doing son more casting and blasting with our new Kansas freinds in the future.

name: Summer Smith
text: My boyfriend and I, along with a couple of close friends, just finished up our Cast and Blast trip, and we were extremely pleased! The condo was excellent, with an amazing view. The chef, Billy Highland, from Flora-Bama Yacht club prepared a duck and mackerel entrée for us, as promised, that by far exceeded all expectations! John Ramsey and his son Trey were excellent guides during our duck hunts! We ended our trip with our fishing trip with John Ramsey. This was mine and Justin’s first time saltwater fishing, and we are hooked! John was an EXCELLENT captain and worked continuously to make sure we all had a blast and all caught fish. To wrap up the entire trip, Stephen Lee came out to speak with us, thank us for our business, and was genuinely interested in how our trip was overall. We do not have one bad thing to say about any part of the trip. Any question we had or phone call made was immediately answered or returned by Stephen or Jeff! Would highly recommend to anyone!

resp.text:
Summer-

Thank you for the kind words. Chef Billy Highland Flora Bama Yacht Club do an an amazing job for our clients. Personally one of the favorite things about my job is introducing guest to new sporting opportunities. Please feel free to call our office anytime we can be of further assistance.

name: Jimmy Daniels
text: Intercoastal Safaris always took care of my clients well. We have enjoyed a great working relationship. As well the owner of the company is a great guy, and a good angler. I am excited to have Intercoastal Safaris serving my Past and Present Ocean Ox Charters clients in the future.

resp.text: Thank you Captain Jimmy. On behalf of my entire team we very much appreciate your profesionalism and partnership. We look foward to continuing to serve Ocean Ox clients.

name: louie hubert
text: Really good experience very informative. I was wanting to learn the basics of fishing in the Gulf of Mexico and what I learned in 2 days far exceeded my expectations. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to be a better fisherman.

resp.text: Thanks for choosing us with your fishing school needs. It's always our goal to match people up with the best guides possible. Looking forward to seeing you on the waters soon!

name: Dallas Poe
text: I have known Steven for a few years now and he has taken me on several awesome hunting and fishing trips! Anything from shark fishing durning the day to hog hunting at night to smacking some ducks on the coast. Any hunting adventure your looking for he is the man to call!

resp.text: Dallas, I appreciate your willingness to continue to do business over the years. Always look forward to putting you on great hunting and fishing trips.

name: John Rapport
text: Could not be more disappointed with this!  Booked a saltwater bowfishing trip for my bachelor party and they were great to work with.  Paid the deposit, got a confirmation, thought we were all good.  We show up to the dock at 7:30 and no one is there.  I call the numbers on the email and the person had no idea of our booking.  They were a third party that Intercoastal Safaris hired.  So now we're 6 guys sitting at a dock after paying $25 in ubers to get there with no fishing to be had.  My deposit was refunded and you can tell the guys were upset with the experience but in the end, you are who you hire.  This was a bad job and ruined night #1 of my bachelor party.

resp.text:
John,

I fully understand your frustration. The last thing we want is to leave any of our clients less than satasfied with our services. The day of your trip their was a miscommunication. When our guide did not receive a call stating that you were on the way the trip was canceled. For that I do apoligize. We have addressed the issue and taken steps to assure that this will not be the case moving forward.

To my knowledge a full refund was issued with in 30 min of discovering the mistake. Additionally we are offering a free trip for future use at your discretion. As far as compensation for the ground transportation simply let us know the amount and we will be more than happy to issue compensation for that as well.

Getting these these things right is of great importance to us as a company.  Intercoastal Safaris and it's partners remain committed to doing all we can to improve all aspects of the customer experience.

Please call me directly with and additional concerns you may have.

Stephen Lee - Owner - 770-548-2002

name: Brent Robison
text: I couldn't have asked for a better Bachelor trip. These guys have every little detail covered. All we had to do was show up and have a good time. I can't wait for the next trip!

resp.text: Brent, was a great weekend of fishing! Enjoy'd meeting your crew. Look forward to doing business with you again in the near future!

name: Ally Mills Dorrough
text: Looking to learn how to fish or new techniques? Matthew Isbell – Bama Beach Bum – is an awesome teacher. Shoreline fishing is a great option for anglers of any skill level and is a great way for kids to have their first fishing experience. I have known Matthew and his wife Courtney for many years, and he is one of the most light-hearted, enthusiastic people you’ll ever meet! He’s a “guy’s guy” and a family man, and his passion for fishing and coastal Alabama shines. Stay bummy with Matthew!

resp.text: Ally- You're too kind. As a professional in the tourism industry I'm sure you're aware how hard it is to find good people with a passion providing excellent service. Matthew as proven to a great asset to our operation and we look forward to helping him provide sporting vacationers with fishing memories for many years to come. #HuntProud

name: Stephen Prewett
text: My boy and i have booked 2 deepsea fishing trips with them and had an absolute blast i would recommend them anytime great guys and knows how to treat there costumers in style

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Stephen. Aaron, Jeff and my self very much look foward to fishing with you and Hunter in the future. I hope we can find a way to get you on a duck hunt this season. #HuntProud

name: Billy Highland
text: Stephen and Jeff are as professional as it gets !!! If your in the Orange Beach, Al. area and are looking for a fishing charter,or Hog hunting, or even Duck hunting ,yes duck hunting !!! I promise you these GENTS have got you covered !!! Not to mention their prices are as reasonable as they come !!! Thanks again guys for an incredible trip on the Gulf !!!

resp.text: William, the high level of service you provide our customers is one of the main reasons we both will continue to see such high success! Thanks again for partnering with us!

name: Allen Ceynar
text: Hello Friends, Big Al here, FRIENDS I am here tell you about Stephen Lee and his AWESOME CREW , CAPTAIN AARON, AND CAPTAIN JOHN, AND CAPTAIN CHRIS, and ARRON'S lab Penny of INTERCOASTAL SAFARIS. These guys take duck hunting and fishing to a WHOLE NEW LEVEL. I have been hunting and fishing since I was 3 years old, I AM A SPONSOR OF DUCKS UNLIMITED AND DELTA WATER FOWL, and I have never hunted ducks in such beautiful surroundings , the WHITE SANDY BEACHES, CLEAR BLUE WATER, THE ABUNDANCE OF REDHEADS, BLUE BILLS, AND BUFFLE HEADS WERE INCREDIBLE!!!!!...We had 4 in our group, 2 ladies who had NEVER HUNTED DUCKS, ONE WHO HAD NEVER HUNTED PERIOD and us 2 guys who have, we were just blown away by how hard Stephen  Lee and Aaron worked, getting us all up on the shore and keeping us all dry and then  building the blind before sun up, putting out an awesome  spread of decoys, when the sun came up this experience was just BREATH TAKING, the Ladies who had NEVER DUCK HUNTED SHOWED US GUYS HOW IT WAS DONE, WITH THEM LIMITING OUT FIRST,  AND THEM LETTING US KNOW ABOUT IT WAS LETS SAY WOW!!!!!!!!!... I have never been served a HOT BREAKFAST in the blind before, AND BEING FROM  KANSAS ,nor have I had a BEAUTIFUL DOLPHIN SHOW ON THE WAY BACK TO THE LODGE, WITH MANY DOLPHINS RIDING THE WAVES BESIDE OUR BOAT, A WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE HAD BY ALL, SO MUCH MORE THAN ANY OF US EVER EXPECTEDED, AND AFTER EACH MORNING OF DUCK HUNTING WE GOT TO GO FISHING WITH CAPTAIN CHRIS AND HIS FEARLESS CREW OF THE SHIP ( HIGH COTTON),AND CAPTAIN JOHN AND CAPTAIN AARON,ON THEIR FISHING BOATS WE CAUGHT TONS OF BIG FISH FROM TRIGGER FISH,RED SNAPPER, SHEEP HEAD AND MY GREAT BIG RED FISH, AND I CANT FORGET MY GREAT FRIENDS JEFF SANDERS AND ADAM SANDAVOL, WHO WAS THERE TO PHOTOGRAPH THE WHOLE ADVENTURE OF A LIFE TIME !!!!..AND I HAVE TO BRAG ON BILLY HAGEMAN THE MASTER CHEF OF ALL CHEF'S WITH THE FLORA BAMA YACHT CLUB, BILLY PREPARED OUR DUCKS AND FISH EVERY DAY AND LET ME TELL FRIENDS I HAVE NEVER TASTED DUCK THAT WAS AS DELICIOUS AS ANY PRIME RIB I HAVE EVER EATEN AND BIG AL IS A BIG EATER, EVERY MEAL WAS OUT OF THIS WORLD !!!!!!THANK YOU INTERCOASTAL SAFARIS!!!!!..I SEE ANOTHER CAST AND BLAST IN OUR NEAR FUTURE!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Big Al! We definitely look forward to seeing you again!

name: Lauren Lee
text: These guys are true professionals. I highly recommend Intercoastal Safaris!

resp.text: Much appreciated Lauren! We are happy to hear that and hope to see you in the future.

name: John C
text: Booked a Thermal hog hunt and had a real good hunt conditions were not the best it was real foggy and the hogs were not as active but Paul did not give up and we were able to take some real good hogs. I will be buying a thermal scope!

resp.text:
John-

Thanks for hunting with us. Paul is a top notch guide for sure. Next time you come down to visit please bring the your new scpoe we like playing with new toys. #HuntProud

-Stephen Lee

name: Hunter Kessell
text: Had an awesome time hunting and fishing with these guys.

resp.text: We loved hunting with you and your family. It was great to get to spend the weekend with y'all. If you and your fraternity brothers head to the Gulf Coast for spring break give me a call and we'll go shoot some pigs.

name: Marlene Hooper
text: Will use no one else but intercoastal safaris to book my fishing trips with.

resp.text: It's great to hear that we have earned such trust. It is our goal to maintain this going forward!

name: Carrie Rogers
text: First and probably ONLY shark we will ever catch!! Jackson and Thad were the BEST!if you want you catch fish, have air conditioning AND have the best time.... book the Predator!

name: Chris Wagener
text: Captain Thad and deckhand Cooper on the Predator are fantastic. We booked a 6 hour charter for our 2 boys ages 11 and 9. We had to boat out for about an hour to the fishing ground and the water was rough. By the time we got there, my boys were seasick. Thad had given me some tips to try the day before our charter but they still got sick. We dropped 1 line in and immediately got a snapper, then they puked again. Thad provided a few options on how to adjust our charter so we could still fish but my wife and I decided it was best to head back.  Thad worked with me on adjusting our price so everyone felt it was a fair outcome, Cooper even graciously settled for less than he would have received for a full trip.  I can’t say enough about how nice the crew of the Predator was to my family. If you want to go out fishing, book with Thad on the Predator; you won’t be disappointed.

name: Joseph Haman
text: My morning started off terrible but Capt Thad and deckhand Mason made my day. Long story short, it was dark and I was following a truck into a parking spot and ran into a sand dune and my car got stuck. With that being said, customers park in the lot outside the marina. Capt Thad did everything he could to help me get my car out of the sand even delaying the trip a half hour, we still did over 12 hours on the water. I think most people wouldn't have done that. He and his deck hand Mason were a pleasure to talk with and share their experiences with. We caught fish almost all day. We didn't catch any of the big fish, not for lack of trying, but we nearly got our limit of vermillion, red snapper, and trigger fish. Dang sharks ate 3 vermillion as they were on our lines. We also caught some grouper, white snapper and a few others. This was a memorable and enjoyable experience that will last forever. I will use again. Also, someone left a 1 star due to having to pay the deckhand .20 percent. That is customary in every charter and if you can't afford to give .20 percent for a guy that works his tail off showing you what to do and running around grabbing you bait and taking your fish off, don't go.

name: James Shiers jr
text: OK so I booked a trip on the cool breeze and just like before very bad experience. A 6 hour trip 1400 hundred dollars and 260 for deck hand. We caught 19 fish that average 2 pounds a piece. Found out by the deck hand that the captain's name was Tyler who never spoke to us. When I say I'm very disappointed it would be a understatement. I had my dad and 3 of my boys with me and none of them had ever been "deep sea fishing ". We actually went to the state park pier and caught better and bigger fish.  With all that being said the deck hand was very nice and seem to care about us having a good time. NOTE IF YOU'RE GOING "DEEP SEA FISHING TRY ANOTHER BOAT. This is our captain asleep and the deck hand operating the boat.

name: Justin Byrum
text: Great charter service! We took a 5 hour trip with our 11 year old and had a great time and caught a great ammount of fish. Highly recommend.

name: Scott Pelfrey
text:
We had a great time, Thad and his deck hand on the Predator made our fishing trip so much fun and did everything they could to make sure we caught fish. We are already looking at our next trip so we can book a fishing trip on the Predator. We did catch those TROPHY FISH (stepbrother term)
Thank you guys

name: Sean Williams
text: Captain Rob and his Deckhand Paul went out of their way to give our group one of the best Red Fish expeditions we've ever had. We will definitely be re-booking early for next years season. Paul went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable and content on our trip. He even cleaned our fish for us  at a price that was next to nothing. We had blast on the Cool Breeze! Thanks Captain Rob.

name: Josh Underwood
text: Rob and Danny always make sure we have the best time.   Been out several times in the last few years and they never disappoint.  5-stars all the way around!!

name: MadiLou Whoo
text: Unfortunately with last minute planning we were unable to charter with Cool Breeze BUT Captain Rob went out of his way & went above & beyond calling around to find us a private charter! That says a lot in itself. That’s Again Captain Rob for being so helpful - The Wilsons

name: Ellen Ehle
text:
We did the 4 hour trolling option and it was fantastic. We went went our three girls, 13, 9 and 7 and they loved it, too.

Captain Joe was very friendly and helpful while we were deciding which fishing trip we were going to take and he took great care of us the day of the trip. His first mate, Hawk, sold the entire experience for us, though. He was so great with the girls and he was excellent at his job.

I feel guilty for calling it fishing since all we had to do was reel them in and eat them. Everything else was taken care of for us.

I highly recommend this charter to everyone!

name: Gee
text: Best fishing trip

name: Jarrett Parker
text: Outstanding crew! The boat is very clean, family friendly, and full of great experiences! Highly recommend

name: Kathryn Potocki
text:
Update:
Having received a prompt response and explanation from Rob, I have changed my rating from 3 stars to 5 stars. I would certainly give this company another chance. Being willing to apologize and make adjustments is a respectable way to respond, and I would be happy to either remove my negative review or leave this up as an example of a company that will do its best to respond positively to its customers.

Original review:
I'd love to give a great review, but the truth is that our group has spent the last day agreeing that this could have been better. Captain Rob was friendly when we called to schedule, but we really had very little interaction with him once on the boat. When we arrived at 6:45 am, we spent the first 30 minutes going to fuel the boat. Our primary interaction was with the deckhand. We were a group of 7, including two 13 yr olds, and all but one of us have had very little fishing experience, which I'm sure is the case for many who schedule these trips. Our deck hand seemed annoyed by our inexperience by saying things like, "That's why I told you to...." and "Thats what happens when...."  We really were doing our best! We were also told to make better use of our bait, as if we were purposely feeding the sneaky trigger fish without catching them. Having paid up front, with an added 25% tip, we would have liked a little more encouragement along the way. That said, we did catch some fish and they did clean them as promised. The boat was clean and we chose to have fun anyway. I see that this company does receive good reviews so maybe our expectations were too high, or this was an off day. I wouldn't rule them out completely, but I will research other companies before I book another charter.

resp.text:
Katherine I read your review and truly appreciate  your sincerety. To offer excuses which are nothing but excuses you did indeed catch us on bad day. Though it should never interfere with professional relationship between us and our customers aftern100+ trips in a row with 16-18 hour days we let our fatigue interfere with your good time. Attitude is everything and we do indeed pride ourselves on our relationship with out customers. Frustration over fishing and missed opportunity is merely our disappointment that did not get that “big one”. Nobody wants more and bigger fish on this boat than
Me
And
My deckhand and I apologize for the overzealousnesss. More time should
Have been spent on technique and the wholenexperience. There is just a lot of
Pressure to “produce” and make you the customer happy. In this instance I admitn we obviously failed. All I can say is that I have truly taken your comments to heart and shall use them positively to improve our situation here. Once again thank you for your candidness and I can only hope that you
May one day give us another chance and let me show you our true colors. Thanks again. Captrob with the Cool Breeze.

name: Sue Hayden
text: What a great adventure for the entire family; never thought this was something that I would enjoy but I am hooked now and can't wait for the next adventure!  Thanks to the Captain for a great time see you again soon.

name: svn 513
text: "If you don't tip my deckhand 20% book somewhere else." See ya a-hole. If you like your deckhand so much why don't you pay him a fair wage. No, it's better to pressure your costomers and demand a minimum tip. What if we don't catch any fish?

resp.text: Deckhands are contract labor and traditionally work for tips. I happen to have a very god one and like to see him get what he deserves   You are obviously naive as to the charter fishing industry. So , like I said,a-hole book somewhere else.  The suggested gratuity is 15-20% and is customary for any service. By the way, no amount of money could repay his wiping the puke off your face and my boat all day. Captrob

name: Ryan Dagen
text: This is my second time fishing with Captain Rob and Paul.  I'm an amateur fisherman to say the least, but they were very encouraging, knowledgeable, and helpful!  During both trips we caught fish and enjoyed our time!

name: Jilana Underwood
text: Our family recently visited Cool Breeze Charters just this last week for our family vacation.  My husband spoke to Captain Rob via phone to arrange our deep sea fishing trip and was told it would be $185.00 per person for our family of 4.  We were charged $740.00 total before boarding as expected.  Captain Rob took us out for our 6 hour deep sea fishing and it took about an hour and a half before we stopped to fish.  The fishing spot was decent, we caught a lot of fish but nothing really huge as we have in the past with other charters.  Then we trolled back toward shore and caught a couple more fish.  The trip was fun because we love fishing although I wish we would have fished in more than one spot.  Once the boat docked the Captain went to bed and we were left to deal with the deckhand who I think's name was Clint because we think that is what the Captain called him once, but he never told us his name.  The boat held our family of 4 and one other couple.  Captain Rob fufilled what was promised but we were EXTREMELY DISSATISFIED with the deckhand.  He barely spoke to anyone the entire trip and although he did bait my hooks he left my husband and kids to bait their own.  This would be ok with the boys but after docking he cut up the fish and then we tipped him $80.00 and the other family only wanted to tip him $20.00. I know from researching prior to our trip multiple reviews say 10% - 20% is customary depending on how good the deckhand was.  We heard him curse in front of our son when the lines got tangled and then after  we tipped him he forced us to walk to an ATM and said his tip was $40 per person and needless to say our family and the other couple were both highly upset about this.  The other couple approched us after leaving asking how much he made us pay him.  So he ended up making $240     for this trip which we all felt was Ridiculous.  We told him that the Captain never said anything about a mandatory tip of 15% + 30cent per pound of fish (which I never saw how much the fish weighed) but he said "Yes he did" and what could we do with the captain now gone.  If I had it to do over I would have refused b/c we never signed anything obligating us to pay that and since when is a Tip a set forced amount?  It should be EARNED based on how we feel he did and he did not earn the $160.00 tip he got from our family.  Plus our 13year old son was sea sick the whole time and only caught 2 fish and sat out almost the entire trip so he didn't do much for him at all.  We have even paid more for other charters in the Biloxi area and been happy to do so previously but had never been to Orange Beach before and were very unhappy with this deckhand.

name: Charles Tallent
text: Awesome. Rob's inshore fishing is always productive. A Navy veteran with lots of experience to put you on the best fishing.

name: Mort Lane
text: Great fishing trip have used Rob in the past never disappointed professional and knowledgeable.

name: jim Biggs
