text: Great place to book a fishing charter with. The day we went out it was very rough but was still able to get us a bunch of snappers.

name: Tony Martin
text: Captain Gary and Alex were well prepared for our trip. We had 3 guys who had never been from 15-19 yrs old and they really made sure they are “HOOKED”. These guys made our snapper trip a truly memorable one. We caught our limit and only kept the big ones. They pride themselves in customer service and it showed today. We will definitely be back for this charter boat.

name: Richard Walden
text: best fishing Ive had in a long time. boat captain knowledgeable, cabin had air conditioning, deck hand was outstanding. Plan to return every snapper season to this outstanding boat and crew. wife and kid didn't want to fish, that's OK b oat had a big screen TV DVD player and comfortable interior for the non fishing guests. with a bathroom on the boat.

name: Nancy Sims
text: My family, four of us, had a great time and a very successful fishing trip on the Triple Trouble!  Caught our limit!!!  Thanks to Captain Henry and BJ.

name: Austin Jones
text: Captain Michael was great! I took my 6 year old daughter and she caught 15 fish by herself.

name: Jason Downard
text:
I have been on numerous charter trips and yes there are some competent boat captains  available and will likely supply an “ok” fishing experience for  you and your family but if you are  seeking a fantastic  trip with an exceptional
Captain  and Deckhand then you must go ahead and get booked on “Hooked Up”.  Me and my family, 6 total,  took a 6 hour trip targeting snapper we limited out  and moved on to other species. The deckhand works his butt off. Deckhand “Blake“  was like a little Tasmanian Devil on the deck. The Captain was so gracious and accommodating, my boys felt right at home on Captain Mikes beautiful Topaz. Captain and crew went out of there way to show my peeps a wonderful time. Lots of laughter and  new memories made on this trip. We had a blast. I hope anyone that books based on my review has a wonderful time like we did. We will be booking with these guys again. My wife is also posting a review as you check out our collective pictures you can tell we had lots of fun and did a lot of clowning around. Just look at the size of this king. Lol 😝

name: John Limbaugh
text: Mike has a great boat. He just bought it this winter. It's not brand new but it's in top shape.i can't wait to go fishing and catching soon.

name: Michael Shockley
text: Hooked Up! Putting fish in the boat with Captain Michael! Good times & great guy!

name: Paul Wimmer
text: Had a great time with Mike tons of fish Stand up Guy!!!! Awesome

name: Bob Rutledge
text: Great fishing with Michael as usual. We been going out for years. This year we caught red snapper!

name: Chris Aliment
text: Had a great time with Captain Michael last week with an offshore charter with some friends! This man knows loves to fish and knows how to catch them. We caught our limit of very large Trigger fish and lots of bee liners. Had a great experience and would recommend him to anyone looking to have fun going fishing offshore!

name: Caroline Jackson
text: Captain Mike and his awesome deckhand, Blake, offered us one of the best weekend's we've had fishing here in Orange Beach. Captain Mike was just as eager as we were to catch some good fish, and that is exactly what we did the entire time! We limited out with no problem after he continuously took us to spots where the fish were biting. Both Captain Mike and Blake were on top of everything all day long, making it easy and also relaxing for us. The boat was beautiful, clean, and comfortable, but their company was the best of all. If you're looking for a fishing guide that won't let you down, Hooked Up Fishing is the only way to go. I highly recommend booking with them, and truly hope my family and I get to fish with them again one day.

name: Patrick Grose
text: Went out today with Captain Mike and his deck hand Blake. This was my wife’s first ever deep sea fishing experience and it was phenomenal!!! We caught plenty of red snapper and my wife caught a small bull shark (she thought it was Jaws!).  Mike and Blake were great to fish with and very professional. I would highly recommend Hooked Up Charters for your next fishing experience in Gulf Shores!!!

name: David Beery
text: First class experience,  had a great time and caught plenty of fish. Laid back, easy going, and professional

name: lisa downard
text: I have been on several fishing charters but this was by far the BEST experience we have ever been on.  Captain Michael Thomas and deck hand (Blake) went out of their way to make it a perfect day.  They put us on the fish immediately.  If we spent a few minutes with no bites he was quick to move us to a better spot.  The deck hand (Blake) was so attentive.  Us girls never had to touch bait or wait for bait.  He was always ready and we kept him very busy.  They were fun to spend the day with even if we hadn’t caught fish.  When it was time to head back in the captain saw a spot with great potential for Mahi-mahi so he had us drop some lines.  My boys were sooo excited to catch mahi-mahi, king mackerel and lots of red snapper.  We will definitely go on this boat again!  Worth every dollar!

name: Quentin Kepfer
text: If you're considering fishing in the gulf it doesn't get any better than an outing with Mike and his fabulous deckhand! Mike went above and beyond our very high expectations. He personally took the time himself to ensure that my special needs son got his BIG snapper. We cant wait to get back and do it all over again.

name: Jesse Gruny
text: Awesome time, went today 3-19-20 am trip.  caught a  bunch of mangrove snappers and 6 sheepshead.  Went on inshore 4 hour trip.

name: Kourtney McCord
text: The best trip I've been on in a long time! We had a BLAST & caught some good fish! I HIGHLY recommend Hooked Up Fishing Charters! Orange Beach, AL

name: Ed Watson
text: Hooked Up Fishing Charters was great!  Captain Michael and his deck hand Blake were awesome!  They put us on the fish and we brought home a bunch of Snapper!

name: Marshall Malone
text: Great experience. Michael knows his stuff. Great for inexperienced fisherman. We enjoyed everything and caught lots of fish.

name: Blake Strawn
text: Went out this past Thursday and got our limit on snappers. It was tuff fishing as the seas were rougher than expected but capt Mike worked hard trying to keep us on the fish. Our next trip will be with him hopefully with better sea conditions lol.

name: Michael Thomas
text: We love to introduce kids to saltwater fishing

name: Shan Payne
text: Went out with Mike Thomas again this year he runs a great charter service and no doubt he is going to put you on the big snapper Made some great memories with my son and friends this year Looking forward to booking with Mike again next year Also this year he has added a first mate great young man and a hard worker

name: Tracie Morse
text: Captain Michael hooked us UP! Thank you for a great day and for your incredible "fishing hole" knowledge, for sticking with us to get our limit, for helping us reel them in, and for cleaning our catch so we could have a delicious dinner! You're the BEST!  HIGHLY recommend!

name: Jackie Fogel
text: My family and I contacted Captain Mike for my dad’s 60th birthday and the trip couldn’t have been better. My dad is a very hard man to impress, and we are already discussing our next trip! Mike was knowledgeable and extremely fexible and a pleasure to spend the day with. I would definitely recommend booking your trip with him.

name: Bill Willis
text: Captain Mike had us on the snapper right away on opening day this year. Every man limited out...then he put us on some fun fishing holes. Boat full of fish. Will be eating fish until opening day next year!

name: Bob Driscoll
text: Micheal Thomas did a great job putting us on fish all day long.  At the end of the day everyone was worn out from reeling in fish.  Great day on the Gulf with Captain Micheal.

name: Scott Young
text: Capt Michael definitely hooked us up!  Awesome all the way around!  He is driven to get your fish in the boat!  My go to charter for sure!

name: Jason DoreyMD
text: Last summer I caught a 35lb Red Snapper with Capt Michael Thomas with Hooked Up Fishing Charters. Besides a great trip he is a nice guy.

name: Matthew Cammack
text: Cap’n Michael knows how to have a good time and put you on some fish!

name: Jeff Lear
text: I've fished with Capt. Michael many times and I've never seen anyone who enjoys fishing as much as he does! Makes for an enjoyable day and we ALWAYS catch fish.

name: STU77W
text: Top notch! Captain Perry was a super cool guy and put us on the fish. Speckled trout are fun to catch and we were reeling them in a fast as we could wet our line! We'll definitely be back!

name: Tarvious Jones
text: Captain Perry was awesome. He made us feel like we were family both days. He made sure my father was comfortable and enjoying his self. We had a blast I would tell the whole world to book the fishing trip with OFF THE HOOK CHARTERS. It was a dream that came true. Great Job Captain Perry.

name: cuddy link
text: The owner and captain Perry was awesome. Caught our limit even though the fishing was tough. Me and my girlfriend really had a blast and the have the best rates. Great first time experience on the inshore/nearshore charter great job and after your done you get to feed some pelicans!!!!! Highly recommended!

name: Bobbie Katen
text: We had a great time and caught a ton of fish! The guys were great! We will definitely be back on our next trip to Gulf Shores!!!

name: Jeremy Trabert
text: We had so much fun. It was last min and they made it happen. I posted a pic of the fish we caught on Facebook page. Parry is the man that made it happen.

name: Kirk King
text: Captain Perry knows some great spots for Red Snapper and Spotted Trout. My father and I were blessed with a full limit on both. It was a pleasure using Captain Perry for our first ocean fishing trip. I would recommend him for your guided fishing trip anytime. I will use him again when we visit the area next year. Great Job!!!

name: Jamie Godfrey
text: Captain Perry did a great job and our family of 4 had a blast... Dinner was great tonight thanks Capitan!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, happy you had a great dinner!!! 😀

name: P H
text:
Aside from a scheduling conflict we had at the start, I cannot say enough good things about Captain Corey & his team. Out of the 10ish trips I have taken throughout my lifetime, this was arguably the best deep sea fishing charter of them all..

They knew where they fish were. They did a Great job - they’re Good people. I would use them again and absolutely recommend them to anyone asking for a fishing trip.

We used captain Corey and his deck hand Mike Jones.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, but I do believe you have left a review for the wrong charter. We are off the hook charters and our captains are Perry and Dylan.

name: C Green
text:
UPDATE: Off the Hook Charter called us and wanted to make it right. They scheduled us for the next day at a discounted rate. The captain was amazing with our boys and we had the best time! Even though our start with this Charter started out rocky, we highly recommend this fishing charter!

Booked this trip for our son's birthday, weeks prior to the actual fishing trip. We received a confirmation phone call the afternoon before the trip. Arrived at the boat the next day per our scheduled time and the man running the inshore fishing trips saw us near the boat and told us the captain was not going to show for our offshore fishing trip.
"Oh, my wife didn't call you last night."
That is the response we received. Very unprofessional.

resp.text: We look forward to seeing you guys again. We’re sorry about the issues at first, but we are happy everything ended up working out and everyone had a good time!!!

name: Cameron Smith
text: My two boys and I had a BLAST!! Captain Perry Davis had us reeling in a huge amount of fish. He was very helpful and patient with us. Highly recommend!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review!!!

name: Tammie Hendrix
text: I would highly recommend Perry and Off The Hook Charters. He was very friendly and knowledgeable. I never felt rushed at any time. We caught so many Spanish mackerels today that my wrist was giving out.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review!!!

name: Molly Killian
text: We had a great day with Captain Perry. He was friendly, knowledgeable, and helped us with everything from baiting to unhooking our large catch. He knew exactly where to find our fish and made it a great and fun experience for our family. Would highly recommend and do it again!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review and we are glad you had a good time fishing with us.

name: KL redmon
text: Perfect experience! From the call the day before to Captain Dylan! Will definitely book every year with Off the hook from here on out!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review!!! We look forward to next time.

name: Tina Jackson
text:
Captain Perry is Legit, he knows the area very well and really works hard to put his clients on the fish! We’ve been on Charters before and Perry is by far the best cpt  yet.  He is very knowledgeable, has a great personality and knows how to catch fish!
We even caught some snappy jacks 🐟 (Skipjack) lol!!

resp.text: Thanks for the review!!! Come back and see us next time your in our area.

name: Brian Hinton
text: Captain Perry Davis is top notch.  My wife and I called last minute to book a trip and he took us out for his third trip of the day!  That's a longer day than most of us have ever put in on the water and he was great!  Caught a nice bag of specks and just had a wonderful evening.  Won't be our last trip with him.

name: Andy Maly
text: Had a blast.  Weather and wind was slightly less than ideal with tropical storm Barry off to the west, but Captain Perry put us on a mess of speckled trout nonetheless.  My 12 year old son and I caught our limit in pretty short order once we found them.  It was SO much fun, and Capt Perry was great.  We will be booking with Capt Perry and Off The Hook charters again 100%.  Can’t wait! Thanks Captain Perry!

name: Jason Chesnut
text: Just got back from inshore fishing with Captain Perry. Couldn't be more pleased. Just wanted our boys to get some fish and that they did. Captain Perry is very knowledgeable and won't hesitate to move quickly if one spot isn't working. Can't thank him enough. Definitely will be booking an offshore trip Captain Perry next time.

name: givens phillips
text: Awesome guide! Caught our limit in under 2 hours! Will definitely be back!

name: Brian Page
text: Great charter captain who really knows where the fish are biting with a clean boat and quality fishing gear. Caught several fish within 30 seconds after the bait hit the water. Would book again

name: Kevin Gorman
text: We had a great time caught lots of fish looking forward to next year will definitely go back with them again

name: Brian
text: Zero fish caught in 4 hours. Expensive boat ride.

name: Brad M
text: Captain Doug and Fisher put us on the fish! Went on the 10 hour trip and was worth every penny. Fisher worked hard to keep everything running smooth so we could keep our lines in the water putting fish in the boat. We highly recommend the eagle express and will definitely be calling captain Doug for our next fishing adventure. Thanks!

resp.text: So happy y’all had a great trip and can’t wait till next year.

name: Sean Dodds
text: All I can say is you will not be disappointed with Captain Doug Price and his crew. We had an amazing first time out with them. Very personable and down to earth crew. We loved our trip and can’t wait to book again.

resp.text: Great trip with great people and looking forward to yalls next trip

name: Alex Dutka
text: Eagle express is the best charter experience I have ever had. I have been on several trips with them and it’s always a great time. Both captain and crew are fantastic.  Doug is a great guy and always makes sure we have a good time and catch a lot of fish.

resp.text: Great trip!!!! With great people. Can’t wait till next year and another great trip.

name: Curtis Rodgers
text: What a great time…awesome Captain, awesome deckhand, awesome boat. worth every penny. We will be back!!!

resp.text: That was a great trip!!! I will see y’all again next year

name: Walker Plash
text: Excellent experience! Absolutely nothing I would change about the trip, and I will plan on using them for my charter trips in the future.

resp.text: Thanks for the review. Great trip making memories. See y’all again next year

name: Donna Chenoweth
text: Eagle Express Charter was the best deep sea fishing in Orange Beach Alabama! Captain Doug Price & Deck mate RC really know the fishing out there. You tell them what you would like to catch & they will put you on it right away. Our family chartered a trip from 6:30-12:30 and we were catching fish all the way out to the spot & back. We caught about 54 fish. We did have to throw some beautiful fish back because they were not in season & because some were not regulation length, but we did end up with 23 fish and about 70 pounds of fish meat when done. We caught Red Snapper, vermilion snapper, trigger fish, king mackerel and huge Amber Jack fish. Unfortunately the red snapper were not in season when we went & had to go right back in. I definitely recommend taking 2 Dramamine the night before & 2 Dramamine half hour before launch because the ones that took Dramamine only got sea sick in the beginning and the ones that didn’t were hugging the floor. It’s definitely bouncy ride but We could not have had a better deck hand than RC at Eagle Express charters! He worked his tail off making sure everyone got fish and that they were reeled in successfully! We are definitely booking them every time we come out!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We love that you and your family had a good time with me and Rc onboard the Eagle Express. I already have been emailing with your husband for your next trip. #tightlinesandgoodtimes

name: Community Roofing
text: This charter is the Best in Orange , hands down.  Captain Doug took us out and put us on em!!!  We caught our limit!!  He put us on Mahi, Snapper and for a bonus we hooked to huge Barracudas!   Amazing day... capped off with a sunset ride back.  Thank you Eagle Express/ Captain Doug for the amazing experience and your service to this country.

resp.text: We had a great time with y'all too. Hope to see y'all again next year.

name: Jerry Thornton
text: Great deep sea fishing trip!  Captain Doug and Fisher know their stuff.  They know where to find the fish and how to get them in the boat!  Boat is extremely nice.  We had little kids with us and they had a blast.  Both Doug and Fisher are personable and eager to make your trip a memorable one. We got the (unlucky)  bananas off the boat from the start, and wore the fish out our entire 6 hour trip.  We will definitely be booking with these guys again in the near future!

resp.text: Great trip!!! I hope to see you again on your next trip down to the beach.

name: Rick Slough
text: Great trip Captain Doug and first mate Fishet were fantastic. Caught a "boatload" of great fish. Highly recommend this charter!

resp.text: Good fishing and beautiful weather. Can’t wait till next year.

name: Shauna Drake
text:
Uh...MAZING.

My mother booked a 6hr trip, and 6hrs was not enough!

The captain Doug, was nice enough as little as we got to talk with him.  If they weren't biting he was quick to rush us to the next spot. He even kept us out an hour longer than we booked because we weren't having the best of luck to start of with.

His deck hand Fisher was such a pleasure to fish next to, and was incredibly helpful. He was quick to help us bait our hooks, untangle our lines, helped pull the fish off the hooks and expertly fileted our fish. Everything a deck hand should be.

It was a perfect experience all the way around.

Given the opportunity we will book again

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Eagle Express charters for your deep sea fishing trip. I hope to see y’all again next year.

name: Slowenby 1 (RIP-STAVER)
text: A great experience, with an awesome crew ... do not delay in booking this crew for a great adventure.

resp.text: Thanks Steve! That is exactly what I want everyone that comes fishing with to say about there trip. See you next year.

name: Joshua Callaway
text: Callaway and friends crew of 10 on 12 hr snapper/jack trip . We had 2 youngs boys on boat . Captain Doug and Fisher were awesome with the 2 kids . Fisher went above and beyond with them . They know the spots and how to fish . Definitely will be repeat customers.

resp.text:
It was a pleasure meeting you and your family
And I will see y’all again soon.

name: kennith bufkin
text: Our trip was for 8 people overnight 24 hour fishing trip. Captain Doug and his deckhands RC and Gage turned it into not a fishing trip but a Catching trip . This was by far hands down the very best trip I have ever been on. We actually ran out of room to store fish, every fish box and ice chest was full . We had over 800 lbs of fish . If you need a charter boat for a in every way perfect fishing trip this is it. Thank you again Captain Doug , RC, and Gage for providing us the opportunity, services and knowledge for an absolutely amazing fish catching trip .

resp.text: It was a great trip! Perfect weather for it too. Hopefully we can do it again next year!!!

name: Crystal Clanton
text: No question about it, this is one of the best charters around. Captain Doug is very good at what he does. Not only will he put you on the fish but you will have a great time fishing as well.

resp.text: We strive to make every trip just like this one. I’m so happy y’all a great time and I hope to see y’all again in the future.

name: Michael Kolinski
text: Our group did 4 hour trip and was very pleased. Only caught nine keepers but fought a lot of fish and with a party of 12 (half were kids) that's really important. The captain was great and the mate was good too. Only complaint was that the mate smoked cigarettes the entire trip. Overall it was a good trip and time well spent.

resp.text: I’m sorry about the mate smoking during your trip. I am so happy y’all had a great time onboard the Eagle Express with us and hope to see y’all again soon.

name: Ryan Bratt
text:
We had a team of co-workers on the Eagle Express for a 5 hour trolling and bottom fishing trip.  Many of our group had never fished before, let alone been off shore.

We had an absolute BLAST!  Doug and Fisher (yeah! that's his name!) were awesome.  We caught a ton of fish, including barracuda, Spanish mackerel, and vermilion snapper.

The experience was amazing, and we're looking forward to doing it again SOON!

resp.text: Great trip with some great people. Tight lines and good times. I hope y’all liked them fish tacos.

name: Matt Deal
text: We had 11 men on a 6 hr trip. The boat was comfortable and had plenty of room for all of us. Captain Doug put us on the fish and deckhand RC was very helpful. I would definitely recommend and plan to fish with them again in the future.

resp.text: Thanks Matt! We had a great time with you and your crew, and we are excited to hear that we met your expectations. We appreciate you giving us the opportunity to put you on the fish. We can’t wait to hopefully see you again in the future. Tight lines and good times.

name: aaron galloway
text: If you want to have a good time with good people then book these guys!! Knowledgeable and courteous! Definitely will recommend them to anyone coming to fish gulf shores! Thanks again Capt Doug and Deckhand RC!!🤙🏼

resp.text: Thanks brother. We had a great trip and a good time.

name: Wessley Spradling
text: 10 out of 10 would recommend. We went out and had an amazing time. We caught a lot of fish and the crew took good care of us. It was an experience of a life time!

resp.text: It was literally our pleasure! What a great group and can’t wait to again next year.

name: Gerald Bradbury
text: I would like to first start by saying Captain Doug and RC are absolutely amazing! We had a group of 9 people on a 6 hour family fun trip . We trolled out 1-2 hours to several bottom fishing spots and captain Doug put us on the red snapper quick ! We all had our limit after the first 2-3 stops ! Everyone in the group caught several fish ! RC kept us stocked with bait and pulled fish in for us ! We had a trip of a lifetime ! And will be back every year from now on with the eagle Express and captain Doug . 5 stars all the way ! The boat had plenty of room for us all and the air conditioned cabin was nice for a break out of the sun . Thank you Doug and RC ! Semper Fi brother

resp.text: Gerald can’t wait till the next trip.

name: Jeremy Baublit
text: This guys are laid back,but have there stuff togerther. Nice boat and gear. This was our first time out and would highly recommend Eagle Express for a fun, safe trip for the family.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Jeremy! It was definitely a good trip this morning and hope to again.

name: Scott Mattox
text: Caught some great fish including a very nice wahoo, some yellowfins, a bunch of blackfins, some triggers, and about 80 snappers. More importantly Capn Doug, RC, and Chris made it fun and exciting. I’d HIGHLY recommend the 24 hour trip. We did it as a company team building exercise and I couldn’t have asked for a better all-around experience.

resp.text: Can’t wait to do it again next year.

name: Trey Sprinkle
text: Captain Doug and his mates are second to none. We took a 10 hour trip and caught so many fish it wore all 8 of us on the boat out! If you are looking for a captain that wants to load the boat up, and wants to make sure you are taken care of look no further. I'll fish with Doug every time I am here.

resp.text: Thanks trey. It’s always a good thing to be too tired from fishing.

name: Adonya Dryden
text: This was a pretty poor experience. Captain Nick was rude from the very start and just had zero interaction with us after that. He informed me that we would only be trolling, regardless of what “she told me when I booked.” I don’t even know what “she” he was talking about since I spoke to a man when I booked—presumably either he or another captain. Being inexperienced, we didn’t know what trolling meant, but it meant we never stopped to fish. We literally just trolled around and if we happened to snag a fish by accident, well…🤷‍♀️. We did a four hour trip and caught six fish between the four of us fishing. For an $800 trip it was incredibly disappointing. The deckhand was nice but didn’t ever change out baits or try to do anything to help us catch more. Overall I definitely would NOT recommend!!!

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to leave your review.

In the future, please feel free to contact us personally to discuss the specifics of your trip experience. We would like to know areas of improvements we can address and the review you left doses not specify what, in your opinion,  the deck hand could have done differently to "help" you and your guests catch more fish.

The trolling trips are as you described. The bait is set and the species targeted chase the moving bait line. There are several trips advertised on our website with descriptions of what these trip experiences are like. Possibly, you may have chosen the wrong trip for the experience you may have anticipated.

Captain Nick is a salty old boat captain indeed. His goal driven focus and demeanor can be off putting at times but he will put you on the fish!

However, he is on the upper deck during the duration of the trip looking for for fish and monitoring the waters and typically is not interactive with the guests. I apologize if he came across rude or did not engage with your group as often as you would have liked. The deckhand is on the same level of the boat and most easily accessible during the trip to help you and your guests with most anything you may ask or require.

We encourage all of our guests to reach out to us personally and especially prior to finalizing your booking so that we can address any and all questions or concerns you have before the day of your trip.

We hope this information helps.

We thank you for fishing with us and hope you have a great rest of your summer!

name: Brookelyn Johnson
text: Very disappointing experience on Daddy’s Baby with captain Nick!! He was rude from the beginning & after that had no interactions with him! The deck hand was nice but didn’t do a great job at helping us catch fish! Never changed out the bait or tackle just sat around talking! Would not do again with them!

resp.text:
Hi Brooklyn. Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. I apologize the trip seems to have fallen short of your expectations. I see you have left a review in addition to another from your same trip.

In the future, please feel free to contact us personally to discuss the specifics of your trip experience. We would like to know specific areas of improvements we can address. We are a family owned business and the owner of the business runs another boat and can not address areas needing improvement if those are not specifically shared.

Captain Nick is on the upper deck during the duration of the fishing trip looking for for fish and monitoring the waters and typically is not interactive with the guests. I apologize if he came across rude or did not engage with your group as often as you would have liked.

The deckhand is on the same level of the boat as you and your guests and most easily accessible during the trip to help you and your guests with most anything you may ask or require.  Please remember that unstated expectations tend to lead to frustrating outcomes. Our crew provides an Individualized experience for each of our guests. Some may wish to ha e a more hands on experience using only the minimal assistance from the crew while others are more inclined to be walked through each and every step of the experience. Providing the specifics of your trip expectations upon boarding the boat with with Captain Nick and Dillan can usually make for a more satisfying trip.

As I state in a previous response from your group, Deep sea fishing is the ultimate fishing experience packed with excitement, challenge, and the need for perseverance. The Gulf of Mexico can offer several species of fish. Unfortunately, there is a federally regulated season and catch limit on many of those. During the red Snapper season, (our current season) there is a catch limit of 2- red snapper per person. I apologize if you were unclear on the species limits upon booking your trip or if you and your crew found it difficult to hook and reel in the fish. We discouraged the deckhand from reeling in fish unless specifically asked to do so in the hopes of providing the most genuine fishing experience the Gulf has to offer to the group. Basically, you didn't pay the money you paid to passivly sit and watch the deckhand reel in your fish but instead to immerse yourself and your group into the deep sea fishing experience by catching and reeling in your own catch. Fruits of your labor!

Again, feel free to reach out to us personally for further discussion. Prior to finalizing your booking, if you find you are unclear on what to expect the day of your trip we are available as many times as you need to call to clarify details from the weather to sunblock.

I sure hope this information helps. We thank you for fishing with us and hope you have a great rest of your summer!

name: Alex Johnson
text: Went on daddys baby. We caught some fish it was ok but not a lot of effort was made from the captain or his deck hand in an effort to catch more fish.

resp.text:
Hi Alex. Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. I apologize the trip seems to have fallen short of your expectations.

In the future, please feel free to contact us personally to discuss the specifics of your trip experience. We would like to know specific areas of improvements we can address.

Deep sea fishing is the ultimate fishing experience packed with excitement, challenge, and perseverance. The Gulf of Mexico can offer several species of fish. Unfortunately, there is a federally regulated season and catch limit on many of those. During the red Snapper season,  (our current season) there is a catch limit of 2- red snapper per person. I apologize if you were unclear on the species  limits upon booking your trip or if you and your crew found it difficult to hook and reel in the fish.

The captian and deck hand most definitely put you on the fish and will keep any and all legal fish species (up to the limit) that you and your crew are able to hook and reel in.

Hope this information helps. Again, feel free to reach out to us personally and especially prior to finalizing your booking so that we can address any and all questions or concerns you have before the day of your trip.

We thank you for fishing with us and hope you have a great rest of your summer!

name: Lindsay Rutland
text: Captain Dale put our party of 9 on the fish. We caught red snapper, mackerel and a variety of others.  It was an awesome trip for all of us.  Billy kept our hooks baited and in the water and was a pleasure to be around. They even kept our four year old occupied with Disney Jr on the flat screen. Well done Class Act, we will be back!

name: Eric D
text:
Excellent Trip!  Captain Dale and Deckhand Billy really are a Class act.  We had 4 adults and 4 children go out and for half of us it was our fist time on a chartered fishing boat.  I got sick as a dog within an hour of our 6 hour trip but thankfully no one else did.
Billy took great care of the group while I was out of commission and my wife and children had a blast.  As sick as I was it was still comforting to hear them having so much fun.  They caught lots of fish and Billy helped my wife surface a decent size bull shark!  At least I got to see the pictures and will probably be hearing stories for years to come lol.

name: Sharon Wright
text: Had a great experience with Captain Dale and Deck Hand Billy! We caught lots of fish and they were really good with our 5 kids! Would definitely do this again.. we did 8 hour trip and bottom fished and trolled for Spanish/king mackerel. Caught lots of fish (mostly vermillion snapper and Spanish mackerel) since it was out of red snapper season.

name: James Knickrehm
text: Captain Dale took care of us!  A great time was had by all! Will probably make it an annual event.

name: Diane Nuss
text: ONCE AGAIN ANOTHER GREAT TRIP WITH CAPTAIN DALE AND BILLY.WE BROUGHT OUR SON ON HIS BACHELOR FISHING TRIP AND IT WAS AWESOME!!! WE CAUGHT A PILE OF FISH AND HAD A GREAT TIME.DEFFINATLY RECOMMENDED AND WE WILL SEE YALL AGAIN SOON.!!!!!JOEL NUSS

name: Sara Olivencia
text:
We went on the pirate cruise and it was so much fun! This was our second time on the cruise  and I would highly recommend it.

My kids 4 and 8 love it! The pirates are really friendly and talkative with the kids. The kids get to play lot of water games to stay cool.

There is very little shade. Wear sunblock and bring a couple cold bottles of water with you.

name: Patrick O'Connor
text: Phenomenal! Great Captains and Deck Hands. LOADS of fish. Take the 6 or 8 hour trip if serious about fishing. Take the 4 hour if you just want a boat ride.

name: Colton Sweeney
text: 4 hour fishing trip was actually not even 2 hours of fishing. They told us to be there 30 minutes early (7:30am) but we didn’t leave the dock til 8:30am. Took an hour to get to the fishing spot. We were constantly moving, so we couldn’t even let our bait sit for fish to get it. Don’t think anybody on the boat caught anything worth a picture. Cherry on top was when it took an hour and a half to get back to the dock. I’m not sure why but we were going the speed of smell. Only reason they get two stars is because the crew was nice.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We will try to improve our performance in future.

name: Ron Sheffey
text: Not family friendly.  Crew used language not appropriate for children and did not want to help children or anyone . Bathroom was ridiculous for all! Captain had own agenda and did not consider passengers even with several very seasick.

name: Floyd Middleton
text: You'd like to go deep sea fishing I suggest you take this trip with these guys any one they got everybody's friendly and the captains put you on the fish great experience thank you

name: Sherry Stout
text: We had a great time.

name: Just V
text: Decent time.  Have been on many fishing trips. This was first time we didn't catch anything.  Deckhands said the captain was still in training.

name: Johnny Fuller
text: Had a fun trip.could use something to get your cooler back and forth from boat.its a long way  to get to boat

name: Jill McCowan
text: Even tho we got soaked on our tour and had to cut it short, it was still enjoyable.

name: Amy Jo
text: We had a great time on our dolphins cruise. The caption and deckhand were friendly. The kids had a blast and the views were amazing. The kids even had a water fight with pirates.

name: Jessica Standley
text: The dolphin cruise was amazing! Captain Jason and Brad did such a great job finding us dolphins and made sure that everyone had a great experience. 10/10 would recommend!

name: David r
text:
Water was very scenic. Crew member complimented my socks. Felt like a fisherboy. Saw a beer can and a styrofoam cup.

We also fished. Very enjoyable. Would recommend to a friend.

name: Kim Smyly
text: Great, helpful staff.  Captain was very good!

name: Angie Stiel
text: My fist time out on a fishing charter boat.  I loved it. Honestly didn't think I would enjoy it but when I reeled in my first tiny fish and then hit my monster fish I was hooked. The crew was very helpful and friendly. Shout out to first mate Jason and the other two crew members that worked their butts off to make sure we had a great time. Thanks to the captain for our safe return to dry land. I had a deal with my dad that I'd go but I was not touching any bait or fish lol. So yep I had a great time and best thing was I didn't even chum up the Gulf.  Dad holding my monster fish.

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We are glad to hear you had a great trip, and congratulations on your catch.  We appreciate your business and the time you took to leave a review.  Come back again soon.

name: Chad D
text: Friendly deck hands, very knowledgeable. Better if we would have caught more fish, but that's the way fishing goes sometimes. We took the 4 hour party boat deep see fishing service.

resp.text: Chad, thanks for the review and joining us. Hopefully the next time you join us the fish will be in a biting frenzy.

name: Rodney Ford
text: Waste of money be better off brim fishing

name: Robert M. Puig
text: I had an awesome time :) Great food, sights, he let us drive the boat. What a great time for a good cause too

name: mikey lemaster
text: One of the best places to fish that I have found. Our party limited out on Red snapper and the C.A.T. Captain and crew were great.

resp.text: Mikey, thanks for joining us on the C.A.T. We can’t wait to have you on board with us again.

name: Hannah Horohoe
text: The dolphin tour was a huge waste of time and money. We were asked to arrive early to prepare for the tour. At 3pm they had us walk down the dock to the boat, but did not allow us on the boat for twenty minutes and would not tell us why. After burning in the sun, they took us out to the gulf to see what we could spot. The captain would shout out dolphin “facts” over the intercom to keep us entertained. One of them being, “dolphins can get up to 10 tons.” The crew had us yell and clap at the dolphins when we saw them. I do not believe dolphins like to be catcalled since they would flee from the boat. I have done another dolphin tour in orange beach in the past. We should have returned to them. Overall, I do not recommend.

name: Amanda Rich
text: Absolutely everything I wanted and more! The crew was awesome! They helped make sure all of the kids got to reel in some good fish! Everyone in my party of 6 got to catch we had a blast!

name: bamababe75
text: We were supposed to be on the C.A.T.  but got bumped to a party boat. The Explorer.   They could not find  fish.  Worst fishing trip ever!  Deck hands were super nice but not very knowledgeable.  Definitely not worth $150.00!  I went on the Wishbone last year and it was amazing!  That was what I paid for this year but t was horrible! Never again!

name: Bryan degroot
text:
My boat engine died after towing it from Michigan with plans to fish with family. Obviously that plan changed, and we decided to fish from a party boat. Something I normally would not do, as experience has taught me that this is usually a low likelihood of success fishing trip, where little effort is put into ensuring a good shot at catching fish. Imagine my surprise, when we fished with Captain Dan aboard the Explorer. What a difference! The Captain put us on fish, and knew when and where to move to keep the action consistent, and stayed out a bit longer than planned to ensure everyone had a good shot at a catch. The crew, from First mate Jason to Julie, Steve, and Ashton, the entire team was first rate. They were fun, lively, VERY helpful and worked hard to keep lines in the water and made sure everyone was attended to, with bait, and fish removal as well as quickly fixing tangles, and kept everyone fishing.
By far the hardest working, and most attentive crew in Party boat fishing.!! Top notch. Thanks for your efforts!! I would recommend this group to anyone. Coming from our group of 10. Ranging from kids and 1st timers to experienced anglers, we all had fun.
Highly recommended trip.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and for leaving a review.  We are glad you had a great trip and appreciate the compliments you left for the captain and crew. We hope to see you again soon.

name: thomas lynch Jr
text: Fun place to go to see dolphin and for kids they have a pirates boat to

name: Lauren Schanz
text: The cruise and Captain was great.. The captain did an awesome job telling and showing us things about Orange Beach on top of seeing the dolphins. My family and I enjoyed watching the Dolphins. $10 a person is a great deal til have a to pay for an infant.. $3 a piece for can soda, water, chips and cotton candy absolutely ridiculous. Office staff could be a lot more friendlier and helpful. Three staff members and they couldn't even help find suitable life jackets for the children and infants. Couldn't find one infant life jacket so had to find the smallest child life jacket. They just sat there talking to each other and on the computers..

name: shelby leblanc
text: Sitting at the beach and Saw a boat that said Dolphin Tours, Hubby and I decided why not go on one. Best $12 ever spent. Got to see some dolphins, got to have some drinks and snacks! The bartender was super sweet as well as our tour guide, she has AWESOME recommendations for places to eat with the best views. Very cute family owned Business!

name: gary dollar
text: Best dolphin cruise I've been on. The operators were super fun and they made sure we saw dolphins of course but were super engaged with the whole group. Would definitely recommend.

name: Sara Benningfield
text: Well worth the money!! We had so much fun. We saw lost of dolphins and he was very informative about the cruise and what was going on. Also the co-captain Jason did an awesome job with the kids and keeping them interested and showing them where the dolphins were. We will be back!! Thank you for such a relaxing dolphin tour!!! 🐬🐬🐬

name: Mike McCravey
text: Took the family for a fishing trip while on vacation and had a wonderful time! We didn't catch much, but we had a few fish for dinner that night. The captain and crew were awesome and the boat was wonderful as well. For my first time out deep-sea fishing, this was a great experience.

name: Ashley DeBord
text: Had a great experience this evening on our dolphin tour. Even though we didn't see many dolphins, the crew made every possible effort to give us a great experience. Thank you!!

name: Christy Lewis
text: Thank you for a wonderful fishing adventure.  The crew was very attentive and personable.  We would recommend this trip/adventure to anyone who was looking for a fun adventure in the Gulf Shores/Orange Beach Area. 😀

resp.text: Thank you for booking with Hudson Marina!  We glad you had a great time fishing,  and thank you for the time you took to leave a review.  Come back again soon.

name: susan rice
text: We had a great experience! Caught lots of fish on our trip. Crew was friendly and helpful. Had an added on bonus with a dolphin jumping out of the water putting on a show right next to the boat.  Jedidiah... fish on!!!

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with us! Congratulations on your catch.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.

name: Adrienne Williams
text: Was a nice boat ride of the gulf and orange beach. Crew were very nice and knowledgeable of the surroundings. Saw a few dolphins and they made every attempt to show us them!

name: Eddie Ledkins
text: Deckhanded on the boats there last season. Good Captains and crew. Best prices on 4 hour deep sea fishing trips.

name: art moyer
text: Worst trip I've ever been on one of the mates was sea sick and the captain could not find the fish and out of 30 people only 6 fish longest was 16"

resp.text: Art, we apologize for it being a rougher day on the water and for the bite being slow that day. Hopefully next time the seas are calm and the fishing are biting

name: Kirstin Fullenwider
text: Highly recommend this place. Jason and Corbit were a lot of help and made this fishing trip one of the best I've ever had! Can't wait to come back next year!

resp.text: Thanks!  We love to hear great things about the crew!  We are glad you enjoyed the trip and hope to see you again soon.

name: adam quick
text: We were told to be there early because the boat was leaving at 7:30 well it was well after 8:00 when we finally left and everybody was catching good fish untill the captain wanted to keep moving, then one of the deck hands kept moving everybodies fish around and nobody knew where their fish were and there was some big fish that couldn't be found do to the deck hand swapping our buckets around, but due to leaving the dock late our trip was cut short. Other than that it was fun and we had a pretty good time I guess, deck hand todd was awesome and he deffently knew what he was doing

name: Kelly Standley
text: Had a great time on a four hour morning party trip. Every one in our group had a catch. Some with as many as 5-6.

name: Tabitha Freeman
text: I want to thank the captain and crew for making one of my sister dream come true she was diagnosed with stage 4 cancer  with only 6 to 12 months and although she was very sea sick they did everything to make sure she caught some fish and she said even though she got sea sick she would do it again  love them for  them making her feel great

name: Joe Eaton
text: Great boat ride. seen several dolphins playing. Crew was great, Captain was awesome, with the history, and knowledge of the area and dolphins as well

name: aften giles
text: Only saw like 2 dolphins while other dolphin cruises was going out not the ocean but not this one he did circles and pretty much didn’t go anywhere except the bay very disappointed

name: Daniel Alexander
text: I was highly disappointed in this cruise being I had gone deep sea fishing with the same company the day before and had an absolute blast. However this was not the case on the Dolphin cruise. Trouble started as soon as we boarded the boat. As we walked up the stairway to the upper deck to view the dolphins there were no benches or any permanent seating just the cheap white lawn chairs you buy at Dollar General. This not such a big deal but very in professional looking. Second of All as soon as we sit down in our lawn chair we noticed there were way to many people on the upper deck for the amount of chars provided. This was due to the lower deck witch is enclosed and air conditioned smelling like raw sewege. We not talking about a little stick, it was so bad not one person could stay inside and by the end of the trip the smell was leaking out of the lower deck and was ingulfing us on the stairway outside on the boat.This was my chief complaint just due to the fact I have 3 small children that use the bathroom a lot and I was having to go in and out of this stink a lot!! Also could have seen more dolphins from the beach and we had got a lot more close to the dolphins the day before fishing. It was hour into the trip before we seen a dolphin 200yds away.  People save your time and money huge let down on the dolphin Cruise. But the deep sea fishing trip is great.

name: Terry Hammond
text: Captain was pleasant and good with the kids. Even let them drive the boat. However didn’t see many dolphins.

name: Nik-Nik Pat
text: So sorry we we were running a little late Captain!! We had a  wounderful time.The water was beautiful and the dolphins were amazing.We saw one doing flips out of the water,he was for sure showing off.We will be back to bring the baby when she’s older.Godbless.

name: matt mansfield
text: Great experience even on a choppy day, the crew was very helpful and went above and beyond to make sure everyone (especially the kids) had a great experience

name: Justin Blair Fishing
text: Started out good saw dolphins then headed towards the inlet and open water and the captain went down stairs. Boat stopped and idled in the inlet for a good solid 10 minutes then when he came back we turned around and cruised the inlet then went back 2 stars only because we saw dolphins early on in the cruise after that nothing

name: Stefanie Miller
text: Capt Rodney and Porter were great. We saw some beautiful dolphins including a baby. Great time for the whole family.

name: Christina Conn
text: Great price and we saw tons of dolphins. The boat ride was very smooth too.

name: Drew Hysong
text: We had a great time and everyone should have caught at least one fish.  They were biting.

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We are glad you had a great time and appreciate the review you left.  We hope to take you fishing again soon.

name: Steve Fuller
text: The boat broke while we were out, so we stopped for a while to fix, then went unreasonably slow moving spot to spot.  Captain tried to pass the slow speed off as trolling, but it was unproductive as only 2 fish were caught in hours of trolling.  Nobody on the boat was satisfied with the their experience.

name: Kenny McCallister
text: Pirate ship adventure was a Great family trip! C.C. was awesome!!

name: Quan Nguyen
text: We had good time with captain Dan and his crews on the explorer

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We appreciate your business and the time you took to leave a review.  We are glad you had a great time and hope to see you again soon.

name: J C
text:
My husband and I are Snowbirds from Canada and we enjoyed a delightful voyage on the Perdido Queen at the Hudson Marina on February 22, 2017.

The lunch was delicious!  There was ample food for everyone!

Chicken, pork, salad, mashed potatoes, pasta, grilled vegetables, dinner rolls and strawberry bread pudding!  There is a bar onboard and you can enjoy an alcoholic beverage with your lunch.

Compliments to Chef Jonathan!  Two thumbs up!

It was a very smooth ride and we enjoyed seeing the sights!

The Staff is very professional and polite and assisted the passengers boarding and departing the Perdido Queen.

We will recommend the Perdido Queen to our American Snowbird friends!

resp.text: Thank you for cruising with Hudson Marina!  We are glad you had a great experience, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Kelsey Sims
text: Worst dolphin tour I’ve ever been on. Captain complained over speaker the whole time. Took us to the end of the bay and said he wasn’t going any further because of waves. We literally sat there and watched other dolphin boats pass us to go out. Saw two dolphins fins. That was it. Paid $60 for 4 people for nothing. After tour, spoke with captain about how disappointed I was. He didn’t care. Called and spoke to manager and they were rude to me. Waste of time. Do not go on this tour. Choose a different company!

name: James Dennis
text: Caught my limit plus 2 big ones Jason really took care of all of us

name: Angel Reavis
text: Best dolphin cruise

name: Mark Waters
text: A one one thing.  We saw dolphin and nice landscape but overall not a highligt of summer.

name: Maddison Leonard
text: Really fun saw lots of dolphins

name: Judy Johnson
text: The  food on the valentine's  cruise  was disgusting.  Don't  waste  your .money.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.  We strive to provide each customer with an exceptional experience and apologize if you did not enjoy the activity.

name: Craig Hare
text: You will spend most of your time riding and not very much time fishing. Save your money and go to tje state park pier.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.  We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced.  It is our goal to provide each customer with an excellent experience.

name: Denisa Berry
text: Very enjoyable.

name: Michael Brown
text: They will cancel on you!!!!

name: Phil Berry
text: Amazing experience

name: Adrian Salas
text: Love it!

name: Meghan Bassett
text: We have been on more charter trips than we can count and captain strange is by far one of the best!! He is knowledgeable with an amazing set up for success. We caught loads of quality fish and will definitely be back for more. All around 5 stars and highly recommended!!

name: Josh Tesreau
text: We (3 men, 1 woman, and a 12 yr old) went out on 7/22/20 for a Snapper Charter and had a great time.  Capt. Strange and his deckhand Lane did a great job of finding the fish and keeping us busy.  The water was a little rough, but we stayed on the big snapper and managed to catch 8 monsters.   The “Get Tight” is an amazing boat and all of the tackle is very nice as well.  I would definitely recommend this charter and plan to take another trip in the coming years.

name: steve hester
text: Captain Boe and Eli did not let us down. We were expecting a first class experience and that is exactly what we received. I took my stepson, his girlfriend and my stepson in law. I have been on several fishing adventures in the past and this one definitely topped them all.

name: Joseph Ziegler
text: Capt. Strange and his deck hand Lane took good care of our group of three adults and two boys (13 years old).  We went out the morning of July 21, 2020 and initially the water was below average but the 37' Freeman cut  through the waves just fine and got us out 20 miles in no time.  We hit a number of spots and after about an hour and a half we had 10 Snapper to take home.  The fish averaged close to 20lbs with one 24lb beast that my son fought for a while was able to bring in himself.  The boat is great and Captain Strange made our charter a great experience.  We'll definitely use him again next time we're going out in this area.

name: John Jones
text: Went out February 2021 caught lots of fish. The boat gets you to the fish fast and Captain Boe can put you on them. Great time!

name: Reagan Mead
text: This was by far one of my most successful deep sea fishing trips and I have been through multiple different charters. Our group wanted to catch Amberjack/Grouper and Captain Strange knew exactly where to go. He has great tackle that allows for people of all ages to have a phenomenal fishing trip. I highly recommend using Get Tight Charters if you are looking for a charter with more fishing and less down time. Captain Strange knows what he is doing and I will for sure be a returning customer.

name: Underdog fishing charters Joey Lapeyrouse
text: Cptn bow is first class and catches A LOT of grouper and all targeted species

name: Karen Lowery
text: Best fishing trip we’ve ever been on!! Thank you to Captain Strange for providing our family with an an amazing day. The boat is incredible and we pulled up huge fish the entire time. This will be a new tradition for our family. Huge thank you to our Captain!!

name: Jesse Fillingame
text: I had a great time and caught a load of big fish. The big boat rode smooth even when the gulf got rough. The captain was helpful and courteous. Would definitely recommend and can’t wait to go again!!

name: Andrew Montgomery
text: Top notch crew with Top notch equipment!! Always an awesome time on the Get Tight!!

name: Richard Thiel
text: Best captain around. Always puts you on fish and ensures you're having a blast. Numerous trips taken and will take plenty more in the future!

name: Hieu Do
text: I’m a regular visitor with this crew.  I’ve caught almost all of my record fish with Shoal charters.  If you’re looking to fish your butt off this is the right choice.

name: Mark Miller
text: Awesome guide boat and fishing trip. Capt Bo and his mate took care of everything! Caught out limit and enjoyed a trip with a very knowledgeable and personal Captian! Will book with him again.

name: Ian Paradelas
text: Went fishing with Capt Bo 7/16/19 and had a great time! Boat is super clean and nice and made for fishing. Plenty of room to fight fish all around the boat. The Catamaran Freeman can handle sea's like no other boat I been on and will get you to the honey Holes quickly! The capt and mate are all about fishing none stop! Best bang for your buck and super tight line's with huge fish! I will be back here and definitely recommend these guys! GET TIGHT Line's feller's!

name: Edward Robinson
text: I’ve been looking for a charter crew that I can stick with and I feel like I’ve found them.  They have a real passion for fishing and it shows.  They get on spot fast and move when needed to make sure that you get fish in the box.  Captain and mate were also fun.  Overall the trip was a blast!  I will charter with them again.

name: Taylor Bassett
text: I highly recommend this charter! Captain Boe is great which made for an amazing experience! Can’t wait till our next trip!

name: Trey Bassett
text: This was a great second trip. The captain and deckhand were very professional. We caught a lot of fish and had a great time. I would recommend a trip with them to anyone. We had 3 teenage girls on our trip and there was no filthy language and they did nothing to make them feel uncomfortable. Very respectful and courteous. A GREAT CHARTER!!!!!!

resp.text: We always love it when our Arkansas crew comes down to fish!

name: Dane DeValk
text: By far the one of the best charters I have been on!  Awesome guys that know how to fish and put you on fish. The Freeman boat will get you where you need to go quickly and comfortably so you can spend more time fishing than riding. Great experience.  My next trip will be for tuna!!

resp.text: Can’t wait to take you in October!

name: Benjamin Cooksey
text: Capt Boe is a great fisherman, we had a excellent snapper trip with a bonus Ling. Fine boat, great experience!

name: Daniel Mcbride
text:
By far one of the most comfortable action packed fishing charters I’ve ever been on. They are geared to the teeth with top notch equipment and the experience and knowledge to know what to do with it.  With that, the day Resulted in a full boat of fish and One satisfied customer.
Strongly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for the review Daniel! We can't wait to go out again!

name: Jennifer Paradelas
text: I had the chance to go fishing with the guys and it was a great trip, super nice boat and plenty of fish was caught! The captain and deck hand were awesome and on top of every one who had a fish on! Definitely recommend these guys!!

name: Haden Williams
text:
Great fishing trip!!  These guys puts us on big snapper within 30 minutes!  We were culling fish before mid-day!  Awesome professional crew, great gear, and badass boat!!
Can’t wait to fish with you guys again.

resp.text: We would be more than happy to have y’all back!!

name: Jon Laycock
text: Absolutely first class trip! Our whole crew had a blast. Would definitely recommend and will call them again! Capt Bo and Steadman took great care of us!

name: Kelsey Brunt
text: If you're looking for the best charter on the gulf coast this is the one! Everything is top notch from its crew down to the equipment. No dink fish are caught on this boat. If you're looking for a great time for your friends, or need to take a client out give shoal charters a call, you will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Brunt! We need to get you on board again for another trip!

name: Tyler Julian
text:
Guarantee to catch huge snapper? Check.
Friendly captain and environment for beginners? Check.
Awesome boat with tons of room and equipment? Check.

Seriously, if you are looking for an top-notch charter experience, this is the one you should be looking for!

resp.text: We can’t wait to take y’all again!

name: Aaron Elmore
text: Amazing crew and vessel! Very safe and knowledgeable of all aspects of being on the water. Highly recommend! Ohh and they catch fish too.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Jarrod Gibson
text: Just wrapped up another successful trip on the Get Tight with Capt Bo. Our crew had a blast and we came home with more fish than we knew what to do with!! Can’t wait to get back out there with them again soon!

name: Allan Mitchell
text: Me and my family had so much fun Caught so much big snapper The captain in the mate is  wonderful people In the ride on the boat was so comfortable Thanks for everything guys see y’all soon the best fishing charter and dolphin island

name: Michael Pittman
text: Top notch operation! One of the best fishing trips I’ve ever taken in my life, Capt bo and Stedman made it very enjoyable! Will def book again

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Bart Briggs
text:
Capt. Boe & Steadman are top notch fishermen, excellent mariners, gracious hosts, and have the absolute best gear. I have booked with many charters in many locales but “Get Tight” is the absolute best. We have booked them for client prospect outings, family get-togethers, and employee gatherings. Never have we have a bad experience, nor have we ever come back empty handed. The best part is that they’re not just for snapper season; we’ve had some of the best trips fishing for scamp, grouper, and marlin after the snapper crowd has gone. A review would not be complete without noting that their boat will get you out and back safely and provide much more fishing time than most charters!

Bart Briggs

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Scott Littrell
text:
This is not your run of the mill charter trip! It was pretty obvious early on that Capt Boe knows what it takes to put clients on the fish but more importantly keeping them on top of fish even in not so ideal conditions.  Fishing with Boe and Stedman felt more like a day of fishing with 2 additional friends on board rather than a charter. To the point I felt I should help clean the boat or do something at the end of the day.  These guys love fishing and neither of them were watching the clock to see how much longer they had at “work”.  Do yourself a favor and experience the pleasure of fishing on-board a very well equipped Freeman with Boe and Stedman.  All of the tackle is top notch and there is a rod on-board to fit anyone.
Thanks guys and see you soon for some grouper.  –Scott

name: Rodney Moody
text: Outstanding trip and boat. Captain knows his business and you will catch big fish.

name: Pfilip Hunt
text: Capt Boe and Stedman have spent a lot of time and effort to master the different techniques for the different species they target for their clients. And they move quickly from non producing spots to producing spots to maximize their client’s chances of catching lots of fish.  We’ve been using them for several years now and have always gotten big mixed bag in the coolers by the end of the day. Many boats just focus on snapper but Boe and stedman will have their clients’ on snapper, scamp, trigger, AJ, king, etc and deep drop targets like snowy grouper, yellow edge, barrel fish, etc. The mixed bag is always the highlight of the day!

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Curt Ryals
text: Best in the biz!!!! Undeniably the best maintained and up to date boat around. Can’t go wrong with these guys!!!! Get Tight!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Russell Martin
text: Great trip on comfortable boat with great captain/mate

name: Marvin Day (Mobboss)
text: Awesome Charter Service!!!!

name: jmk1292
text: We had a great time fishing with Capt. Randy and his crew. The captain put us on the fish and the crew were very polite and helpful. I would highly recommend this charter

name: Christina Hanna
text:
The Deck hands were GREAT (Jack & Jeff), but unfortunately the captain seemed to have trouble navigating the boat. He’ed tell us to drop our lines and then he’ed move the boat causing our lines to either get caught in the prop or tangled with each other. Meaning 10-15 lines tangled at once multiple times leaving us with only about 20mins of fishing time all together. It was a 2hr trip out there. Once we stopped the first time the captain decided to move location adding an additional 25mins to our non fishing time. He kept blaming it on the current but you would hear him accelerate the engine and then all the lines would end up getting pushed behind us and then he would get mad because all the lines would be back towards the prop and we would have to reel them back up which is what we spent most of our time doing.  We’ve been deep sea fishing several times before so I don’t mind not catching anything because of the weather, etc.,  but I do have a problem with not getting to fish due to lack of caring or inexperience. You know there’s an obvious problem when everyone including the kids are saying to just “stop moving the boat!”
Fishing trip 7/14/21

name: Amanda Scott
text: Our experience was just OK. The crew of 3 on deck were not always attentive when we had fish on the line and had to take them off ourselves. Ran out of bait and had to wait for a refill which lost fishing time. On our way out for the 6 hr trip, an interior window started to fall out of the slot. Didn't think it was a huge deal and would have appreciated if they just stored the glass somewhere safe, but instead they had to stop the boat and all 4 members of the crew took about 15 min to put it back in its place. I thought they would for sure compensate for the lost fishing time, but nope! We pulled back into dock a few min before the end time. I thought this was really rude. Lastly, we tipped the crew as we were getting off the boat a generous amount because we knew we had fish to clean. Come to find out, the fish cleaning is NOT part of the tip we gave and we had to pay even more just to have our fish cleaned. I thought this was a huge rip off and something that should be communicated. I never would have given the tip I did because I didn't think they earned it for what they did on the boat.

name: Craig Driessner
text:
Captain Jack and the crew were awesome! The fish were a bit smaller than 5 years ago when we went with Reel Surprise.  Everyone caught their limit within the 2 hour fishing time. I can't say how awesome these guys are.

The office staff is great too.

All around excellent family fun.

name: David Schumer
text: Highly competent crew. We had very rough seas, but the captain kept us fishing throughout. Moved several times when the fish stopped biting. Each time got us back on the fish. Deck hands were great keeping up with all the fish on. Keeping track of whose fish were whose. Not an easy task at all. Processed the fish after the trip. Made sure to tip them well, for their hard work. Would go back on their boat anytime.

name: Mike Nicholl
text: Great job navigating the gulf waterways we had an amazing time and the office lady Jessica was fantastic

name: Jeffery Mclaughlin
text: Worth every penny! Great customer service and beautiful relaxing views. Very romantic and thoughtful.

name: Larry Windle
text: Around 40 people and no one caught  a fish. Trip that went out before us  slayed them.

name: Becky Krisell
text: I can't say enough of how the captain and his staff cared for my family on our fishing trip. The seas were rough and several were seasick. One of my sons in particular was extremely sick. The captain knew exactly how to care for him. He turned the boat around and refunded everyone their money. Wow is all I can say. Thank you Reel Surprise Charters!

name: Karina Metcalf
text: If you have fished in open ocean a lot, you'll be fine. If not, just know going in that you'll be figuring it out on your own. Not the friendliest crew of young guys.

name: David Poche
text: Great trip went two days in a row and caught several fish and had a great experience will definitely go again

resp.text: Thanks David!  We look forward to you fishing with us again.

name: Connie Gilbert
text: This was the WORST fishing trip, DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!  Captain didn’t know how to drive the boat straight, we moved majority of the trip got MAYBE an hour of actual fishing & hardly anyone caught any fish. Then deck hand Elizabeth said “well this is a fishing trip not a catching trip!” VERY RUDE & UNPROFESSIONAL!! Do your research people the bad reviews are all true!!

name: cynthia m
text: The fishing itself was ok but it was a “reel surprise” when out fish got mixed up and they kept putting us at the end of the line to get them cleaned. I also asked if there was some other market we could go to to get them cleaned and the captain was very rude. I tipped the deck hands before and asked them to take care of us but that’s not what happened.

name: Joseph Columbus
text: Bottom fishing for snapper mostly when I went. Big boat with a good size interior cabin. Friendly captain and mate. Tried to get enough fish to cook at a local restaurant. I didn't get enough( my fault) but someone gave me a few so it's fresh caught fish for dinner! A couple of hours fishing time with an hour ride back and to the fishing grounds. A bit tricky finding the Marina. Good way to spend the morning.

name: Cathy Richardson
text:
Fun time, Elizabeth was awesome with our first timers.  Staff was friendly and knowledgeable.  We didnt get to keep many fish because it wasnt trigger or snapper season but fun was had by all.
THANK TOU AGAIN REEL SURPRISE and Captain Randy .

resp.text: Thank you, Kathy.  We will make sure that Capt Randy, Elizabeth and the crew know that you left them a 5 star review.  We look forward to having you fish with us again.

name: Justin Jenson
text: Reel Surprise Charters are First Class People. A Once in a Lifetime Family Friendly Experience! I hope to make this an annual trip like most of the other guest that continue to return year after year to fish and create lasting memories with Reel Surprise Charters! Thank you for everything. My family is 'hooked'

name: mobiletrock mobiletrock
text: Nice boat upgrade, should make for a nice ride out. Too rough today for fishing heading back. Better to be safe!

name: nicole fitzpatrick
text: We loved it so much that we went two days in a row! The captain was very nice and did a great job making sure we were on the fish the whole time we were fishing. The deck hands were extremely nice, knowledgeable and worked hard the entire time! We will definitely be back and wouldn't think of going to any other charter.

name: Ashley Baumgartner
text: My family has not stopped talking about their trip.  They loved it.  All three caught fish and had the best time.  Said the captain really knows his stuff and put them right on the fish.

name: Jason Yeager (Jason)
text: The deckhands were friendly and always right there when you needed them. We had a fun quick red snapper trip!

name: Judy Hanson
text: Not the fault of the launch but had to turn around after awile... too rough on the water.  We almost fished but appreciate the safety first policy!!

name: Tina Osborn
text: We had an absolutely awesome fishing trip! Captain Randy is THE BEST! When he found out our son had recently joined the military and wanted to take a fishing trip before leaving for basic training, Captain Randy went out of his way to make our son's trip the very best that it could possibly be! We will be back!! The deckhands (Derik & Russell) are great! So nice and helpful!! If you choose this charter.....you WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!! 5 STARS!!

name: Kristi Marsh
text: Great times with a wonderful crew! Learned so much and had a blast. Thanks guys!

name: Chad Warren
text:
Went out on the intruder.  They told me it would be 12 people and showed up and there were 15.  Might as well been on a party boat.
We had no room to fish and lines were constantly getting tangled.  The deck hand
did a great job considering.  It even states
On website 14 max to fish.  Doubt if i will be back.

name: Pat Mason
text: Randy and his crew are a fun group to fish with. Large boats , plenty of room to move around. Fun day of fishing

name: Candy Win
text: Don’t waste your money. Spent more time traveling to fishing sites than fishing.  Approximate  travel time was 5 hours out of the six. Not enough deck hands. Kept asking for bait. Had to wait on bait. Lines kept getting tangled and by the time a deck hand untangled your line the captain moved spots. Very  frustrating that there wasn’t  plenty  of time to fish out of six hours. Captains fishing sites were far apart so you spent more time traveling from site to site. Longest time in one fishing spot was approximately 20 minutes. The shortest stop was approximate 10 minutes. We move to five different spots. Traveled a lot.

name: scott walsh
text: My first outing with a boat charted like this and definitely disappointed. We spent more time boating then fishing . the deck hands pretty much ignored use for the first hour and 20 minutes we finally stopped fished for 5 min i caught a fish before i could i.d. it the deck hand cut it free. Not. Cool at least let me know what i caught. We again spent 15 minutes driving we finally stopped and fish. Zero help from the deck hands on how to hook bait properly. We were told they would instruct us the first time. After that it was a fish free for all. Every cramped together trying to fish. Looking back I'd have done a private charter. Also my son and his friend caught nothing we ran out of time.

name: Christi Remaly
text: Reel disappointed!!!! Thank goodness this was not my first party boat fishing charter, otherwise I would probably never step foot on one again after today. We had maybe a total of 2.5 hr’s of fishing time. The 3.5 hr boat “ride” was nice, but not what I was looking for on a supposed 6 hr fishing charter.  Compared to other charters it seemed very unorganized and chaotic. They shorted us 4 fish by putting them in other peoples buckets!!?? Really. Thank god for the normal company we go through,  out of Hudson Marina! They have your buckets labeled and with you at all times. The captain gave minimal instructions on depth and location and  there was absolutely no room to fish properly. Granted the seas were rough but the “novices” we got stuck next to we’re allowed to act like complete careless idiots without correction from the staff. It was also discouraging to know the deck hands were not paid by the charter and basically relied on our tips.  Shame on you Captain. Now I know why the price was cheaper...We tipped them generously and got out of there as fast as possible. I have never been happier to see land!! Trust me, spend the extra money for professionals who take care of their guests and employees.

name: Steve Weissmann
text: Big boat that is stable on the ocean. Good crew and Captain.

resp.text: Thank you, Steve.  We will share your comments with the captain and crew!

name: Skyler Tuttle
text: I went on a shared cost charter today (fishing charter with about 30 people). It was supposed to be a 6 hour trip. Showtime was 8 and we departed at 8:20. We fished 15-20 miles offshore so it took a little under 2 hours each way. We stayed at each fishing hole for about 10 minutes before driving 20 minutes to the next one. With all the driving and getting back 30 minutes early, there was very little time spent fishing. With that being said, the boat caught its limit in red snapper which included a few very nice ones. However, once someone caught their limit, they then catch yours too. If you didn't catch your limit, you get to keep the smallest of someone elses. Instead of a relaxing fishing trip, it was a race to catch fish. Not at all what I wanted/expected, a reel surprise.

name: emmylou dela cruz
text:
This company will give you a real surprise. We rode on the boat for an hour and twenty minutes to find a ton of big fish, but surprisingly majority of them were all small that they needed to be returned to the ocean. We also barely had time to fish because we still had to travel back for another hour and twenty minutes. We wasted 3 hours of boating and an hour for fishing.What do you expect? We got 1 red medium snapper and 8 small gray snapper for 7 fishers, which is better than nothing. The good news is someone gave us extra small fishes. I spoke to people from different charters, saying that they went for boating 20 mins and spent 3 hours fishing.
It was a waste of money and time.

name: Johnny Warren
text: Went on my first deep sea fishing trip yesterday 8/25/2017 Had the time of my life reel friendly grew and very helpful. I'd go again today if I could. Oh and the price was awesome!

name: chuck morgan
text: We spent a week in Orange Beach every year and every year we go on a fishing charter trip with my 2 son in laws, we have gone 4 yrs straight and we have had some bad experiences and some good, but every time we have gone with Reel Surprise the boat has caught our limit and returned early and we have caught several monsters, but overall these guys are excellent and great group of people and our bad experiences have been with Hudson Marine, on one trip, before we left the dock the Captain bragged how great the fishing was going to be and after countless attempts, the majority of the boat never caught a fish and the Captain made excuses the whole way back to shore on why the fish weren’t bitten, just very poor experience

name: teresa lackey
text: We had the best crew ever. They were right there to help you and tell you what to do. It was my grandson first time to go but we will definitely do it again. Caught 8 fish but 4 was out if season but we brought home 3 pounds of red snapper cleaned and ready to cook.  Love yall guys for making a memory that me and Zack will never forget.

name: Dax McDaniel
text: We shopped around at most of the fishing charters and these guys definitely are the best for their money. $65 for a 4 hour trip and it was absolutely worth it. They put us right on the money and are very thorough with their instructions and what fish we are catching and how to catch them. Very professional crew and they cleaned your fish for very cheap. Be sure did bring some cash for the deck hands as it's not included in the price.
