And that for our trip 3 hours of it was getting to and fro. 18 people fished and caught 90 vermillion snapper since that's what was in season

name: Ronnie Alston
text: Had a good time on this boat. Deck hands answered all my questions and we're attentive.

name: James Cowell
text: First off I paid over $600 for my family of 8 which some were not fishing. We rode for nearly 2hrs and then found a spot to fish. We fished for around 5 minutes & captain decided to move to another spot. We fished for 5 to 10 minutes and he decided to go to another spot which we got there around 20min later and fished for maybe 10min & captain came over speaker saying a lady had cut her hand & we had to leave accidents happen & we weren't upset about it but nearly 2hrs later on which half my family got sick due to the speed and crashing waves we were ramming through to get her back. A family of 8 which 6 were fishing had 4 small fish. I went in to go ahead and tip the deckhands since it wasn't their fault and they did a good job. I asked the lady in the office about some money back since we had fished maybe 30min after paying for 6 hours. They told me that captain Randy was on his way back and would give me a call. We never received the call & have called back around 6 times. I talked to him once and he hadn't had time to look into it. This is the middle of the 2nd day and still no call back. We have called a few more times & hes still not available. I think hes just waiting us out until we go back to Arkansas where we came from which I dont appreciate. I can handle a yes or no but just being ignored. I dont appreciate. This was my kids 1st trip and I work hard for my money just to be ignored isn't an option. I would not recommend this group to anyone. Pay a little more and get a reel professional charter. I know I spelled that wrong on purpose because I got a reel screwin .  They have 1 star since there isn't a 0 star button. This could've been avoided if I could just get a call back and a little professionalism.

name: Doug Gillespie
text: Captain qas great and fishing could not have been better.

resp.text: Thank you!  We will tell the crew!

name: Bradley Force
text: This place is trash! Didnt even show up for there booked trip! I would not recommend them what so ever!

name: OverSizeDriver Local
text: Great place to take out a group, family or individual trip!  These guys will put you on the fish!

name: Mark Lewis
text: Great captain. . Randy always puts you on the fish. He always has some good deckhands. It always a pleasure fishin with these guys.

name: Eddie Ledkins
text: Good people, good fishing at a good price. Capt. Randy will put you on the fish.

name: Phyllis Bouley
text: Best Chartered fishing trips EVER BEAT ALL OTHER CHARTERS FOR QUANTITY MORE THAN DOUBLE

name: Richard waters
text: One of the best if not the best Snapper boats around !

resp.text: Thank you, we are glad that you a had a great experience.

name: Rodney Stanberry
text: Very helpful and friendly on our company trip today

name: Steve Olave
text:
awesome fisherman !   great service !!

i have fished all over the united states and several foreign countries .
I have never experienced a more professional outfit and great fisherman . The boats are exceptionally clean and equipment is terrific and functional . The crew and captain made us feel welcome and appreciated . I would definitely reccommend this charter service to anyone interested in a great time and fantastic fishing

steve

name: Rauf Bolden
text: Fishing fun for the whole family.

name: Chuck Arnold
text: Best charter service by far!

name: Jack Snelling
text: Unsatisfactory all round, last trip, not hard to please.

name: Mary Womack
text: Good people

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your comments.

name: Payton Allen
text: Such an amazing experience with friendly service!! More than worth the cost and a great experience for the whole family that we’d definitely do again. Troy and Sam were great guys who made sure we got the full experience and the kids loved how engaged they were and to be able to learn in a safe environment. No other charter service will offer the knowledge or the experience so be sure to book with them!!

resp.text: Payton.   Thanks so much for your great feedback about your family’s trip with us.   We enjoyed the laughter and watching ya’ll catch those fish.  That shark was so cool.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again someday soon.   Troy

name: Amber Prather
text:
We booked a family fun deep sea fishing trip as part of our vacation and I am so glad we did! They were so kind and patient with my two 7 year old daughters. We caught so many fish and the cabin of the boat was clean and nice and cool to hang out in while you ride. Kids took a little nap is was so cozy!
I highly recommend Captain Troy and the deck hand Sam to give you a fishing experience that the whole family can enjoy.

name: Matt Wright
text: Troy and Sam are the best. They took us out yesterday morning, and I couldn’t have been more pleased. The boat was very nice and extremely well maintained. Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.

text: Distraction Charters is the charter you want to choose. He made a really rough/stormy weekend work and we caught a lot of fish. name: Michelle Arnett
text: We booked the 6 hour fishing trip as part of our Christmas Present to the kids.  They each brought a friend and everyone had a great time. I decided on Distraction Charters because it is family focused.  Captain Troy and Sam wanted everyone to have a good time, learn a little and stay safe.  We will definitely go again and perhaps an even longer charter since I now know the kids will enjoy it.  They are already talking about going again.  I highly recommend Distraction Charters to anyone who is wanting to take their kids fishing.  We were able to grill up some of our catch for dinner.  It was so helpful that Sam cleaned the fish for us so we were able to cook it at the condo for dinner.  I also liked that it has a nice clean cabin and bathroom for those who worry about having "facilities" on the high sea.  Thank you Captain T-roy and Sam for a fabulous time.

text: Capt Troy was great and Sam the deck hand was "Johnny on the spot". My daughters first deep sea fishing trip and she is hooked.  They had us on the Snapper quick and a mess of them in the boat in no time.  The boat is a bullet proof Hat and clean as a whistle.  I cannot wait to go back.

name: Dan Foor
text: Booked the premium family trip and went out on a morning charter the day after red snapper opened.  Captain Troy is an amazing host and quickly makes you feel like part of his family. “Family” being a key word because this charter service and its captain is absolutely focused on helping families have an amazing experience- with awesome fishing as a bonus. We had fish for lunch less than 1/2 hour into the trip and limited out on red snapper very quickly, several triggerfish, bonito and even a king mackerel found their way into our boat. Deckhand Sam did a great job of keep hooks baited, fish held for pictures (along with their captor) and patiently guiding those newer to fishing to success. Sitting “up top” with Captain Troy during travel time was just like having a chat with a favorite relative in your living room or deck. Overall just a great experience we’ll never forget. Would highly recommend Distraction Charters to anyone looking to fish out of Orange Beach marina. Thank you Troy and Sam!

resp.text: Dan.  Thank you so much for taking time to share your wonderful experience you had with us.  We really enjoyed getting to know you all.  Your family was so much fun to be with.  I too enjoyed the conversations and your company.   Thanks for allowing us to serve your family.   Hope to see you again soon.   Troy

name: Matthew Bohm
text: Troy and Sam run a great family oriented operation! My wife and I took our boys age 6 and 8 and we all had a blast. We did the 5 hour trip and it worked out great. We caught a good variety of fish, saw a shark and dolphins, and had enough fish to keep for a couple meals even though we were fishing for fun. Troy takes a personal approach to the trip by getting to know you and keeps it fun for everyone. If you are looking for a true family friendly trip I would not hesitate to give them a call.

resp.text: Matt, thank you so much for your kind words about your experience about your fishing trip with us.   Your family was so much fun to be with.  I am so glad you allowed us to meet and serve your family.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon!   Troy

See you next year!

name: Jason Pletsch
text: I love to support Veteran owned business. Troy is Navy and our group was a mix of Army and Air Force, so we had some good jokes going around. I took my Dad and my best friend with his family. We had a blast!!  We were fortunate that we went on good days with calm seas. We caught 8 different types of fish and saw some annoying dolphins that kept trying to steal our fish of the hook, hahaha. Troy kept us laughing with jokes while Deckhand Sam was making sure we had bait and helped us land some fish. My buddies youngest son caught the biggest fish, and bragged about it for a week. Both boys asked us to make this an annual fishing trip. Troy and Sam took care of us and worked hard to make sure we had fun. We cannot wait to book another trip with them next year!  We look forward to becoming regulars.

resp.text: Jason.  Thank you so much for taking time to share your awesome experience you had with us with others.  Ya’ll were the perfect family.  We enjoyed the fishing, laughter and feeling like part of your family.   Can’t wait to see you all again soon.  Troy

name: Christine Henderson
text: Captain Troy and Deckhand Sam were the best. My Husband and I took our six year old son on the fishing trip. I was worried that our son would get bored or tired and make the trip not so much fun. But he did amazing. He caught the most fish. Several times he caught two fish at once. I did not want to do more than the six hour trip due to being worried about how our son would do, but he could have easily done the longer trip. Once we started catching fish, he had a blast and his enjoyment was the best. For those that have never been on a fishing trip before (like myself), it does take time to get out to sea. So if you are taking younger kids, make sure to have something for them to do to pass the time. But that is normal for any travel time with younger kids. They don't tend to be very patient. However, Captain Troy and Deckhand Sam worked very well with us as a family. They were very safe and informative. Family memories for a lifetime.

resp.text: Christine.   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your awesome experience you had with us.    Ya’ll were so much fun to fish with.  We enjoyed it very much.   Kids and family fishing is our passion and I am glad you allowed us to serve you.  Hope to see ya’ll again soon.   Troy

name: Claudia
text: Mr. Troy is AWESOME!! First, I'm in a wheelchair.  After contacting a couple of other charters who said that they did not or could not accommodate someone in a wheelchair, Mr. Troy said "We'll make it happen" and he did.  It took Mr. Troy, Sam, and my husband to get me into the boat, but after that it was smooth sailing.  We caught our limit of red snapper and a few vermillion snapper.  It was an amazing experience that I will never forget.  We are already planning on coming back next year and bringing the kids.  If you are wanting to book a charter, the only one to go with is Mr. Troy!!!

resp.text: Hey Claudia.   Thank you so much for sharing your experience and giving us such awesome feedback.   It was an honor to be able to meet your needs and get you out deep sea fishing.   Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.  Can’t wait to see you again soon.   Troy

name: Marie Pearson
text: Wonderful people, wonderful experience. Troy and Sam were friendly and personable and we enjoyed every moment, from stepping on board to docking. Sam showed us how to use the rods provided, baited our lines, and shared all sorts of cool facts about the fish we caught. Troy was an exceptional captain. He got to know us, showed us around the boat before launching, and checked in often to make sure she were all doing okay even on the drive. He truly cares about the happiness of his customers and it shows. This trip is perfect for everyone, whether you're a beginner fisher or a veteran one. Already booking our next trip!

Marie,
It’s a real pleasure to have been able to meet and serve your family.   Your kindness abounds with your feedback about your experience with Sam and I.  We are so happy you had a good experience and a good time.  Thanks for allowing us to serve you and look forward to serving you again.   Troy

name: Dave Peterson
text: Captain Troy and deck hand Sam provided my 2 sons and I a fun, exciting 6 hours of fishing May 12, 2021.  Fast trolling produced lots of excitement while reaching the fishing area where we experienced the strength of the greater amberjacks.  What an amazing test of strength and endurance those awe-inspiring fish put us through.  Our final treat was fishing over an artificial reef catching and releasing fish after fish until it was time to return.  You won’t be disappointed if you hire Distraction Charters for your outing.

resp.text: Thanks Dave for taking the time to share your feedback with others.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.  I’m glad the fish were biting.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon!  Troy

name: Tyler Rose
text:
10/10 would recommend you go with this amazing  charter especially families!!! We arrived early in the morning to be greeted by the enthusiastic Captain Troy, who also happens to be the one who operates this amazing business along with the crew mate Sam. Captain Troy is a genuine person and only wishes that his customers enjoy their time upon his ship.
During our time we caught a tremendous amount of Trigger fish and red snappers with a few vermilion snappers. His crew mate Sam was always willing to help out with our lines and make sure we had bait.
I feel this experience alone would make me book another trip with this company and suggest that you give this charter a booking as well!!

name: Denise NOLA
text:
Great Fishing Trip!!!! Thank you, Capt. Troy and Sam! Seriously, thank you! You provided the best fishing experience I could ask for. I was nervous about taking my kids (both under 10) on a deep-sea fishing trip but you two created a fun and safe environment. Your kind and funny personalities brought my kids out of their shells. Within seconds they thought of you as friends. Thank you for answering the billions of questions they had. My kids have been telling everyone about all the different types of fish they caught.
I cannot say enough about how your trip was so carefree and fun. We caught so many fish, saw a dolphin and a possible shark (which my kids loved the most).  Also, there was no mess for me to clean up! No mess!!!! Your trip was our favorite part of an already great vacation.  We will definitely visit again!

resp.text: Hey Denise.   Your attention to detail about how good your experience was with us is impressive.  Often we get caught up just being us and don’t realize how those around us, especially kids feed off our energy.  What is amazing is, the energy is mutual.  Fun people make fun fishing trips.  Your kids were so sweet and that makes me appreciate what I do.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Again, thanks for the awesome feedback.   Troy

text: Fabulous family fishing experience!! We had so much fun! Troy, the captain, had a fun playful personality. He was very knowledgeable and professional. Our deck hand was Sam. He was knowledgeable and friendly. Sam  worked his butt off... he was quick to replace bait on our hooks, patient when we messed up, very accommodating when we wanted pictures, so easy to talk to and get along with.  He also was constantly checking on the 4 of us and cleaning up the messes when we brought in the fish. The boat was an older boat but very well maintained and CLEAN. We had an amazing experience. Highly recommend this company!  Captain Troy also gave us his special seasoning blend to use when cooking our triggerfish. Yum!!!! This was an experience of a lifetime. Thank you for the memories!!

name: Kaden Stephens
text: Troy was our captain. This man, I tell you what.  The experience was absolutely amazing.  We learned, we laughed, and it was just an amazing time. Sam helped us catch and release while Troy took us to the places where the fish were.  We got tips and tricks on how to cook the fish we caught, and we received a little something special at the end.  Troy isn’t worried about his spot in the fishing business when he works on the charter boat. He is only worried about 2 things. The safety of your family, and the experience that you and your family will have. The second you get on his boat, he wants to get to know you, and he becomes your friend throughout the trip. He is in the service business when he takes you on his boat. He doesn’t care about profit he makes on the fish you catch, he really only cares about whether or not you and your family had a good time.  I recommend this to anyone and everyone. My family and I had a great time on our 6 hour fishing trip. And will remember this time for the rest of our lives. If it were possible to give more stars, I would have.     As a personal example of his priorities, before we even payed a cent, he made sure that we had an amazing time and that we were 100% satisfied.     Which we were.  I couldn’t have asked for a better fishing trip.      Thank you Troy and Sam.

resp.text: Kaden.  That is one of the most amazing detailed feedback reviews about us that I have ever read.  Your attention to detail and ability to explain the service you received is amazing. name: Suzanne Drake
text:
We had an amazing, memory-making, 6-hour trip with Distraction Charters today!  My husband, Nick, and I were treating our parents to a first time deep sea fishing adventure. Captain Troy and deckhand, JT, were friendly, fun, and made us feel like family.

We originally had the trip planned for yesterday, but due to stormy weather we had to postpone. Captain Troy kept us informed and gave us several options to reschedule. Safety, comfort, and our overall experience was his top priority.

We were excited to go out the following morning. We were greeted with smiling faces and a clean, well maintained vessel.  It has a comfortable, air conditioned cabin, which was a great retreat from the heat.

While trolling, we caught a king mackerel that made for a delicious dinner.  You definitely have to try the heifer dust! Then we went out for some fun catch-and-release due to the season. We caught red snapper and cobia, saw dolphins, a leatherback turtle, and a couple of bull sharks.

Distraction Charters is definitely a family friendly charter. They were great with making sure my parents, whom have slight mobility issues, and experienced a little seasickness, were comfortable, included, and having a wonderful trip. Young or old, everyone will have a great time! We will be booking with them in the future and if you want a personalized family-friendly trip, you should too!

Thank you again Captain Troy & JT!

resp.text: Thank you Suzanne for taking the time to write such incredible feedback about your fishing trip with us.  It was a pleasure meeting and serving your family.   I am glad the weather worked out and we had some availability to move your trip to a better weather day.   Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.  Can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: xSTOLENSUNDAYx
text:
Captain Troy and Deck hand  Sam went well above and beyond what is expected of a fishing charter boat captain and a deck should be expected to ever do. We are on my husbands 8,088 mile bucket list trip and this by far is the most memorable and the most fun and emotional trip all wrapped into 2 amazing fishing days they he will remember until the end.
Not only the busy job of keeping track of fishing poles, bait, and tangled reels which I did ALOT!!  Sam kept track of Tip Kurts service dog! He made sure that the dog always was offered water and lots of hugs. Captain Troy just had the most impeccable timing to capture the best and memorable videos and pictures. This trip is going to be the best fishing trip Kurt has ever had, this most likely will be Kurts last fishing trip ever. He loves fishing and he had the time of his life joking and poking fun at Sam! This made the whole trip worth wile of nothing else goes right. God Bless you Troy and Sam. I will never forgot what you Did for this well deserving,Loving wonderful man in my life and a veteran of the Vietnam war.  He made this trip so lively and bitter sweet all in 2 of the best days of my life with Kurt. I hope he can make it back to fish again with you soon. All my love to you both for such a sweet ride! Kate and Kurt

resp.text: Kate.  It was an honor to be able to serve you and Kurt on his bucket list tour.  The time spent with you was so valuable to me, because it reminds me of how important it is to live life to its fullest.  I am just so happy ya’ll chose us to serve you.    I can’t believe ya’ll drove all the way across the USA to help complete this list.   I thank God every day for those customers who have become a part of the Distraction family.   I am in awe with your review about your experience with us.   Thank you so much for allowing us to fulfill Kurt’s wishes.   Godspeed.  Troy

name: Mark Foster
text:
Our family of 4 had a blast 💥 on our fishing 🎣 Distraction Fishing excursion with Captain Troy and his deckhand, Sam, on April 6th, 2021!

ORGANIZED. The logistics of reserving a time slot with the charter was simple (reserve a morning or afternoon just before you depart for your vacation or availability will not exist!). Troy responded immediately to dates and times That were available.

QUALITY PEOPLE.  Troy and Sam went out of their way to learn and communicate with each of my family members by name... both were enthusiastic, patient, positive, and accommodating with our family composed of rookie anglers!

THE BOAT.  “The Distraction” fishing boat was perfect for our needs.  We took a 50 minute ride into the Gulf for our offshore fishing.  We enjoyed the large, comfortable cabin where we relaxed out of the sun ☀️ and enjoyed our packed lunch.  The boat is very spacious and allowed us to easily have 4 wet lines operating simultaneously once we began fishing.

THE FISHING.  I’ll say we landed in the neighborhood of 40 fish 🐠 at 2 separate fishing holes... most were “Trigger” fish which put up a great fight and you knew when you had a big Trigger fish at the end of your line!  We also landed several beautiful Red Fish and a few “Ruby Lips” which were wonderful eating’!  Sam cleaned our catch upon our return; we immediately brought our fish to a nearby restaurant where they fried and grilled our catch for a wonderful and hearty dinner!

THE SHARK. After we had enough keepers in the cooler to feed our family, Sam asked if we’d be interested in fishing for shark.  “Well, heck yeah!”  He baited a leader which led to a huge hook with some large, live bait and my 13 year old son began fishing shark.  As he was commenting on being able to feel the active nature of his live bait, the live bait when dead still... the line was taken horizontally across the bow of the boat... Sam immediately commented, “be careful what you wish for!” 😜... we had a shark on (fair warning ⚠️... this is a fairly unusual occurrence)!  All of a sudden, my 16 year old son had the butt end of his pole anchored into a belt harness as he began battling this massive and ornery Bull Shark!  I took a turn... it felt like I was trying to haul up a live anchor from the bottom of the ocean!  When Captain Troy informed us the shark was at a 45 foot depth, my boy found his second wind and was determined to surface our catch.  After about a 25 minute bout, he did!... a huge (by our standards!) 300 pound shark was brought alongside the boat where we had a brief moment to snap some photos and get some video!

THE EXPERIENCE. Distraction Fishing provided an entirely positive experience and memory for which my family will never forget!

name: Cheryl Birdsong-Dyer
text: What a great way to spend the day! FISHING with Capt Troy and deckhand Corey! Originally, booked the day fishing for my husband, sons and grandsons and last minute decided I would like to come along and enjoy watching the boys doing some fishing. Much to my surprise, I threw in a line as well and managed to pull out a fish. The highlight for me was the dolphins I must confess. There were a herd of 5-6 dolphins around the boat at one point. They are such amazing animals and I think they like Capt. Troy. I have nicked named Captain Troy the “Fish Whisperer” if you get the chance to charter with him you will know why that’s his nickname for me. Book early! You do not want to miss the opportunity to go fishing with Capt. Troy and deckhand Corey. I must mention that although fishing is the reason we originally wanted to go on the charter. We quickly understood the marine life in the area and how passionate Capt. Troy and Corey is about preserving it for our future generations and we are very grateful for their dedication to preservation.

resp.text: Cheryl,   Thanks you for taking time to share your story with others.  Those dolphins certainly were a delight of the trip.  Watching ya'll smile, laugh and reel in fish was especially pleasing to Corey and I.   We hope to see ya'll again soon.

name: Sarah Lester
text: Distraction exceeded our expectations!  We read all the reviews, and expected so much to begin with, but the experience itself was still so much more than we expected.  Captain Troy and Corey were the picture of service and courtesy.  It is clear that they have developed a knack for serving families that are looking to have a fun time fishing and building memories together.  We were not looking to fill a cooler full of fish, but rather to catch a lot and keep only what we could eat while on vacation.  Troy and Corey helped us select the best ones to keep.  They were very knowledgeable on species and conservation of resources and were willing to pass on that knowledge without being overbearing.  We have a 16 and 11 year and both thought this was a fantastic experience and we still can't stop talking about it.  We wouldn't hesitate to book another trip with Distraction.  If you are looking to make a lasting memory, this is the boat to book!  We had considered a group party boat, but are so very glad that we went with the private and personal experience of Distraction Charters instead.  What a great trip!

Thanks.  Capt Troy

name: Brandon McDonald
text: If you are in search of a charter in the Orange Beach area, look no further! As with every vacation I plan with my family, I always do my homework by reading reviews, researching websites, and etc. I chose Distraction Charters for many different reasons, and WOW am I glad I did! We met Troy in the parking area of the marina, he didn't waste a second getting to know my family and I on a first name basis as we made our way to his boat. Troy is one of those guys who you get to know very quickly, it didn't take long to know that I was dealing with a man of integrity that loves to see families have the most memorable experience possible. As we approached our first area to fish, Corey was on top of his job as deckhand. As the family and I were fishing, Corey would always magically appear when you needed him, he definitely had his job down to an art. We kept rods bent and had the most amazing time! My kids will never forget this trip, especially Drew who caught a massive 73lb Cobia!! We even received a video and some great pictures at the end of our trip! I will be booking a trip again real soon with Distraction Charters, they far exceeded our expectations!

resp.text: Brandon,   We really appreciate you choosing our charter fishing company to serve your family.   After meeting you all in the parking lot, I was thinking to myself, "this is going to be a good day."   We had good weather, calm seas and a family who wanted to participate in everything deep sea fishing can offer.  You, Your wife Shana, boys Dylan, Drew and Jordan were so much fun to fish with.  Watching ya'll wrangle some big fish was a blast.  I was pleased when I found out you have the same conservation ethic as we do.   Watching you experience the fishing trip with your family was amazing.  You were so attentive to your family and I knew you wanted them to maximize their experience.  The most incredible few moments was when Drew, your 17 year old hooked into that huge Cobia and fought it with all his might.   That boys is country strong because he didn't even flinch when that big fish made those runs wide and then deep.   I appreciate you sharing a piece with me.  I had it for dinner tonight.  Hope to see you again my friend.

name: Crystal YL
text:
Distraction Charters gave myself and my family a most wonderfully memorable deep sea fishing experience! Captain Troy and Corey were friendly, funny and extremely considerate of everyone's needs, concerns and questions. I was also very impressed by the attention to detail on the extremely clean and well-kept boat that offered comfortable amenities both inside the air conditioned cabin and the back portion of the boat. The trip was not only extremely fun and exciting but also educational with an emphasis on conservation. Every aspect, process and procedure was thoroughly explained so not only were we told how to fish, we were also taught how to fish effectively.
What stood out to me the most, however, was the high moral standards of the crew of Distraction Charters, their genuine care for their guests and their passion for preserving and promoting the continued health of fish specifies so we may continue to fish for years to come.
We were lucky enough to catch our limit, then at the end of our trip, we also caught two more that turned out to be the largest two fish we'd seen the entire time. While some may have "turned a blind eye" in favor of allowing these "extras" (who's going to know, right?) - Wrong! Distraction Charters made it clear that they always strive to do the right thing - even, and especially, when no one is looking.
If you're looking to just go fishing, you can pick any charter in Orange Beach. But if you and your family are like us and prefer a memorable and educational experience for everyone aboard, go with Distraction Charters!
Captain Troy - we can't wait to see you again next time!

resp.text: Crystal.  Thank you for taking time to share your awesome review with others.  Corey and I sometimes don't realize how all the things we do, effect other people - in a positive way.  We do our best to provide consistent, good service and we take pride in what we do.  Your feedback helps us to grow and makes us continue to focus on improving customer satisfaction and the overall fishing experience.  We cant wait to see y'all again.   Troy.

name: Medic Bunny
text: Where do I begin!?!  This was an absolutely amazing trip for my family and I!  We were visiting the area for Christmas and wanted to try out deep sea fishing. Never having gone before nor knowing which charter to go with seemed like an obstacle at the time. But, let me assure you, I now know I picked the absolute BEST!  Troy and Sam made our experience beyond incredible!  I loved how the website was upfront and honest about their costs and how they charge their fees. Deciding to go with Distraction Charters, I contacted Troy, who was always fast about getting back to me and helpful about answering all of my questions. The day before our trip he messaged me to let me know the weather was great and we were still able to go (we were booked for an off season trip, as it was for Christmas). The morning of the trip we arrived as planned and were met by two very fun, yet professional gentlemen who ran an insanely clean boat!! Being a paramedic, I was a little worried about the safety aspect of the boat, and after a few short minutes my family and I were comfortable and completely happy we picked Troy and Sam!  Being a kid at heart, I wanted to check out what the Captain’s “job” is, and went to the top of the boat and learned to drive!  Although I wasn’t very good at it, Troy was very patient and explained everything. When it came time to fish, Sam is the man!  He explains how the poles work, what each fish is and why you can or can’t keep it. He will even take your picture for you. He’s all about safety and making sure no one gets hooked or hurt by a fish. He lets you bait your hook or he will do it for you!  If you get your line snagged, just holler out and Sam comes on over and gets you out of your tangled up mess!!!  When your adventure is over, let the cleaning begin!!!! The outside deck gets scrubbed back down. You can sit outside or inside. I actually got a bit seasick on our trip (I knew this would happen, as I always get motion sickness), so I laid down inside on the bench and took a little nap on the way back to the dock!  Once we docked, Sam cleaned up our fish and bagged them for us and on our way we went. No mess for us to worry about and no hidden fees!  Again, ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!! So, if you want honest, friendly, and fun with upfront costs and no hidden fees that comes with super clean amenities and is safe then Distraction Charters should definitely be your choice!! I know this was a long review, but I didn’t want to miss anything. I hope this answers anyone’s questions that they might have!  Thanks again Troy and Sam!!!

resp.text: Angela - I am in awe.  Your kind words and attention to detail about your experience with us is incredible.   You and your family are absolutely our customers.   We love it when we get to interact with our guests and get to share our knowledge with them.   You did a great job driving the boat.  Thanks for complimenting Sam on the job he did for ya’ll.  I can’t wait until we get to fish with ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Greg Johnson
text: Outstanding afternoon with my 2 teenaged boys. We caught fish within minutes of getting our hooks in the water and caught fish consistently all afternoon. Family friendly as advertised on the website and we will be back the next time we are in town.

resp.text: Greg, thanks for giving us some great feedback about your fishing trip.     Corey and I really appreciate you taking time to do that.  We enjoyed watching ya’ll fight those fish.  That cobia fight was a real treat to watch.  Can’t wait to see y’all again!  Troy

name: Kathy Hintz
text: We had a wonderful experience with captain Troy and JT!! They were great with the kids and gave us all a wonderful experience. We caught lots of fish!! I would highly recommend this charter boat!!  The kids can’t wait to go again!

resp.text: Kathy.  Thank you for taking the time to write this great feedback about your family’s fishing experience with us.  Ya’ll were so much fun. Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Susan Miller
text: We wanted a great family adventure and that is EXACTLY what we got! We had a fantastic, memory-filled trip with Destination Charters. Troy and JT were amazing! I highly recommend them for a family-friendly charter. We caught lots of fish and enjoyed a great, safe day on the water.

resp.text: Thank you Susan for your kind words about JT and I.   We were so happy to serve your family and look forward to seeing ya’ll again soon.   Troy

name: Jake Ledford
text: Took a trip on 7/9/2020. Had an absolute blast. Captain Troy and JT were awesome, provided top notch service, and we caught tons of fish too! For anyone out there looking to charter a trip in the gulf shores/orange beach area, don't over think it, These guys are the best and will take great care of you!

resp.text: Thanks Jake for taking time to give us such great feedback about your trip.  We had a blast with y’all.  Look forward to seeing y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Nick Roeming
text: I was blown away by the experience I had with this charter. The captain, Troy, went out of his way to make sure we had fun and he was hilarious. The deck hand, JT, was very knowledgeable and fun to hang out with. The boat itself was very clean also. If you're looking for a great charter experience Distraction Charters is the way to go!

resp.text: Nick.  Thank you for your great feedback.  Glad you enjoyed fishing with us.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Mark Monzyk
text: Troy got us in the right spots to catch a whole mess of fish! Troy and JT we're great to all of us, good people and very knowledgeable. Great for a group of friends or a family outing.

resp.text: Mark. Thank you so much for your feedback about your family’s fishing trip with us.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Kathy Asbery
text: If you want to have a great family outing and catch some fish, look up this charter! Captain Troy and JT are fun, professional, and will make sure you make wonderful memories. We couldn’t have had a more perfect time. All of our kids from ages 20 to 8 enjoyed the day!

resp.text: Thank you Kathy for taking time to give us some great feedback about your family’s fishing trip. Your kids were so much fun to interact with.   Glad you enjoyed your trip.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Billie Orris
text: Awesome experience!  Had a fantastic day of fishing aboard the beautiful, immaculate Distraction with a top-notch crew!  Troy and JT kept us going all day - we caught all kinds of fish!!  We thoroughly enjoyed our time with these guys - it really was a perfect fishing day that we will be talking about for years to come!! Thank You for everything!

resp.text: Thank you Billie for bringing your family fishing with us and for taking time to give us your very positive comments about your trip with us.   We enjoyed watching you reel them in.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.   Troy

name: mia atkinson
text: Really a WONDERFUL family fishing charter experience! Captain Troy and JT were a lot of fun and knowledgeable about fishing! Clean and well maintained charter! The kids were really happy with their memories of catching huge fish for the first time!! We caught plenty! We couldn’t recommend them enough! Money well spent!

resp.text: Thank you Mia for bringing your family fishing with us.  You and Darain have a great bunch of kids and we enjoyed being with them and watching them catch fish.  We do appreciate your giving us some great feedback.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Marie Ludt
text: Had the best experience ever and made some awesome memories with my family and new friends Capt Troy and JT. Definitely a family friendly trip with some learning, storytelling and plenty of jokes. Absolutely will be making this an annual fishing trip!

resp.text: Thank you Marie for taking time to write such and awesome review about your experience with us.  Your family was so much fun to fish with and serve.   We can’t wait to see ya’ll next season.   Troy

name: Cindy
text: Three generations of fishermen went on this trip with Captain Troy. The vessel is beautiful and we all had a wonderful time. Plans are already in the works for a trip next summer and we will bring more of the family on this adventure, because it is an experience we will never forget.

resp.text: Cindy.   Thank you so much for allowing us to serve your family.  Your kind words are so appreciated.   We can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon!  Troy

name: Wayne Eich
text: They day started coming off of a 5 day set do to tropical storm Christobal  waters were rough and turned over and stirred up from the storm. We were wondering through the trip out what our adventure was going to be like? Soon would we find out, Captain Troy said drop them and then the fishing was on for remainder of the day. Troy and his deck hand done a superior job with with the cards they and came out smelling like Roses. (Fish) great job!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your vote of confidence in our services.   The weather for the past week finally backed off and we were so glad we were able to get ya’ll out fishing.   We appreciate your kind words about your experience!   Troy

name: Daniel Anderson
text: This fishing trip was even better than I expected! We were treated very kindly and were comfortable the entire trip. We caught more fish than we could count, and they cleaned the fish for us right after the trip! Whether you are an experienced fisherman, or going for the first time, these guys are not going to disappoint!!

resp.text: Hey Daniel.  We appreciate you taking time to share your great experience with our company.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.   Troy

name: David Mueller
text: I had a great trip with Troy and Jt! Perfect for all types of families that want to go deep sea fishing. Very friendly and helpful. Worth every penny!

resp.text: David.  Thanks for your kind words about your fishing trip with us.   We enjoyed the time we spent with you and your family. Especially watching ya’ll catch those snapper and triggerfish.   Hope to see you again sometime soon.  Troy

name: Christy Gant
text: This was not our first fishing charter, but it has by far been the only one that lived up to a truly family friendly experience.  Captain Troy is a wealth of knowledge coupled with a great sense of humor.  Troy actually even asked us if we were fishing for anything in particular, or if we just wanted to catch fish. JT worked hard to ensure we were taken excellent care of while fishing.  We will definitely book more charters with Distraction Charters. Thanks for providing a truly enjoyable experience Troy and JT!

resp.text: Christy & Cruncher.  Thank you so much for your kind words about your experience with us.  Ya’ll were awesome and we can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Amy Koether
text: We had such an amazing trip with Distraction Charters!! Troy kept us laughing the whole time and JT was so much help! This was my first time ever doing a fishing trip and will definitely book again when we visit this way again. Super sweet, clean and very family friendly!! My son had an absolute blast and is still talking about his big catch!! Thank you again Troy and JT for an amazing experience!!

resp.text: Thanks Amy for your kind words about the way we treated your family.  Ya’ll were awesome.  Can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Amy Rowlette
text: We had a great experience with this fishing charter and we would definitely use them again!  We had ages ranging from 4-69 and everyone had a great time catching fish.  Safety is a priority for this crew and they made it easy to sit back and relax.  Corey was a wonderful deck hand, especially with the kids.  He had a lot of knowledge and patience.  Captain Troy and Corey were professional and fun and it was a highlight of our vacation.

resp.text: Amy. Thank you so much for taking time to give us some great feedback about your family’s fishing trip with us.  We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.  We can’t wait to see y’all again soon.     Troy

name: joe garrett
text: I took my two sons and we absolutely had the best fishing experience of our life. We searched many but chose Distraction because of their family focus. They treated my boys and I with respect, mentoring leadership and ensured we were having fun. Caption Troy and JT are hands down the best charter team. We will be back!

resp.text: Hey Joe.  Thank you so much for allowing us to serve your family.  Ya’ll were so much fun to fish with.   We appreciate the positive feedback too.  Troy

name: james berg
text: If you guys want to have fun and catch and release with Captain Troy and JT the first mate, and very family friendly and great with kids and have a good time then you picked the right charter, these guys are absolutely amazing and care about our environment which is big in my book, we caught a lot of fish and got to make memories with my family that they will never forget, I will definitely come back and fish with these guys, thank you for the awesome experience guys safe seas to you guys.

resp.text: James. Your family was so much fun to fish with.  Your boys were so sweet and we enjoyed spending time together.   We appreciate you taking time to give us your awesome feedback about your trip.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy.

name: Sara Southerland
text: We chose Distraction Charters for our family fishing trip because of the family-friendly reviews and we were not disappointed! Our group of 6 ranged from age 5-65 and everyone had a great time. Captain Troy and Deckhand JT made us feel safe, comfortable and extremely well taken care of the entire time. We all caught several fish but even if we hadn’t, it still would have been an amazing trip. Most of our group had very little fishing experience, but JT was super helpful and kind. We will definitely use Distraction Charters again next summer!

resp.text: Sara.   Thank you so much for for allowing us to serve your family.  We do appreciate you taking the time to write such great feedback about your experience with us.    Ya’ll were so much fun to fish with.  I’m glad ya’ll had a good time.  Can’t wait to see y’all again soon.   Troy

name: Tony Vining
text:
If you have kids that would like to experience an off shore fishing trip then stop looking around and book Troy right now. From the moment we arrived at his boat to the time we left he was engaging and very friendly. He took time to get to know my two boys and explain how and why he was doing things.

He kept us on the fish all morning and made sure we all had a great time. My youngest son even landed a Wahoo, which he will remember for the rest of his life.

His deckhand, JT, kept everything in order and was extremely helpful. He treated all of us with respect and made sure we understood everything that was going on and what we needed to do.

We'll definitely be using Troy again in the future.

resp.text: Tony.  Thank you so much for your great feedback about us.  Catching that trophy fish was a real treat for us too.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy.

name: ALLEN BARNETT
text: Great Captain and deck hand. They went out of their way to make our trip enjoyable. Very family friendly guide and deck hand. Thanks for a great day.

resp.text: Thanks Allen for your awesome feedback about your family’s fishing trip.   We are so glad ya’ll enjoyed yourselves.    Can’t wait to see ya’ll again next year. Troy

name: Jennifer Ruschman
text: We had the absolute best time on this charter. Captain Troy and Corey were family oriented and focused on our experience the entire time. We arrived and there was rain and a few storms. The captain spoke to us about weather, made us feel safe in him and his judgement, but left us in control of whether we went out and for how long. Luckily it cleared up once we were out. They taught, assisted, and encouraged our whole family of six, including one reluctant teen. He now might be interested in Corey’s job if there’s ever a vacancy- but only if he can work with Captain Troy.  I cannot recommend this experience highly enough- if you have a family this is THE charter to take!  Thanks again!

resp.text: Jennifer - thank you for taking time to share a review about your fishing charter today.   We really enjoyed meeting and serving your family.  I am glad the weather wasn’t a factor and we were able to have a successful fishing trip.   We hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Jodi Betts
text: We give Troy and his crew 5 plus stars. They made are fishing trip fun for our family. My daughter was worried that she would get bored for 5hrs. Well, she loved it, she caught the most fish and was kinda sad we had to head back. Troy and Kyle were so good with her and all the rest of us. Our trip was fun, entertaining, helpful, exciting and an enjoyful time because of Troy and his helper Kyle. We highly recommend, The Distraction, with Troy and his crew. They are amazing and make your fishing trip the best!! Thank you again Troy and Kyle, we had a great fishing trip that we will always remember. Five plus stars for the "Distraction" 🐟

resp.text: Jodi,   Thank you so much for your kind words about your experience with us.  It was so much fun serving your family and look forward to seeing ya’ll again one day.  Troy

name: Eric Jaquith
text: Best fishing trip ever! Service was 5+ stars. We have been on several fishing trips in the Pacific, Atlantic and Gulf, but Captain Troy and Corey make the difference. It certainly didn’t hurt that we caught a ton of fish too! My family, friends and I will be back for sure. I can best sum it up like this. Distraction Charters is a customer service company that truly likes to take people fishing.

resp.text: Eric, thank you so much for taking time to give Corey and I some great feedback about your family’s fishing trip.   It was a pleasure to be able to serve ya’ll.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon!   Troy

name: Heather Kainz
text: We highly recommend Distraction Charters! Our family of 5 enjoyed our day out fishing with Captain Troy and Corey. Two of our children have special needs and both men were awesome with all three of the kids. They kept things light and had us laughing through the trip while keeping the kids engaged and teaching our 13 year old about the fish she was catching. We saw many dolphins which was a bonus for us as well! Thanks guys!

resp.text: Heather, thank you so much for allowing Corey and I to serve your family.   Your children were so sweet and fun to be with.   We enjoy it when family’s trust is with their children.   Being married to a teacher for 32 years and Corey being an elementary school teacher, education about boating and fishing are always a top priority with us.  We can’t wait to see ya’ll again.   Troy

name: Rebecca Reagor
text: Troy and JT were so good with our kids. It was a wonderful family fishing trip. We highly recommend these guys.

resp.text: Thank you Rebecca for allowing us to serve your family.  Ya’ll were so much fun.  Glad those fish but well and ya’ll got to catch a variety of fish.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Brent Rutterbush
text: I took my wife and 9 year old daughter on our first off shore fishing trip with Distraction Charters. Captain Troy and deckhand JT are easy to talk to and make everyone feel very welcomed. Troy promotes conservation of the fishery through catch and release, but also understands if you want to keep your fish. He was very up front about the challenging fishing conditions durring our trip, though we ended up with a very good haul in spite of it. Troy's focus is aimed at everyone catching fish instead of searching for larger trophies. That is helpful as most of the 6 hour trip is spent traveling to and from the fishing spots. 6 hours go quick!  Even so, we had a great time.  Troy was even nice enough to give us a copy of video footage from our adventure. 5 stars for sure.

resp.text: Brent. Thank you for writing such great feedback about your trip with us.   6 hour trips do go by fast.  That is why we do our best to get you catching fish quickly, so everyone stays interested and engaged in fishing.   We are happy that you were fully satisfied with your fishing trip.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again    Troy

name: Weston Newman
text: Capt. Troy and his deckhand J.T. were both fantastic. Our group had all been deep sea fishing on a number of occasions and agreed this was one of the best outings we've been on. We caught our Red Snapper limit, King Mackerel, Trigger-fish, and ended the day with a nice Cobia. I would highly recommend Distraction Charters to anyone is who is not only looking to catch nice fish, but values a high level of professionalism. Cheers!

resp.text: Thank you Weston for your feedback about us.  Ya’ll were so much fun to fish with.  Having an all guy trip was fun for us.  We can’t wait to see ya’ll on the next outing.   Troy

name: Brandon DeShon
text: I can not explain enough about the amazing experience that Troy and Cory provided us.  They both were amazing during our trip.  The great benefit of going with these guys was the experience for my kids.  Troy let both my kids sit in the top of the boat.  They also helped both my kids fish and hold their fish they caught.  We will definitely be back for a long trip.

resp.text: Thank you Brandon for taking time to give us such great feedback about your family’s fishing trip.  Your kids were so much fun to interact with.  Watching them catch fish was a real delight for Corey and I.

name: Madi Moore
text: Great service, great people, phenomenal time! Troy and his crew were so personable and just all around solid, genuine, good people. 10/10 recommend- especially for family trips!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Madi.   Ya’ll were awesome.   Glad we were able to be a part of your grandfathers birthday fishing trip.  Thanks for your kind words and feedback.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Beth Hurley
text: Best Day Ever. Troy moved us around and put us on top of fish at every stop. We caught our limit of Red Snapper. Our family group aged from 75 down to 12 years of age.  The  most important thing about our trip was the relationship we formed with Troy and JT.  He spent valuable time talking and teaching the kids. Close to the end our 15 year old showed interest in catching a shark. Troy was very patient and JT was very helpful as my son wrestled a 450-500 lb shark for close to an hour. A memory my family and my son will never forget. Thank you Troy and Distraction  Charters for a great day!  We will be back soon very soon.

resp.text: Thank you Beth for your kind words and incredible feedback about your family’s fishing trip.   You were so much fun to be with.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy.

name: Laura Brumfield
text: We had a great time fishing with captain Troy and Corey! This is definitely a family oriented charter. My daughters had good clean fun and that was my main concern. You don’t have to worry about what you might see or hear. Captain Troy kept us on top off the fish while Corey was right there to grab the fish from the hooks. We can’t wait to book another trip!!

resp.text: Thank you Laura for sharing your experience so others may know how much we care about families.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family and can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Chris Cardwell
text: My wife and I have fished with Cpt. Troy at least once a year for the last ten years and always have a blast.  He consistently puts us on big fish and is just a really good guy.  Also, he always has top-notch mates on board.

resp.text: Chris.  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us some great feedback about your 10 years with us.   We really appreciate your friendship and your business.  Looking forward to many more years of fishing together.  Thanks.  Troy

name: Joyce DeVol
text: Amazing family, friendly day on the Gulf!  Would suggest this trip for anyone heading out for the first time!  Humorous and humble boat captain & deck hand!!!

resp.text: Thank you Joyce for taking time to give us such great feedback about your trip.  We had so much fun watching ya’ll reel them in.  Those mackerel were a real delight to catch.   Hope to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: David Sparks
text: Second trip with Distraction charters.  Once again, Captain Troy and Corey are the best! Great service and atmosphere for family and friends. Dedicated to making your trip one to remember.

resp.text: David.  We appreciate you taking time to share your review about our company.    Like you, we were concerned about the weather and sea conditions after TS Cindy.  I am glad the seas laid out and got nice, so we could complete our trip as scheduled.  I am especially pleased that we got to catch some good fish.  We hope to see y'all again.  Thanks. Troy

name: Chad Cain
text:
What a great time! We were in Orange Beach for a week of relaxation and ocean fun and planned a 6-hour charter with Distraction Charters and so glad we did. Troy and JT were simply awesome. Friendly, funny, helpful, and kind are just a few adjectives to describe them.

We had two 10-year-olds with us and they both worked great with the kids, were patient, super helpful and supportive, and made it fun for them. We fished for fun (catch and release) and had a wonderful trip. When we come back to Orange Beach, we will certainly be booking another trip with Distraction Charters! If you are thinking of who you might want to try while you are here... you won't be disappointed with Troy and JT.

resp.text: Chad.  Thank you so much for the detailed compliments about your experience with us.  We try hard every day to give our guests our best every trip.   Thanks for allowing us to be a part of your lives during that wonderful 6 hour trip that we too really enjoyed.  Can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Ryan McGlaughn
text: I really enjoyed my fishing trip on The Distraction ! I caught my biggest fish I have ever caught ! Captain Troy and the deckhand were awesome !! Super friendly and family friendly ! We had a great time. This crew is wonderful and will be coming back again !!

resp.text: Thank you Ryan for your kind words about your experience with us.    It was a lot of fun watching you all catch fish.    Especially enjoyed sharing your big fish experience with you.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll soon.   Troy

name: Misty Hanshaw
text: We’ve taken a few fishing trips with our family, this was the most family friendly charter we’ve ever been on!!  Captain Troy and JT treated our kids like family and made sure we all had a great trip!  We had a blast will definitely be back!  Thanks so much!!

resp.text: Misty.  Thank you so much for giving JT and I such positive feedback about your family’s experiences with us.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with and hope to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Donald Leemaster
text: The crew of the Distraction charter boat were very nice and educational. Troy gave us the option to catch small fish to keep or to catch fish for the fun of it. Myself and my son thoroughly enjoyed our trip. Corey was very informative and helpful. We would highly recommend the Distraction for any of you charter fishing needs or wants. Thank you Troy and Corey.

resp.text: Thanks Don for taking time to give us some great feedback about your family’s fishing charter.  I am happy that you chose the trip that allowed you all to catch larger fish and have some fun.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Jennifer Johnson
text: Great experience from before we even booked. I booked this trip as a surprise for my husband’s 40th birthday. I had no clue what I was doing, but Captain Troy answered all my questions quickly. Captain Troy made sure my husband and I had a great experience. J.T. (the deckhand) was also wonderful. He was very knowledgeable about fishing, but he also had a calming personality. These two are very down to earth, real people. I hope to come back soon with my kids. After the experience we had, I feel very comfortable bringing my children fishing with Captain Troy and J.T. next time. I highly recommend distraction charts!

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer for taking time to write such awesome feedback about your fishing trip with us.   We enjoyed meeting and serving ya’ll very much.   Can’t wait to meet your children.   Thanks.  Troy

name: Jeremy Butler
text: This was a last minute trip for us because we where supposed to go out the day before but the weather screwed us up. So at the last minute we were scrambling to find a boat to take us out before we had to leave to go back home. Well this guy and his deck hand were not only friendly but professional and when he asked what we were trying to catch we said anything really. As we were headed out my wife first time caught a really big Spanish mackerel. Shortly after that he started catching Trigger fish and red snapper. The deck hand j.t. was one his toes and made the trip really enjoyable and friendly. Troy the captain was a straight shooter and kept us on the fish. IF YOU WANT TO HAVE A BLAST AND MAKE MEMORIES CARHING FISH. THIS IS THE BOAT FOR YOU. WE WILL BE GOING BACK.

resp.text: Thanks Jeremy for taking time to write such a great review about your experience with us.   I am glad we were able to get you out and give you the results you wanted.  Can’t wait to see y’all again.  Troy

name: Riding & Catchin
text: Troy works really well with people. He knows where the fish are. Even though there was a little wind he adapted to a different spot where the fish are. He is the best with family. Really nice and funny. He’s all out funny and fun to be with. I really recommend him to go fishing especially if you have a family.

resp.text: Thank you Lane for your kind words and feedback about your family’s trip with us.  Corey and I enjoyed being with ya’ll and putting you on the fish.  Glad the wind backed off and we were able to continue working our way offshore so we could get to those quality fish.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Gidget Turney
text: Awesome experience! Captain Troy and his deck hand were both very helpful and knowledgeable. They want you to have a good time and are very patient. They are very knowledgeable of the wildlife and want to help the environment. Very family friendly. Can’t wait to bring our 6 year old next trip!

resp.text: Gidget, thank you so much for your kind words about our company.  We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.

name: Jodea Westphal
text: Our family of 5 had a FANTASTIC time with Capt Troy and JT. Due to the Spring weather, Capt Troy kept in contact with us and adjusted the trip, super thankful!  JT is an excellent deckhand and personable! If you find the hot-spot, we highly recommend the "hook & cook".

resp.text: HeyJodea, we really appreciate you taking time to share your experience with others.   We appreciate your review and wanted to say thanks for your business. We had an incredible time serving your family.    Hope to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Brittany DeShon
text:
We had an amazing time.  3 adults, 7 year old, and 5 year old.  We caught 18 fish to keep, and many more catch and release on a 6 hour trip.  We had plenty of bait, probably could have caught more if we tried!  Captain Troy and Corey were fun and informative.  Corey did an outstanding job taking care of us and cleaned and bagged all of our fish!  Troy even gave us some spices and recommendations for a restaurant nearby to cook up our fish.

6 hours went so fast!  It was a blast.  When the kids are a little older we will want to do the 10 hour trip!

Highly recommended that you take your family and friends out with Distraction Charters!

resp.text: Thank you Brittany for your review.  It was so nice to meet and serve your family.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again. Troy

name: Justin Case
text: Captain Troy and JT are as advertised! They are incredibly friendly, caring, knowledgeable and patient! My two sons had an absolute blast and haven't stopped begging me to book another trip this week lol! Do yourself a favor and just quit shopping around for a charter service. You've found the most competent, caring, and friendly charter service in all the land!! I fish professionally and guide in fresh water myself, so I know what a great guide looks like. Captain Troy and JT will exceed any of your expectations! Big thank you to Distraction Charters again, I appreciate all that you guys do! ~Tight lines

resp.text: Justin.   Thank you so much for an awesome review of your family’s fishing trip with us.   We appreciate your kind words about us and are very humbled by the detailed description about the service you received.    We can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Korri Georgenson
text: OK, I know what you're all thinking. "There is no way these guys have all 5 stars, they must be deleting the bad ones."  Well I can tell you that that is just not true, because there's no way these guys have any bad reviews!  They are amazing!  Super fun and funny, and definitely family friendly.  We had a great time and I recommend them to everyone, and I really mean any type of group!  Perfect for young families, and even a great time for a "dudes" trip.  Most importantly, they know what they are doing fishing!  Such a great time, 5 stars for sure!

resp.text: Korri - thank you for taking time to write such wonderful feedback about your experience with us.  Your family was a blessing to fish with.  Your kind words and belief in Corey and I make what we do really feel appreciated.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Be sure to keep Don straight! 😁

name: Matthew Levandowski
text: Booked this charter fishing trip and was absolutely blown away. Troy and his son in-law Corey were fantastic. I haven’t fished since I was about 9 years old and the directions that they gave were awesome. If you are looking for a enjoyable fishing trip with a couple of guys who’s main concern is ensuring you have a blast, than this is the charter to book. Thank you again to both Troy and Corey for an amazing experience I will absolutely be booking this again next year.

resp.text: Matt.  Thank you so much for giving Corey and I some great feedback.  Being with fellow Texans was a blast.  Ya’ll helped make our job so much fun. Cant wait to see ya’ll again soon. Troy

name: Clay Keith
text: Troy and Corey were first class in every aspect of the trip.  Such an easy process from start to finish. Both of these guys went out of their way to make a memorable trip for my kids and I.  My son Miles has told everyone that would listen about his monster Red Snapper he caught!  On our way home I asked both my kids what the favorite part of their vacation was.  Without hesitation, they both said fishing!  Thanks again Troy!

resp.text: Clay.  Thank you so much for taking time to write so many kind words and for this review about your experience with Corey and I.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family and enjoyed watching you reel those fish in.  We can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Bill Morgan
text: Captain Troy and his mate JT made the trip a lot of fun.  The fish we caught was a bonus.  We would use Distraction Characters again without reservation.

resp.text: Thanks Bill.  Your family is awesome.  We enjoyed the laughter and watching everyone catch fish.   Can’t wait to see y’all again soon.   Troy

name: Cassady West
text: Really great experience for our first trip with this group! They were a recommendation by some close friends and they did not disappoint!! We caught fish at every spot we stopped at and saw several dolphins along the way. Captain Troy and deckhand Corey made it a fun family experience in a relaxed atmosphere. We booked directly through Captain Troy, which was quick and easy! I would highly recommend and we will definitely be back soon!!

resp.text: Cassady, thank you so much for giving us such great feedback about your family’s fishing trip with us.  We are so glad you gave us a chance to meet and serve ya’ll.   We appreciate you booking direct with us.   Can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Katie Canterbury
text: We had a great time! Caught lots of fish! Captain Troy and JT were fantastic! Great family trip if you need something fun and different to go do!!

resp.text: Thank you Katie for taking time to give us some great feedback.   Your family was so much fun to be with.  I can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Anna Espenmiller
text: My family and I been going with Troy and JT for 5 years never been disappointed. I always have an amazing time. Their one of the nicest people I’ve met down here

resp.text: Anna.  I can’t believe ya’ll have been allowing us to serve your family for five years now.   Thanks for the great feedback and for taking the time to share your comments with others.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: allison marshall
text:
What a wonderful day on the water!  Captain Troy and Cory are truly the best.  Great family fun - safe, good fishing and a whole bunch of fun.  We have fished on Distraction several times now and will continue to make memories with captain Troy.

Allison Marshall
Auburn, AL

resp.text: Thank you Allison for writing this review about your experience with Corey and I.   It is always good to see you and your family.   We look forward to next years trip.  Troy

name: Cynthia Harding
text: Our family has gone with Distraction Charters three times now and we have never been disappointed. They are family friendly, knowledgeable and kind. They helped those who were unsure what they were doing to understand what to do in a very unthreatening way. We have always caught a variety of fish and always see dolphins! And Mom’s favorite part is they have a nice clean bathroom onboard! You won’t be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you Cynthia for taking time to write this great review about your trip.  We always enjoy you company and your business.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Brittany Memmelaar
text: Great service and southern hospitality at its best!  We had an amazing afternoon with Troy and Cory. Our family caught many Red Snapper along with a shark. Couldn’t of asked for a better experience. If your looking for a fun time and a family atmosphere definitely go with Distraction Charters!

resp.text: Thank you Brittany for sharing your feedback about your experiences with Corey and I.  We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Andyh2484
text: What a great trip we had with Captain Troy and Corey.  Both were extremely friendly and courteous to our group.  We really couldn't have asked for better guys to fish with on our first trip offshore.  If you are looking for a family oriented charter in the Orange Beach area, look no further.

resp.text: Thank you Andy for sharing your feedback about your experience with us.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Stevie Del Busto
text: Captain Troy and deckhand JT did a great job putting us on red snapper. Very family oriented and professional. We had a great time. Thanks, again, for the experience. -John Del Busto

resp.text: John.   Thank you so much for your kind feedback about your family’s fishing trip with us.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: John L
text:
WOW!! Another great fishing trip with Captain Troy! This is the third time we have fished with Distraction Charters. We finally were able to go out fishing during Red Snapper season..YES!! We had our limit of snapper in no time!! All I can say is top notch trip again! Captain Troy and Sam are the very best. We are a family of six and all of us had a great time! We love the boat and care Troy and Sam put into our well being and they go out of their way to make sure you have a great time (did I mention the cabin has AC that blows cold and feels great when you want a break from the sun :) They are just great human beings and make your fishing experience the very best. Captain Troy is someone you can text with any questions and he replies very quickly. He is honest and seems to always deliver (No pressure Troy :)
I have always booked directly through his website and contacted him through text if we needed any other info. Don't feel pressure to look all over the internet or go to charter fishing websites. Just book directly with Distraction and let him know if you have any questions. My children are already planning our next trip :)
We can't say enough great things about them! A++++
Thanks again for a great trip!!
John L from Nashville

resp.text: John, thank you so much for your amazing feedback about your family’s experience with Sam and I.   We are so humbled by your kind words.  Your family is the best and we really enjoyed interacting with your great kids and watching them learn how to catch those fish.  We can’t wait to be able to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Greg Memmelaar
text:
Captain Troy and Carey, his first mate, run a tight ship.  They were courteous, helpful and very accommodating.  They put us on the fish and oh boy was the bite good!  We even negotiated a large bull shark just for fun.  I highly recommend Distraction charters.

-Greg M

resp.text: Hey Greg.  It’s so good to hear you had such a wonderful time with us.   That shark was a real treat for sure.   I hope to serve your family again soon.   Thanks. Troy

name: Eric Caldwell
text: Our group of four had a great time on the 5 hour fishing charter. Captain Troy and his mate, Corey, provided exceptional service. The boat had a nice air conditioned cabin where we could escape the sun, which most charters do not based on our research. Overall, it was a great experience and caught a lot of fish. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Eric for your great feedback about your experience with us.   We really enjoyed meeting and serving your family and putting ya’ll on some quality fish.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.   Hope you have a great Labor Day weekend with your family.

name: Scott Mills
text: All of our kids (2 girls and a boy) are still talking about our fishing trip. We caught all of the red snapper we could eat and it was delicious. Captain Troy really focuses on making sure the kids have a great experience.  I know we will be back on our next trip.

resp.text: Scott. Thank you so much for taking time to give us some great feedback about your fishing trip with us.  Glad you enjoyed those red snapper for dinner.  We can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Scott Loper
text: Had a great time with Capt Troy and Corey. Both were very knowledgeable and friendly. Boat was very comfortable and well maintained. Great charter for families and caught a lot of fish. Would definitely recommend this charter to anyone looking for fishing and fun...

resp.text: Thank you Scott for bringing your family fishing with us and for taking the time to give us some great feedback about your trip.   We can’t wait to see ya’ll again.   Troy

name: Curt Eddy
text: Incredible family fishing trip!  Captain Troy and Cory were great with my kids.  This was our first family deep sea fishing trip and I was a little hesitant at first how they would all do.  Captain Troy made everyone comfortable right off the bat .  Kids caught tons of fish and were entertained from the time we stepped on the boat till the time we got back on land.  If you are look for a true family fishing experience I would HIGHLY recommend!!!!

resp.text: Curt, we really appreciate you taking time to give us some great feedback about the service you received with Corey and I.   We really enjoyed meeting and serving your family and getting to know you all.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again!  Troy

name: jen g
text:
We had the pleasure of venturing on a fishing excursion with Distraction Charters, Captain Troy, and JT. I cannot recommend them enough. It was our favorite experience of our family’s vacation to the Gulf Shores area. Our 4 kids (ages 10, 7, 5, and 3) all had the best time.

JT took the time to teach our oldest kids how to bait their own hooks, drop their fishing line, and everyone had the pleasure of reeling in (*or helping to reel in*) a great fish! We caught Trapper and Red Snapper. Each of the kids took a turn driving the boat, which my youngest loved as much as the fishing. JT cleaned the fish we wanted to keep, which we took right to the marina, where they cooked it for our dinner!

Troy captured dozens of pictures on a CD for us: they are wonderful memories that we will always have and we are so thankful. Distraction Charters crew was nice, knowledgeable, and great company during our 5-hour tour.

We will absolutely be back to visit them next time we are down in that area. If you are looking for a fun, family-friendly adventure, please do yourself a favor and take a trip with Captain Troy and Distraction Charters!

resp.text: Jen, ya’ll were so much fun.  We are still talking about your family’s trip. It’s parents and kids like your family that remind us why we got into this business in the first place.   We appreciate you taking time to write such a wonderful and thorough feedback about your experiences.    Hope you have safe travels back home and a blessed Easter.    We look forward to to seeing ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Jennifer Thompson
text: We are a family of 4 from West Monroe, Louisiana. Captain Troy’s Distinction charter was recommended to us by a friend... & what a great recommendation! Captain Troy & his deckhand JT go above & beyond to make your fishing trip the best it can be. We have 2 children, & both Troy & JT were patient & so willing to help our kids learn how to handle the reels. We had an absolute blast! Caught King mackeral & red snapper. Highly recommend this charter!

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer for taking time from your 4th of July celebration to write this great review of our company.  Your family was so much fun to fish with.  We look forward to seeing y’all again soon.   Troy

name: Talon Maningas
text: Captain Troy and his deckhand Corey were fantastic. They are definitely vey family oriented and spent great time catering to our kids throughout the trip. The boat was very clean and comfortable, even had a nice air conditioned cab to get a break from the heat if needed. Troy was very knowledgeable and put us right in the fish over and over again. We had a blast! I would highly recommend them

resp.text: Talon.  Thank you so much for taking time to write such kind comments about your fishing trip with us.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family and look forward seeing y’all again soon.

name: Aaron Boozer
text: Went on a 6 hour trip this morning. Let me tell you. Beat fishing experience ever!! Captain Troy was awesome. The deckhand Corey was awesome as well. Both were very friendly. Next time I’m in gulf shores I will be going back to Captain Troy.

resp.text: Thanks Aaron for taking time to give us your seal of approval and feedback.  We enjoyed meeting and serving your family and brother in laws.  Ya’ll were a lot of fun. Hope to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Scott Sutherland
text:
Five-star fantastic family fishing fun! My family had an absolutely superb 6 hour fishing trip with Captain Troy and Corey. They made us feel immediately at ease and took great care of us from beginning to end. I believe my kids wanted Captain Troy to come home with us when we left; he and Corey felt like new members of the family. We caught our limit, had loads of fun and even sang songs! What more could one ask?
You definitely want to go out on the Distraction With Captain Troy and Corey...it was top notch from top to bottom!

resp.text: Scott.  Thank you so much for writing this incredible review about Corey and I and the way we treated your family.  We really enjoyed meeting and serving you.  Loved meeting your kids.  Can’t wait to see y’all again.  Troy

text: Great fishing with captain Troy and Corey. We were not disappointed, we have been on other charter fishing trips before but this was the best ever. resp.text: Rodney, Happy 4th of July and thanks for allowing Corey and I to serve your family on such a wonderful Holiday.  We do appreciate your vote of confidence in our services and we sincerely appreciate the great feedback.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy
