text:
Had a great day fishing with grandkids.
The fish were on and we put them in the boat. Will be back with Troy before summer ends

name: Andrew Engle
text: Troy and JT were great people and they do everything they can to make sure you have a good time. If you want a fun, safe, and relaxing day of fishing with a laid back, entertaining crew, this is the boat for you!

name: Laura Garrett
text: Excellent trip for my husband and sons, they haven't quit talking about it! Would recommend to anyone, great crew.

resp.text: Thank you Laura for your vote of confidence in our charter fishing service.   We enjoyed serving your family and can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: L M
text: Great family trip for first time deep sea fishing with kids! We did the 6 hour trip in the morning. Captain Troy and JT were great with the kids and we highly recommend them for anyone looking for a family friendly fishing trip! They have an Air conditioned cabin and restroom. We caught a variety of fish and kept some big red snapper which JT cleaned and filleted for us at the end of the trip. We took his advice for cooking it and it was delicious! Thank you Troy for the yummy Heifer Dust seasonings!! We even ended the trip with a few dolphin sightings! Thanks again Captain Troy and JT for a great trip!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us some great feedback about your experience with us.   We enjoyed serving your family and look forward to seeing y’all again soon.   Troy

text: Wonderful morning of fishing on the water with Captain Troy and his first mate, Corey.  Couldn’t ask for a better experience from booking to hooking some nice fish.  I liked being able to pay the balance and tip with my credit card right on the boat at the end of the trip.  Thanks for the memories.  We hope to return during Red Snapper season to take over to the Flora-Bama for dinner.

resp.text: Wade.  Thank you so much for your business and your kind words about our company.  Ya’ll were a lot of fun to be with and look forward to seeing y’all again soon.  Troy

text: We had an outstanding experience with Distraction Charters!  Captain Troy and Corey were very easy to work with and great with my children.  We caught a lot of fish and my family left having learned some new things...  and with SMILES on their faces!  After having some poor experiences with other charters, we will definitely call Distraction Charters again!

resp.text: Greg.  It was so good to meet and serve your family.  We appreciate your positive comments about your experience with Corey and I.  We are glad that this experience was what you were looking for and expecting.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Cassie Clark
text: While searching for a family friendly charter fishing trip I was referred to Capt Troy with Distraction Charters. From start to finish my family had the most amazing trip. It was a first time trip for us, we had my father in his late 70’s, myself, my husband, and two boys ages 9 & 12. Capt Troy and JT catered to us the entire trip making it fun and successful! My boys are already asking to do this again next year but only with Capt Troy and JT! Their boat was clean, cool inside, with a bathroom. JT was so kind and patient with all of us, helping us bait and reel those fish in! If you are looking for a true family friendly deep sea fishing guide, Distraction Charters in Orange Beach is by far the best choice! Thank you Troy! We will be back!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Cassie for taking the time to write this great review about your family’s fishing trip.   I am so glad we had a chance to meet and serve your family.  Glad Mr Wayne caught that 27” fish and topped his old record.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: 3dPulp
text: Fantastic time with my family and the crew. Caught lots of fish and had a great time.  Highly recommended for excellent family fun!

resp.text: Mike.   Thanks for taking time give us some great feedback about your family’s fishing charter experience.   You have some great kids and ya’ll were a lot of fun to be with.  Thanks for allowing JT and I to serve you.   Troy

name: Haley Wood
text: My family and friends fished with The Distraction for two days straight and had a wonderful experience. Capt Troy and J.T. were very fun to be around! We had 4 boys 11-13 and their rods were bent most of the trips! The first day we caught plenty of Red Snapper and Trigger fish. The second day we filled the cooler with Vermillion Snapper which we grilled the same night and paired it with Capt. Troy’s famous seasoning he makes called “Heifer Dust.” Was incredible and was our best meal the entire trip! Want to also mention how nice J.T. was to our boys. He took extra time with them showing them how to tie specific knots and getting to really know the boys. I’ve been on many fishing charters and would say this one with Distraction Charters was the best. Will definitely be fishing with them again!

resp.text: Hey Haley.   Thank you so much for bringing your family fishing with us. Ya’ll were so much fun to be with. Those boys were a real pleasure to be around and interact with. They learned quickly how to catch those fish.  I can’t wait to see ya’ll again.   We do appreciate your taking the time to give us such incredible feedback.   Troy

name: Jared Lehr
text: Best charter I have ever been on! The Captain was extremely funny and friendly. JT and Troy (Captain) were extremely patient with our families novice abilities. They taught everyone a ton and by the time we hit the last fishing spot all of us were catching fish almost effortlessly. JT (deck hand) was very patient with our mistakes and took care of everything for us. Our entire family had so much fun and completely loved the experienc. I honestly can't wait to come back next year and go out on The Distraction Charter again!

resp.text: Jared.  Thank you for your great feedback about your experience with us.   Your family was fun to fish with.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Lisa Stice
text: Awesome experience! Caption Troy was very friendly. My 3 boys sat with him the whole way to the fishing spot. If you want a fun family experience this is the Caption to go with. Deck hand Corey was also awesome. He was there if we needed him but otherwise let you do the fishing. Everyone caught plenty of fish and we were able to keep enough to feed us two meals. One meal we had the Fisher’s restaurant prepare the other I cooked with Troy’s seasoning it was delicious. I can’t say enough about how comfortable Troy and Corey made the experience. Highly recommend the 6hr trip!

resp.text: Thank you Lisa for bringing your family fishing with Corey and I.  We enjoyed being with ya’ll.  Your boys were so much fun to interact with.  They are some fine young men.  Know your proud of them.   Watching everyone catch fish was a pleasure for us.   I am glad you enjoyed the meal at Fishers.  They do such a good job with fresh catch.   Thanks for the positive feedback about our seasoning too.  Can’t wait to see y’all again some day soon.   Troy

name: Kelly Johnson
text: We had just an amazing time with Capt Troy and his son-in-law Cory!   I had my brother, my 14 year old son and his good friend.   They had us on fish the whole time we were on the water and did an amazing job helping out my son catch and learn about fishing.    An amazing experience for the whole family and highly recommend booking your fishing trip with Distraction Charters.

resp.text: Kelly.   Thank you so much for giving us a chance to earn your business.  We are so glad that you all enjoyed your fishing trip with us.  Your incredible review of our services makes us feel great and want to continue to improve.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

text: Had an amazing time with my family. Everyone who went fishing in my family was at a different experience level and everyone caught fish, including a few huge red snappers! Awesome experience through and through, and I would highly recommend if you are looking to capture great fishing mixed with a great time. Planning to come back here next time I visit!

resp.text: Maxx.   Thanks man for taking time to write this great feedback about your family’s trip with us.   Ya’ll were a lot of fun and the laughter and smiles made the  trip fun.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Matt Ball
text: AMAZING!! My kids have been wanting to go deep sea fishing for years.  We finally went and couldn't be more pleased with our experience.  Troy and Corey took care of everything, even cleaned all our fish and couldn't be more friendly.  VERY FAMILY FRIENDLY! Troy got us right on the fish and we caught plenty.  We even got to see several dolphins that came within 30 ft. of our boat.  Great, safe, fun! Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you Matt for taking time to give us some wonderful feedback about your trip today.    Watching you, your wife, daughters and your dad catch those fish was really fun for Corey and I.  We do appreciate you giving us a chance to serve your family.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.   Troy

name: Mike Navel
text: Great day on the water with Captain Troy and mate Corey. With questionable weather, he remained in constant communication. They want everyone to have a great experience. Read their website - they deliver exactly on what they say they will do. They are excellent with kids and families. They are knowledgeable, helpful and like to have a little fun along the way. I would highly recommend a day out with The Distraction.

resp.text: Mike.  It was a real pleasure to be able to meet and serve your family.  Ole Mother Nature often reminds us who’s in charge.  We were so blessed to  have the wind back off and the seas lay down so we could get offshore.   I’m glad the fish were biting for ya’ll.  We can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Robert Snyder
text: A very welcoming experience for our first charter, very family friendly.

resp.text: Thank you Robert for bringing your boys down to fish with us and for sharing this review with other parents.  We enjoyed having y'all on board today and hopefully will see you again someday.  Troy

name: jake young
text: This is a top notch fishing charter! Family oriented and family run! Troy and Corey make you feel at home, always ensuring that everyone is having the greatest experience! Please check these guys out! Our family had the greatest time!

name: Michelle Henry
text: Great experience! Friendly, fun, and patient with me and our children when hooks got tangled or hook got bitten off. We all caught fish and even hooked a couple of sharks! Fun was had by all! Highly recommend if your family wants a fishing experience.

resp.text: Thank you Michelle for taking the time to give Corey and I some great feedback about your fishing trip.  We enjoyed meeting you and serving your family.  Watching ya’ll catch those fish and fight those sharks was the highlight of our day.  We can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Jimmy Underwood
text: This was our third trip with Captain Troy on The Distraction, and there is a reason we keep coming back...our outings never fail to provide great fun and treasured memories. We’ll be back very soon!

name: Rebecca Castleman
text: Thanks so much Captain Troy and Corey!  We had a beautiful day on the water. Hit lots of great spots and I pulled in quite a few fish!  It was my first time on a charter fishing trip and they were so helpful to walk me through each step. Thanks guys!

resp.text: Rebecca, it was so nice meeting and serving you.  Thank you for taking time to give us some great feedback about your fishing charter.  We can’t wait to see y’all again soon. Troy

name: Jessica Minton
text: I need more than 5 stars to rate Distraction Charters!  I would give them 100 stars if I could.  My family and I had a blast with Distraction Charters!  There were 5 of us which included a 6 y/o, 9 y/o, and our 87 y/o grandfather.  Captain Troy was very welcoming and pleasant.  He showed so much concern and compassion towards my grandfather which was a huge plus for us as this was a trip about us having fun and making lasting memories with him.  He was great with the kids, which was another huge plus, and treated us like part of his own family.  I was nervous about the 6 y/o at first, but seeing Captain Troy with her immediately eased my worries.  Captain Troy is huge in providing the opportunity for families to have fun and catch fish in the process.  You can tell he is a big family man and just loves people.  He talked to us the entire time, joked around, invited the kids to ride up top while going out to the fishing spots, and even took pictures for us so we could just spend time together and reel in our amazing catches.  We were able to relax and be ourselves.  The deckhand, J.T., was amazing at helping us and making sure we had everything we needed.  He helped the kids catch fish and provided an impressive learning experience.   J.T. was always respectful, made sure the boat was clean and safe at all times, answered any questions we had, made sure PawPaw was taken care of, and smiled the entire time!  We had plenty of fish for meals afterwards, but most importantly we were given the time as a family to make memories with a crew who were knowledgeable, knew how to turn a simple fishing trip into an actual learning experience, and knows the importance of family while providing an opportunity to have fun with each other.  Love, love, looooove Distraction Charters and can’t wait to go back with them again!  If you are looking for a charter that provides a great fishing experience with a family atmosphere Captain Troy and Distraction Charters is where it’s at!  Thank you again, Captain Troy and J.T., for a wonderful experience!

resp.text: Jessica.   I can’t say enough about how awesome it is to read your in depth review about your family’s experience with us.   For that I am truly great full.   Thanks, Your humble captain.  Troy

name: Jon
text: Captain Troy and Corey have been amazing during the entire trip. They are fun, easy going and will do whatever they can to help you catch fish. I have been on several other fishing charters that once you max out on your fish they will cut your trip short. Captain Troy let us keep fishing for different types of fish and then release them back into the water. I highly recommend them and will be back fishing with them again.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jon for taking time to give us some great feedback about your experience with us.   Our goal is to give you as much fishing time as we can, so you maximize your saltwater experience.    We enjoyed being a part of your family’s vacation. Hope to see you soon.  Troy

name: Angela Henry
text: I can't say enough about my family's first deep sea fishing experience.  The weather was questionable for fishing during the time that we were there.  Captain Troy reached out to me prior to the day of our planned trip to let me know that the high winds and waves may not allow us to go at our scheduled time.  At that time he worked with me to find a mutually acceptable time while we were in town as an alternative.  We did indeed have to reschedule for the next day.  He reached out again the day of the rescheduled trip to let us know that the weather conditions were not the best for catching a lot of fish.  He wanted us to be 100% satisfied with our trip before we even went.  My husband, myself, and our three boys (ages 14, 12, and 9) did fish that day and had the best time.  Even without the best weather conditions, we each caught several fish.  My boys enjoyed the entire experience.   Captain Troy and Corey were both great with the boys.  They made them feel comfortable and at home during the entire trip.  As soon as the trip was over, my boys started planning their second trip with Captain Troy.  I highly recommend Distraction Charters, especially for families.  You won't be disappointed.

resp.text: Angela, thank you so much for writing a detailed review about your family’s experience with our company.  We always do our best to make sure we give you our best and provide a quality experience.   Thank you for being flexible and working around Mother Nature.   She certainly can wreak havoc with our plans.   I am glad you have a great trip.  We enjoyed serving you and your family.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Kelly Bothe
text:
Had a fantastic experience with Distraction Deep sea fishing charter. Troy the captain and Jacob the deckhand gave us exceptional customer service all day! This was a new experience for my family and it will not be forgotten. We all caught plenty of fish and enjoyed the beautiful day . Troy was very personable and so much fun to talk and laugh with!  He did a great job getting  us to areas that had fish to catch.  Jacob did a fantastic job helping and educating all of us newbies.
We would highly recommend them..we did a 6 hour trip and it left us all feeling like we had a wonderful experience together.. and that’s what life is about❤️

resp.text: Kelly, thank you so much for taking time to give us such wonderful feedback about your fishing trip.  I am still thinking back about your fishing trip and I am still smiling.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.  We hope to see you again soon.  Also, wanted to thank you and Jeff again - for your service!!!   Troy

name: Amy Rhoades
text: Best fishing trip ever according to our 4 boys!!! We went on the 6 hour morning trip today and it was amazing! Captain Troy is a fantastic host and made us all feel so welcome! The boys took turns riding up with him and answered countless questions. Corey was a perfect deck mate and helped us all so much! We are all novices and we had no trouble at all with the equipment or keeping our lines in the water with Corey’s help. Both were so knowledgeable about where to find fish, then different species, and whatever questions our group came up with they knew the answer. Distraction Charters is so family friendly, and we would highly recommend this experience!!! We would love to come back and do it again!

resp.text: Thank you Amy for taking time out of your vacation to share some feedback about your fishing trip.   Corey and I really enjoyed serving you, Jeff and your boys.   You were the perfect family for us.  We love answering questions honestly and interacting with young adults and parents.  Hope to one day see ya’ll again.   Troy

name: Jerry Stone
text:
I grew up deep sea fishing.  My dad would bring me down from Columbus, GA to the gulf starting when I was just 8 years old.  We'd push away from the dock at 2 AM, cruse out for 4 hours, fish for 4 hours and cruse back for 4 hours.  Now, here we are 50+ years later and I'm taking my adult children and grand children on similar deep-sea fishing adventures.  A pretty cool tradition.

Allowing Capt. Troy to continue our family tradition was a great decision.  We had a party of six this past Wednesday (9/21/16) , which included my 5 year-old granddaughter.  Capt. Troy and his ever-helpful and courteous  deck-hand Corey,  were both awesome!  We went on a six-hour fishing trip and caught fish at every stop.  The last stop, which was the farthest out from shore, produced some very challenging fish.   We caught red snapper, amber-jack, and trigger fish.   While we landed plenty of fish, Capt. Troy made the experience more about our family, and especially about making sure our 5 year-old, first-time deep-sea-fisherman granddaughter had the best experience ever!   I highly recommend Capt. Troy and Distraction Charters for a family-oriented, fun time, deep sea fishing adventure.

name: Reximum Rex
text: We had a great trip! Troy treated us right!! My son had a blast and we saw things you never really see! His deckhand Corey was great as well! Can’t wait to go again!

resp.text: Thanks Marshall for giving us some great feedback about your family’s trip.  It was a real pleasure watching you and your son team up and build those memories of catching fish together.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Brandon Mayer
text:
So much of the time, you read about something online only to be disappointed that you were told, or sold, something that just isn't true.  Having fished with many charters from Louisiana to Florida, some good and some not so good, our goal was to see that our children were taken care of, we were in a safe and clean environment and that we had the opportunity to catch some fish.

My sons and I, along with a friend of mine, his son and a friend of his(2 adults and 4 kids) were fortunate enough to fish with Capt. Troy over the past couple of days.    From the moment we met Capt. Troy (but don't call him Capt....Capt is what he does, Troy is who he is :)) it was if we had known him for years.   He was so incredibly attentive to our children and made us feel comfortable before we ever stepped on the boat.  JT, our deckhand, was also incredibly patient and kind (and VERY knowledgeable about what he does) and his soft spoken mannerism was very calming, even when we had 4-5 fish coming in at once!   In 2 days, we caught well over 100 fish and had 4 boys and 2 men that can't wait to go back with Capt. Troy.  In the 12+ hours we spent with Capt. Troy and JT, we never heard anything but positive encouragement, great coaching and a genuine desire to see that our expectations were met to the best of their ability.  If I could give Distraction Charters 10 stars, it still wouldn't be enough.  I have already recommended him to several friends of mine with children and we can't wait to get back out on the water with Capt Troy and JT.

Thank you both for allowing us to make such great memories!

resp.text: Wow.   Brandon, we appreciate you taking so much time and providing so much detail about your experience with JT and I.   Your family was amazing.   Your children were so much fun to interact with.   We can’t wait to see ya’ll again this summer.  Troy

name: Susan Thomas Jones
text: My kids and I had a great time fishing with Troy and Cory!  Distraction Charters is a great option for families who want to have a great time and be well taken care of.  I appreciate the age appropriate language and they were quite friendly.  Overall great time!

resp.text: Thank you so much Susan for your kind words about your trip with us.  We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.  Ya’ll were so much fun.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: reba429
text: We took our 8 year old boy on his first fishing charter today and we were BLOWN away by our experience! Captain Troy and JT were total pros! It was evident from the very beginning that they were focused on giving us  a FUN, SAFE, and most importantly FISH filled day and that is EXACTLY what they delivered! We limited out on Red Snapper, caught tons of Nice Vermillion Snapper, HUGE Triggerfish(not in season but a blast to catch, a beautiful Damsel Fish and several Remoray. We can’t wait to go again and we will definitely be calling Captain Troy and JT...they did NOT disappoint!

resp.text: Hey Becky.  Thanks so much for your incredible feedback about your fishing trip.  Ya’ll were the most amazing anglers.   We can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon. Troy

name: Cameron Hall
text: Had a great afternoon with Troy and Corey.  Extremely nice guys and first class.  All of our family limited out on red snapper on a half day trip.  We hooked up on the first cast and reeled in some great keepers.  We hooked up on a 7’ bull shark!  Couldn’t have asked for a better afternoon.

resp.text: Thank you Cameron.  It was a real pleasure watching you catch that big shark.  You did a good job and got that fish to the top like a boss.   We really appreciate you taking time to give us some really good feedback about our fishing charter.  Can’t wait to see you all again soon.   Troy

name: Kaenan Bash
text: Thank you Troy and Corey, for a wonderful fishing trip. My son and I had an awesome time. If you have been undecided about choosing a fishing charter in Gulf Shores, this is definitely the one to choose. Captain Troy put us on fish all day and explained the various kinds of fish we were catching.Corey was patient with us and very informative,couldn't have asked for a better day!!!! We give the Distraction Charter a 5+ rating and hope this is start to a long friendship.

resp.text: Kaenan, it was so good to hear you enjoyed your full day (10 hour) fishing charter.  Ya’ll were so much fun to have on board.   Made us feel like part of your family. resp.text: Rob.   We really enjoyed meeting and serving your family yesterday.   Thank you so much for taking time to give us some feedback.  Fishing with ya’ll was a real pleasure for Corey and I.   We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Orange Beach.

name: Eben Leeman
text: Best fishing experience! We caught had a great time and caught so many fish. Troy and Corey are great. They were very welcoming and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Eben, thank you for taking time to write this great feedback about your trip with us.  We enjoyed meeting you and your family.   Can’t wait to see y’all again.   Be safe putting out those fires!

name: Taylor Edwards
text: My family and I love Troy and Corey! They are the best charter in the area hands down. We have been plenty of times and love the fish we catch, the fun, and how much they truly care about us!

resp.text: Taylor. Thank you for taking time to write this wonderful feedback about your family’s fishing trip with us.   Glad ya’ll had fun. We enjoyed the laughter and the reeling.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again!  Troy

name: Shanon Levandowski
text: There aren’t enough words to describe Captain Troy & his deckhand Corey, so I will just say this. These two men are so kind & knowledgeable; their hospitality was amazing, and they made sure our charter was an ABSOLUTE BLAST. Troy is the only Captain I know that gives his guests options of whether they want to fish for fun or fish for keeps. Corey took the time to explain different things about the fish as we caught them & he was always right there to help pull a fish up, bait the hook, or anything else we might have needed. Captain Troy let me sit up in the tower with him while we were headed out and back in to dock the boat and we had great conversation! We will DEFINITELY be back to charter with them again & will HIGHLY recommend them to my family and friends! Thanks so much guys for making our trip awesome!

resp.text: Awe - Shanon, your kind words are so appreciated.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.  Your driving the boat was also a lot of fun.  Your a natural at it.  Can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Adam Panos
text: Came down to Gulf Shores for a family trip. Most of the guys had never deep sea fished and Corey did a fantastic job showing us the ropes. I would highly recommend Captain Troy and Corey for your family’s fishing adventure!

resp.text: Thanks Adam for your great feedback.  You were a fun group.  We enjoyed serving you and your Chicagoland family. Your kindness and business is appreciated.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.   Troy

name: Scott Harris
text: I booked a trip with Distraction Charters for my family on a family vacation.  Captain Troy and deck hand Cory did a phenomenal job. They made the trip fun for everyone. This was more than just catching fish, but an experience of a lifetime.  The stories, education, and service I'll never forget as they know what customer service is and catered to our every need. We did catch fish as soon as we put our lines in the water, but more importantly we had a great experience and made unforgettable memories. If you are looking for a family adventure this is the right place for you. Oh ya, we didn't have to worry about taking pictures either. Troy took all the photos you could ask for and gave them to us at the end of the trip. I'll definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you Scott for giving us some feedback on how we did on today’s fishing charter.  Your family was a lot of fun.  Watching three generations spend time together fishing is special for us.   The photos are our passion because we enjoy catching everyone and the priceless expressions on their faces.   We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Troy

name: Julie Paul
text: My family chartered a 1/2 day trip with Distraction Charters and we couldn't have been more satisfied.  Captain Troy was great with our teenage boys and helped explain how he came to be a charter boat captain (and even let my son drive his boat!).  We caught fish at every spot he took us to and even landed a monster 23lb red snapper!  I would highly recommend Distraction Charter to any family looking for a perfect day of fishing!

resp.text: Thank you Julie for taking time to give us some feedback.  We enjoyed meeting you and John and your entire family.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with. Watching John catch that large fish was really amazing.  We love it with our guests catch a trophy.  We look seeing ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Robert Starkey
text: This was the second time I used this charter.  The first time me and my wife and kids went.  We had a blast.  It was very family friendly and my kids enjoyed it very much.  Captain Troy provided us with the ultimate family fishing trip.  Just took my second trip with my best friends and had a blast.  I will definitely book another charter with them.  Customer service is their number one priority. Corey (first mate) was always on the ball and made sure we had fun the entire trip.

resp.text: Robert.   It was so good to see you again and be able to serve your friends this go around.   Corey and I really enjoyed fishing with you guys and being able to see the smiles on everyone’s faces.   We do appreciate you taking time to share your review and hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: John Landis
text: If you are looking for a guided fishing trip for a family with kids then Distraction Charters is the only one to consider.  Captain Troy took my brother and I out with our 4 kids (ages 8-14) for a day trip.  He is great with kids and spoke to them about the importance of conservation and treating the ocean with respect.  My youngest son even "drove" the boat back to the marina.  We caught the most beautiful fish I have ever seen.  The trip was in 2015 and my kids still talk about and ask when we can go back.  He included a CD with great pictures with the cost of the trip so we didn't have to worry about anything.

resp.text: Thank You John for writing a wonderful review about our company.  It seems like yesterday we were reeling them in, laughing and having a good time.  Hope to see you again soon!!!

text: Had a great time with the best captain and a great deck hand. Can’t wait to come back!

resp.text: Thank you Jake.  We enjoyed serving your family and watching you catch fish.  Can’t wait till our next trip!  Troy

name: Michelle Lowrey
text: Limited Out!! From a ladies perspective it was a blast. The crew took time with us and explained the best way to have a good time catching fish. Nice family environment took the time with the girls 3 teenagers and they had a great time as well. All 3 caught fish and talked the crews ears off. I can’t say enough it was an awesome time. I’m so thankful my husband booked it for us.

resp.text: Michelle, thank you so much for your kind words about your fishing trip with us.  We really enjoyed serving your family and watching ya’ll catch fish.    We can’t wait to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Larry Coggin
text: Cap’t Troy and JT gave our family a fun and memorable day at sea.  They put us on some snapper and trigger fish.  At one point, I needed to take a break from reeling in a nice red snapper.   Cap’t Troy is a true conservationist and is committed to preserving off shore fishing for the next generations.   He is a believer in  treating the fishery like a savings account.   Only withdraw the interest and you can live off the principal.   He takes great care of his guest, his deck hand, his boat, his rods and reels, and his industry.   My family enjoyed eating the vermillion snapper the same night.  Thank’s Cap’t Troy and JT.

resp.text: Larry, thank you so much for giving us the great feedback about your fishing charter with us.   I’m glad you enjoyed your trip.   Your appreciation for conservation makes us feel like we are doing the right thing for future generations.    Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Cade Oats
text: My father-in-law, 2 brother-in-laws, and myself had the idea of going deep sea fishing on our family vacation.  To pick which charter service we used, I googled for the best deep sea fishing near Gulf Shores. Captain Troy's Distraction charters was at the top of that list and all of the reviews were great, so we decided to give him a shot.  We could not have made a better decision. We decided to go with the 6 hour trip in the morning. Captain Troy and Corey are the best. They do whatever they can do for you to have the best experience fishing for you and your family. Not only were they able to put us on some great spots to catch a ton of fish,  they were also there to answer any questions one of us had. They have a passion for this and it shows. Captain Troy and Corey truly care about your experience being the best it can be. So if you are looking to have a great time with your family or friends and as a bonus catch some good fish, your choice should hands down be Captain Troy and Distraction Charters.

resp.text: Cade,   Thanks for taking time to go into detail about how we treated you and your family.   It's certainly humbling to read such nice things about us and what we do for others.  We always wonder how what we do is perceived by our guest, and your review is an example that we really enjoy reading.  Your words are kind, genuine and caring.   I hope to be able to serve y'all again someday.  Troy

name: Frank Merry
text: Great time for my 3 kids (1 in high school and 2 in college) and me. Troy is a hilarious host and very committed to making sure everyone has a good time. Had a blast catching fish. Highly recommend!  We will definitely hire Distraction Charters again.

resp.text: Hey Frank.  Thank you so much for bringing your family fishing with us today.  Corey and I enjoyed serving your family and watching our catch those fish.   Your feedback is very much appreciated.  Hope to see you again next season.  Troy

name: R Smith
text: Captain Troy, the First Mate, and Ms. Distraction where a great experience for our first off-shore fishing excursion. When I first contacted Captain Troy with a week worth's of potential date, he suggest the first day of Red Snapper season 2018. My family and I (Mom, Dad, two teenage boys, two grandparents) where extremely excited. It was our first off-shore fishing experience and our first for Red Snapper. Captain Troy and the First Mate were awesome. A tropical storm had just blown though and the opening day of red snapper had season made a rough transit but the Distraction and her crew where worthy of the adventure, The family had a great time. Everyone that wanted to landed a red snapper. We caught our limited and were thrilled at the experience. Captain Troy, First Mate, and Ms. Distraction are an excellent charter. We look forward to making this an annual adventure for our family. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great feedback about your family’s fishing trip with us.  We are so glad you had a good experience and caught plenty of fish.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Happy New Year!!!

name: Samantha Dyer
text: My husband and I are newlyweds and were given the opportunity to go deep sea fishing with Mr. Troy and his son-in-law Corey while on our honeymoon. We had the most amazing time! They were incredibly personable, professional, and family friendly. Before we even left the dock we were briefed on safety considerations and Mr. Troy's conservation philosophy. We caught tons of fish and were able to keep our limit for a family cook out. My husband Chris was given the chance to catch and release a big shark. We will definitely be using Distraction Charters for our future fishing endeavors. Thanks so much for the great time!

resp.text: Samantha.  Thank you for taking time to write this awesome review.   We enjoyed meeting you and especially enjoyed watching y'all catch those fish and that shark.  We hope to see y'all again someday soon. Troy

name: Deb Shriner
text:
Our daughter booked this company after reading many reviews, she kept coming back to Distraction Charters and what a great choice!
We did a 6hr trip & the time flew by! Captain Troy & his 1st mate Corey were amazing beyond words!  They made SURE we caught fish, when trolling wasn't going so well,Troy said I'm not wasting your time and money, you came to get some fish... so let's go get the big ones! We all caught fish and used muscles that I didn't know existed!
They were first and foremost very professional in every aspect of our trip, felt like friends we'd known for a long time! The boys enjoyed being able to sit up by the "Captain" to watch how he navigated the boat to our next fishing spot.  Corey gave great instructions how to let out the line and set the hook when "it was time!" A little different than our normal fishing technique! He was kept extremely busy helping take the fish off for us and making sure we were using the right bait!
If ANYONE is contemplating a chartered fishing company in the Orange Beach area ... This is the ONE!

resp.text: Deb,   Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience about our guide service with others.  Corey and I really enjoyed meeting and serving y'all.   We hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Duane Alberring
text:
Captain Troy is a knowable and entertaining Christian man. His prime objective is to make sure you catch fish and have fun in the process.  He is attentive to detail and willing to answer questions without tiring.
His deckhand is also 1st rate and helpful to the point of ensuring that you catch fish and enjoy yourself.  The experience is kid friendly and it's obvious that they love children.
We will charter with Captain Troy every time and recommend him with highest esteem.

resp.text: Duane, we really appreciate you taking time to share your experience with us and others.    It is customers like you that make us really enjoy our job.    Watching ya'll reel in fish like you did, makes us smile.  We hope to see ya'll again real soon.   Capt Troy

name: Bridget Elliott
text: This was truly the best fishing trip ever.  We have been on several fishing trips and this was by far the best!  Captain Troy and Corey were so nice and patient and loves interacting with children.  They are very  family friendly and try their best to find fish.  My Son loved fishing with them and enjoyed talking to them.  We caught fish all day and had a ball!  We will definitely be back fishing with them every year.  In fact, my Son wanted to fish another day with them.  I was very pleased, and was glad to meet them and happy to know their is still genuinely nice people still out there.  You won't regret booking a trip with them.

resp.text: Bridget.   Thank you for taking time to share your experience and saying such kind words about us.   We really enjoy watching families interact with each other and share those fishing memories.   We appreciate you giving us a chance to serve you.   We look forward to our next trip together!!!

text: This was our fifth family trip with Distraction Charters. Troy and Corey are a very knowledgeable and fun crew. We look forward to this trip when we visit Gulf Shores because we know we'll always have fun!

resp.text: Thank you Emily for giving Corey and I some great feedback about your family’s recent trip.  It was so good to see you again.  We can’t wait to see ya’ll on your next visit it Orange Beach.  Fishing with your family makes us feel like part of your family.  Your photos we’re great.  I went and got the same camera today!  Troy

name: Wade Seymore
text:
Troy was all about the experience for everyone on his boat.  It was my first time deep sea fishing and I had a blast.  We caught a few keepers, but he let us know up front with what was in season we would have to go way on out to catch keepers and, not guaranteed, which would cut down on the fishing time or we could be in closer and be catching fish.  He was up front with us.  Corey gave us all the pointers on the deck of what we were trying to catch and was spot on.  Awesome guys, When I go back, I will go with Distraction Charters.

Wade from Autaugaville!

resp.text: Thank you so much Wade for taking time to give us some detailed feedback about your experience with us.  We are so glad that you had a good time.  Corey and I really enjoyed fishing with you.   Ya’ll made our job easy.  Look forward to seeing you again soon!   Thanks. Troy

name: Traci Barrett
text: We had a wonderful 6 hour fishing trip this morning with Troy and Corey. They are very knowledgeable and definitely all about the kids. They were great about pointing out dolphins and jellyfish; most of all we caught a lot of different fish including red snapper and trigger fish. They even sent us home with a fabulous CD of all the excitement. This is a definite must if you are a family visiting Orange Beach. We will definitely book with Distraction Charters again.

resp.text: Traci,  We really want to thank you for taking time to give us some feedback on how we did today.   Corey and I really enjoyed meeting and serving your family.   We loved meeting your kids and being able to share the look on their faces while reeling in those fish.  We hope to see ya’ll again soon.  Thanks. Troy

name: Shirley Bayless
text:
A couple of years ago we were vacationing at Fort Morgan and wanted to go deep sea fishing.  We (my daughter, grandchildren and I) didn't plan ahead and really didn't know what to look for.  We booked what we thought was a deep sea fishing trip only to find out it was just fishing in the bay on a small boat.

This year when we all made plans to come back I did some research on deep sea fishing charters and found Distraction Fishing charter. I read their entire website and decided to book with them because they were family oriented and had were decently priced.

When we got there we were met by Captain Troy. He was very friendly and interacted with my grandchildren with a genuine smile and caring attitude. This was definitely the right charter for us!!! We were all impressed by the cleanliness of the boat and how his crew (Cory) treated us throughout the entire trip. They even took pictures and put them on a CD for us at no charge.

We will definitely book with them again.

resp.text: Shirley.  It was such a pleasure trip be able to serve your family and grand boys today.  I really appreciate you taking time to write this wonderful review.  We hope to see you again soon.   Troy

name: Duane Smith
text: Great trip Troy and JT were great with the kids.

resp.text: Thank you Duane.   Ya’ll were a lot of fun to fish with.   Come see us again!   Troy

name: Michael Mangina
text: The best fishing trip we’ve ever been on. Captain Troy and Cory made us feel like family. We had a great time and everyone caught several fish. The boat was very clean and comfortable.  We’ll be back. Perfect for families.

resp.text: Thank you Michael for taking time to give us some feedback about your trip aboard the distraction.  It was so much fun having you on board and watching Mary catch that big snapper.   That’s a memory that we will never forget. We are glad that we were a part of your family’s vacation.  Hope to see you again soon. Troy

name: scott phillips
text: What a fantastic trip. Captain Troy and his deckhand JT did a wonderful job of making us feel welcomed, appreciated and safe. I have been on many charter boats and this was by far the best boat I have ever been on. The 5 star reviews are no joke, Captain Troy deserved every one of them. From taking a few minutes to truly talk to us and get to know us a little better to keeping us on the fish. We had such a good time and will use Captain Troy the next time and every time we come back to Orange Beach. If you are looking for the best boat to take your family and friends out, look no further. If you’re out to party and drink with your buddies, keep looking.

resp.text:
Scott,
Thank you so much for sharing your experience with others.   You and April were so much fun to have aboard.  We enjoyed interacting with you and watching you reel up those fish.  Hope you enjoy those triggerfish for dinner.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Gabe Emerson
text: A group of four of us went on a fishing trip with these lovely people yesterday (August 3rd). The captain was one of the best I have seen. He knew exactly where to take us to find the best fish and have the best experience. The waters were rough, and there was a decent storm, but he made sure we felt comfortable and safe the entire time.  They have the equipment to fish for whatever kind of fish you are wanting to catch. I would 10/10 recommend this charter for anyone and everyone all ages looking to have an amazing fishing trip.

resp.text: Gabe, thank you so much for taking time to share your feedback about our fishing charter.   You guys were awesome to fish with.  Those fish sure were biting good and we enjoyed putting you over them so you could enjoy yourself catching them.  I am glad the rain held off until after we were headed home.  Corey and I enjoyed having y'all and look forward to serving your family again someday.   Troy

name: Angie Smith
text: Family friendly fun!!  An awesome fishing experience for all!  Capt Troy and Mate Stephen were so much fun and kept our safety first.   This was my family's 1st deep sea fishing trip and we plan to return.  We felt safe and enjoyed a great afternoon of making memories and having a blast!  Comfortable boat with room to move around and did not get sea sick!

name: Abbe Utter
text: Distraction Charters never disappoints.  It's a very safe and FUN trip. The crew (Troy and Corey) have a well-organized and clean system.  They are hospitable and relatable.   We love this trip every year and always catch enough fish to last us for a while.  THANK YOU Troy and Corey for making our experience great.

resp.text: Abbe, it was so good to see y'all again this year and to spend time fishing with your family.  I am so happy that we were able to put you on some quality fish and watch you catch them.  Watching your dad (Mr. Johnny) reel in that kingfish was a real treat for us.  I looked at the photographs of your trip that I took, and thought they turned out great.  Hope you enjoy looking at them and remembering your trip.   We sincerely appreciate you taking time to write your review about us.  We can't wait to see y'all next year.  Troy

name: Brittany Gatlin
text: Great time! This was our first time to deep sea fish, and I would highly recommend distraction charters for any family or anyone. Fun time and great atmosphere. Troy and Corey were wonderful. We will now be repeat customers for future trips.

resp.text: Thank you Brittany for giving us such wonderful feedback about your fishing experience.   Corey and I enjoyed spending time with y’all and watching you catch those fish.   We look forward to seeing you, Brad and the rest of your family next season.  Troy

name: Cooper Kimbrell
text: Troy and Corey are top class.  They are great professionals who are passionate about their job and passionate about helping families create memories.  My cousins and I fished with them and were thoroughly impressed with how they educated the kids about the different species of fish and boating and fishing safety.  They were great people who love what they do.  Plus, Troy put us on the fish.  We had a great time and I would highly recommend Distraction Charters.

resp.text: Thank you Cooper for taking time to write this great review about your family's experience with our company. Your kids were all so nice and fun to be with.  I enjoyed having all of ya'll up on the wheel house with me too.  I hope to see you again someday soon. Troy.

name: Damon Sevier
text: Do yourself a favor and take your family out with Capt Troy and Distraction Charters.  You won't be disappointed.  Fishing with Troy is like fishing with a good friend.  The Distraction is a great boat, comfortable, clean, and won't disappoint.  Take your wife, take your kids!  Every time we fish out of Orange Beach we go with Troy.

resp.text: Thank you Damon for sharing your experience.  We really appreciate the opportunity to serve your family and catch a few fish.  It’s a real pleasure share stories, laugh and bend some poles.  Watching Ethan and Ian grow up fishing with us is a real treat.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Taylor Lewis
text: We had a great time with captain Troy and deck hand Corey this year as we always do. We usually always do a 6 hour trip, but this year we went on a 10 hour trip. It was great fishing. The size of the fish were great they all faught hard made it a challenge to get in. If you are on the fence I would strongly recommend a 10 hour trip on the distraction.  You will not be disappointed in the trip at all! The whole experience is a lot of fun and you will love the captain and the deck hand.

resp.text: Hey Taylor.   Thank you for taking time to write this review.  It's has been a real pleasure fishing with you over the years.  I can't believe how much you have grown since we first started fishing together.   I especially enjoyed seeing everyone again and being able to serve ya'll.  Hope to see you again soon.  Capt Troy

name: Jennifer Murphree
text: Our family had a fantastic outing today with Troy and Jacob! They went out of their way to make sure we had the best opportunities to have fun, catch fish, and enjoy the day! While we did catch a lot of fish, it's the experience and these wonderful people we will remember.

resp.text: Jennifer, it was so nice to meet and be able to serve your family.  We appreciate you taking time to share some feedback about your experience with us.  Watching you reel in those different species of fish made the day a real treat.  Can’t wait to see you all again soon.  Troy

name: Matthew Browning
text:
An Excellent fishing experience. Capt. Troy and Corey (1st Mate) did and excellent job taking our family out to catch fish, get educated on the environment and most of all, have FUN!!!
My wife and I have been on fishing trips before, but this was the 1st time for our sons. After the 1st stop, we dropped lines, and had fish on 1st cast. Caught plenty on our trip, but only decided to keep what we would eat for a late lunch. Brought fish to marina, Corey cleaned and bagged. We brought the fillets to the local restaurant, and they cooked up a perfect meal.
Very friendly and a perfect choice for any family of 6 or less! Look forward to booking again next year. Thank you!

resp.text: Matthew - thank you so much for giving us some feedback about your fishing adventure.  We enjoyed serving your family and look forward to seeing ya’ll again soon.   Troy.

name: Tracey Bradley
text: I was a little skeptical about going fishing right after Alberto had been through, but I'm so glad I did.  My family and I had an excellent experience with Troy and Corey.  If you want to catch fish and have fun doing it, I would recommend Distraction Charters.  I'm looking forward to possibly going again this fall.  Thanks to Troy and Corey for a great time catching some HUGE fish!

resp.text: Hey Tracey.  We too were wondering how the fishing was going to be after a tropical storm.  History has told us that the bite can be pretty good, that’s why we try our best to make your family fishing trip a success.    We enjoyed meeting you and serving your family.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.   Troy

name: Haley Wood
text: Highly recommend Capt. Troy and J.T. For your next fishing charter. After working from home for over 50 days due to Covid-19 and desperately needing a getaway,  I searched for a charter to take my family fishing offshore. I came across Distraction Charters and it was the perfect choice. The first day we landed several red snapper and triggerfish. The second day we landed a boat load of vermillion snapper which we cooked later that night and paired it with Capt. Troy’s famous seasonings he invented. Don’t forget to ask about it! Also, cant speak highly enough about deckhand J.T. He was such a class act and really took a special interest in teaching my 12 year old son how to tie several fishing knots among other fishing tips. We’ll definitely be back soon to fish with Distraction Charters!

resp.text: Haley.  Thank you for taking the time to give us such great feedback about your family’s fishing charter with us.  Your kids were so much fun to be with.  They are amazing anglers.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.   Troy

name: Maricarmen Critides
text: My husband and two sons went out on a charter last week and had the best time! They were professional and yet it was a family friendly environment. The Captain and made were super friendly. And I've never seen a boat so well maintained throughout the entire trip. The cabin was comfortable and clean as well. We highly recommend and will be coming back later this summer!

resp.text: Maricarmen,  Thank you so much for sharing your review about fishing with us.  Dr. Sam and your boys were certainly a lot of fun to fish with.  We look forward to our next outing together.  Troy

name: Sandy Bradley
text: Troy and Corey are the best Orange Beach has to offer for an awesome deep sea fishing experience!  It was my first time and I couldn't have had a better experience.  I would 100% recommend them if you want a family friendly fishing trip!  Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you Sandy for telling everyone how much you enjoyed your fishing trip.   We really appreciate being able to meet and serve your family.   Troy

name: Lynda Watson
text: Absolutely loved deep sea fishing today with Captain Troy Frady & Corey @ Distraction Charters!!! This is the BEST family friendly deep sea fishing charter on the Alabama Gulf Coast! They really care about making fishing trips fun, safe & exciting! We caught so many different fish & had such a wonderful time hanging out with them! Thanks again for another great trip, guys!!! We will be back again & again & again!

resp.text: Thank you Lynda for giving us some feedback about our fishing charter company.   It was so good to see you all today.   We especially enjoyed watching you catch that big amberjack and then let it go.   Spending time with you and your family while  trying to make each memory special was a real treat.  I looked at your pictures from today’s trip and they turned out great.  Hope you enjoy them.  Can’t wait to see you all again soon.  Troy

name: Amy Lackey
text:
After searching online to find a charter that would be a great fit for our family, we found Captain Troy and Distraction Charters.  I am so happy that we did.  From the time that we got there until we left, he made our family feel special.
We caught many large fish. The look on all of the kid's (8 years and 12 years) faces were priceless.  We made wonderful memories that will last a lifetime.
A special bonus is that Captain Troy takes amazing pictures that you receive on a disc at the end.
We look forward to going back one day.

resp.text: Amy,  We really appreciate you taking time to write this excellent review and to share your experience with others.  Corey and I are still taking about how much fun ya'll were and those kids (Sylvia, Samantha &Tyler) certainly provided us with some wonderful memories ourselves.  Your mom and dad were a lot of fun too.   That picture of You and Sylvia turned out so good, we put it on the website.   Again, thank you so much and hope to see ya'll again someday.  Capt Troy

name: Ellice Wirthlin
text: What a wonderful experience for our family.  From the time we met up with Captain Troy, he was fun and engaging for our children.  Not only was he an excellent boat captain, but he was also lots of fun.  The kids loved climbing up and watching him drive the boat, singing songs, and catching fish.  Our fishing experience did not disappoint.  Everyone in our group caught multiple fish - even our four year old son.  I love that this was a true family experience.

name: Alex McGarrh
text: Had a great experience with Troy and Corey while we were fishing.  They were very friendly. We had a great time while fishing. Would highly recommend them if your a family wanting to have fun.

resp.text: Thank you Alex.  We enjoyed watching you catch those fish.  It was a real pleasure to be able to meet and serve your family.  Can’t wait to see y’all again!   Troy

name: Janet White
text: Captain Troy and Stephen took us on the best fishing trip over our Spring Break! I had the pleasure of joining my three young nieces (4,6 and 7) and their parents on the girls’ first charter fishing experience. Captain Troy sat the girls down and quickly taught them what they needed to know about the ins and outs of fishing on the beautiful and very clean Distraction. Then we were off! Captain Troy took us to the perfect fishing spot in the Gulf. Stephen helped all of us bait our hooks and showed us how to fish - both right and left handed. Once we started dropping our hooks in the water – we were reeling them in! The girls’ father even had the awesome experience of reeling in a shark! Captain Troy also acted as photographer for us, so we have all of our catches and smiles on film! If you want to take your family fishing, this is the charter to go on! Both the novice and experienced fisherman in our family walked away having had the best fishing trip ever! We even had a delicious dinner that night with some of the fish we caught! Our one regret from this memorable day is that we only booked the half day trip… The girls are still talking about Captain Troy and Stephen, and when we can go again!

name: Linda Abbey
text: From booking reservation to the end of our trip, EVERYTHING was PERFECT!  Our grandsons (10 & 6) received all the assistance they needed by Corey & Captain Troy to bait, release their lines & catch fish.  They were even able to help drive the boat.  We were all able to relax and enjoy catching (& releasing) all the fish we wanted to make our trip a total success.   We even went out on a cold morning and the boat and cabin were warm, clean & welcoming.  It was the best family fishing trip! Highly recommend this charter.  Captain Troy is quick to respond to all emails and phone calls.  The customer service was some of the best we have experienced.  We would do this trip again!

resp.text: Mrs Linda, Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience you had with our company.  We really enjoyed meeting and serving your family and look forward to seeing ya'll again some day soon.

name: James Parsons
text: Awesome charter

resp.text: Thank you James for taking time to give us some great review.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.

name: Trey Stanford
text: We had a blast on this trip! We could not have picked a better fishing trip! Our family will recommend (Distraction Charters) to everyone I know that wants to take a fishing trip! Thanks so much for y’alls time! Very kid friendly, great atmosphere, great fishing, what more could  we ask for! Last but not least I laughed the entire time I was on the trip! Thanks so much troy! God bless you and Corey, and your families as well!!!

resp.text: Thank you Coach Trey for taking time to write some feedback about your family’s fishing trip.  It was a real pleasure to be able to serve you guys.   Getting to know your family while fishing was fun.  Ya’ll make me appreciate my job and look forward to seeing y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Christina Byler
text:
My dad and I had been tinkering with the idea of a deep sea fish for several months. We decided to do it a little later than we probably should, but Captain Troy was very prompt in getting back with us and letting us know what he had available. We were looking for a relaxed, fun, friendly atmosphere that would put us on the fish, let us have some fun with them, and then release them back into the ocean and we found just that.

Captain Troy and Corey were both first class, professional, and extremely knowledgeable. They were very patient with this first-time ocean fisherman. Their boat is EXTREMELY clean and well-maintained.

My dad and I had a first-class experience with Captain Troy and Corey. We caught a large number and wide variety of fish and made father-daughter memories that will last a lifetime. If you are looking for a family-friendly, fun, fish-filled outing you have come to the right place!

resp.text: Christina,   Corey and I really appreciate you taking so much time to write this review about you and your dad's experience with us.  I am glad you had a chance to catch so many different species. We enjoyed serving you and hope to see you again next year.  Thanks. Troy

name: David I
text: Absolutely the best trip we have had as a family.. Treated as a close friend or family member by both Captain Troy and JT the deck hand. Well maintained and safe vessel.. Felt very comfortable putting my entire family on this boat.. Troy made sure that safety was the highest priority.. Our kids are both teenagers now but this would be the charter I would recommend even to a family with younger kids. Thanks for the a great trip.. We caught fish the entire time we had lines in the water. We get to have a fish fry with our friends when we get home and then tell some large fish stories!!

resp.text: David.  Thank you for taking a few minutes to share your experience with others.  It was so nice to meet and fish with your family. Watching Michelle, the kids and you reel them in was a lot of fun.   We hope to see you soon on that full day charter we talked about.  Troy

name: Hayden Wells
text: Had a great time with Troy and Corey. Caught some nice fish but couldn’t get over the good hospitality of these guys. Super friendly people and will always do their best to get fish on your line.

resp.text: Hayden, we enjoyed having you today.  I’m glad you felt comfortable enough with us to come upstairs and take control of the helm and drive our boat all the way offshore.  We enjoyed meeting you and being a part of your family’s fishing trip.  Look forward to seeing you again.   Good luck in school.  Troy

name: Jared Maier
text: This was exactly the trip I was hoping for with my family.  Being our first time on a charter fishing trip we didn't know what to expect.  Captain Troy and Corey were wonderful. They treated us like family, were patient with my boys (11 & 8),  and made us feel right at home.  We couldn't have asked for a better experience. Thanks for the memories!

resp.text:
Jared,
It was so nice fishing with your family. We do appreciate you taking time to give us some feedback about your trip with us.  We are so glad you had a great experience.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again. Troy

name: Keith Rickles
text: My dad, 72, wanted a fishing trip with me and his grandsons. This was the perfect trip. The captain and mate are both great guys and did an excellent job putting us on fish and making a great trip. I highly recommend booking with Distraction if you want a good crew and a great time. We will book with them again.

resp.text: Thank you Keith for giving us some great feedback about your family’s fishing trip with us.  Your dad was so much fun. Reminds me of myself in so many ways.  Spending time fishing with 3 generations is something that never gets old for Corey and I.   We do appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Troy

name: Brandi Hutchinson
text: Fishing is a family affair in my house!  So glad we chose Distraction Charters for our deep sea fishing adventure, as it was apparent that family is a BIG part of why they do what they do!!  I could not have asked for a more family friendly atmosphere!  Captain Troy is the friendliest, gracious, and most respectable Captain that I have ever met!  J.T was helpful in so many ways on deck with our 1000 questions, and always with a smile and a "yes, mam".  My family and I will be back!  This trip was definitely " KID FRIENDLY AND MOTHER APPROVED!"

resp.text: Brandi.   Thank you so much for sharing your experience about fishing with us.  I  Ya’ll are the perfect customers for us and we felt right at home and a part of your family.  Thank you for allowing us to serve you and look forward to seeing you all again someday soon.  Troy

name: Melissa Lewis
text: If you are looking for a great fishing experience I strongly recommend going out with Captain Troy. We have been fishing with Captain Troy  for several years now and the experience is always a great one. We usually always do 6 hour trips but this year we decided on a 10 hour trip and it was awesome. The size and fight of the fish was amazing. Also, Captain Troy has the best deck hand around hands down!!

resp.text: Melissa.  It was so good seeing ya’ll again this year. I am so glad we were able to get out on a full day (10 hour trip).  Watching ya’ll catch those larger amberjack was a blast for Corey and I.  Spending time with your boys as they grow up over the years has been a real treat for me   We appreciate being able to be a part of those family memories.   We can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: David Long
text: Captain Troy was a delight!  His attentiveness to the children in our group made this trip extra special. We caught plenty of fish, the kids learned something in the process, the deckhand was awesome, and most of all, we had fun!  The captain and the deckhand worked extra hard to make this trip what we wanted it to be. Highly recommend!  Feel at ease choosing Distraction Charters!!!

resp.text: Thank you David for taking the time to write this review about our fishing charter. It was so nice to meet and serve your family and friends.  I appreciate your flexibility in departure times due to the tropical storms uncertainty.   We work hard to communicate with everyone and to let them know what is going on weather wise.   We hope to see you again soon.    Troy

name: Arthur Eaton
text: Fishing trip of a lifetime! These guys know their stuff. Mr Troy and Cory made sure that our trip went perfect from beginning to end. Everyone caught quality fish and had a great time. We are already planning our next family vacation around another trip with Distraction Charters.

resp.text: Thank you Bo for taking time to give us some feedback.  Corey and I really enjoyed meeting and serving your family.   It was fun just sitting and taking with you.  Getting to know our customers allows us to really hon in on what’s important to them.  In return, we do our best to make sure your every desire is met or exceeded.   Hope to see you again next season.  Troy

name: Christina Fears
text: My husband and I booked our first deep sea fishing charter with Distraction Charters based on the high rated reviews. Let me tell you, they did not disappoint! Troy and Corey were respectful, courteous, family oriented, and made our trip more enjoyable than we ever expected. Their focus on conservation and their respect for people and wildlife alike was unbeatable. We caught several red snapper on our trip, and are already planning a return trip in the future. Thanks so much guys for making our trip better than we could have ever imagined.

resp.text: Christina,   Thank you for allowing us to serve you today and for taking time to share your experience with others.    We sure did enjoy watching ya'll laughing and reeling in those fish.  We look forward to serving you again some day!

name: Chad Twellman
text: I want to personally thank Captain Troy and Corey for an unbelievable first fishing experience for myself and my two boys. Both Troy and Corey were obviously there to please, entertain, and help us catch fish. BTW we caught fish!!!!! Above all of that it was evident Troy and Corey loved kids and were great people! Always ready to answer all of our crazy questions and teach along the way. After our trip I could not stop smiling at the satisfaction from my family members and my kids. I would recommend Troy anytime and we will certainly use him again. Matter of fact I personally recommended them twice while we was still on vacation! Thanks again Troy and Corey and God Bless!

resp.text: Chad,   Thanks for taking time to write such a wonderful review of your experience with our company.  We enjoyed serving you and having fun with you and your boys.   We hope to see y'all again soon.  Troy

name: Scott Utter
text: I love doing this trip every summer with my family. Troy and Cory are both extremely kind and go to great lengths to make sure everyone has a safe, memorable experience. I would highly recommend Distraction Charters to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you Scott.  It was so good to hear you enjoyed fishing with us again.  It is always good to see your family and to be able to spend time together.   Corey and I really appreciate you taking time to write and share this review.  Troy

name: Lily Coleman
text: Troy (aka T-Roy aka Roy) and Corey made the day my family and I spent on Distraction charters our absolute favorite of the trip! Moreover we were traveling with my 4.5 year old niece, and I can’t imagine how they could have made the day anymore fun for a little one who couldn’t physically partake in the fishing. We brought home a bunch of amazing fish which we enjoyed for the remainder of our trip. Absolutely wonderful!

resp.text: Hey Lily.  Thank you for taking time to share your experience with others.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.   Catching all those different species of fish was a lot of fun for us too. Good luck in grad school and hope to serve you again someday.

name: Andrea Jensen
text: By far the best charter we’ve done. I highly recommend them and would definitely go fishing with them again. Kids (age 6-13) had a blast and learned a lot. If you’re thinking about booking with them, just book it you won’t regret it!

resp.text: Andrea, Thank you for taking time to give us some really good feedback.    We enjoyed meeting you all and being able to take you fishing.  We look forward to seeing y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Tanya Calhoun
text: This was the best experience ever! Captain Troy and Stephen were awesome!!  My husband and I took our 14 year son, our 14 year old niece and her friend on the deep sea fishing trip.  This was our first time to the beach and our son is an avid fisher so we thought we would plan a deep sea fishing trip for his birthday while we were at Orange Beach.  I researched to find a charter service that would be geared toward kids and be family oriented.  Distraction Charters stood out in other reviews and from the info on their  website.  I AM SO GLAD WE PICKED DISTRACTION CHARTERS! Captain Troy and Stephen made the experience amazing.  It was not a trip focused on just getting out there and catching fish, but focused on us having an adventure we would never forget.  We did catch plenty of fish, but they went the extra mile to make us feel like royalty on the boat.  Our son got to drive the boat, sit in the wheel house, and Captain Troy answered all thousand and one questions our son asked him.  Captain Troy and Stephen were professional, but yet it felt like we had known them forever! I would recommend Distraction Charters to any family going to Orange Beach and want to take an amazing deep sea fishing experience. When we go back, we will definitely be doing this again!

name: Taylor McCrory
text: Distraction Charters was an awesome boat! It was very family oriented, Troy was there for good fun and humor. He was active in the whole process, he didn't stay in the tower the whole time by himself. He invited us up to look. The experience was overall the best I've ever been a part of. Troy also took pictures and loaded them onto a disk for us to have. This is ideal for a family trip or for anyone looking to have FUN!!! Also, his deckhand was awesome and never got upset or agitated. He was calm and helpful the entire time. Would absolutely take this charter again!!!

name: Villin Rogers
text: The DISTRACTION. How can I say the best fishing charter in Alabama any better than The Distraction. The captain and crew are a few of the most holsom, fun, professional people I've had the honor to go fishing with. Excellent trip for any family looking to have a great time on the water. Knowledgeable, about the fish and what they do very helpful while you're fishing. I cant wait to be on the water with them next year.

resp.text: Villin What a real pleasure it was to serve you and your family.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with and I am glad you took time to give us some feedback about how we did.   We do appreciate it and look forward to seeing you all again.  Troy

name: Lindsey Stock
text: Captain Troy and his deckhand Cory were absolutely amazing! I not only was laughing the whole time and having fun, but I also, caught a bunch of fish! There was never a dull moment the whole time we were fishing, and even on the way out to the actual fishing spot. Altogether, (4 of us total) we caught over 30 fish! The price was also better than any other charter that we researched by hundreds of dollars. I would give 20 stars if I could! Thanks guys, for taking my family out and having a great time fishing!!!

resp.text: Hey Lindsey.  Thank you so much for for writing this review about Corey and I.  We are so glad you had a good time and caught a lot of fish.  We enjoyed having you and your family on board and allowing us to serve you.   We look forward to some more laughs, a good bite and another great day on the water.  Troy.

name: Mike McLain
text:
I recently booked a charter with Captain Troy at Distraction Charters. Simply put....amazing! Captain Troy and his first mate Corey did a great job of taking care of our trip. My wife and I took our 14 year old son and 9 year old daughter on the charter and they loved it. The crew at Distraction Charters handled everything.

If you are looking for a family friendly, fun environment to take your family fishing you have found the one.

If you are worried about safety, Captain Troy has you taken care of. He does a great job of making sure that everything is up to date and in good working condition.

Outstanding experience! Can't wait to go again.

name: Brad Gatlin
text: First time for deep sea fishing. Had a great time with Troy and Corey. We caught 4 different species of fish on our trip. Looking forward to next year already. I would highly recommend distraction charters.

resp.text: Thank you Brad for taking time to give us some feedback about your fishing trip.  We are glad you enjoyed fishing with us.   I am happy that you were able to experience catching so many varieties of fish.   Can’t wait to see you all again.  Troy

name: Lance. VW
text: This was amazing. We had a great time and will definitely return! Lots of fish and run by very nice people!

resp.text: Thank you Lance for taking time to give us some great feedback.  We enjoyed watching you and your family catch those fish.  We hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Sydney Lindley
text: This was my third year to go out with Troy, and we caught tons of fish. Even though I became seasick, I still had fun while fishing. I would highly recommend going out with Troy because he cares about his customers catching fish, and he also takes pictures, a video of the entire trip, and gives you his own seasonings to cook with.

resp.text: Hey Sydney,   It was so good to see you this year.  I am sorry you didn’t feel good and got sea sick.  I am glad you stuck it out and caught some nice fish.   I hope to see you again next year.   Thanks for giving us some great feedback.  Troy

name: Isaac Scarborough
text: Had a great experience fishing with them. We caught a 60 lbs cobia which was amazing. Troy and Corey we’re both incredible and made the whole experience great!

resp.text: Isaac, Corey and I really enjoyed watching you catch that big cobia.  It sure was fun watching you wrangle that beast of a fish.   You will certainly enjoy a few good meals off that one.  We do appreciate you giving us such a great review about your experience with us.    Thanks.  Troy

name: Bud Homan
text: Our party of 4 went out on a 6 hour trip and had an amazing time! The boat was very clean, the fishing poles and tackle were clean and in great condition as well. Distraction Charters is a family owned operation, and made every effort to make sure that we had a great time. Even when one of our party members got a little seasick, Captain Troy and Corey both made sure to check on her often and make sure she was ok. We will definitely be using Distraction Charters for our fishing trips for years to come.

resp.text: Hey Bud -   Thank you for taking time to give us some feedback.   We appreciate your kind comments about the way we treat our guests.   We are so happy that y’all had a good time.  Can’t wait to see you all again.  Troy

name: William Bitts
text: Outstanding guys and great time with troy

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience.  We really enjoyed fishing with your family.   Hope you enjoyed those triggerfish.  Watching your mom out fish everyone was fun.   Go Royals -

name: Money on Main Street
text:
Troy is one of the most genuine people you will ever meet. He truly makes the adventure of charter fishing a memory you will cherish for the rest of your life. His deck hand (Cory) is incredibly polite and knowledgeable about fishing. The two have a relationship that optimizes your chances for success.

If you are considering fishing in Orange Beach, pick up the phone and call Troy. Doesn't matter if you find another boat that will do it for cheaper. This is a guaranteed best experience you and your family can have fishing

resp.text: Alex, thank you so much for sharing your experience with others.  I really appreciate your kind words about our company.  It was so good to see y'all again and we enjoyed fishing with you, sharing stories and a lot of laughter.  I am so happy for you getting married this summer.  Your wife to be sure is lucky to have a fine man like you.  We hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Phil K
text: Fabulous Family Experience:  What an incredible day of fun and fellowship.  Our family was truly blessed to share the day with Captain Troy and Stephen.  They obviously love what they do, entertaining all guests aboard for the day.  They truly strive to ensure that all aboard have a safe and enjoyable experience.  The weather cooperated, the fishing was great and the service was top notch.  We will return in the future!

name: Rebecca Poire
text: Great charter! Captain Troy and Corey are great! They focus on conservation, respect for the gulf, and on family charters. Your kids will love learning to fish and getting out in the gulf! We had a great time!

resp.text: Thank you Rebecca for giving us some feedback.  It was so nice to meet you and Robert and your friends and to be able to spend the day fishing.   Corey and I enjoyed the time we spent and the conversation and watching ya’ll reel in some fish.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Lane Williams
text: Had an opportunity to go out with Captain Troy and his deck hand with 3 teenage boys.  We had a great time together!
