As my boys get older it can be difficult to connect, but the atmosphere accommodated by Distraction Charters made it a lot of fun and gave me the opportunity to grow closer with some young men!  I highly recommend Captain Troy and hope to make a return trip next year.

resp.text: Lane.  Thank you for sharing your story about fishing with us and how important it is for parents to connect with their children.   We do our best to create an environment that promotes a loving family atmosphere and allows families to bond.  We appreciate you allowing us to be a part of your family.  Troy

name: Mike Inman
text:
I have been on several fishing charters and have to tell you that this was absolutely the best!

I could not have been more pleased with Captain Troy or Cody, the deckhand.  I chose to book my charter with Distraction as they promote the fact that they are a family friendly charter, and we were bringing four children, ranging from 7 to 14 years old with us on the trip.

Captain Troy had us laughing and having fun before we even stepped on the boat.  He did a great job of engaging our family, making everyone smile, laugh, and get ready for a great day on the water.

The equipment was great, and the operation was flawless.  Captain Troy put us on the fish, and we had a great time reeling them in.  The kids were allowed and encouraged to sit in the wheelhouse, and learn how to operate the boat.  Cody did a great job helping everyone bait their hooks and reel in the big ones.

I never felt like either of them were doing their "job"...I felt like I was on the boat with old friends who wanted to ensure that my family had a great day.

Distraction Charters is everything they advertise and more...very professional, fun, safe, engaging.  They have great equipment, and they did a great job teaching the kids how to use it.  I'm certain that Captain Troy enjoyed the smiles on my children's faces as much as I did.

I will see them again the next time I'm in Orange Beach.  This was absolutely the best day of my vacation, and I can't wait to get back.

Best Charter Ever!
Thanks for the memories Captain Troy and Cody.

name: Jessica Shaver
text:
Great family fishing experience!   Captain Troy and first mate JT were excellent hosts from
start to finish.  The boat was clean, comfortable, and safe.  We were treated like family.  The kids were made at home and had a chance to help Captain Troy “pilot” the boat.  Captain Troy got us on the fish and moved us to new hot spots if the fish stopped hitting.  We all caught fish which they cleaned and cut up for us at the end of our trip.   We will be fishing with them again the next time we visit Orange Beach, AL

resp.text: Jessica.  Thank you so much for allowing us to serve your family.   Your children were so much fun to be with and to have them help me drive the boat was a treat for me.  We hope you enjoy the fish and the heiferdust seasoning.   Your kind words are so appreciated.  We hope to see ya’ll again next year. Troy

name: Andrew Stephens
text: A small group of us including my 8 and 5 year old went deep sea fishing with Troy, Corey and Distraction Charters.  All of us had an amazing time and the overall experience couldn't have been better.  My sons enjoyed learning the proper way to fish and the even got to help Troy drive the boat.  Both Troy and Corey were extremely patient throughout the day and eagerly answered questions from some newcomers to deep sea fishing.  The boat was clean, the fishes were biting and it was a great time had by all.  I highly recommend Distraction Charters as the true family fishing experience.

name: Zach Hobson
text: Had a great time used him so many times, best fishing charters around. always catch many fish with him. Great for families and big group of people!

resp.text: Thank you Zach for giving us some great feedback.  It’s always good to see your family and look forward to many more years of fishing.

name: Brad Murphree
text: My family went out with this crew and had a great time.  A few of us had not been deep sea fishing that many times but Troy and crew did a great job of explaining to us what to do and when to do it.  Hanging out with them was the best part.  When we do our annual fishing trip again next year there isn't another charter I'd use.  Highly recommend these guys!

resp.text: Brad,   Thank you for taking time to write this great review.  It was a pleasure serving you and your family.  Watching your Dad, Mr George and his Brother Mr Lynn, spend time together was especially delightfull.   Your aunt Lisa is a blast.   I hope we get a chance to get together again very soon.  Again, thanks for taking time to share your experience.

name: Brian Gregory
text: Exceeded our expectation!  Great Family Fun day!  I was looking for something fun and memorable on our family vacation and I'm sure glad we booked a fishing charter with Troy! My 9 year old son wanted some hardcore fishing and my 16 year old daughter and her friend had to be coaxed a little to come along. We all had a blast! Lots of great fishing action and my son hasn't stopped talking about it since! The girls jumped right in and enjoyed the fishing also. Troy and Stephen made it a fun and exciting day. Even if you aren't into fishing, you'll get caught up just like my girls did. Besides that, it's a fun day way out on the gulf, something we don't get to do very often in Kansas! Do the 6 hour trip for sure!

name: Trey Weir
text:
Simply Awesome!  Our family had an absolute blast!  This was our second trip with Distraction Charters.  We caught so many fish my wrist was hurting.  Captain Troy and First Mate Stephen are THE perfect combo.  Capt. Troy has such a great personality.  Our kids (10 & 14) think he hung the moon.  Stephen is first class!  He is so knowledgeable and made the fishing to easy for our kids.
This is by far the best fishing experience we've ever had.  I can not say enough great things about the experience and the people of Distraction Charters.  We can not wait to go back next year!

name: Heather Simmons
text: We had a wonderful time again!  This was the first trip with Distraction Charters for my 11 year old and third trip for my 13 year old.  They were both ready to go back the next day!  We caught several different types of fish and enjoyed a red snapper dinner that night (with enough to take home to share with their dad, too). Captain Troy and Corey were wonderful with my boys and made sure we all had a wonderful time.  We can’t recommended them enough if you are looking to go fishing in Orange Beach/Gulf Shores!  We will be back!

resp.text: Heather.  Corey and I really appreciate you taking time to write this review about your experience with our company.   It was so cool that your youngest son came along and got to see what his older brother has been talking about.   You have some great kids and a great family.  We do appreciate your business and friendship and for trusting us as your family fishing charter.  Troy

name: Justin Routon
text: We had a great time again with Captain Troy and Corey! Always a blast and they are great with the kids.  And catching great fish with them is always a given!!! Can’t wait to go back with them again soon!  Thanks for the memories!

resp.text: Thank you Justin for taking time out of your busy vacation schedule to share your experience about us.  It was so good to see ya’ll again and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Troy

name: Jason Uselton
text: We’ve been on some charters before and this is the MOST and BEST family friendly charter we have been on! Troy allowed us to come into his wheel house and showed us around! It was so much fun and we were allowed to learn at our own pace not expected to know exactly what we were doing. If we had any questions both Troy and Joey were very happy and helpful not once did we ever feel uncomfortable! We had an 11, 17, 38 and 2 21 year olds and we ALL throughly had the best and most relaxed time we could’ve had! The boat is very comfy and very roomy!! I can’t say in words how much of an amazing time we had and HIGHLY recommend this charter company to everyone!!

resp.text: Jason.  Thank you so much for your amazing feedback about your trip with us.   Glad you enjoyed your trip with us. We enjoyed having you and look forward to seeing y’all again soon.   Troy

name: MISTY Halley
text: This was by far the best fishing trip we have ever been on and we have been on several!!!  Captain Troy was so nice and so much fun and JT, thank you for all of your help and answering all of our questions!  We caught tons of fish and if they stopped biting in one spot, he found another spot.  We will definitely be using this fishing charter again.  The boat was super nice and clean.

resp.text: Thanks Misty for taking time to share your review about our fishing guide service.  We had so much fun with you and your family.  We enjoyed meeting and serving ya’ll.  Getting to know you and then tailoring our trip to maximize fishing is what we really enjoyed most.  I am glad the fish cooperated. I was so pleased to run into ya’ll that night at the marina and after we got in from our second trip for the day.  Ya’ll made us feel like part of your family.  Can’t wait to see you all again!!!!  Troy

name: Richard Moore
text: I booked our trip based on the reviews I read and boy we were not disappointed. Captain Troy and his deck hand Corey made our trip special. We had a really good time, the boat was clean, everyone caught fish, they even took some pictures while you haul in the "big one", also made us feel like family. Thanks Caption Troy and Corey for a trip we won't forget, hope to see you next year!

resp.text: Richard - thank you for taking time to write  about your experience with our company.  We do appreciate it so much.   Corey and I enjoyed fishing with your family and look forward to seeing you again some day soon.  Troy

name: hillary kuklenski
text: Troy and Corey were wonderful in every aspect. They cared greatly about our safety and treated us like family! The boat was very clean and well maintained. We caught a variety of fish. Captain Troy knew exactly where to take us to make sure we were able to catch fish, and the boat ride was very smooth!

resp.text: Hillary, thank you for taking time to share your fishing experience with others.  It was really fun fishing with ya’ll and watching you reel in those big ones.  Catching those amberjack on light tackle was certainly entertaining and exciting.   Thank you for your business and hope to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Tyler Harris
text: Captain Troy went above and beyond to make sure our family was safe, first and foremost, while having a ton of fun catching fish in the process. Troy genuinely cares about his customers, and treats them with the highest service imaginable, especially big groups and families. Troy is an amazing conservationist who looks to protect our future of fishing by advocating safe practices to preserve the environment. I would highly recommend to any anyone looking for a good time at sea! If possible, l would give him 6 STARS, and I would definitely consider this the highlight of our vacation.

resp.text: Tyler - thank you so much for taking time to share your detailed experience about your trip today.   We really appreciate customers who really care about conservation and the future of our nations fisheries by wanting to ensure we have fish for future generations.    We appreciate your business and hope to be able to serve your family again soon.    We know coming all the way from Oregon was a chore, but we are glad you did.  Troy

name: Tyler Stice
text: Captain Troy and Corey made my families deep sea fishing trip a great experience. They were funny and you can tell they really care about you. We all caught plenty of fish and Corey cleaned them for us. If you are thinking of going deep sea fishing and looking for a great family friendly experience I would highly recommend Distraction Charters!

resp.text: Tyler. Thank you so much for taking time out of your vacation to give us such wonderful words of feedback.   It was a real honor to be able to meet and serve you and your family.   We look forward to seeing you again.   Troy

name: Webb Broussard
text: 8th year in a row with Captain Troy and Corey. Always have a good time. Always puts us on some fish. This is the most professional fishing charter I've ever been with. They have excellent customer service. Perfect for a family trip of any age. If you want the best fishing experience, these are the guys to go to.

resp.text: Webb,   Thank you for taking time to write a review about our charter fishing company.  I can't believe I've had the opportunity to take you fishing for the past 8 years.  It really means so much that I have been able to watch you grow up over the years into the fine young man engineer you are.  I am so proud to call you a customer and a friend.   Hope to see you again next year.  Troy

name: H. W.
text:
If you're looking for time and money well spent, Distraction Charters will not disappoint!  Capt Troy and first mate, Corey, are the best!!!  This is the deep sea fishing experience you dream about.  The service they provide, bonds families and creates memories of a lifetime!  Corey was such a kind, considerate young man!  He was so very helpful and cheerful about it!  Couldn't have asked for a better first mate!!!  Capt Troy is a genuine, caring man who truly wants to provide families with the best experience possible!!  He is a character and really knows how to connect with kids.  :)
I highly recommend Distraction Charters!!!!!!!!!!  Do your family a favor and book a Charter with Capt Troy Frady!!!!!  You will thank me... sincerely!!!!  :-)

P.S.  I realize that I've used a lot of exclamation points in this review... I want those reading to understand how AMAZING this experience has been for me and my family.  :)

name: jeramy Harrington
text: We had a great day. We caught our limit of red snapper and hooked several big sharks. The best part was the family atmosphere. We will definitely charter Captain Troy again.

resp.text: Thank you Jeramy for writing this review about your family’s trip with us.  Ya’ll were a lot of fun and Corey and I enjoyed watching your rods bending.  Wish we could have got one of those sharks on the line long enough to see it. But, there is always next time.  Hope you enjoy that fish and the heiferdust seasoning.   Troy

name: Aaron Johnson
text: Outstanding charter service! Captain Troy and mate Corey are true professionals and fun to be around. They are great with kids and beginners, run a very safe operation, and go the extra mile to make it a great experience.  For example, Troy runs a video camera while you are fishing and is on the deck taking great pictures of your adventure and catch. As you get off the boat, he hands you a CD with all your pictures and video at no cost. They give you great tips on how to cook your catch and gave us some great seasoning! I do at least two charter trips a year and I WILL book again next year with Distraction Charters! I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Ronnie Smith
text:
Great family time! This was our families first time deep sea fishing and we had a blast!  Capt. Troy knows where the fish are.  We could not have asked for a better experience.  Boat was very clean and well kept.  A/C blows cold. All fishing equipment was in excellent condition and ready to go.  We can't wait to go again with these guys!  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM!

Also, I really enjoyed the photos and videos they took.  It was nice not having to drag a camera along.

name: Adam Hines
text: We had a great time with Captain Troy on a family fishing trip. Several of us were new to ocean fished but they were great teachers and wonderful with the kids. We did the 6 hour trip and had good luck with everyone catching a variety of fish. I’d definitely recommend the Distraction crew for charter fishing trips, especially for family trips.

resp.text: Thanks Adam.  Sure was fun to fish with you and your family.  War Eagle!   Hope you have a great Thanksgiving.

name: Justice Jones
text: We had an awesome experience with Captain Troy and his crew on the 6 hour fishing charter. Caught a lot of fish and had fun the entire time! Highly recommend and we will definitely be back!

resp.text: Hey Justice.  Thank you for taking time to give us some great feedback about your trip today.    I really enjoyed meeting you and getting to know you and your family.  Really enjoyed riding and talking about aviation and all those planes.  Sure did bring back a lot of memories for me about my past life.   I am so glad you had a good time fishing with us.  Can’t wait to see you again.  Troy

name: Tatiana Critides
text: My brothers and I had a great time on the Distraction. The Captain and mate were extremely helpful and reliable. The boat was kept in pristine condition the entire ride and all we had to do was worry about was catching the fish. We had a great experience and will most definitely come back for more!

resp.text: Tatiana, We really appreciate you taking time to share your review about our company.  We really enjoyed fishing with ya'll and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Troy

name: Jessica Vasquez
text: 6 people in our family did a charter with Captain Troy and his deck hand JT.  This is a great boat for a family trip out for some fish in’.  We had a fantastic time and caught 7-20 fish each. The captain always made sure everyone was happy and the deckhand helps out as much as you need. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Hey Jessica.  Thanks for taking time to share your experience about your trip.  Fishing with you, Matt and the rest of the family was especially pleasing.   Being able to meet the rest of your family that evening was a real treat too.  I can’t wait to get your girls out fishing on the next trip.  Hope to see ya’ll again soon.   Troy

name: Patricia Amaya
text:
Captain Troy created the perfect experience for our family. He and his deckhand, Kyle, did an excellent job from beginning to end. We are already discussing our next trip on the Distraction! The boat was perfect for us -- it was the right size and very clean. Captain Troy's expertise helped us stay safe and get comfortable with the boat and the entire fishing experience. He took great care with our sons, ages 9 and 13, and showed great patience with our 9 year old in particular. We caught fish, and our 9 year old caught the largest one! Almost 28 lbs! He can't wait to go fishing with Captain Troy again!

We definitely recommend Distraction Charters to anyone looking for an amazing fishing experience.

name: Brad Bryant
text:
Capt. Troy and Corey were excellent. I have been on several charters in the past and this one was by far the best ever. They were very helpful and friendly. They are great for a beginner to and experienced angler as well. Great for kids and ladies too. They specialize in a family experience not just a fishing trip. Capt, Troy does a great job with his camera and video as well. I am already looking forward to fishing with them again, next tie I am in the Orange Beach area.
Thanks again,
Brad Bryant

name: Alek Ledvina
text: Captain Troy is a fun and enjoyable person to fish with. He is very knowledgeable about the local ecosystem and fisheries biology. We caught a lot of fish and had a great time. The deckhand Corey is very helpful and is also knowledgeable about the local fish. Definitely rating Distraction 5 stars; its truly an amazing charter.

resp.text: Alek - thanks for reviewing us.  Corey and I had a good time with you all yesterday afternoon.  You and Izzy make a great match and enjoyed watching you reel in those fish. Keep the entrepreneurial spirit alive.  Hope to see you again.  Troy

name: Christie Goehring
text:
Absolutely Amazing Experience!!  My family went on a 6 hour off shore trip with Troy and Corey.  This was the first time my two boys and myself have ever been deep sea fishing.  Both were very patient with us and taught us the basics before we went out.   We all caught great fish and had an experience we will never forget.  As a mom, the best part of the whole trip was being able to look at the pictures and video Captain Troy took for us.  We were all fishing and unable to take pictures on our own, so having Troy take such great pictures from our fishing trip is priceless!!  We couldn't wait to come home and share the pictures with our family.  Troy provided my family with a once in a lifetime experience.  I would highly recommend Distraction Charters to anyone looking for a charter fishing service in Alabama.

Christie Goehring
Round Top, TX

resp.text: Christie.   Thanks for this wonderful review about your experience with Corey and I.  We appreciate you taking time to write it.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family and look forward to serving you again some day.  Troy

name: Bode Shahan
text: Had a fun time, we saw dolphins and caught plenty of fish

resp.text: Bode,  we appreciate the opportunity to serve you and your family.   Glad you had a good time and caught some nice fish.   I agree, those dolphins are cool to look at.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Kirk Clark
text: They went through their preboarding procedures and thoroughly explained each item and the reasons behind them. We came on the charter with two people who had never gone deep sea fishing at all and they were so helpful to them teaching them how to do it and making sure everyone left knowing more about it than when we got onboard. They are down to earth and extremely kind to everyone with a sense of humor that had all laughing and enjoying our time on board. We caught our limit in Red snapper while also he taught us about conservation of the ecosystem and the importance behind it. Overall, Distraction Charters is the most wholesome, family oriented, honest, and friendly charter I have ever had the pleasure of being on. My family left the trip with smiling faces and fish for dinner it was perfect.

resp.text: Kirk.  I am in awe.  Your kind words about your family’s fishing charter have me thinking about each of those items you mentioned.  Being conservation oriented, educational and caring are things we often think go unnoticed by our guests and friends.  Thank you so much for taking time to write this awesome review.    Troy

name: Brittany Urbaniak
text: After reviewing many different options in the Orange Beach area we chose Capt. Troy and Distraction Charters for our boating/fishing adventure.  I was looking for a trip to take our 5 and 10 yr old on.  This was my firsts time trying to pick a charter and with so many options I was a bit lost.  After much research I contacted Troy via email and just asked what type of trip would be best for the time of year.  We were not looking to bring a ton of fish home, but just wanted to catch fish!!  We went on a 4 hr trip (perfect length for small children) and each of the four of us caught 2-3 fish a piece (even took one home and had it for dinner).  Troy let my kids up in the captain's area with him when we were moving between areas.  (and yes there is a working bathroom!!) Life vest was provided for my youngest.  Very family friendly (clean, no smoking or bad language)  First Mate was awesome in helping the kids with their bate and I can not tell you how many time he helped my daughter with her fishing line and every time with a smile!!  It made it so my husband and I could fish and enjoy the experience as well.  I would recommend the picture package.  We have over 50 awesome shots that Troy took of use fishing and with out catch so everyone is in the picture and no worries of losing a camera!  We even got to see dolphins jumping around the boat.  We will be back to Orange Beach and Capt Troy will be a part of our vacation!!

name: Wyatt Rickles
text: My dad, brother, grandad and I all took a fishing trip through Distraction Charters. Before we headed out, my grandad, who has taken many fishing trips in his life, warned my brother and I that "captains are usually jerks and first mates are no better". Our experience could not have been more different from that expectation. Both the captain and first mate were incredibly friendly and helpful. More than that, the trip as a whole was fantastic. If you're looking for a family-friendly experience than I would definitely pick Distraction Charters.

resp.text: Thank you Wyatt for the feedback about your family’s fishing trip with our company.   Corey and I really appreciate you taking time to do so.   Charter fishing has changed and has become a very professional industry in the past 16 years and providing excellent customer service is now a standard  with the charter boats in my peer group.  We are so glad you had a good fishing experience.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Troy

name: Katlynne Adams
text: Amazing family atmosphere ! Great crew, and great experience! Caught lots of fish and had the best time with Distraction Charters! Cant wait to go fishing with them again!

resp.text: Katlynne,   Thank you so much for giving us such great feedback about your fishing trip with us.  Watching you catch those fish was fun.   We enjoyed having you.  Can’t wait to see you and your family again.   Troy

name: Whitney Armstrong
text: Distraction Charter Boat is an excellent choice for your families fishing adventure! I would give this charter a five star rating!  Captain Troy knows his stuff when it comes to fishing because we caught our limit on red snapper along with several other kinds of fish.  We also had a great dolphin show while we were fishing!  The captain has a great sense   of humor and makes your feel right at home! He even makes a DVD of your fishing trip to take home with you ! This is a charter I would book again!

name: Mimi Poole
text: We had a wonderful time with Captain Troy and Corey! We couldn’t have asked for a better experience. We were looking for a charter that specializes in family fishing trips and they exceeded expectations. We will definitely be calling Troy again next year and making this part of our Orange Beach tradition.

resp.text: Thank you Mimi for giving us some wonderful feedback about your family’s fishing charter.   Corey and I really enjoyed serving your family.   Your twins are amazing kids and we liked being with them and sharing their first charter fishing experience.   We love families like yours.   We are looking forward to being able to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Ashleigh Elkins
text: GREAT experience…my family has been deep sea fishing for the past several years, but this was our first trip with Troy.  His main priority was making sure we had a great time, and he succeeded! We caught all types of fish and enjoyed every minute of the trip.  If you're looking for a laid back guy whose only goal is to make sure you catch fish and have a good time, Troy is your guy!

name: Dalton Ellers
text: There's a reason why we are repeat customers with Troy and Corey. They not only embody the spirit of true fishermen, but they also hold high standards of what it is to be hardworking and honest men. First off, they create a family friendly environment. We came with a group of 6 guys, with one being under eighteen. Troy and Corey were able to keep up with the jokes as guys would, but not once were they disrespectful or derogatory in any sense, which is very surprising for us because we have traveled all over the world fishing, and we have seen some rough captains. Next, these men work hard. When Corey is not rigging up a pole, or getting a fish off the line, he is constantly making sure the boat is immaculent.  Troy also knows the spots. He is up and down the boat ladder guiding the boat and taking pictures of some of the day's highlights. To add on to that, we limited out on Red Snapper, caught a King Mackerel, and dabbled with several other species of fish while we were on the water. Lastly, they are very personable men. They are straight shooters and they are willing to answer any questions you have. They even allow you to ride in the cockpit area while he is captaining the ship. If I am in the Orange Beach area and I want to fish, Troy and Corey will be the only men I call.

resp.text: Dalton,  Corey and I really appreciate your kind words about your family fishing charter with us today.  I didn't really think anyone paid that much attention to all that Corey and I do in order to make an ordinary day an extraordinary day.  I do like it when a plan comes together!  I really enjoyed visiting with you again and to find out you want to finish your education and go to medical school.  Please stay in touch and look forward to fishing with you again. Capt Troy

name: Brad Dunkerley
text: If you are looking for a family adventure, where you can build special memories that will last a lifetime call Captain Troy at Distraction Charters. Of course you will catch plenty of quality fish however, what separates Distraction Charters from the rest of the fleet is Captain Troy's positive, humorous, Christian family first attitude. His goal is to make sure your entire family has the best day they will ever experience on the water. As usual, he succeeded with our family! I highly recommend the 10 hour trip.

resp.text: Hey Brad.  We really appreciate your feedback and sharing your kind comments about fishing with us.  That 10 hour trip you referenced, is one of our favorite charters we offer.   They give us fishing guides enough time to get out far enough offshore where fishing pressure is less and we have a chance to target different species to catch.   Spending time trying to catch quality fish with your family and friends is a real delight for Corey and I.   We hope to see you again next year.  Thanks.  Troy

name: Kenneth Pickett
text: As a fisherman, conservation and appreciation of marine critters is important to me. it was awesome to find a cap. That shared the same values. Troy and Corey are doing the entire Orange Beach fishery a favor by sharing these values with their patrons. My family has a blast

resp.text: Ken. Thank you so much for giving us some feedback about our company and your experience.  Being conservative and conservation minded is tough down here in an environment where it’s all about taking all you can.  It’s nice to have customers (friends) like you and your family who appreciate what we do for them.   Your family was so much fun to fish with today. We look forward to seeing you again someday soon.  Troy

name: Ross Jensen
text: Thanks Troy, my mom, my dad Scott, Abbie and I all had a great time. Corey was an excellent deck hand and we all had some good fish. Too bad that big one got away 😜.

resp.text: Hey Ross,   Thanks for giving us some great feedback about your family fishing trip.  It was so nice to meet you all.   We look forward to seeing y’all again someday!   Troy

name: kole read
text: Troy is an amazing guide who brings a lot to the trip. Definitely will make you laugh and is very laid back with a beautiful ship. We had the best time and everyone needs to go fishing with Troy! You migjt even get to catch some sharks! Thanks for the amazing trip -Kole and Morgan

resp.text: Kole, Morgan,   Thank you for your kind words about fishing with us.  We are so glad ya’ll had a good time.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Good luck in Law School.

name: Courtney M. Woods
text: Most amazing experience and first anniversary ever!!!  I'm not sure where to even begin here! If you want a totally different family experience I highly recommend booking a deep sea fishing trip with Distraction Charters. Captain Troy is by far the best and most respectable charter boat captain in the business!!! My husband and I booked a fishing trip for our first anniversary. I had never been deep sea fishing before that trip and I had the time of my life! I felt like family immediately upon meeting Capt. Troy and his deckhand Stephen. I loved the laid back atmosphere and how hospitable they were to us. I had no experience with trolling or bottom fishing previously and I was able to learn so much and have a blast at the same time! A huge plus for me was the emphasis on safety and making sure that everyone on board was having fun at all times. Catching fish is awesome but I realized that it's not even about that (We caught tons that day plus fought 2 huge bull sharks). Conservation is vital to our future and the future of our children's children. They let you keep the best of what you catch and release the rest. That makes so much sense rather than just keeping everything just for the sake of "look at all the fish I caught."  The whole entire experience with Distraction Charters far exceeded any of my expectations for a day of fishing with my hubby. It doesn't matter if you're an expert or you're a complete newbie like me. Capt. Troy goes above and beyond for his customers in every way possible. The cleanliness of the boat was also impressive to me. I had help with anything that I needed at all times. I'm huge on trust and believe me my trust was earned 1000% by the time spent on safety and the fact that I was on a boat carrying a life raft (not many do). I just can't say enough good things about Distraction Charters. Please try them one time and I promise you won't be disappointed in the least. Good people and they live up to their word!!! AMAZING

name: Steve Townsend
text: Caught our limit including a 28# trophy red snapper! Great trip with teenagers, awesome captain, first mate and boat- fun, clean and entertaining.  Going back out with Troy next year, highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Steven for taking time to write your experience down about us.  It really means a lot for you to take time out of your busy schedule to do this.  We do appreciate it.   We are glad you enjoyed your trip. Those big fish certainly are a lot of fun to catch.   We like seeing you try and catch them using light tackle.   We hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Alan Waits
text: Fun and entertaining experience. Very professional and knowledgeable crew. Captain Troy and deck hand Cory makes sure you have a fun and memorable experience. I would love to return and fish which them again

resp.text: Hey Alan.   Thank you for taking time to write a review about your experience.   It was so nice to meet you and be able to share a fishing trip with you.  I enjoyed watching you catch those many varieties of fish.   I hope you enjoy a few good meals.  Remember to sprinkle a little heiferdust on them for that extra flavor.   Again, thank you for coming fishing with us.  Troy

name: Chris Baker
text: I've charter fished with many captains in multiple locations to include Hawaii and Mexico.  Troy was by far one of the best I have ever fished with.  He is very personable, excellent with kids, knowledgeable about conservation and was great at putting our group on excellent fish.  I would highly recommend Distraction Charters to anyone interested in an excellent time and a great family atmosphere for veteran and novice fishermen alike.

resp.text: Chris,   Corey and I enjoyed serving you on today's fishing charter   We are glad you trusted us with your family.  We especially want to say thank you for taking time to share your experience with others.  Your kind words about us, remind us why we love doing what we do.   We hope to see you again soon.  Thanks. Troy and Corey

name: samantha mccormick
text: We had an amazing time with Troy and his deckhand, Corey. They're kind and genuine, whilst remaining professional. His top of the line tackle and equipment; along with the clean environment, called for an excellent experience!! This is great for families as well as serious fishermen. We will be back!! -The McCormick's, Tn.

resp.text: Samantha.  It was so nice to meet and get to serve your family.   Corey and I really appreciate you taking time to share your review with others.  We enjoyed watching y'all catch those fish.  It was especially delightful to see the smiles on your faces.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Troy

name: Blake McCarroll
text: The best fishing trip I have ever been on. Troy and Corey are great guys. Easy going and wonderful family oriented guys. I highly recommend them to anybody. They are both in the business of serving others. Thanks guys!

name: LaFonda Davidson
text: My family has been on many fishing charters  - and this was by far our very best experience. As far as fishing goes, we had great success in terms of numbers and size of the fish. The experience on the boat was awesome too. GREAT family experience for the kids. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend Troy and Distraction Charters to any families looking for a fishing adventure. This was everyone's favorite experience while we were in Gulf Shores.

name: Jeffrey Smith
text: Distraction Charters is the only fishing charters we will use in Orange Beach. Captain Troy and Corey are a top quality team, providing an unforgettable fishing experience. Their boat is very clean and well maintained. Corey made us feel welcomed and very comfortable aboard the boat. Capt Troy definitely knows how to find the fish. We caught enough for dinner tonight, and released enough for three more dinners. We caught a variety of fish, from Snapper, Cobia, Trigger, and Bonita. If you are looking for a family friendly charter service, look no further than Distraction Charters!

resp.text: Jeffrey, thanks for taking the time to give us some feedback about your fishing trip this morning.  It was so good to see your family again.  We are so happy that you were pleased with your fishing trip and the results.  We look forward seeing you all again next time.  Troy

name: Kelly Yeager
text: We had a great time fishing.  Our trip was scheduled for Saturday but the weather was not going to be optimum so Capt Troy called Friday to see if we could go Friday instead and we did.  As the trip was specifically to go fishing for our daughters 21st birthday present.  This is the reason we are repeat customers and will continue to book in the future.  Thanks to Capt Troy and Corey for a great trip.

resp.text: Thank you so much Kelly for taking time to share your experience about us, with others.    Getting to see Reggie and the rest of your family again and be able to take ya’ll fishing was a real treat for us.  I am glad Shelby had  a good 21st birthday and glad we were a part of it.  We hope to see you again soon.  War Eagle.   Troy

name: Randy Williams
text: Our family had a great experience fishing with Distraction Charters celebrating our grandson's 10th birthday.  If you are looking for a fishing charter that is "family friendly".....this is it!  No cussing, no lewd comments......just good clean fun..... You will have a blast!  Captain Troy will get you to the fish.......and then take photos as you pull them in.......Stephen will make sure your lines are baited and tackle is in order.....At the end of your trip, Captain Troy will give you photos of your day that are professional quality....You will also receive a video of your fishing trip that you can share with family and friends for years to come....... Look forward to doing this again in the future!  God Bless!

name: Bruce Wilson
text: Captain Troy and Corey were patient, kind, and helpful. They have been taking my family fishing for 7 years, this is the first time I got to go along. I saw how they taught my nephews and nieces how to fish, each time we caught a fish that was different they would explain how the fish was different and what kind of fish it was. We caught lots of fish, had fun, and most importantly the kids had fun. If you have children, this is the place to go.

resp.text: BJ. Thanks for taking time to share your feedback about our company. It was a real pleasure to be able to finally meet you and have you join us for a day of fishing.  We enjoyed watching you and your family spend time together while reeling in some fish.  Hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Steven Stelk
text: We first went out with Captain Troy on a half-day trip almost five years ago.  It was supposed to be a one-time getaway for a small group of Dads.  We had such a great time that first year that we decided to make it an annual trip.  Our small group has since expanded to three generations of fathers and sons and usually book a full day.  We look forward to our trip with Captain Troy every year.  He takes great care of us and always has a stellar first mate.  We're coming up on our fifth trip with Distraction Charters and we've never considered booking with anyone else.  If you're on the fence about which charter to book with, or whether you should try this kind of fishing trip, book with Captain Troy today.  You will be glad you did!

resp.text: Steve.  Thank you so much for taking time to give us some great feedback about your five years of past experiences with us.   Getting to know you and your family has been one of the most rewarding things we get to do as a guide service.     We love it when families come back and bring their kids and grandkids with us.   We love doing those full day trips with ya’ll.  They are always fun and exciting.   Going during the fall is good because fishing pressure is less then due to tourist season being over for a while and the weather is cooler.    We can’t wait to see you all again this year and see what all we catch.  Troy

name: Mary Michalak
text: From beginning to end this was a first rate fishing charter!  Capt Troy and Corey were knowledgeable and professional fishing guides.  The boat was in tip top shape with an A/C’d cabin and clean bathroom.  We were staying in a hotel nearby and thought we were not going to be able to keep our fish but Capt. Troy advised us that the restaurant at the marina would cook it up for us which was a bonus that we didn’t know we would have.  I would highly recommend using this charter fishing guide and will use them again in the future.

resp.text: Mary.  Thank you for taking time to share your experience with others.   Your family was so much fun to be with today.  I am glad ya’ll were able to keep a few fish for dinner so you could try our gulf seafood and taste the many flavors our waters gave to offer.   Ya’ll made us feel like family and we look forward to seeing ya’ll again someday soon.  Troy

name: Raegan Byrd
text: Such a GREAT experience!! FAMILY friendly!!! Troy treated us like family and we had an absolute blast catching all those fish!!! Such great people!

resp.text: Thank you Raegan for taking time to give us some great feedback about your family’s experience with Corey and I.  We had a good time with ya’ll and really enjoyed watching ya’ll battle that monster shark.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again. Troy

name: Brandon Onsby
text: Captain Troy and his deckhand Corey are very professional, and lots of fun. They put us on some nice fish right away, and then put us on the hunt for sharks. I would recommend to anyone who wants an awesome experience with your children or a few friends.

resp.text: Brandon. We really enjoyed meeting and taking you guys fishing today.   You guys were a lot of fun and we enjoyed sharing those moments with y'all.  We really want to say thanks for taking time to write this wonderful review.   Hope to see y'all again next year.  Thanks. Troy

name: Michael Gatto
text: Distraction Charters is a great deep sea fishing trip for families. If you are looking for your kids to enjoy a few hours of fishing, this is the charter for you. Troy (captain) was great with the kids and Cory (deckhand) did a good job of educating us on the fish my kids were looking at. My kids caught a lot of different fish and had a great time!

name: Kalyn Atchison
text: My family and I went on a half day tour this morning with Captain Troy and his deckmate Corey with Distraction Charters. We had so much fun reeling in a colorful variety of saltwater fish! While we all love fishing, saltwater fishing is not something we have the opportunity to do very often. Corey was excellent at teaching us the proper techniques for baiting and casting and made sure that all of us were successful. Both Captain Troy and Corey were eager to share their abundant knowledge with us during our excursion. We cannot recommend Distraction Charters enough! Our experience was worth every penny! And to top it off, our day was recorded (at no additional charge) in pictures and video by Captain Troy so we can relive our day with extended family and friends back home!

resp.text: Kalyn.  Thank you so much for giving us some detailed feedback about your fishing trip.  Corey and I really enjoy it when our guests and friends get a lot from the experience.  We are so glad you chose us to serve your family.  We love it when we have three generations on board sharing memories and the love of deep sea fishing.   We look forward to seeing you again someday soon.  We wish you the best with your nursing career.  Thanks.  Troy

name: Joe Childers
text: Captain Troy and Cory were amazing.. We had a great time and caught alot of fish. We couldn't have asked for any better charter. Troy has a great personality and really makes you feel appreciated, and respected. My family and I will definitely choose Distraction Charters the next time and from now on. If you want to feel like your with family on a fishing trip, call Troy. Thank you again for a great day. Joe, Janet, Morgan, Mallorie and Mason.

resp.text: Thank you Joe for writing this great feedback about our company and your experience.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with and we look forward to seeing y’all again some day soon.   Thanks.  Troy

name: The Allenz
text:
Wonderful outing...looking forward to enjoying our catch this evening at dinner!!
Captain Troy and his deckhand Cory were family friendly and put us on top of the fish! Everyone’s reels were bending all morning!! Everyone enjoyed baiting their own lines and pulling in their own catches!!

resp.text: Hey Kim.  Thank you for bringing your family fishing with us today and for taking time to give us some feedback.   Corey and I enjoyed serving you and your family today.  I am glad you caught some quality fish for dinner.  We hope you enjoy eating them tonight.   We hope to see you again someday soon.  Troy

name: Dirk Stock
text: We enjoyed a fantastic fishing trip on the Distraction with Captain Troy and his Mate, Corey.  It was truly the best and most successful one I have ever been on!  Captain Troy did a superb job locating fish and my family and I all caught several, including red snapper, mackerel and trigger fish.  Captain Troy has an engaging sense of humor and made sure we all had an enjoyable experience.  His Mate, Corey was extremely attentive, providing valuable tips and helping us land our fish, unhook them and position us with our catches for memorable photographs.  Their price was significantly better than others we researched on the internet and included filleting and bagging, as well as a CD of all of the great photos they took of us, at no extra charge!  I would highly recommend Captain Troy and the Distraction to anyone looking to have wonderful fishing experience on the gulf.

resp.text: Dirk.   Hope you are doing well.  We appreciate your kind words about your experience with us.  It means so much when our friends/guests take time to critique us and give us some feedback.  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to serving you again someday!   Troy

name: Michael Harkey
text: Several members of our family went fishing with Troy today and had a great time. They really catered to our kids and made sure that they had a fishing trip of a life time. we caught several big fish and had a wonderful time and great company. we will definitely come back and fish with them again. The whole experience was good and the boat and crew were awesome!

name: Alison Wilson
text: We will fish Distraction Charters for years to come! It was an all around great experience.  Captain Troy and his crew were great.  They were very welcoming and helpful in all ways.  This was a first experience for my 6 and 8 year old boys.  They had a very memorable time.  They were also taught it is important to conserve for out future.  We still brought home plenty of red snapper and mackerel to feed out entire family for multiple meals.  I recommend Distraction Charters to anyone.

name: Don Honeycutt
text: Second time fishing with distraction charters and we had another great time. We caught multiple species of fish, learned more about gulf coast fishing, and made great memories with the kids. You won't find a better gulf coast charter for a friendly hard working crew that knows how to catch fish.

resp.text: Thank you Don for taking time to share your review about our company with others.   We enjoyed serving you and your family today.  I can’t believe how much your boys have grown up.  I can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Charles Martin
text: Capt. Troy, Deckhand Corey and Distraction Charters provided an amazing experience. It was my first time on the family's fishing trip and Capt. Troy went out of his way to show me all of the instruments and controls, which was phenomenal from an educational standpoint. Corey was very knowledgable and hardworking. Capt. Troy's boat is very neat and clean, and it stayed nice and cool on a 90+ degree day. The fishing was amazing that day for us. We were able to pull in trigger fish and king mackerel, which made for a delicious dinner. Capt. Troy kept us moving to great spots where we had plenty of hits, and Corey helped keep us in the action and having a good time. I highly encourage anyone or any family looking for an enjoyable experience on the water to book Capt. Troy and Distraction Charters. And don't forget to try his seasonings! They were awesome!

name: Yo Daddy
text: Fantastic experience from the moment we were welcomed aboard until our fish was handed to us cleaned and ready to grill.  The boat was clean and well maintained;  The Captain and Mate were professional, friendly, educational and entertaining.  Extremely family-friendly atmosphere, even let my 9 year son steer the boat!

resp.text: Josh.  Thank you for taking time to share your experience with others.  We are happy that you had a wonderful time with us.  Watching y'all fish was the highlight of our day.  Please stay in touch and hope to see you again some day soon.  Troy

name: Brittany Kimbrell
text: My family took a trip with Distraction Charters this past Saturday. It was my first deep sea fishing trip. We thoroughly enjoyed our time. Captain Troy and Stephen were very considerate and made sure we were comfortable and enjoying our time. I would recommend Distraction Charters to anyone!

name: Sid Smith
text: My family fished with Captain Troy and Kyle on 7/7/12. We had a wonderful experience.  Troy was very approachable and friendly. He encouraged all of us to visit with him in the captain's cabin while we were trolling out to the reef to begin fishing. My boys, ages 7 & 9 loved that. Once we arrived at the reef and dropped our lines, we almost immediately began catching red snapper. We caught our limit in no time. Kyle, Troy's first mate, was great at instructing the kids on what to do. We all had a great time and will definitely fish with Distraction Charters again. Highly recommend!

name: Kolten Kunkel
text: I absolutely enjoyed our family trip with Distraction Charters. Captain Troy and Stephen made sure that our family had a wonderful time catching some big fish. The trip was great and I also liked how the Captain and Stephen were conservationist and made sure that we fishing the correct way. If you are looking for a affordable family oriented charter fishing trip I highly recommend these guys.

name: Stacy Gober
text: Troy and JT were gracious hosts to our day of fishing in Orange Beach.  Our family of 6 enjoyed a beautiful day on the ocean, caught enough fish for an amazing dinner and appreciated the fun-loving conversation!  We recommend Distraction Charters 100%!

resp.text: Thank you Stacy for bringing your family to fish with us.  We really enjoyed sharing those moments of reeling, laughter and good ole conversation.   We hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Autumn Smith
text: We had an amazing time! (Captain) Troy and Corey were both so nice and helpful it made the trip go so smooth. They also were nice enough to provide accommodations for one of our members who didn't handle to seas too well. I definitely recommend for a family or friends trip because it was worth every penny.

resp.text: Thank you Autumn for your kind words about Corey and I.  We had so much fun with ya’ll  and look forward to see you again some day soon.  Troy

name: Regina Efird
text: Distraction charters was a wonderful experience for all of us! We caught a lot of fish, and the captain and crew were so friendly and helpful. We have used them before and have never been disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you Regina for sharing your comments about us.  Seeing you and being able to spend time fishing together is always a highlight of our week.   We look forward to seeing you all again next time.  Troy

name: Wanda Stone
text: Capt. Troy and Corey are amazing. My husband, son, daughter, son in-law, granddaughter (who is 5 yrs old) and myself went on a half day trip with them. We had a fantastic trip. Every one caught fish. This was my granddaughter and my first deep sea fishing experience and Capt. Troy and Corey made it a wonderful experience. My husband and children go every year and they all said that the boat was the cleanest boat they all have ever been on.  We are all planning on coming back in 2017 for our family vacation.

name: Jordan Badarack
text: Distraction Charters was a great experience, Captain Troy and his deckhand Corey were first class. We caught all sorts of fish and a ton of red snapper all while Captain Troy told all types of great stories. He is a huge family man, so definitely would suggest to a family to take the 6 hour charter if you are looking to catch a bunch of fish and even take some home! He also was nice enough to take great photos and videos of the whole trip and gave us a CD to view after we got back!

resp.text: Jordan.  Wanted to say thanks bringing your family fishing with us and for taking time to share your experience with others.   Corey and I really enjoyed watching ya'll catch those fish.  I can't believe ya'll got to experience catching five different species.  I just wish we could have got you that shark you wanted.  I am glad the bad weather held off long enough for us to get our entire trip In.  Good luck in the baseball tournament this week.  Hope to see you all again next year.

name: Kent Jones
text: Distraction Charters was the right choice for our family! Everything was just as it was advertised, no surprises. Capt. Troy and Stephen were so fun to fish with, we felt like they were just part of our family. They were truly excited for us when we caught fish. Thank you for a great family experience! We will be back!

name: Shannon L
text:
Luckily, Captain Troy and Corey had an opening on our last day in the Gulf Shores area. My boyfriend and I spent a nice long afternoon on the Distraction and had a fantastic time.

We're fairly experienced in fishing lakes and rivers, mainly for bass, but deep sea fishing was a completely new experience. Troy and Corey were friendly, helpful, down-to-earth and very knowledgeable. We caught four new (to us) species - red snapper, triggerfish, ruby lip, and spanish mackerel!

The boat, equipment, and tackle were all very well maintained. I got to see Corey clean up on the way back to the marina, and he was impressively thorough. He and Troy care passionately about what they do, and it really does show. Their focus on family-friendly, conservation-minded fishing is one of the main reasons we booked. The fair, competitive pricing was a plus too :)

We received a DVD of video footage of our time fishing before we even stepped off the boat - how neat is that?! I absolutely recommend Distraction Charters to my friends, family, and anyone else looking for an amazing experience. We will definitely be back, and we'll be bringing the kids next time. Thanks again, Captain Troy and Corey!!!

resp.text: Shannon - Corey and I really appreciate you taking so much time to give us such a wonderful, detailed review about your fishing charter with us.   You and Marcus were the ideal customer for us.  Your passion for the outdoors and all of the experiences life can give us was very impressive.   We loved spending time with ya’ll, talking, explaining, educating and sharing and listening to all the stories.   We are so glad ya’ll had a good time.  I can’t wait to meet the rest of your family and serve them someday too.   Thank you so much for allowing us to serve!   Troy

name: Blake F
text: Troy and Corey were amazing for our fishing trip. We had a great time. I highly recommend hiring them for your next fishing trip.

resp.text: Thank you Blake.  I am glad you had a good time and thought enough of us to write a review about your experience.  Your family was a lot of fun to fish with and Corey and I look forward to seeing you again soon.  Troy

name: Steve Stelk
text: Our 4th Year with Capt Troy and he never fails to live up to expectations!! Great Capt, Crew, and Boat. Never missed yet providing a wonderful fishing experience. First 2 years we brought children along. For last last 2 year we have included Grand Children. 3 generations. From teaching about fish to practicing conservation and in my book simply the beast n the water

resp.text: Thank you Steve for this wonderful review.  We really enjoy spending time with you and your entire family.  Being in this business has been the most rewarding thing I have ever done.  Watching three generations share life experiences and getting to be a part of that is special for me.  Thanks for allowing us to be a part of your life.

name: Connie Noyce
text: Spent the morning fishing with four of our children. Very kid friendly, felt welcome on the boat and both Corey and Troy were excellent hosts. Best of all we ALL caught fish to take home for dinner and it was delicious!

resp.text: Thank you Connie for allowing Corey and I to serve ya’ll today and for giving us such quick and positive feedback about your trip. We are so happy to have been your choice for your family’s fishing charter.  Your kids were amazingly good anglers and they were so sweet.   Thank you for giving us the chance to serve you.   I hope to see you again someday soon.  Be safe heading home. Troy

name: John Proctor
text: Outstanding experience on two red snapper charters in 2016.  Highly professional and courteous Captain and first mate.  Super-clean boat.  Captain Troy put us on multiple "hot" sites on both trips.  Highly recommend.

name: Ryan Durbin
text: Third year in a row with Captain Troy and Corey and they were absolutely amazing. Extremely friendly and interacted with everyone and gear was immaculate. Caught some great fish and had an amazing time. Can't wait to go again!

resp.text: Ryan.  Thanks for taking time to write a review about our company.  It was so good to see y'all again and be able to take you fishing.  I am glad the seas were calm and the fish were biting.  Looking forward to seeing y'all next year.  Troy

name: Jacob Haus (JHAUS13)
text:
We booked our trip not knowing what we would get, but we based our choice solely off reviews and pictures of fish. We were more than pleased, not only with the Fishing Trip, but also with Captain Troy and Deckhand Stephen. They were both very professional, polite and made sure we were having fun. They are both very nice people and they treated our family as if they were apart of it. The fishing was very fun; as soon as we got to the spot we all dropped lines and caught about 10 Red Snapper within about the first 20 minutes. After we were done with that spot we went through a couple bate fish sites were we trolled through and hooked into some Amber Jack & King Mackerel which was very fun to land. Overall, we are very very pleased with the service and the fishing trip. Not only was the fishing great, but so was the crew. I would suggest this Charter for any family that is looking to have some fun with family or friends while doing some good ole fashion fishing. I would like to thank the crew for being very nice and polite as well as fun and knowledgeable about Fishing.

Thanks Again Troy and Stephen,
Jake Haus

name: Ken Boroughs
text: Our first private charter for fishing.  Distraction Charters is awesome!  The boat, Capt Troy and Mate Stephen were awesome in how they treated us.  Stephen took time to show us all how to use the fishing reels properly and assisted if we had any questions.  He worked quickly and efficiently while dealing with six people fishing.  Capt Troy made sure he placed on the fish.  We caught mackerel (keepers), trigger fish, red snapper (not in season), grouper, amber jack and even tried to catch a shark.  This is a family friendly adventure.  It is highly recommended you do the 6 hour trip as you will catch more fish.  Look forward to using Distraction Charters and Capt Troy on our next fishing trip.

name: Byron Earnheart
text: One of the best days fishing I have ever had...and it had nothing to do with the number of fish (and, we did quite well!).  Troy and the guys do a great job and have created an excellent fishing...experience.  The lighter tackle makes each fish memorable.  My dad and I, both lifelong bass fisherman, came home with a great story for each fish we caught.  Distraction is definitely worth checking out and making a part of your vacation experience.

name: Kary Nation
text:
Spending 6 hours on the "Distraction" was like being with family; The ones you like to be around!  Captain Troy put our minds at ease within the first few minutes and the rest of the trip was a blast!  You never know what to expect when you take your children on vacation and I was sure glad that Captain Troy and his deck hand, Jacob,  were gentlemen; no cussing, no drinking, no off-color jokes - just clean family fun.  He treated my teen and pre-teen boys with such kindness and had them rolling with laughter at his off-the-wall, silly stories and songs.

They both made sure that we were comfortable.  They worked hard to make sure that we were satisfied with our experience, and we were.  We were taken to a few different spots so that we could catch a variety of fish and each time we did Captain Troy was there with his camera assuring us that our memories would last!  He also videoed the whole thing and we received a photo disk and a video disk before we left the boat!  You could tell that he truly enjoyed what he was doing; it didn't seem to be about making money for him.

Overall I can say that, as a family, we've never had so much fun together, and it was all because of the atmosphere that Captain Troy created on his wonderful boat!  We look forward to going back to Gulf Shores and when we do, we will definitely go back to Distraction Charters!

name: Allen Thomas
text: My father and two sons enjoyed a 6 hour morning trip this week on The Distraction.  We limited out on red snapper despite challenging weather.  This is a family friendly experience and many great memories were made.  I recommend Troy and The Distraction for a top notch family fishing trip.

name: Collin Bozant
text: We had so much fun and would wanna come back again Captain Troy was funny and made everyone in a good mood and we just enjoyed everything nothing was wrong about this trip it was perfect.

resp.text: Collin.  I really enjoyed meeting you and your family.   You all were so much fun to fish with.   Corey and I appreciate you taking time to give us some great feedback about your trip.   We hope to see you again soon.  Enjoyed the conversation also.  Troy

name: Will Martin
text: As a father of four teenagers who have seen and done almost everything, I never thought they would all enjoy any event as much as our deep sea fishing trip with Distraction Charters.  Troy made us feel at home from the beginning.  It was really a great bonding experience for my family.  Plus, the fishing was awesome!

name: William Bowen
text: It was a great time with fantastic weather.  The fishing biting was non-stop and I had to take a rest!  The Captian took us to where the fish were and it was an enjoyable experience.  I would definitely recommend to anyone that wishes to deep sea fish!

name: Eric and Jenn Walberg
text: I must admit, when we changed our vacation to get in with Troy and Corey and I was dragged from Texas out to Alabama to go snapper fishing, I was like really!  They can't be that good.  Well, I can say I will do it again and every time I get a chance.  We celebrated my dad's 70th by taking him out on this trip.  My sister and dad were repeat business, and I can definitely see why.  A great crew who not only takes care of their clients, but genuinely interested in the environment and protecting our fisheries.  Thank you guys!  Had a great time.

resp.text: Thank you Eric for taking time to share your feedback about fishing with us.  It was really good to meet you and Jenn and to be able to add you to the fishing family.  Your family is the best and now I know the whole family and best of all, feel like part of your family.  We love the laughter and watching ya’ll reel them in.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: Cindy Oliver
text: I have never been deep sea fishing in my life, but my husband wanted to do this more than anything during our vacation (and since it was his birthday as well, I thought why not)? I wanted it to be a surprise, which left the picking of which charter company we used up to me. Swell. I searched endlessly, each company saying the same stuff. Then I happened upon Distraction Charters, whose website alone was vastly different than all the rest. What stuck out to me the most was the phrase "family friendly." Being a mom of three kids, that matters. I never thought that it would mean something though, until I began to plan this trip. And then I imagined captains and deck hands cursing up a storm, drinking til they couldn't stand, and not helping my youngins catch some fish. But Distraction Charters screamed family friendly to me so I took a chance. And boy, I am sure glad I did! Troy (the owner/captain of the boat) and Corey our deckhand, was over the top, helpful and friendly, informative and fun, patient with our inexperience, and wanting to know who we really were. From the moment we stepped on board (actually, well before that through calls and texts) they were very welcoming. My youngest is quite shy until she is comfortable with someone, and by the time we pulled out of the dock, she was already racing up the stairs to hang with Troy and help him pull the ship out of the harbor. That means something to me. The trip out and in was spent in Troy's wheelhouse listening to endless hilarious stories, having the kids pilot the boat, and learning many life lessons. And while fishing, there were not many moments where someone didn't have a fish on the line, with Corey rushing between us to get them off as quickly as possible so we could put our lines back in. To Troy and Corey, it was never truly about catching fish (although they sure as heck made sure we caught our limit) but about having fun as a family. Making sure we were creating memories, and not just putting food on a plate. And that is why, we'll continue to use Distaction Charters, hopefully for years to come. Thank you guys for everything! Mike, Cindy, Andy, Abby, and Maddie.

resp.text: Cindy.  We are in awe at the details you wrote about your experience with our company.  We read this incredible review many times and have shared it with others.  Your attention to detail about how we care about families is impressive.  We want to sincerely thank you for giving us the thumbs up, mothers seal of approval.  We can’t wait to see ya’ll next time.  😁 Troy

name: Aaron Lipke
text:
I recently went on Distraction Charter's 6 hour fishing trip with my son and two other family members.  Captain Troy is a great guy, hands down.  He gave me the feeling of that fun Uncle you've known forever and love going to visit in the summer.  The family and I learned a little, laughed a lot, caught some fish, and had a great time.  The photos (free) and fish cleaning (included in price) were also a nice touch.  I would recommend anyone book this charter!  You won't be disappointed.

- Aaron (not Erin, Captain Troy ;)  )

resp.text: Hey Aaron.   Thank you so much for taking time to write about your experience with our company.   We really enjoyed seeing you guys and watching everyone fight some fish and laugh a lot.   You guys made Corey and I feel like we have known you for many years - so the feeling is mutual about feeling like family.   We hope you enjoyed eating your catch and we hope to see you again soon.  Btw, that last part about Erin has me laughing.  It sure is fun to laugh and carry on with our guests (friends).  Troy

name: Stephanie McDonald
text: My family's deep sea fishing trip with Capt. Troy was amazing! He was funny, yet made sure that everyone is safe. He got us to the BEST fishing spots in the Gulf. I can't wait to go fishing with him again. If you want to hire a family-friendly fishing charter, Capt. Troy and Distraction Charters is the way to go. :)

name: C Mc
text: Captain Troy provided excellent family fishing experience during the Thanksgiving holiday.  The quality of the excursion exceeded our expectations.  Capt. Troy follow up with us by sending professional grade photos of the trip which was a very nice touch. We would have no reservations about recommending Troy to our family and friends when they visit the Gulf Shores area. We'll certainly be hiring him again during our next family vacation.

name: Jamie MORACE
text: We had the  best time this weekend with Captain Troy and Cory.  These guys are the best and we will be booking with them again in the near future.  This is a very family friendly charter and they go out of their way to make sure everyone on board had a great time. We wouldn't go fishing with anyone else. Distraction charters is simply the best out there.

resp.text: Jamie,   It was so nice to meet y'all and be able to spend time fishing with you.  Thanks for taking time to write this wonderful review about our charter company.   We hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Michael Chambliss
text: Great family fun on the water. The captain was fun and easy going and made our time on the water worth while. We came home with the fish and they cleaned them up and filleted them for us.

resp.text: Thanks Mike for taking time to give us some feedback about your charter today.  We enjoyed meeting and serving you guys today and look forward to fishing with you again some day. Troy

name: Dennis Robles
text: Captain Troy and Corey are a class act!  Our family of five had the best time catching an array of 'Trophies'.  Our kids range in age from 6 to 13  and they took their time making each one of their experiences unique and enjoyable. Can't wait to make it back to Orange Beach and do it all over again.

resp.text: Thanks Dennis.  We appreciate you bringing your family fishing with us.  Your kids were so much fun to be with.  I am glad those big fish were biting and you all had a chance to catch them.  That amberjack was a real treat to see.  We hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Colin Day
text: My brother booked distraction because of Troy's great reviews, especially when it comes to kids on board and his appreciation for the sustainability of fish stocks. It was a great decision, and the best charter I've ever taken to into the Gulf! Troy and Corey the deck hand were, fun, personable, very generous and helpful, and they were amazing with my five year old niece. We caught fish after fish, keeping only those we would eat and were in catching season, and Troy and Corey made the Distraction our home for the day. We relaxed on the bow on the way back to the marina with beers in hand, and then Troy and Corey gutted and filleted our dinner for the rest of the week. They even took pictures while we were on the water and had a photo CD of memories of us to keep by the time we docked. Hands down would recommend this outfit to anyone- what a special day! Thanks guys!!

resp.text: Hey Colin.   Thanks for taking time to share this excellent experience and review with others.    Corey and I really enjoyed spending time fishing with your family.   I hope you enjoyed the different species of fish you had to eat.  I can't believe we caught so many.   Hope to see you again my friend.  Troy.

name: Garret Shields
text: Our family went out with Troy today and it was fantastic. They are great people and are very good with kids. They let both the kids in our group drive the boat. It was a great time.

resp.text: Thank you Garret for sharing your feedback about us.  We really appreciate you taking time to write it.  Corey and I really enjoyed watching you and your family fish today.  Watching you smile and reel them in was the highlight of our day.   Hope to see you again.  Troy

name: Candice Wagner
text: Our family thoroughly enjoyed the experience we had with Troy and deckhand Kyle. We kept our lines busy reeling in the fish! Our 6 hr trip felt like 2 hrs. We had so much fun and hated to see it end. Can't wait to do it again and it'll definitely be with Distraction charter and not some group that cargoes a boatload of people.

name: Lachel Johnson
text:
We had an amazing time! Troy and Jacob were awesome! They were friendly, did a great job helping us catch great fish, and provided amazing entertainment. Troy is a fabulous photographer as well!

Lachel Barnett

resp.text: Lachel- thank you so much for taking time to give us some feedback about your fishing trip today.   We enjoyed meeting and serving your family and enjoyed watching ya’ll reel them in.  That mahi mahi was a real treat.  We hope you enjoy eating it.  Can’t wait to see you all again soon.  Troy

name: tiffany walling
text:
Our family had a wonderful time and experience with Captain Troy and Corey. My kiddos (12, 9) thought Captain Troy was funny (we all did actually :)) Captain Troy was very knowledgeable and Corey was very helpful with the kids! When we return to Orange Beach we will definitely call use Captain Troy again!
Drew & Tiffany
Dallas, Texas

resp.text: Tiffany.  Thank you so much for writing this review about our charter company.  You, Drew and the kids were so much fun to have on board.   We enjoyed serving y'all and watching everyone catch those fish.  We hope to see y'all again next year. Thanks. Troy

name: Jacas Shewbart
text: Great experience the captain Troy  is funny and the deck hand dose everything to help you catch fish.

resp.text: Thank you Jacas for taking the time to write this great feedback about your family’s trip.  We enjoyed meeting and serving your family.  Can’t wait to see y’all again.

name: Pam Graves
text: Great family trip!!  Couldn't have asked for better weather or a better time.  Captain Troy and Stephen do a wonderful job from start to finish.  The boat is well kept, extremely clean and perfectly organized to keep the poles in the water.  Fish started biting within the first 30 minutes.  Best bonus were the pictures!!  It allowed me to enjoy my family and the experience without constantly running for the camera (and good thing because the fish were biting non-stop).  Would highly recommend.

name: Ben Brandell
text: This was an amazing experience. As a father, I was hesitant taking my 3.5 year old child with us on a 6 hour trip. After reading other reviews, I took the chance and I am glad I did. The captain and crew were very respectful and created an environment not only safe for my child but fun for all the adults. Their passion for people is evident and refreshing. We caught many species of fish and learned so much more than expected. Thanks for memories and fish for supper!

resp.text: Ben.  Having you and your family on board was a real treat for us.  We are especially happy that you all had a good time and that you took the time to give us some wonderful feedback about your time with us.  I am glad the fish cooperated and gave you such a wide variety of opportunity to catch them.  Fall fishing can be very rewarding -that is why it is our favorite time of the year for offshore fishing.   We hope to see you again soon. Thanks.  Troy

name: Linda Williams
text: Our family had the best Thansgiving experience ever. Captain Troy did everything he said he would and more. He and Zack were very friendly. We each caught a big King Mackerel and had a great day fishing! We enjoyed watching the video later when we came home. I highly recommend Distraction Charters to everyone!

name: Robin Enloe
text: We had a absolute BLAST with Captain Troy and Corey!!!!! We were on fish as soon as the boat stopped. We did limit out and even chased a few sharks. Even if we wouldn't have caught fish, we had so much fun going out with them. We will definitely be booking again as soon as the 2017 schedule is available.

name: Matthew Cortez
text: Outstanding fishing trip! We have been on other "family friendly" trips and this trip was as promised and we caught tons of fish. We will book again and make more memories soon. Thanks Captain Troy and Corey for making me and kids feel welcome and showing us a great time !!

resp.text: Matt,   Thank you for sharing your experience about today's fishing trip.  Corey and I really had a blast watching ya'll reel them in.  I can't wait to serve your family again some day.

name: Jim Webster
text: Outstanding! Capt. Troy and Corey put us on the fish and made sure we had a great day. I highly recommend them for both serious fisherman as well as families and friends looking for a fun fishing trip. These guys know what they're doing - professional, courteous and personable. We will definitely book them again!

name: Luke
text: Great family get away for some good fishing and great memories in gulf shores.

resp.text: Thank you Luke for the great feedback about your family’s trip.  We enjoyed seeing ya’ll catch those fish.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Have fun and be safe this football season!! Troy

name: Lucas Burge
text: Mr. Troy made my sons, nephews, and myself feel like apart of his own family. Better than average service and hospitality. I HIGHLY recommend!!!!

resp.text: Lucas aka Elmo, We are so pleased to hear you all had a good time and enjoyed fishing with us.  Your family was so much fun to be with today.  Those nephews are some good boys and I am glad they caught some nice fish.   Hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: redneckofms
text: Great family man. Troy cracks jokes and does his best to put you on fish. You will not be disappointed with him. My family and I have went with him twice and both times it was a blast.

resp.text: Colton,  thank you for taking time to share your fishing experience with others.  It was really good to see you again and I am really proud of you and the man you have become in just a few short years since joining the US Marine Corps.   It was a real pleasure to be able to share some laughs, stories and memories with you and your family on yesterday's fishing trip.    We look forward to fishing with you again soon.

name: Jade Randolph
text: We took our family out fishing with Captain Troy, and it was one of the best family trips we have been on.
