We have fished for years out of Orange Beach, and we always come back to Distraction Charters. They are family and kid friendly people and very professional with their work. We really enjoyed the video of us reeling in our big catch. The boat is very clean, and all the fish and tackle are wonderful. They were real easy with us and helped us learn new fishing techniques like gigging for amberjack. If you want a wonderful private fishing charter, this is the ONLY way to go!

name: Kirsten Hammock
text: We booked a 6 hour tour for our family - 2 adults, 3 kids (4, 9 and 11).   We could not have had a better time.  Our kids got a little antsy on the way out - "when are we going to be there, when are we going to be there?"  Capt. Troy and Corey talked with them, shared stories, got them involved in the trip and kept them interested.  The fishing was amazing.  Capt. Troy's primary concern during the whole trip was our safety, first, and our fun.  He answered all our questions before the trip and made sure we were all comfortable and having fun throughout the trip.  We will definitely book again next year!

name: Steve Canerossi
text:
My family an I thoroughly enjoyed our 6 hour excursion this morning. Capt Troy & Stephen were wonderful hosts, and ensured our trip was safe and fun, and our fishing was responsible.  The boat, Distraction, was comfortable and well out-fitted.

We departed the dock on time and immediately headed out without stopping to catch live bait and therefore without wasting any of our fishing time thanks to Capt Troy's investment in frozen bait (Spanish Sardines). We kept a limit of Red Snappers, but released quite a few more back into the Gulf; a testament to Capt Troy's bait strategy.

On the run out and back Capt Troy high speed trolled and we picked up a Bonito and a King Mackerel.  Once at the fishing grounds, Capt Troy put us over fish time and again, and when, at one spot, we kept catching undersized Red Snappers, quickly moved us to a better spot.

Stephen, our mate, did a great job of coaching the total novices among us (that would be all of us) in the finer points of Gulf reef fishing and landing all our fish.  He was incredibly patient with our back-lashed reels, our crossed lines, and noob questions (how far out are we?).  :-)  Stephen also was a quick and sure hand cleaning and packaging the fish we decided to keep.

A big plus to the trip is the DVD Capt Troy provides of our entire trip that was filmed from an camera over looking the fishing deck so we can share and relive the memories of this fantastic trip for years to come.

name: Sara Muc
text: This was an amazing trip I had with my family.  Captain Troy was fun and professional.  I have already booked our next trip!  We caught Snapper, AJ, and lucked out with a Tuna.  Family-friendly, safe and enjoyable.  Bring your sunscreen and have a great time.

name: Tom Jerry
text: Great People to go out with, they treat you right. You’ll catch a lot of fish and have a lot of fun.

resp.text: Thank you Tom for taking time to give us some great feedback.   We enjoyed fishing with you and watching you battle that big shark.  Hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: John David McCollum
text: Best fishing trip of my 37 years of fishing. Great for families of any age. Troy and Corey are great people. Will be back.

resp.text: JD thank you so much for taking time to give us some good feedback about your fishing experience with Corey and I.  We enjoyed spending time with and and getting to know your family.  We are glad you you had a great time.  Can’t wait to see you again next season.  Troy

name: Bruce Semisch
text: Two years ago, we were lucky to find Capt Troy and Distraction Charters. Our family has now made fishing with Distraction an annual outing - after three half-day trips. We can't say enough great things about Captain Troy. He makes the trip fun and knows where to find the hot fishing spots so everyone catches fish. His deck hands have also been top notch, providing super-friendly help and expertise. I would recommend Distraction Charters to anyone, there's no better family friendly entertainment anywhere on the Gulf.

name: Ward Gossett
text: Wonderful experience. Boat was clean, Troy and deckhand Jason were personable and helpful. He knew the spots and both provided helpful tips regarding the rods and reels and landing equipment. Caught our limit of red snapper (five in party) in first three hours including a 13-pounder. Might have wished for a more comfortable journey out - swells were up and running pretty good - but that had nothing to do with Troy or his boat. It was a great experience for my family and I look forward to fishing again with Troy. By the way, he is big on catch-and-release, which I like because it's a great way in make sure my grandsons can repeat this trip with their sons and grandsons. On a scale of 1-10, I'd give this trip a 10-plus!

name: Chad Burchfield
text: This if my first Google review and I could not have picked a better experience, or better folks than Capt. Troy and Stephen to write a review about.  If you're looking for a great, family friendly fishing experience, this is it.  As a father of two boys (9 and 10 years old) it was a pleasure spending a few hours with Troy and Stephen.  They treated my boys like young men.  It was great not having to worry about my kids hearing profanity or anything inappropriate while we were fishing.  We had a great experience!  The fishing was great and Distraction Charters is the best!!

name: Alex Kelley
text: Captain Troy Frady and his deck hand Kyle provide the best deep sea fishing experience. This was my first trip and I cant wait to go back. The two of them made me and my husband comfortable. He was welcoming and friendly and made sure we had a good time. Kyle made sure we always had bait, taught us how to cast and cleaned the fish for us afterwords. The boat was clean, there was a private bathroom, snacks if you needed them. Troy takes video of the trip and takes pictures when you catch stuff. It was a great experience and I recommend them highly!

name: Samuel Hoeferkamp
text: Captain Troy and Corey are genuinely nice guys that love to take people fishing. The night before our trip the forecast called for rain, but Troy said we'd try it. He even offered us a discount if we didn't make it the full length of the trip. The weather held off for us, and we were able to catch 7 different species of fish. Now we had fished before, but are in no way the best fisherman; there was no pressure to fill the cooler with fish, no yelling for losing fish, just good vibes, which made for an awesome trip! If you want to have a good time and catch plenty of fish, then choose Captain Troy and Corey.

name: Brad Edwards
text: We are a local Baldwin County family of six, ages 6, 8, 10, and 12 and we had a blast with Troy and Corey.  We went out at the end of tropical storm Barry in 3-4 foot seas and it was a really fun experience.  We hooked into a Atlantic sharpnose shark right off the bat, caught some nice snapper, a trigger, remora and it was just an all around great day.  Troy was spot on keeping us on par in 3 foot seas which couldn't have been easy and Corey was perfect with the kids.  Our daughter Mia got sea sick but it was only for about two hours but thats to be expected in 3 foot seas.  They were very patient, kind, and upfront which was great.  Corey did an awesome job of re-hooking the poles when we started getting hit by sharks so there wasn't much down time which was perfect.  It was nice hitting the amount of spots we did, Troy was absolutely perfect on that.  Not in a hurry, not slow, it was nice having a short break in between so people didn't tire, absolutely perfect trip on what could have been a sea sick day.  Thanks for the great charter.  The Edwards Family

resp.text: Brad, it was so good to be able to meet and serve your family on your fishing trip with us.  TS Barry certainly did disrupt our fishing last week.  We are happy that by the time we were able to get your family out, the seas had backed off to a manageable 3 feet and 6 seconds apart.  We Enjoyed watching your family and children learn how to catch those fish.   We always enjoy seeing their eyes light up when they catch their first fish.   We do appreciate you taking time to give us such great feedback.   We can’t wait to see your family again soon.  Troy

name: Tim Deckard
text: Absolutely highly recommend Troy at Distractions Charters. We had the BEST time. The boys (ranging from ages 5-8) had the most memorable time. They are still talking about it. No need to look any further BOOK NOW! He is the BEST and you will not regret it!

name: Noah Weeks
text: Very conservative and awesome hospitality with the crew and caught some great fish

resp.text: Noah, thank you so much for bringing your family with us.  We enjoyed having you and watching ya’ll catch those fish.   We appreciate you taking time to give us some great feedback.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.

name: David Broome
text: I haven't tried the other charter boats out there, I'm sure there are good ones.  I'll never know, as I will never book with anyone else.  No risk, just great fun and good fishing with a service that cares more about your enjoyment than their bottom line.  Troy called me the morning of to let me know the seas were rough and we may have to take a reduced-rate trip closer to shore.  When the winds died down, we were able to go out anyway.  Caught 5 different species of fish and loved every minute of it.

name: Christy and Greg Rowland
text: Just went fishing with Captain Troy and his mate Corey last week.....what an incredible experience! It was my wife and I with our 4 kids (13, 12, 9, 7) and by the time we were done Corey had my 7 y/o fishing like a pro. I wouldn't recommend any other charter boat, Captain Troy even burned a CD for us with all the pictures he took and the video of us catching them. Awesome time!!!

name: Dustin Ford
text: Took my 3 girls & son in law for a 6 hour trip. The crew was not only professional but also so nice & pleasant to my family. Will definitely be back. Thank you

resp.text: Dustin.   Thanks for the feedback about us.  Corey and I really enjoyed meeting and taking your family fishing today.  Hope to see y'all again someday.  Troy

name: Alex LaGrone
text: Great experience, very family friendly , they will hook you up with some fish, would definitely recommend and we plan on going back again

resp.text: Thank you Alex for taking time to give us some great feedback about your fishing trip.  We enjoyed watching you land that big red snapper. That was a sight to see.  Can’t wait to see y’all again soon.  Troy

name: Pepper Dowdy
text: This was my very first experience saltwater fishing, and I really appreciated Capt. Troy and his deckhand Steven's hard work to provide exactly what kind of experience his guests were looking for (and we were treated as guests, not just customers). Very professional but also fun and laid back, safety first at all times, (a big plus putting me and the other first timers at ease), family friendly, patient with the first timers but extraordinarily capable for keeping up with the experienced game fisher of the group. These guys work their butts off to make sure you're happy and have fun, the most important part!

resp.text: Thank you Pepper for your kind words and the opportunity to serve your family.  We really appreciate your feedback and look forward to serving you again soon.   Troy

name: Timothy Surratt
text: Highly recommend! They were very curtious and professional! We had no idea what kind of fishing we wanted to do, so they took us trolling and bottom fishing. Best fishing experience we have ever had. Perfect for family outing!! Also the boat was very clean!! We will use them again in the future!

resp.text: Tim. Thanks for sharing your feedback about our company.  We really enjoyed fishing with y'all and those combination trolling and bottom fishing trips are one of our favorites.  Glad you enjoyed your trip. Hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Mirenda and Paul VanSweden
text: This was the best ocean fishing experience that we have ever had!! Captain Troy and the First Mate J.T. were beyond excellent!! They were attentive to our children, both young and old! I really cannot say enough good things about Distraction Charters! There are so many good things to say, and not one bad. The welcoming that Troy and J.T. gave to us made us feel like family! It was truly one of the best experiences!! And we made memories that will last forever, AND as if that was not enough came home with some delicious fish, too! It was the most favorite thing of all the children in our two families that were vacationing together!!! We look forward to planning another adventure next year with Captain Troy and his crew!

resp.text: Mirenda, Paul.  Thank you so much for writing this wonderful review about your experience with us.  Family’s like yours is the reason we love fishing with kids and adults so much.   Thank you for allowing us to serve you.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Bethany Hicks
text: My family and I had a wonderful experience with Captain Troy and JT.  They went out of their way to make sure we were safe, had a good time and caught fish.  I can't wait to book another trip!

resp.text: Thank you Bethany for taking time to share this review of our charter company.   Fishing with your family was so much fun.  If not mistaken, I believe your husband Josh is my brother from my other mother.   Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.  Troy

name: justin whitten
text: Best guide ever! Had so much fun, caught a 8 foot bull shark with this guy and plenty of supper. Highly recommend him.

resp.text: Thanks Justin.  It was a real pleasure watching you fight that monster size shark.  You handled that 300 pounder like it was nothing.  I am so glad we got it to the top and was able to see it, photograph it and then release it.   Thank you for writing this fine review.  We hope to see you again next year.   Troy

name: izzy S
text: Very professional people with a very clean boat. Had a lot of fun and caught a lot of fish. The crew had an abundance of fish knowledge. I highly would recommend!:)))

resp.text: Thanks Izzi.  We really appreciate you taking time to write some feedback about us.  Corey and I really enjoyed fishing with you and your family.   We hope to see you again soon.   Troy

name: Louie Wright
text: This trip was a trip of a lifetime!!!!  Captain Troy was absoultley the best!!  They were the greatest with my daughter and her friend.  They truly love taking kids fishing!!!  And not to mention we did catch some BIG FISH!!!   Truly a trip of a lifetime for my family and I.  We would definitely recommend Distraction Charters and Captain Troy to anyone who wants a fishing trip of a LIFETIME!!!   THE WRIGHT FAMILY

name: Eric Anderson
text: If we could add a 5+ it would be here but, There is nothing else to say... other than memories to last a lifetime for my boys and I. Captain Troy and TJ made this trip feel like we were fishing with lifelong friends. Great boat, top of the line gear, and action packed fishing put the biggest smiles on my boys faces I have ever seen. With this being our first trip ocean, we are already planning our return trip to Distraction Charters!

resp.text: Thank you Eric.  It was a pleasure serving you all today.

name: Amanda Gilchrist
text: This was a great trip! I went with several of my family members, including my 5 year old daughter. We all caught some great fish and had an absolute blast! Captain Troy and deckhand Corey were extremely nice, funny, and professional.

name: Mike Conley
text: This was my first deep sea fishing trip! Captain Troy made this an unforgettable trip. I enjoyed it a lot

resp.text: We really enjoyed having ya’ll in board.   Mike and the boys were a real delight to fish with.  Thanks for allowing us to serve  you.   That big cobia was a real treat for all of us to see.  Hope to someday get you back down to Alabama so we can do this more often.  Troy.

name: Christy Guthrie
text:
Just finished our half day fishing trip. So much fun and such a pleasant, family friendly charter! We chose Distraction because we wanted a clean, G rated experience for our family. Troy and Corey were informative and genuinely seemed to care about our experience. We also caught lots of fish! Mackerel,  Snapper, Triggerfish and a big Bonita. Woot!
I would highly recommend Distraction. 💙

resp.text: Thank you Christy for giving us some great feedback about this mornings fishing trip.  Corey and I really enjoyed serving your family.   Watching ya’ll catch those fish was a real delight.  Seeing the magic in everyone’s eyes when a new species was landed made us smile.   We hope to see you again soon.  Thanks. Troy

name: Taylor Harper
text: Captain Troy could not have provided my crew with a better experience. He was informative, personable and most importantly gave us a fun time catching fish non-stop! Would not recommend anyone else.

name: John Gula
text: Picking a Charter to use on vacation can prove to be difficult and even overwhelming. Once seeing the Boat and meeting Troy and Stephen we felt like we were on our way to a great experience. Everything Distraction offers came to reality. The Boat Clean, the fishing experience excellent just as advertised. Troy and Stephen cold not have been more fun while fishing proved to be outstanding, Our group will return and again seek Captain Troy and Stephen for yet another great fishing experience. Thanks to both for making my Vacation with my family a huge and complete success!

name: Ashley Henry
text:
This was our first family fishing trip, really expected something totally different. I suppose i expected to have a real gruff, matter-of-the-fact type of captain. I was completely wrong...... Captain Troy is such a fun man to be around, it is truly a family friendly trip!!!!! Our children are a son 10, a son 13, and a daughter 17 and it is hard to find something everyone enjoys doing together, well we found it with Distraction Charters!!! Captain Troy spent time with each of our children and made sure everyone had a very memorable first trip. It almost feels as if Captain Troy is family the way he treats everyone. This will now be a yearly trip for us!!! I don't even like to fish but I truly
enjoyed this trip and cant wait until next time!! My daughter - a senior in high school - has even suggested taking a group of her friends for part of their senior trip this year!!!!

name: Tanna Brown
text: Had a Great time! It was a wonderful family environment, and we caught lots of fish! Recomend them for anyone looking to have a fun filled deep sea fishing experience! 😁

resp.text: Tanna.  Thanks for taking time to share your experience about your fishing trip.  We enjoyed watching you catch those fish today and was especially impressed with that giant triggerfish.  We hope to see you and Dustin again next year.  Troy

name: Nancy Smith
text: My family of 4 and 2 friends went for a 6 hr trip with Captain Troy and Cory. It is a family friendly outfit and did very well with my 12 year olds. Professional all around and we caught fish!  Thanks Captian Troy. We will look you up the next time we are in town. Nancy Smith.

resp.text: Nancy, thank you so much for taking time to share some feedback about your family’s fishing trip with us.  Ya’ll were so much fun to be with.   Watching your family catch one fish after another was very satisfying for us.  We look forward to one day being able to serve your family again.  Hope you enjoyed those fish for dinner.  Troy

name: Mindy Phillips
text:
This was the 3rd time we have used Distraction Charters over the last 10 years, Troy and his crew are always knowlegeable and friendly. They have put us on fish every-time, and make sure we are enjoying ourselves.
He has a special way of interacting with the entire family and getting every one smiling. We will definitely use them again, and again. Thanks Troy and Corey

resp.text: Mindy.  Thank you for taking time to write and share your experience about fishing with us.  We really appreciate y'all trusting us tall serve you over the past decade.  Thanks for being part of our fishing family and look forward to many more years of friendship and good fishing.  Thanks. Capt Troy

name: Aaron Efird
text:
This was a First Class Trip!  There were 3 things that made this trip unbelievable, Captain Troy, Deckhand Corey, and the FISHING!!  As a business owner I can appreciate excellent customer service and catering to the paying customer and the crew of Distraction do just that.  I was on board with my wife, 3 daughters and an adopted daughter (friend of the eldest).  Parents, at no time did we ever worry about inappropriate situations or salty language.  These men were respectful and treated the ladies in a manner befitting southern gentlemen.  Captain Troy is a character and always ready for conversation! He is knowledgeable about fishery habitat and how to put a successful trip together.  There are many "value added services" that make the trip memorable.
Corey, the deckhand, is one of the best deckhands I have had the privilege of witnessing.  He was quick to assist without being over the top of you, and handled all of the minor inconveniences (i.e. Line tangles, break offs, etc) with grace and ease.  He was quick to get the hooks back in the water.  Corey was always busy working on the boat when we weren't dropping hooks.  The boat was immaculately clean.  Finally, the fishing was great.  Captain Troy focuses on quality, and that is what we got.  We went on June 1st, the first day of Red Snapper season.  The bite didn't disappoint.  We caught several fish over 24" and a whopper that went 35".  Everyone caught fish, everyone laughed, everyone had a great time.  We are in Orange Beach a couple times a year and this is the top experience we have ever had.  Captain Troy, and the Distraction are in my phone and will be the only charter we use from now on!

resp.text: Aaron,   Wow.  Your review has me speechless and in awe.   Your words are incredibly moving.   Corey and I consider ourselves as humble servants and just really want to please our guests (and friends), and never think of what we do, is noticed as much as you shared.   It is families like yours that makes our job, the best in the world.  Watching you interact with your wife and daughters and their friend was what all fathers should strive for.  You are a great father and that shows the way you interact with your girls.   Thank you so much for your kind words.  We really appreciate you taking time and putting so much thought and effort into this review.

name: Dan Tidwell
text: Have been on plenty of charter fishing boats over the years but the Distraction is tops! Captain Troy caters to families, stresses safety first, runs a very clean vessel, and put us on the fish. Stephen, our deck hand was very attentive, and made sure our youngsters were given special service. It was a trip that none on board will ever forget.

name: Todd Lester
text:
This was our families second trip with Cap'n Troy and Corey.  We wish we could go every month.  They served us up another exciting excursion that was well worth repeating.  Troy put us on the fish, and we even had time to hook, fight, and "land" a monster Bull shark!  That was a first for us!  The fight was intense, but now that I've recovered from the muscle ache, I'm ready to do it again!

We would not hesitate to use Distraction Charters again!  Captain Troy is very knowledgeable, and dedicated to educating his passengers when asked to.  We've learned something on both of our trips.

If you are looking for good, clean, family oriented fishing, the Distraction is for you!

resp.text: Hey Todd.   Thanks for taking time to share your feedback about using our services.   Seeing your family again and watching your family reel in those fish was a real treat for Corey and I.   We really we’re impressed at how you made fighting a 300 lb bull shark, look easy.   Glad you made it home safely and look forward to seeing you again soon.   Troy

name: Brad Jones
text: If your looking for some non stop fishing  action, Distraction Charters should be your choice. Troy and Cory are super nice guys. They put us on the type fish we wanted. 20-25lb snapper, 250lb 7' shark , Maui Maui , Triggerfish. Thanks Troy and Cory hope to do it again soon.

resp.text: Brad,   Thank you for sharing your feedback about your trip with us.  It sure was fun fishing with ya'll and I was especially happy that the fish bit well.   Hope you have a wonderful summer.

name: Brandy McCollum
text: Had a great family fishing day with troy and Cory today.  Will be back...very fun trip...thanks so much!!!

resp.text: Thank you Brandy for allowing us to serve your family today. We appreciate you taking time to give us such positive feedback about your and JD’s fishing trip with us.  We enjoyed fishing with you and glad you had fun.   Looking forward to seeing you again.  Troy

name: Ross Sloan
text: Our family had an outstanding trip!  You can tell Captain Troy and First Mate Corey really love what they do.  This charter has set the standard for   family friendly.

resp.text: Ross,   Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience with others.  It was a real pleasure to serve you and your family.  We look forward to serving you again someday soon.  Capt Troy

name: Scott Gruen
text: Our trip aboard the Distraction was fantastic and I highly recommend Troy and his crew.  They were great with the kids and made sure they were able to hook and land fish.  Troy also took all the pictures and sent us home with a disc of pictures and videos.  All we needed to worry about fishing.  Additionally, Troy's practices of fishing conservation are a great learning experience for the kids and teaches them responsible fun fishing.  We came home with enough fish to feed 14 people 2 meals and we didn't even keep all the fish we caught.

name: Bennie Day
text: Captain Troy Frady and deckhand Corie provided an awesome experience for us twice this weekend.  Incredibly knowledgeable, super friendly, able to work well at all skill levels, and absolutely put us on the fish! Limit Red Snapper each day, we will definitely use them for our future outings.

name: Jake Richards
text: Great people, great trip, big fish. Courteous of whether, got us out a day earlier than scheduled. Very respectful and kind staff.

resp.text: Jake.  Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience with others.  It was So nice to be able to spend a day fishing with you and your family, and making some great memories.   Hope to see you again soon!  Troy

name: David Dean
text: So friendly,  helpful and knowledgeable. We caught everything we were going for including a nice sized bull shark. Highly recommend!

resp.text: David,   Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to write this great review.  We really enjoyed serving you on today's fishing trip.   Watching ya'll reel in those fish while smiling the whole time,  is what I enjoy most about my job.  It's people like you that makes my job the best in the world.  Hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Jeremy Mize
text: Great group of guys to fish with Troy and Corey took great care of the 5 of us we caught plenty of fish had an awesome experience. Really good people to fish with family or group of friends

resp.text: Jeremy.  Thanks for taking time to give us some feedback about your fishing trip today.  You guys were awesome to fish with.   We can't wait till we meet again.  Troy

name: Jeffery Lloyd
text:
Our family have vacationed in gulf Shores/Orange Beach for years and never had gone fishing in the gulf. My two sons, nephew, brother-in-law and his son-in-law decided this was the year. We did some research looking for a charter boat to take us out fishing before deciding on Distraction. I was very pleased with our choice.

We were warmly met on the dock by Captain Troy, his college age son and a very helpful deck hand. Troy showed us the boat (very spacious and clean) before explaining his safety procedures.

After an enjoyable ride out to the reef, with amazing views of the coast, we commenced to fish. Our group consisted of rookie-knowledgable fishermen, so Stephen, the deck hand, showed everyone how the custom fishing gear worked (very nice - well cared for equipment).

My bait wasn't in the water before one of our party shouted out "I have one" which turned out to be a large 12+ pound Red Snapper - one of many.

During our trip, Captain Troy took pictures of each one of us holding up our "trophies" as well as group photos. While I chatted with him on the way back to the dock, he burned a CD of the pictures as well as a DVD of our entire fishing experience - so great to show those who didn't go on the trip.

I whole-heartedly recommend Distraction to anyone looking for a memorable family fishing trip. Distraction Charters will not disappoint - they truly care that you have a safe, comfortable, and memorable time with your friends and family.

name: Alli Alley
text: Could Not have been better! Very Nice and Kyle was so helpful... Troy cares about his customers and it shows! I had never been Deep Sea Fishing before but I cant wait to schedule my next trip!!! It was a great experience, Thank you!

name: Leslie Brown
text: Had a great time caught plenty of fish. Crew was friendly and professional and equipment was good. Highly recommend them for a great family friendly experience.

resp.text: Hey Leslie.  Thanks for bringing your family fishing with us today.  We appreciate you taking time to share your review about our company.   We hope to see you again next season.  Troy

name: Kathy Aldridge
text: Captain Troy and JT were entertaining and knowledgeable. Caught our Trigger fish limit☺☺. Very family oriented, lots of good clean fun, everyone had a great time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for bringing your family with us fishing today.  We really enjoyed meeting and serving you.  I am especially happy that you all caught some nice fish.  We hope you enjoy the triggerfish.  We hope to see you again soon.  Thanks for taking time to share your experience.  Capt Troy

name: Sarah Esther Merry
text: Great time! Family friendly and a fun environment!  catch and release was also a plus as well as free photos!

resp.text: Thank you Sarah Esther for taking time to give Corey and I some feedback about our fishing charter.  We enjoyed meeting you and your family and the conversation.  Ya’ll were so much fun to fish with today.  Hope to see you again next year.   Good luck in school. Troy

name: Missy Harbert
text: We had a great time!  Very family friendly which was really appreciated because we had a four year old with us.  The pictures taken by captain were a nice surprise.

name: Mike Kurschner
text:
Leading up to our trip the weather was looking pretty nasty, 60-80% rain and thunderstorms. Capt. Troy communicated well in advance of our trip time the status of our charter. He had a cancellation earlier in the day due to 3ft+ swells in the AM (that had since subsided) and asked if we would be willing to move our trip up as there was a break in the weather. He explained he would be able to navigate around most of the inclement weather. When we arrived, we were greeted by his deck hand Corey. He was very courteous and attentive. Capt. Troy came aboard and gave a warm welcome. He's a character, very personable and knowledgeable of the industry. He gave very clear expectations and made known his top priority was our safety and that we enjoy ourselves. Fast-forward a bit, the weather ended up being beautiful and we must have caught 10-15 fish per person. Virtually every fishing spot yielded bountiful fishing! The air conditioned cabin and restroom was very clean, comfortable; plenty of room. Corey was an amazing help. He was ready to help bait hooks, take fish off the hook, help reel in big ones and if a line broke, he made sure there was always a 'fishing ready' pole at all times. When we stopped to fish, the time was maximized with no at-fault downtime of the staff. If a pole wasn't in the water, it was because we needed a break from the abundant and lively fishing.

Overall, this was the best charter experience I've had in my life. When planning a chartered fishing trip and you're sifting through the options, please consider Distraction Charters. They are the "Original Family Friendly Charter". They provide a very clean and fun atmosphere; and you will catch fish.

Great job Capt. Troy & Corey... We will be back!

name: T Brownlee
text:
Second time booking with Distraction Charters for a morning 6 hr. trip.  We couldn't have asked for a better experience (again).  Capt. Troy is funny and family focused and we had a blast!  Capt. genuinely wants the family to enjoy the experience.  Great perk that he takes good quality pictures and hands you a cd at the end of the trip full of all the pictures.
We will only use Distraction Charters!  My only complaint would be that our time out went by way too fast!

resp.text: Hey Tammy,  I really appreciate you taking time to write this review of your experience with our company.  It is so good to see ya'll again and look forward to seeing you reel in some more fish on your next outing.  Take Care.  Troy

name: Eric Rohren
text: I've been charter fishing many times, but this was the first trip for my 9 year old son and his grandpa. I had read great things about Capt Troy and Steven, so booked a trip with them. Wow, what a day! This was the PERFECT family fishing trip!!! Not only did Troy put us on the fish (lots of fish!), but he has such a great way with kids. We came home with tons of memories, and beautiful pictures to show family and friends. On the ride out and back, my son sat up top with Troy, learning about boating, fishing, and the Gulf. My kids and I will remember this trip forever!

name: Reynolds Cook
text:
Fished on the Distraction recently.Had an excellent time and caught a lot
of fish.  Capt. Troy and deckhand Stephen were top notch.  Hope to go
w/ them next year!

name: William Thetford
text: Great trip with friendly and experienced captain and 1st mate.  They knew what they were doing and it showed with a very pleasurable afternoon.  Would gladly do that again.

name: Keith Hanson
text: Great 4 hour trolling trip with Troy and Corey. Very professional and yet a lot of fun and very friendly.  Caught several large mackerel and a lot of fish overall.  Cant wait to go again.

name: Melissa Brown
text: Super fun day catching fish with my family.  A five star fishing experience!  We will be back yet again!!!  Love Captain Troy and his crew!!!

name: Jenny Clark
text: We booked Distraction Charters based solely from the family/kid friendly promise of the website.  My son is missing his left hand and we were very picky because some places aren't very accommodating.  We were very happy with our choice and will never think twice about who to book with!  From the moment Troy met us until we disembarked (and actually even after because we stopped him for a group picture while we were eating lunch later), we were treated with great respect and sincere care that we have a great fishing trip.  That's exactly what we had!  Troy and Steven (deckhand) were excellent with our kids and very entertaining.  The kids rode up top with Troy and listened to him tell stories and they are still re-telling his stories a week after we've been home.  Steven couldn't have been better at helping us with all of our fishing needs.  He was very gentle and kind with the kids and never got short or aggravated at them.  Another plus was that the boat was very clean and well kept, even the restroom!  My absolute favorite thing was that Troy took great quality pictures of everyone and captured some really awesome moments, while I continued to fish and didn't have to stop and grab my camera every time one of the kids caught something.  I don't mean pictures with a dinky camera…I'm talking really good Nikon camera with a great lens.  We all caught a lot of fish, we couldn't even keep count! My youngest caught a 13lb. red snapper!  On our return ride home, my oldest son (14) rode up top with Troy and slept on the bench beside him.  I loved that Troy even captured that on camera!  He showed me the slideshow of the pics on the trip back and as soon as we docked he had the photos ready to go on a disc for me!  Also he gave us a video of the whole fishing trip!  I had the time of my life on this trip!  We got to see more than a few dolphins right at the back of the boat.  It was awesome!  We will definitely go back with Troy and Steven.  We've been on other fishing trips and nothing even compares to the quality service and one on one time these guys gave us!  We were very blessed by these two men!

name: Brad Burton
text:
Captain Troy is the best.He will entertain you on the trip out and then he puts you on the fish!
A family friendly environment and Steven, the deck hand was excellent with my 8 year old.Thanks for the good time guys,see you next year!

name: Jeff Clark
text: My name is Jeff Clark with Lifetime Outdoors, I booked two trips with Distraction Charters for my wife, two teenage girls, and myself. We went on the 4 hour trolling trip the first day and had an absolute blast. We caught numerous king mackerel, and bonito fish. Captain Troy and Deckhand Jacob were professionals at their job, but more importantly they were good to my family. After being on the boat 30 minutes or so they were like family members to us. Captain Troy Knew exactly where to go, and Jacob took care of our every need. The second trip a few days later was the offshore trip, I am sad to say this trip had to be canceled due to weather. The morning of this trip a severe storm rolled into the gulf and created conditions that were at times hazardous. Captain Troy pulled me aside as we were headed out into the Gulf and expressed his concerns about the weather. After looking at the weather radar we decided to cancel the trip, Captain Troy earned my respect because he put my family's safety and happiness ahead of his checkbook. Troy only charged me for the fuel we used and did not require that I tip the deck hand, but I did anyway cause Jacob is awesome. Troy doesn't take deposits so there was no waiting 10 days for a refund or anything like that. I will recommend Distraction Charters to everyone I know and we plan to promote them on our Lifetime Outdoors website. Troy believes in the same things we believe in, and is a good Christian family man. He videos and takes numerous pictures of all the action on your trip, so you can relax and enjoy time with your family. I will definitely come back to Gulf Shores/Orange Beach and take the 6 hour offshore trip next June with Distraction Charters. If you are interested in bringing your family(especially Kids) on a fishing trip to the gulf of Mexico, Distraction Charters is the only way to go in my opinion. Thank you Troy and Jacob you guys are the best.

name: Matthew Taliancich (Moocow9m)
text: Had some fun fishing! The captain was a nice guy with a great attitude.

resp.text: Thank you Matt for sharing your feedback about your fishing charter.   We do appreciate you taking time to do so.  We enjoyed serving you and your family /friends and hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Brian Fowler
text: A tremendous charter.  First class.  A friend and I took our boys--two 8-year olds, one 7-year old, and a 10-year old and Captain Troy and his Deckhand Jacob were fantastic with the kiddos and put us on fish despite relatively poor conditions.  Troy was exceptional with the kids, telling jokes, engaging each one of them, and kept the experience clean/G-rated.  Troy is all about safety and patience.  Also impressive was Troy's commitment to capturing priceless photos--he doubled as a photographer and Captain (and storyteller).  Well into the trip, we started to encounter some fronts at nearly every turn and Troy didn't try to outmaneuver the weather conditions but rather encouraged us to be smart about not taking risks...which we Dads appreciated.  Troy also was extremely fair in adjusting his rate accordingly as the conditions shortened the trip somewhat.  Despite the boys' lines catching on the prop several times over (wind had kicked up and holding the boat over the fish was challenging, leading to some prop line tie-ups), Jacob promptly re-rigged, never showed frustration, and kept a gentleness about him that we all appreciated.  Same goes with Captain Troy.  Troy was focused on photos, putting the boat on the fish, and ensuring everyone was having a good time.  Would use Captain Troy Distraction Charters again.  Put us on red snapper, triggerfish, king, and white snapper.  Houston, TX

name: Brandon Edwards
text: Troy took good care to make it an awesome experience for me and my family. We had a good time, good catch, and spent some good time with this crew. Would highly recommend!

name: Wayne Denson
text: Exceeded expectations in every way!  Troy and Corey ensured everyone in my family of novice fishermen enjoyed themselves and had everything necessary for an amazing time catching fish.  Choose no other!

name: Jimmy Atkins
text: Capt troy and Corey awesome people.  We got there early and was waiting outside the store and not knowing at first that our group was there next family to go they were super nice and cutting up with the kids. Really made my daughter super comfortable.  My 6 year old daughter or 8 year old niece have never been and I was super worried bout how the trip would end up but when I say that we had the most amazing time and how Capt troy and Corey treated the girls it was heart warming.  There already wanting to go again.     They put us on fish as soon as we started fishing till it was time to head back.  They definitely are in a class of there own. Not only are they kid friendly but extremely safe and they make sure from the time we entered the boat till we got off safety was always first.  I can not say enough for these 2. If u are worried one bit bout go fishing with the babies leave ur worries at the beach and let these guys show u an amazing time.  Thank you again capt and Corey.   Lily and Hayden are so excited for the next trip out with yall. Yall def gave us an amazing experience thank you

resp.text: Jimmy - that is the most heart warming review I have read in a long time. We do appreciate it very much.  Meeting and serving your family was a real pleasure for us.   Watching Hayden and Lily interact with ya’ll while fishing is why we became so specialized in family fishing.    We love to see the magic in a child’s eyes when they catch their first fish or their hundredth fish.   It is especially pleasing to have incredible parents like you and Ernie who make sure their kids get all they can out of the trip.  We are forever grateful that you chose us and allowed us to serve your family.  Can’t wait to see ya’ll again.

name: Jay Thomas
text:
Capt Troy and Corey were great!! We enjoyed every minute of our trip! We caught lots of fish, heard some great stories, and learned some things too! If you are looking for a fun family fishing trip this is the one to choose!! Try the HeiferDust seasoning as well - it is fantastic!!
Jay Thomas, Tuscaloosa,AL

name: Jeromy B
text:
Stop clicking.  If you're searching the internet for a charter company, this is your stop.  Troy made this trip memorable and exciting.  The bait, gear and air-conditioned boat were completely ready to go with new CAT diesels, we were off and fishing in minutes.  We did the 6 hour trip and will do it again.  Great for families with young children and for salty fishermen that are looking for that one that got away.  Don't hesitate to book with Distraction.  Also, the Heifer Dust seasoning that Troy makes is great on Amberjack and Snapper.

Update one year later and another trip with Troy. Great fishing with friends on the boat. Corey and Troy make a great team to keep your hook in the water. I won't charter anywhere else on the gulf coast. We have a great time with my family and friends every time we board at distraction charters.

Update three years later: Troy continues to take care of our family for fishing trips. Up and running full speed following hurricane Sally, we had a great trip and will be back! The gear, service and boat are always clean and ready for fishing.

resp.text: Jeromy, We really appreciate your business and taking time to write this wonderful review about our company.  Getting to know your family and friends over the past years has been very rewarding for us, because you make us feel like part of your group.   The friendship, laughter and the fishing is always a highlight of every trip with y'all. Thanks for sharing the "grilled red snapper, mango chutney over coconut rice recipe".  We shared  those pics and recipe with our FB friends so they too can enjoy.  We hope to see you again soon my friend.  Troy

name: Jason Vines
text:
Repeat customer- never disappointed! This is the 2nd time we’ve gone out with Troy & his team. The boat is very well maintained, and they are professional & fun. We had made arrangements to go out with a different boat & crew. After a terrible experience we aborted that plan & my wife says “We need to text Troy and just see if he’s available.” Thankfully he was.

I had a wonderful time with my father-in-law and my future son-in-law. Troy & JT were fantastic, informative & we really enjoyed our catch & release competition. Let me assure you that you may be able to find a cheaper option out there, but you won’t find a better one. Distraction Charters won’t disappoint and is worth every dime!

I look forward to coming back for inshore fishing and eventually bring my grandsons when they’re older. Thanks Troy & JT for great fishing, laughs & fun!

resp.text: Jason.  Thank you so much for giving us some detailed feedback about your fishing trip and experience with us.   We are so glad we had a time slot yesterday afternoon available.  We enjoyed seeing ya’ll again to be able to spend some quality time with you.    We are always here to serve you and to make your trip a good one.  Hope to see you again soon my friend.   Troy

name: L R
text: Troy the captain and Jacob are hands-down the most wholesome individuals I've ever met (not to mention amazing fishing guides)! As land dwellers and lake fishers, my family and I don't experience the ocean often or catch lots of fish. Troy is a magic man when it comes to locating the best deep sea fishing spots and Jacob was the fastest I've ever seen helping my family and I catch and release the fish and bait our lines. All we had to do was drop a line in and BAM a fish comes out - every single time. It is NEVER that easy! But Troy and Jacob made it possible.  Troy was kind enough to even let me drive the boat for a while! Most importantly, they were very accommodating when I got sea sick. Overall 10/10 - would fish with them again or just hang out with them when we find ourselves back in AL.

resp.text: I really appreciate you taking so much time to give Jacob and I such wonderful feedback about your fishing trip with us.  We can’t wait to see you again soon!   Troy

name: Carol Ball
text:
Great family experience:

Want a truly memorable family outing?  Try a charter fishing trip with Distraction Charters.  Captain Troy & First mate Corey bent over backward to make our family fishing outing one to remember.  Caught about 25 #of fish, watched two porpuses playing near by and enjoyed many hours of family fun.  Corey even cleaned and filet'd our catch.  Hope to come back next year.

Grampa

resp.text: Thank you Mr John for your comments about your fishing trip with your family.  We really enjoyed meeting your family and being able to share some laughter while everyone was reeling in fish.   We can’t wait to see you again!   Troy

name: Michael Williams
text: This was our second trip with Troy and Cory.  Highly recommend them if you are looking for a professional family oriented fishing charter.

resp.text: Thank you Michael for taking time to give us some feedback about your experience with our company.  We look forward to a third trip next year.  Troy

name: Chris Evans
text: Booked a trip with captain troy and on the day of our trip we awoke to thunderstorms. We decided to postpone to later in the day. Capt. Troy called backed and we decided to try at noon. We all met at the boat. After waiting for the last forecast the waves were getting worse not calmer like the original forecast. Capt. Troy decided to cancel the trip saying it would not be an enjoyable trip in this weather. He took us for a short ride and showed us how rough the ocean was. Very grateful for Capt. Troy putting our enjoyment and safety over his pocketbook. Thank you also goes out to Corey who helped on deck having his ear talked off by the kids. Will definitely try again when we make it back to this area.

name: Zach Dodd
text: This was the first time most of my family had been deep sea fishing before and it was an absolute blast! Troy and Stephen are great teachers. I literally caught a Red Snapper on my first "cast" and all 5 of us had a fish within just a couple minutes of having our bait in the water. You can tell that Troy and Stephen both love sharing their knowledge and experience with families and people new to fishing in the Gulf. The fishing was great, Troy and Stephen were fun and knowledgeable and they provided us with a video and over 100 great pictures at no additional cost. The great thing about the pictures is that everyone in your group can focus on having fun and catching fish instead of trying to capture pictures. A surprise bonus for us were the dolphins feeding literally just a few feet away during part of our trip! We all agreed that this was the highlight of our vacation and we will definitely be returning to Distraction Charters. If I could rate this a 10 out of 5 I would, it was that much fun!

name: Adam Downs
text: Distraction Charter is a top notch family fishing trip. Captain Troy and deckhand Corey made our trip absolutely great. I would recommend them to anyone.

name: John Hall
text:
2016 - This is the second time I have gone out with Troy.  He continues to get you on the fish.  We tagged out on Red Snapper halfway through the trip.  Spent the rest of the trip catching and releasing until our arms fell off.  We took home 20lbs of fillets and cant wait to try some snapper when we get home.
2014 - One of the best fishing trips I have ever been on.  Troy and Stephen were all about keeping you on the fish.  Troy would get you on a spot and with in 5 seconds of bait hitting the water we were reeling in fish, and Stephen was there ready to get the fish off the hook and you back to catching fish.  Another thing that Troy does is use light tackle.  This provided extra excitement when you hit a big shark and are in a fight of a life time.  I would go out again with Troy and Stephen to have another great fishing experience.

name: Kennon Halley
text: Best fishing and super fun environment!! Definitely recommend Troy-Etta!! 👍👍

resp.text: Thank you Kennon for taking time to give us the thumbs up about your fishing trip today.  I was just kidding about naming that baby after me. Lol.  Can’t wait to see you again. Good luck in vet school. Troy

name: Jamie Johns
text: Captain Troy was so great with my boys, I will never use another charter again. Loved, loved it.

resp.text: Jamie.  Thank you for taking time to share your feedback with others about us.  We appreciate it so much.  Hope to see y'all again soon.  Troy

name: Chuck Pope
text:
Captain Troy and Corey are great to fish with.
That's what keeps us coming back. We kept enough to eat for supper and let a bunch go including a huge bull shark.

resp.text: Chuck.  Thank you for allowing us to serve your family again today.  It's always a pleasure to be with you  and share those fishing moments and some good conversations.   It was a pleasure to meet your brother Al and the girls.  That bull shark was a monster for sure and even had Corey and I saying (wow).   Hope you enjoy those young mackerel.  They sure are tasty.  We look forward to seeing you again soon my friend.  Thanks. Troy.

name: George Hill
text: Great trip! Couldn't have asked for better service. Best deep sea fishing of my life.

name: Chris Wiesinger
text:
It was a great atmosphere from the moment all 6 of us brothers and brothers-in-law walked up with our dad (father-in-law).  Captain Troy and the deck hand Stephen were HAPPY to have us, answer all of our silly questions, and PUT US ON FISH.  Well, answered almost all of our questions. He wouldn't tell us the GPS coordinates of his spot that had the fish with "big shoulders."  That's where I caught my 15 lbs red snapper.

Seriously, I've been on deep sea fishing charters where they bait your hooks, hold your fish for the pictures, and make you refer to them as captain...that was NOT this trip.  We were a part of a family friendly team and everyone was having a good time.  Enjoyed the video and pictures Cpt. Troy took as well.

name: Sabrina Michalak
text:
Had such a great time fishing with Distraction charters. Troy and Corey were great guides. Made me feel like I was fishing with family. Both were great to talk to and very insightful on fishing. Very helpful as well. If I or another person of my party had a question they always had the answer. Boat was super clean. The cabin was airconditioned, which is a must on those summer fishing trips.
Picture taken by Troy turned out amazing. Next fishing trip is going to be hard to beat because they certainly set the bar.
-sabrina michalak

resp.text: Sabrina.  We really appreciate you taking time from your vacation to share your wonderful experience with others.   Your family was so much fun to interact with and get to know.  We really love watching ya’ll catch so many different varieties of fish.   Red snapper, triggerfish, vermilion snapper, mangrove snapper, kingfish and bonito topped the list today.   We hope to see you again some day soon.  Troy

name: Haiden Landry
text: This was my first trip with Captain Troy and it was awesome he put usbon some HUGE fish. He is very friendly and very family friendly. We caught lots of fish and I wasn't lieing when I said they were huge. If you are ever in the area check him out.

resp.text: Haiden- Thank you for taking time to share this review.  It was especially nice to meet you and your family and to be able to serve you today.   I enjoyed watching you catch those red snapper and triggerfish.  Corey and I hope to take you fishing again someday.

name: Kaitlyn Lanier
text:
Distraction Charters fishing was awesome with Troy and helper Cory! My family and I went last week and it was a blast. The weather was perfect and the fishing was good. We caught king mackeral, amber jack, grouper, tons of red snapper, and some bonita. Cory was helpful with giving us information about catching the fish and Troy was a great captain. He took pictures and even videoed the entire experience and gives you both so you can capture the memories forever. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a fun family experience that will bring laughter and good family memories on a trip.

We did the six hour trip and we even got to see lots of dolphins. They came close to the boat hoping to get the fish we put back in the ocean. This was my second time with Troy and Distraction Charters and I will keep coming back and recommending him to people. It is definitely worth it!

name: Cole Disney
text: Troy and Cory were great, very accommodating for anyone from lifelong fishermen to kids with no experience

resp.text: Thank you Cole for taking time to share this review about us.  We enjoyed meeting you and serving your family.   I was just looking through your pictures and I’m glad they turned out so good.  I hope to see ya’ll again soon.  Troy

name: Craig Peterson
text:
Want to rap over the top Hospitality, Family Fun, Adventure of a life time, Safety, and Epic Fishing all in one day, then all you need to do is step on the "Distraction" with Captain Troy and Corey and go fish the Gulf of Mexico! I  have fished all over this country and hands down the best trip of my life!!!  I fish every month in Hawaii and catch big fish....but nothing like catching hogs in the Gulf of Mexico on light tackle!! This is not the first time I have fished the Distraction...5 years ago in Alabama on a golfing vacation while living in Oregon I had 2 Captains book me a trip and then call it off at the last minute....I called Captain Troy after being so bummed out and the next day I was on the Distraction reeling in King fish till my arms hurt! Fast forward 5 years later and as I''m sitting in my home in Hawaii.....I didn't even book a flight until I had a trip booked on the Distraction! This trip was accompanied by Trophy Red Snapper and Monster Amberjack, all but one Amberjack (Red Snapper out of Season) released with state of the art equipment to insure a sustainable fishery for families to enjoy for generations ....I was so wore out I had to call off golf the next day!! In Hawaii we have what is called the "Aloha Spirit" I can tell you this....The Aloha Spirit lives with Captain Troy and Corey of the Distraction.....Southern style! I would travel 5000 miles to fish on the best boat and with the best crew in the South again all at the drop of a hat! Captain Troy and I were talking on the way in....it is not all about anything but the experience.....if you and the Family want the "experience of a life time" .....give them a call you will not be disappointed ....this is a Team that cares about your experience and the fishery....unlike any other in Alabama and Florida!
Aloha!
Craig S Peterson
Regional Engineer Hawaii
PS I can't wait to be back and do it again!!!

name: Abbe Utter
text: Captain Troy was intentional about making our first deep sea fishing experience rememberable and enjoyable. He learned our names and took pictures along the way. Corey, the deckhand, steadily helped us with our lines and getting our GIANT fish off the line. He also kept everything very clean. We plan to return deep sea fishing with Distraction Charters.

name: ANTHONY MCCAA
text: Andy McCaa . had a great trip .Troy in a very friendly and family orrented person .He and his crew are very professional . we caught the limit of fish and then just had fun with some catch and release. distraction charters is the way to go if you are looking for a good family fishing trip.

resp.text: Andy.   Thanks for writing this wonderful review about us.   It's a real pleasure robbery able to serve you and your family for so many years.  I look forward to many more years of friendship and fishing.  Troy

name: Chris Scocos
text:
We recently took our 2nd trip with Capt Troy and included our wives on this trip. On our first trip, we had booked with another charter captain but after we had arried on the day we booked, he had maintenance issues with two of his boats so he was unable to take us out.  We called Capt. Troy mid morning and he was able to take us out for the day.  His boat was very well maintained, comfortable, and Capt. Troy focused on safety, having fun, and catching fish.
On our second trips, Captain Troy and deckhand Corrie showed our wives how to fish, kept it fun and relaxing, and everyone had a great time again.
We are definitely planning on using Captain Troy on our 3rd trip next year.

name: Yizhou Zhang
text: It was a very happy journey and I caught a lot of big monsters. Nice off-shore fishing experience and I plan to return.

name: Eric Stone
text: I recommend anyone considering a family fun fishing trip in Orange Beach to go to Distraction Charters.  Troy and the Distractions crew were a fun and professional group that allowed my family to experience a great afternoon of family fishing.

name: John Ball
text:
Great fsmily experience:

Looking to create grest memories for your kids or grand kids? Try a day of charter fishing wirh Distraction charters out of Orange Beach Al.  Captain Troy & First Mate Corey went out of their way to make our day one my grand daughters will never forget.   Caught about 25# of fish which Cory cleaned and fileted for us .  We even got to watch two dolphins play around our boat.  Truly a once in a lifrtime experience.  Thanks Troy and Corey.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking time to give us some incredible feedback about your experience with Corey and I.  We enjoyed meeting and fishing with you all.  I’m glad the fish were biting and the dolphins were jumping.   Can’t wait to see you next time.  Troy

name: Cindy Mahan
text: Took our daughter and her four friends out for a 6 hour trip for her 21st Birthday (her idea:). It was thier first time fishing. We had a great time. Capt. Troy and Kyle were super. Very patient, knowledgeable and safety conscious. We were on the fish the entire time- caught 11 red snapper! I woul highly recommend them for a charter trip.

name: Greer Underwood
text: Fantastic outing with Troy and Kyle.  Friendly and courteous, and we consistently caught fish.  The Underwood’s will return!

resp.text: Greer, we really enjoyed meeting your family and spending some quality time fishing with everyone.  We especially love having three generations on board and being able to capture those moments visually and through photography.   We hope to see ya’ll again soon.  Thanks. Capt Troy

name: Randy Moller
text: If you want to go fishing go with Distraction Charters they will put you on the fish and they are family friendly.

resp.text: Thank you Randy for taking time to share your experience.  It was so good to serve your family and hope to see you again some day soon.  Troy

name: Courtney Boom
text: This is our 7th trip. Awesome once again! Very family friendly! Troy and Corey are great!!

resp.text: Courtney,   Thank you for taking time to share this review about our charter company.  I can't believe it's been 7 wonderful years we have been fishing together.   Corey and I have really enjoyed your friendship and patronage as well as allowing us to watch your kids grow up fishing with us.   Looking forward to next year.  Troy

name: Tyler Nielsen
text: Captain Troy and Stephen took our family including our 1 YO daughter on a terrific first fishing charter!  We caught two huge fish to start off the trip and Momma is still bragging because she hauled in a Wahoo catch of a lifetime!  We highly recommend the 6 hour trip we got a large number of opportunities to reel in fish from trolling as well as from bottom fishing.  Afterwards, we grilled our fresh King Mackerel using Troy's Game Fish Seasoning and it was perfect!

name: James Zettler
text: Troy is the best!! Three straight years he has put us on the fish!! Very family friendly! The best charter we have ever taken!!!!

resp.text: Hey Doctor Z.  Thank you for taking time to share your experiences with our company with others.   It's always a pleasure to be able to spend time with you.   Your trips are certainly a lot of fun for Corey and I to be a part of.  Thanks for wanting to go with us each year.   Hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Dan Dunigan
text: Captain Troy of the Distraction is the best in the business! I highly recommend him for a satisfying family fishing experience!!

resp.text: Dan.  Thank you for taking time to write this wonderful review.  We really appreciate it.  We hope to see y'all again soon.  Troy

name: A Williams
text: We visited Orange Beach on a family spring break trip including 3 of our 4 kids with ages 7, 16, and 17.  Captain Troy and first mate JT did a fantastic job of engaging with the kids and making sure they had a great time! Even our primadonna 16 year old girl was "forced" by Troy to engage in the fishing with his great sense of humor. We had fairly limited fishing choices this time of year,  but Troy and JT put us on several Triggers - we kept 3 or 4 for lunch, but caught at least a dozen total.  We would definitely recommend and will be back again when visiting three gulf area.   5 stars!

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to share your experience.   We really enjoyed fishing with ya’ll.   Hope to see you again soon.

name: Carla Strome
text: We decided to book a fishing trip for or eighteen year old son's birthday while vacationing in Gulf Shores.  My husband, father, son and two of his best friends participated in the charter.  Everything about the experience far exceeded our expectations.  Even if they had not caught one fish (everyone caught at least one - 16 total) it would have been well worth while. From the moment they met Captain Troy and Steve, they were treated warmly and well cared for.  They left home for a fishing trip and came back with priceless memories.  My father, a very experienced fisherman ,who has worked on charters, said he would not have traded this day for a million dollars. Thanks so much Troy and Steve!

name: Johnny Germaine
text:
My family took the 6 hour fishing trip. My Mom and Dad came with us. My Mom is not in very good health and I wasn't sure if she would be able to get on the boat. Captain Troy was very patient and help her get on board. She was able to fish and get around the boat with no problems.

Troy let the kids drive the boat - which they really enjoyed. We limited out on BIG red snapper during our trip. I even hooked a shark which gave me the fight of a life time. We saw dolphins on our trip too.

Our deckhand was great. he was constantly busy helping us - from baiting hooks, releasing fish, and fixing backlashes. Very hard worker and very polite.

If you are looking for a family adventure be sure to book a trip with captain Troy and Distraction Charters. I promise you wont be disappointed!! This trip was worth every penny. I cant wait until I can book another trip.!

UPDATED REVIEW: MY FAMILY FISHED WITH TROY AND COREY LAST WEEK 7/10/19. WE HAD ANOTHER GREAT EXPERIENCE. I HAVE FISHED WITH LOTS OF DIFFERENT CHARTERS IN THE PAST BUT NONE CAN MEET THE SERVICE AND KINDNESS THAT CAPTAIN TROY AND CREW PROVIDES. IF YOU WANT TO HAVE A SAFE, FAMILY FRIENDLY, AND VERY FUN FISHING TRIP GO WITH DISTRACTION CHARTERS. YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED!!

resp.text: Johnny,   Thank you so much for taking time to update your review and give us additional feedback about Corey and I and your family’s fishing trip.   It’s always good to see ya’ll and we can’t wait to see you all again.  Troy

name: Cody Wright
text:
CODY WRIGHT-

Troy and Corey run a top notch experience here. Troy is a fun person that likes to crack a joke with you and "yank your chain" or "pull on your leg" if you will. Troy knew exactly what to do and where to go to give us GREAT fishing. It was Red Snapper after Red Snapper and a couple of Trigger fishes all morning long.

The deck hand Corey has a ready-to-help peronslaity and won't hesitate to help out with your fishing rod or baiting or answer and questions. He's very friendly. Troy had video and photos of the fishing trip loaded up on DVD's ready for us when we got off the boat! He also gave us some of his fish seasonings. They're good! Corey had our catch of 12 Red Snappers ready and all fileted up by the time we were ready to leave!

On this fishing charter you feel like you're fishing with family. The crew's hospitality is fantastic. CHOOSE THIS CHARTER!!!

resp.text: Cody,   Thank you so much for sharing this wonderful experience with others.  Your family  was so much fun to fish with.  I am glad you had a good time reeling in those fish.  We look forward to seeing y'all next year.

name: Terry Connor
text: I could not have asked for a better experience. Captain Troy put us on fish, educated us all and did it with a smile. My family made a memory.

name: Jason Hall
text:
All Dads and Granddads, this is the boat to take your kids or grandkids on! Captain Troy made our trip very family friendly and he and his deckhand Corey are great guys and made our trip one to remember for years to come.
I took my 15 year old son and his 4 friends. We had an absolute blast, it was so fun that each one of the boys came up to me at different times and told me how much they enjoyed the trip, appreciated me taking them, and that they will be talking about this trip for a long time.
We caught our limit of Red Snapper (2 per person = 12) and put back about 30. In total we caught about 30 - 40 Red Snapper, 2 Triggerfish (had to throw back, not in season), 1 Spanish Mackerel, 1 Bonita.

name: scott blaskowski
text: My family went out with Captain Troy and deck hand JT Sunday the 25th of March. It was a fantastic time! They rearranged things due to some rough seas coming in as we were originally scheduled to go out Monday. That was a great choice as I don't think anyone could get out to fish the rest of the week. The fishing was awesome! We were rookies who had never been out on the ocean before but they showed us what to do and it worked out fabulously. JT worked hard to keep the ladies baited up as well and helped out however needed whenever needed. We caught all the fish we needed for a dinner at the restaurant that night as well as plenty that we just let go. It was the highlight of our spring break this year! I would highly recommend Distraction Charters if you are thinking of taking your family fishing out of Orange Beach!

resp.text: Scott.  We really wanted to say thanks for allowing us to serve you and your family.  I was glad you were able to move your trip to a day earlier due to impending weather.  I appreciate you taking time to write such a wonderful review of your experience with our fishing charter.   We hope to see ya’ll again soon.  Thanks. Troy

name: Susie Mccarroll
text:
Captain Troy and Corey are an outstanding team!!! Distraction Charters is a five star charter!!! We had a scheduled trip planned on Monday ,June 12th for 6:30 am and the weather was looking weary, Captain Troy called me ahead of time to let me know about the weather and that he was concerned about it! Captain Troy was very professional and I completely trusted his judgement. We decided to head out and within about 20 minutes in, he and Corey conversed and felt like we needed to turn back because the waves were quite high and hard!
They both spoke with us and we felt completely safe and well taken care of!
They rescheduled us promptly for another day during our vacation!
On Thursday we headed out again and loved it!!!! We caught our limit of fish and he and Corey made sure we had many opportunities to get a bite!!! My family had a wonderful time and we so appreciated the dedication, caring spirit, and professionalism of Captain Troy and Corey!!! Thank you both!!! God bless you!
Susie McCarroll
Rector, Arkansas

resp.text: Mrs Susie,   I really appreciate you taking time out of your busy vacation schedule to write this wonderful review.  You, Mr Johnny and your family are so much fun to fish with.  I am so glad things worked out like they did, because Monday wasn't  just right, Weather wise. Your flexibility and willingness to move your trip to a more favorable day was a blessing for us.  Thank you for trusting us with your family's safety and happiness.    We hope to see you again next year.  Can't wait to meet that new grand child. I do think the name "Troy" would be a good name. Lol.   Thank you. Troy

name: Chris Wrobbel
text: Oustanding!  We were looking for a family focused fishing experience and that is exactly what we got.  Captain Troy and Jacob made certain that we had a great time and caught a variety of fish.  The picutres that Captain Troy took were top notch and my girls can't wait to show them off the first day of school.  You will NOT be disappointed.

name: Jerry Smith
text: Great Family Trip in a clean boat ..Captain Troy Frady & Mate Corey did a great job getting us on fish in very difficult conditions! We caught Red Snapper, Triggerfish, Mahi Mahi and got into some Amberjack that we tangled with but ended up breaking our lines. I would highly recommend Captain Troy Frady and Distraction Charters on your next family fishing trip while in Orange Beach.

resp.text: Thank you Jerry for giving us some great feedback about us.   I am so glad you were able to reschedule your trip the other day to today when seas were a bit calmer.   I  am so proud of Sawyer for hanging on to that amberjack as long as he did.   That’s a memory we will always remember.   That mahi was also a real treat too.   Can’t wait to see you all again next year. Troy

name: Tammy Prickett
text: I have a special needs child, who experienced an anaphylactic allergic reaction to the IV contrast during an MRI.  He suffered an anoxic brain injury, which left him blind, with low motor control, and in a wheelchair.  His mental capacity is great, and one of his dreams was to go on a deep sea fishing trip.  Several charter services were contacted, but said they could not accommodate my son.  I contacted Captain Troy, and his response was, "I would love to take him!" Captain Troy and his deck hand, Jacob, went above and beyond what I expected to help make my son's trip great!  Jacob was careful to provide as much assistance as was necessary, while also making sure that Logan got to do as much on his own as possible.  It was such a gift to see the smiles of joy that flooded Logan's face.  Thank you, Captain Troy  and Jacob, for sharing your love of fishing, your heart of compassion, and your kindness.  You made our trip wonderful!

name: Wynne Coleman
text: In all the years I have been fishing Captain Troy was one of the best I've been around.If you are looking for a great experience with a lot of fish then this is the trip for you.

name: Pat McDonald
text: I wont charter anu other boat while fishing the Gulf. Troy is a true angler, great captain and over all great guy. We caught so many fish we lost count.

resp.text: Pat.  Thank you so much for taking time to write a review about your experience with us.  It was a real pleasure to be able to serve you.   Be safe on your travel home and hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Allen Jeffries
text:
For over forty years I have been fishing.  From Ontario to several miles outside the reef at Key West and several points in between.  Our recent family fishing trip aboard Distraction Charters with Captain Troy Frady was nothing short of Fantastic!  From the initial contact, booking, answering all my questions, the boat and tackle, and the trip itself;  Captain Troy exceeded all expectations.
So if you are headed to the Orange Beach area and want a great family experience you’ll remember forever;  give Distraction Charters a call.  Captain Troy and deckhand Kyle provided my family with a trip that has redefined “Southern Hospitality” and “yes” we caught fish!
Don’t forget to ask about Captain Troy’s gamefish seasoning (old family recipe).  We grilled up some our catch with it and it was awesome.

Allen J. ,  Central Indiana

name: Andrew McCollum
text: You couldn't get the kind of treatment Captain Troy and Corey give you if you were on your own boat

name: Andy Nester
text: Awesome trip, do yourself a favor and book it. Troy and Stephen were awesome!

name: David Renz
text:
We took our second trip with Captain Troy on June 3, 2016.  As with the previous trip, everything went perfectly.  The equipment was in full operation and the engines had been recently rebuilt, the air conditioning pumped cold air into the cabin and the head was clean and worked as designed.  Reliability was extremely important to our group since we had been burned by a charter captain who showed up late and couldn't get either of his two boats operating on a previous outing.

Captain Troy took us out and right to the fish.  As soon as we put our bait in the water we started catching red snapper.  When the bites stopped coming as frequently he would relocate us nearby and again as soon as we dropped bait the fish started biting.  We caught more than our limit and had to release most of what we caught.

We had a great time and we even got some free Captain Troy's Heifer Dust steak seasoning which is delicious!

name: Joseph Langham
text: Caught fish , both times out,good host,fresh fish great eating,highly recommend,

resp.text: Thank you Joseph for taking time to share your review about our business.  Hope you have a good Thanksgiving and Christmas and look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: David White
text: Snapper fishing the best 3 years in a row family friendly clean

resp.text: David.  Thanks for taking time to share your experience with our company.  Can't believe we've been fishing together three years in a row.  Thank you for your loyalty and friendship.  I hope to see you again next year.  Troy

name: Matt Whitlock
text:
This Fishing trip is amazing and very family friendly!  The kids had a blast and Captain Troy and Corey was outstanding with the kids from the time we met at the marina to catching some big red snapper, trigger fish, maceral, cobia, and hooked a shark but didnt quite get it to the boat!!  My son is very shy but troy was amazing with him, so much that when we werent fishing he went straight up to the captains deck to hang out with him while we were traveling out to sea and back!  A trip to remember!!
Thanks Distraction Charters!

resp.text: Matt.   We really appreciate you taking time to share your experience with other families.  We are still looking at the pics from yesterday's fishing trip.  That snapper Carrie caught was a whopper for sure.  We enjoyed watching you all reel them in. Hayden is certainly a fine young man and I enjoyed having him come upstairs and hang out with me.  He did really well driving the boat too.  We look forward to seeing y'all again.   Thanks. Troy.

name: Jeff W
text:
If you are looking for a charter that goes after only trophy fish this isn't the review for you.  If you have a family and want to take them deep sea fishing keep reading.  Our 6-pack group consisted of 2 male adults, 1 female adult, a couple of ten year old girls, and a 7 year old girl.  We selected the 6 hour trip and selected Distraction Charter specifically for a family fishing trip.

First, the boat.  A very clean, well maintained Hatteras with wood paneled interior and the classic shark jaw mounted on the wall.  The air-conditioned interior was very cozy with plenty of comfortable seating for the family if you elect to get out of the sun and cool off.  Outside there are a couple of benches on the lower deck plus a bench that seats 3 or 4 right next to the Captain.  Captain Troy is very kid friendly and our kids spent a great deal of time hanging out with the Captain including sitting in the Captains seat at the helm (supervised by the Captain of course)!  Captain Troy has tremendous patience with the kids and our youngest tested him thoroughly!!!

As for the fishing...I've taken my daughter deep sea fishing before and one thing I've learned is my kids could care less about catching that trophy.  My daughter is simply happy pulling in all of the strange looking fish that live in our oceans and could care less about whether we keep them - in fact, she would prefer to release all of them!.  My trip and her trip is going to be best if rods are bent and we are catching fish.  Captain Troy delivered and kept our rods bent the entire trip.

As an experienced angler, I can say we experienced a particular rare day of fishing reeling in our limits of Red Snapper and throwing back ton's of fish that weren't in season or large enough to keep.
