Given the amount of fish we released I'm confident that Captain Troy's style of fishing would have kept our rods bent all day keeper or not.

If this is the style of fishing you want for yourself or your family then Distraction Charters is highly recommended.  We will likely opt for the longer trip on our next visit now that we know all of our kids have sea legs.

Thanks Captain Tony and Mate Corey for a wonderful experience with my family!!!  When we return to Orange Beach/Gulf Shores I won't need to research my options, I'll come straight to Distraction Charters.

PS:  The "steak" seasoning you provided was a big hit when I cooked up my first batch of snapper!

name: Kyle Harvey
text: We did the 6 hour charter and had a great time.  Captain Troy worked really hard to make sure the kids had fun, took time to show them how the boat worked, let them "drive" and overall was great with the kids.  The boat was clean and in great shape.  And,most importantly we caught our limit on Red Snapper, pulled in a nice King Mackeral and even tustled with a couple of sharks.  Throw in spotting a giant sea turtle 20 feet away and a bunch of dolphins throughout the day, and it all amounted to an awesome experience.  I was a little jaded on deep sea fishing after a few bad experiences in other places but this totally changed that.  We plan to go again next year.

name: Ken A.
text: If you’re looking for a great charter boat fishing experience in Orange Beach, look no further than Captain Troy with Distraction Charters.  Searching the internet, I am always skeptical of anyone loaded with 5 star ratings.  Well, you will not regret booking with Captain Troy.  Reasons?  1)  You are treated like family, on a family-oriented fun trip.  Troy and first mate Steve went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and having a great time.  2)  When the weather was marginal on our scheduled date, Captain Troy suggested the option of rebooking later in the week.  No charge for taking us out briefly offshore to let us judge for ourselves what the conditions were like.  He just wants you to have a good time fishing, not fighting the weather.  3)  A clean well-maintained boat, with an air conditioned cabin if you get too hot on deck, and clean toilet facilities.  4)  Clean, nice fishing gear, no junk.  5)  You have the boat to yourself, up to a party of six, for the same flat price.  No jousting with another group for fishing space or service.  6)  Pictures of your trip, catching fish, burned to a CD by the time you reach shore.  7)  When we had marginal success starting on the 4 hour trolling trip, we asked about bottom fishing.  Troy headed out further and put us on the fish for the remainder of the time.  Simply put, the fish wore us out.  What an incredible trip.  Although he can’t control the weather or whether the fish bite, you can count on everything else being taken care of in a first class manner.  Very satisfied!

name: beckmanmd
text: I have lived and worked in the Daphne area for 6 years and never had the opportunity to try deep sea fishing. It was my 60th birthday and I figured it was time to go fishing. I searched diligently for the perfect Captain and did weeks of research.  Being an Emergency physician safety was my #1 requirement. I wanted someone who truly cared and acted professional but was a people person like myself. Troy Frady exceeded my high expectations in every way. This charter boat Captain, Troy Frady and his first mate, Corey, worked non stop to make sure our experience was top of the line and amazingly fun. I haven't had as much fun as I had in a very long time.  This man knows these waters like none other and I, a novice to this sport, caught so many fish including a 34 inch Amberjack which was beautifully cleaned and packaged by Corey. This one we brought home for dinner. He is a wonderful conservationist and shows a great love for the creatures of the deep. I believe without hesitation that the Distraction is the only Deep Sea Charter service to use for any individual but also for families with children who want a fun family friendly experience.  Your children will learn the trade by the best and be treated with respect by someone who truly enjoys serving others - especially families. I am planning on another excursion with friends very soon and will certainly be booking through Distraction Charters. You will feel your money is well spent and the amazing photos that he takes come with the deal...not to mention his delectable  personal seasoning! Thank you for the best birthday ever Troy and Corey! William and I had the greatest adventure!

name: Davin Knolton
text:
My family and I had an amazing time with Capt Troy and Stephen.  They did an awsome job making our trip the best ever. They are absolute professionals that work themselves for our benefit.  This is the best chater fishing I have done in 10 years.  Capt Troy put us on fish with every stop over and over again. We wasted no time but got right on fishing.  The bait, the boat, the mate, everything was ready on time for a perfect trip.  We caught a variety of fish to keep everything exciting. This was my daughters first ever deep sea fishing trip and Capt Troy and Stephen did everything they could to make it a memorable experience for her. She wants to go again next year. I would recommend Distraction as a great event and DEFINETLY family friendly. If Capt Troy says it, then you can bet on it.

Thanks to you both.  What a great trip!

name: Kim Clark
text: My family recently took a trip with Distraction Charters. The trip started off with a wonderful greeting from Captain Troy and Deckhand Jacob. We soon became like family, it was then Troy and Jacob.  You see these guys don't have to have you call them a title to feel good about themselves. They are who they are and proud of the men they have become. They then proved it by their actions. A storm rolled in and Troy looked at the radar.  He said it was rolling in fast so we were going to hang and troll fish to see if it was gonna pass. No problem because we had our family on this trip. Being safe with my family meant more to him than getting a paycheck.  I appreciate this type of person. So, we trolled and caught some Ladyfish.  It was fun considering a storm was blowing in like crazy. Distraction Charters is THE LEADER of the pack. Many other boats then followed his lead. Everyone in this field look up to him. Just check his credentials. I did before even booking with him. He has excellent reviews going back years. He is great at getting you on the fish every time. He knows this area and knows the fish. He believes in CPR...Catch, Photo and Release. Don't worry YOU don't need to bring a camera. He does it all. He drives the boat, puts you on fish, takes photos and films it all. But he doesn't have hidden costs like others do. He didn't charge anything for the photo cd or movie cd. We got great photos and big smiles. I didn't regret one thing about this trip and you won't either. Choose Distraction Charters, for safe fun family fishing!!!!!

name: Kameron Alexander
text: I can say that all these reviews about Troy and Distraction Charters in Orange Beach are all legit.  After talking with him and seeing how he does business he encourages people to write truthful reviews on his company.  We booked our trip on a Wednesday for a Saturday departure.  He was booked up but agreed to take us on a Saturday because everything I found on the web suggested I should choose his company.  I would go ahead and plan it in advance because he can be booked up.  We got lucky.  All the other charters had absolutely zero bookings and could take us next day which made me question how good they were.  Anyways my wife, 2 kids, me, and one of my kids friends went on a 6 hour deep sea fishing trip with Troy and his deckhand Kyle.  To say they were great with the kids would be an understatement.  Our boys ages were 10, 12, and 13.  We caught a ton of fish.  Everytime they would slow down for literally 1 minute without a bite we would move just a few minutes away and Troy would have us back on the fish.  We went out in 4 foot swells and we all took non drowsy dramamine before hand and none of us had a problem.  However Troy offered for us to cancel the trip with no penalty the morning we showed up at the docks since the ocean was so rough.  I thought that said a lot about him being worried about the kids.  So we ended up catching roughly 30 Red Snapper, 3 huge King Mackrell, 2 triggerfish, a couple of nasty sucker fish, 2 Bonitas, and 2 Jack Cravells(sp?).  The Jack Cravells were enormous and took my 13yr old son and I over 10 minutes to reel in.  It was quite a battle and we were definitely worn out from it.  They had snacks on board the boat and we of course forgot to pack a lunch so Troy whipped us up some chicken and brocolli for us to eat since he felt bad for us.  I was happy to give the deckhand Kyle 20% gratuity and he cut all the fish up for us and put it in our cooler.  Next time we go back I will definitely use Troy at Distraction Charters again.  Deep sea fishing isn't the cheapest sport but I guarantee that my boys will remember that part of our beach trip for the rest of their lives.  The boat was very nice, very clean, and Kyle was non stop spraying off the decks, baiting hooks for my boys and wife, and we watched him scrub down all the poles with soap and water to prepare for the next group.  I think the boat is about 41 feet and had plenty of room for our group of 5 and 6 wouldn't have been a problem.  Hope this review helps you get more business Troy.  You deserve it!!!

name: Austin Hiroms
text: Very helpful! Family friendly!

resp.text: Austin.  Thanks for the feedback.  Enjoyed fishing with you today.  Hope to see you again.  Troy

name: Justin Lange
text: You couldn't ask for a better "family" fishing trip experience ever.  Thank you Troy.

resp.text: Justin.  Thank you for thinking about us and sharing your experience with others.   We do appreciate you using our service and hope to see you again soon.  Troy

name: Charlie
text: Captain Troy is the only sure thing! I have used other charters when he was booked and ALL were a disaster. Stop reading reviews and book your trip with Troy now. Your welcome in advance

resp.text: Thank You Charlie for the review.  Hope to see you again soon.. Troy

name: Brittany Brown
text: Had an awesome time!

resp.text: Thank you Brittany.  We enjoyed meeting you today and glad you had a good time.  We appreciate you taking time to share this review with others.  Hope to see you next season.   Troy

name: Charlie Anderson
text: Best Dolphin Cruise in Gulf Shores! Captain Joe is fantastic! We got to see the dolphins up close and get some fantastic pictures!  Our 4 year old had a blast! It was her first time on a boat and Captain Joe made it the best experience for her. He even taught us all how to fish. Now my daughter is hooked! Pun intended:)

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Happy to hear your little one is hooked!

name: Erica Miller
text: My family had the best experience with Capt. Joe. If you are thinking about booking, do it! This was our first time for a fishing charter, and it was awesome! Capt. Joe has an unmatched positive energy! He is family friendly and has insurmountable knowledge! He seemed genuinely interested in us learning, as well as catching fish! We will be back!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate it!!!

name: Kevin Hartell
text: The family and I took a dolphin sight seeing cruise with Captain Joe. Keeping a 3 and a 1 year old entertained isn’t the easiest, but he came through with flying colors. He made the ride smooth for my baby, was educational, and we found the dolphins! I think we had 5 or more all around us, and one was a baby. We were surrounded. And Captain Joe went above and beyond the whole time, I cannot recommend him enough. The trip was worth every penny.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Island Marine Charters!!

name: Jonathan Terry
text: From the time I booked a trip with Island marine charters for myself and a friend to the end was nothing less than a great experience.  We arrived at the boat launch early and the boat was already in the water.  Captain Joe was very professional and definitely family friendly.  We communicated several times before the trip and he did not fill our heads with unattainable expectations but far exceeded what we expected.  I have fished with many guides for many years and this is one I will keep on my list anytime I am in the gulf.  Thank you for a very memorable experience and looking forward to the next trip.  Looks like I will see you mid June!

resp.text: Thank you! Looking forward to your next trip!

name: Lauren Hawthorne
text: Captain Joe was truly the best!  He was so incredible with our 8 year old and was just a genuinely nice person.  We all had such a great time and ended up catching 3 personal bests!  He even took some extra time to show our daughter the dolphins up close!  Can’t wait to go fishing with him again!  You’re missing out if you don’t choose him for your next charter!

resp.text: Thank you!!!!

name: Karan Khosla
text: Our first fishing excursion and Captain Joe was amazing.  Went with small kids and they had a memorable experience. Thank you so much Captain Joe until next time…

resp.text: Thank you! Glad you guys enjoyed the trip!

name: Kevin Hartell Jr
text: I cannot recommend Captain Joe enough. We took a 3 year old and a 1 year old on a dolphin cruise, and he went above and beyond. He made the ride smooth for my baby, was entertaining, and was very educational. I think we had 5 dolphins and a baby within 50 yards of the boat on all sides and even had a breach! Highlight of our trip and worth every penny. Captain Joe will be my first call next year for a fishing trip, for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! See you next year!

name: Nathaniel Freeman
text: Me, my dad and brother in law went inshore fishing with capt. Joe. It was a great trip we caught a lot of fish and capt. joe was awesome.  We have fished with many different guides for all different kinds of fishing and he was no doubt the best.    Hope to get to go back with him again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Looking forward to future trips!

name: Ana M
text: Capt Joe is the best! He really cares that his guests have the best experience possible. We'll be recommending him to everybody and will call him the next time we're in town!

resp.text: Thank you! Love hearing happy clients!

name: Tony Noel
text: We had a great time with Captain Joe.  Captain Joe is a lot of fun, very personable, and goes out his way to make sure everyone on board has a good experience.  We came at a time when the fish were transitioning making the fishing a challenge.  Captain Joe worked hard to put us in a position to catch fish.  I will definitely book another charter with Captain Joe the next time we are in town and I would recommend him to anyone who plans on spending some time in the Gulf Shores/Orange Beach area.

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Julia Spangler
text: We had a great Family Fun trip with Captain Joe yesterday. In two hours, each of us caught at least one fish (our daughter caught multiple), and we also found a pod of dolphins that swam alongside our boat. It was amazing to see the dolphins so close-up while they were jumping and playing. Definitely recommend to any family with an interest in fishing or marine life. Joe can customize the trip to focus as much on fishing or on dolphins as you like. We spent an hour on fishing and an hour on dolphins.

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Aaron Smith
text: I booked a charter for me and my two boys (16 & 10) during our trip to Gulf Shores and it did not disappoint. Captain Joe was fantastic! He was personable, informative, and patient. Not only did we catch a bunch of fish (and a crab!), but we learned some tips and tricks along the way. If you are thinking about booking, don’t hesitate!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We appreciate it!

name: Heath Bush
text: Captain  Jo is a phenomenal guide that works hard to find fish and make sure you have a great time.  My family will always use him when we are in town.

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate it & look forward to having you & your family on the boat again!

name: Amanda Schmidt
text: Had the most amazing experience today fishing with Captain Joe. He was very welcoming and knowledgeable. Made the salt water fishing trip unforgettable for us. Lots of laughs and great conversation. We were able to catch and release some awesome fish and we saw a bunch of dolphins. Definitely recommend and will be back again!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us!

name: Angie Pentland
text:
Captain Joe is flat out a good dude.  After searching charters/reviews for a couple of days, we knew the moment we spoke with him that he was the guy to take our family out.  He put us on fish right away and we caught fish in every spot we stopped.
We were interested in seeing dolphins, so Joe pulled lines and made a run to another area where we had dolphins playing right next to the boat.
Joe is fun, knowledgeable and easy to talk too.  We will be giving him a call again the next time we are in the area.  We highly recommend him.  Thanks for a great day on the water and making memories our family will never forget.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!!!

name: Carlton Dove, PGA
text: Captain Joe is an outstanding guide! We had an awesome trip with him.  We caught fish, had great conversations and lots of laughs.  You can count on him to get you on the fish and to have a good time.  A great trip for a couple buddies and/or a family. Captain Joe is a true professional.  Enjoy!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Matthew Fullen
text: We had an incredible time with Captain Joe! He was the utmost professional, knowledgeable, and he had a great sense of humor. He contacted me a few days before our trip to confirm our expectations such as: species to catch, trip duration, and scenery. We caught 25-30 sheepsheads, Joe butchered them with expert precision, and we kept a few for dinner that night with family. I would recommend him to anyone and we will be back.

resp.text: Thank you! Looking forward to next time!

name: Ashley Ramm
text: Our family had a great trip with Captain Joe!!  He was really patient with the kids and made sure they caught plenty of fish.  We were also able to cruise around and see some dolphins.  He definitely helped us make some great memories.  Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Jason Stob
text: Had a great afternoon with Captain Joe!  Took my son and I out for an afternoon fish and had us on the fish from the moment we started until we were done.  Fished multiple species, had nice tips to keep us catching them.  Helpful and fun to talk to.  Would fish with Captain Joe anytime!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Chel Horn
text: Joe was a great guide!!!! Lots of knowledge, friendly, family oriented and fun to be with. Our time went so fast and we caught so many fish. We can't wait to come back and go again. Thank you so much Captain Joe Fish!

resp.text: Thank You!!!

name: Nic Mertz
text: We had an great trip with Captain Joe! We caught a bunch of fish big and small, and saw some dolphins! Joe was really patient with our 10 year old and taught him (and us) a lot of different techniques and fishing tips which we will apply throughout our fishing endeavors! Thank you Joe we will be back without a doubt sir!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Tera Fullen
text: My husband, brother-in-law, and cousin went on a chartered inshore trip with captain Joe on 30 Dec 2020. They had a fabulous time! We ate the fish they caught that night and their experience was all they talked about for the remainder of our trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!!!

name: afuzybear
text: Captain Joe was great! Kept working the area til he put us on some big bull reds. Such a great day. Highly recommend  Captain Joe. Great guy who has great local knowledge of where the fish are.

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Sara Pedersen-Fairfield
text: Hands down the best fishing charter I have ever been on.  We came with 4 adults at all difference experience levels and Captain Joe had insane amount of patience with our group.  I still can't figure out how he was in 4 places at one time!  We got to try several different fishing styles and he made sure we were all catching fish all day!  Only regret was not bringing our kids with because Captain Joe would have made it an adventure for them.  We are already planning our next trip so we can take our kids fishing with Captain Joe!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review!!!

name: Randy Wilkens
text: Joe's service was top notch! Very experienced and pleasant. Caught a lot of fish- at one point we had a triple going! (3 fish at once). I strongly recommend his service and he's reasonably priced vs the big competitors. Great times and memories made. Did excellent with my young kids. Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Chris Pozzuto
text: Simply the BEST!  If you are looking to do a 4 hour fishing excursion in Gulf Shores, look no further than Captain Joe!  My group has been on many fishing charters and this one was the best, bar none.  Captain Joe is very knowledgeable, personable and put us on the fish!  Will definitely look him up again when we are in Gulf Shores.

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Susam Ford
text: There aren't enough stars to rate how wonderful Captain Joe and his charter service is. We took our ten year old granddaughter out and we had the best time imaginable. He's is wonderful with children! He found her interest right off and had great conversation with her. He made sure she caught plenty of fish. Words cannot express what a wonderful time we had. We will definitely go again when possible. Loved,loved, loved it!!

name: Joe Miles
text: Had a great fishing trip, Captain Joe is the best!!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Cliff Meyer
text:
What a great trip! My 8 year old son and I did a 4 hour in shore charter with Captain Joe. My son had a great time and caught quite a few fish. We even caught a huge Black Drum estimated at 30 pounds! Captain Joe was great with my son, he kept him fishing and educated both of us on the different species of fish we caught. He really went above and beyond to make the trip fun and informative. We kept two fish to eat and he cleaned them for us as well.
His boat and equipment are all top quality and ready to use. There was zero downtime to worry about.
Even the local bait and tackle shop we visited knows him and highly recommended him again for future visits. We are already talking about planning our trip again next year!
Thanks again Captain Joe!

name: Nana Up North
text: Captain Joe is the best! We had an amazing trip where we had dolphins playing all around our boat plus Captain Joe worked so hard to make sure we caught fish even though it meant going to several different spots and took extra time.  He is very committed to making sure you have an enjoyable, successful fishing day and is engaging and knowledgeable.  He was patient with a first-time-ever fisherwoman!  I would highly recommend him!

name: Ryan Gambrell
text: Captain Joe is hands down the best. He communicates very well prior to the trip. We emailed several times before the trip and he called the day before to let us know where to be and what to expect. On the charter, he seemed genuinely interested in getting to know our group, he (of course) knew where the fish would be. He really enjoys his job and wanted us to succeed, offering advice and tips and tricks to help us Ohioans catch some seafood without being overly aggressive about it. We had a great time and I would do it again in a heartbeat. Highly recommend.

name: Sheila Fort
text: Captain Joe, the best Captain on the Island! Joe is very energetic, great personality, has a great boat & equipment! This Captain is on top of his game! My husband and son caught fish and had a fantastic time!  Thanks for giving them a great experience!

name: Scott Adams
text: Great time and awesome fishing! Doing it again next year!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Zachary Ervin
text: Joe was awesome. We had weather issues all day.  It was our sons 11 birthday and he did everything in his power to get us out on that day. We went out at a very unorthodox time of day when the fish typically are not biting but he put us on a spot that even at that time of day the kids caught nearly 40 fish. He did a great job communicating and keeping us posted on the weather. We are already planning our next fishing trip and will definitely use him again.

name: Henry Pham (HenryFromOhio)
text: Alabama Inshore Fishing is the place to go if you’re looking for a personalized fishing experience in Gulf Shore, Alabama. Me and my dad went on a father son fishing trip and had a great time on this charter. Captain Joe was very personable and knowledgeable and created a fun/educational experience on his boat. He is the only captain in Gulf Shores that has a money back guarantee if you don’t catch any fish on your trip, this however didn’t happen as we caught many Black Drum and Redfish on our trip in the middle of December. So if you’re looking for a charter that guarantees plenty of fish, is fun/educational, and has a captain that will go above and beyond to make sure that you’ll have a great fishing trip then Alabama Inshore Fishing is the place for you.

name: Heidi Morgan
text: Can't say enough good things about Inshore Marine Charters. Captain Joe worked with us to find a good option for both our small kids and the adults. He knew exactly where to find the fish, both big and small, took time to get to know our group, took time with the kids to teach them about the fish, educated all of us on fishing safety. We caught tons of fish and a shark! Thank you Captain Joe!

name: Stoney Jones
text: Captain Joe is top notch! You will not find anyone better, so stop searching, hit the call button and book this guy. Joe will put you on the fish in any weather condition. I will definitely be back soon for another round Joe!

name: Anthony Allen
text: Best fishing, best captain, and best experience I've had in over a decade of coming to this area! Captain Joe is the man and he makes sure all of his clients have the best service possible. Thank you again!

name: Ryan Smith
text: This guy is very good at his job.  He can find fish in any conditions.  He grew up on these waters and impressed the heck out of myself and my buddy.  Highly recommended!!!

name: Marlo Mikle
text: We had a great time with Captain Joe!  He took us right to where the fish were biting.  He was very knowledgeable and advised on proper technique when fishing.  We will definitely use Captain Joe again!

name: Steve Bond
text:
My party recently booked Captain Joe to take us for an inshore fishing trip. To say that it was a success would be an understatement! We had a very productive and fun-filled morning of quality fishing (I captured the Inshore Slam within the first hour of the fishing trip!).

Captain Joe is a skilled angler and is also passionate (he really cares) if his clients are into quality fish. I highly recommend his services as a great value  both for the money and entertainment!
God Bless,
Steve Bond

resp.text:
Steve,
Thank you for the review! It was a great day on the water with you guys! I look forward to fishing with you again!

Captain Joe
www.islandmarinecharters.com

name: Al Katzone
text:
We had a wonderful fishing trip with captain Joe and his son. Both were really thoughtful and sympathic. We got a lot of sheepshead and saw some dolphins jumping, too. It was the highlight of our USA trip! Thanks alot and best regards from Switzerland,
Rüdiger and Mareen

name: Joshua Parson
text:
Captain Joe was an excellent guide who took the time to show us proper technique and land us on some pretty nice fish.

Hes a really genuine dude and I'd book him again if I came back.

name: Jonathan Straus
text:
Great experience.   Captian Joe worked all week to fit us in with bad weather and high winds and kept us informed through out. He is a great teacher of the proper way to fish.  Took my three boys ages 7/7/4 and he did an unbelievable job getting them excited but also doing things the right way.  Book in advance but worth it for sure.   My boys want to all ready book another trip.  Overall top notch experience and can't thank Captain Joe enough giving my sons this experience.

Jon from Indiana

name: Mark Meckem
text: Captain Joe is an awesome person and very knowledgeable.  Thanks

name: Rebecca Worthen
text: This guy was awesome! He goes above and beyond to make sure you have a great fishing experience. Very instructional and fun.

name: Derrick Thomas
text: Great trip! Capt. Joe put some fish in the boat. Very knowledgeable and great conversation. Obvious he takes pride in what he does just by how well he takes care of his gear and his boat. Highly recommend Island Marine Charters.

name: Byron Jones
text: Known him (Joe) for over a decade and still does the same work and has the same care for his customers as he always has. You should go by and see his work. I know they say a picture is worth a thousand words, but to see it in person, would amaze you. Great work!!!

name: Kim Baumann
text: All I can say is WOW! He is a 7th generation fisherman and really knows his stuff. Took our group of 5 including a kid. Joe's personality definitely made the trip.  He went above and beyond and made sure our entire group had fun. We caught some real whoppers! Also saw dolphins, several sea turtles, a manta ray and an osprey with a mackarel dinner! Highly recommend!

name: Michael Sain
text: Capt Joe will put you on the fish. Had a great time fishing with him.

name: Gene Montecchie
text: Nobody gives attention to detail like Joe.  Very impressed with his work!

name: Tony McDonald
text: Excellent Captain!

name: Mike
text: Rates too high

resp.text: Michael, I appreciate your feedback, but I would like the opportunity to find out why you feel our rates are too high. We are very competitive in our market. We clearly state our rates on our website and never accept payment until after our services have been completed and our clients are happy and satisfied. The only thing that makes sense is that perhaps you have confused our business with someone else's, or you were not comparing us apples to apples with our competition. In that case I would like to respectfully ask you to remove the negative review. If you would like to talk to me personally, I can be reached at 251-228-2344. Thanks, Joe Buskens

name: Nicholas Pohl
text:
Very nice fiberglass catamaran 26’ boats, completely coast guard compliant, all rigging included, modern engines.

The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. We ran into a bad weather issue after an hour on the water, but with the fun we’d already had, we’ll be returning tomorrow morning for some fun in the sun.

I would highly recommend them if you are looking to do some exploring, play on sandbars, fish a bit… whatever.

name: Brandon Williams
text:
GREAT DAY ON THE WATER!

My family recently rented a pontoon boat from Orange Beach Boat Rentals and had a fantastic experience! From making the online reservation, payment, orientation, boat pick up, and drop off processes were super easy.  The entire staff was friendly, informative and very helpful. You can tell they love what they do. The boats were top notch and it even had a restroom.  Would highly recommend and will be back next time we're in OB!

name: Memorie Cole
text: Doug was amazing. Very helpful and accommodating. We had so much fun on the water and have already started planning our next time out

name: Ashley Allerson
text: We had a great day on the water renting a pontoon. Danny was through and knowledgeable and a super cool guy to chat with. The boat was extremely clean and well kept. Pulling back in after a full day was easy to fill up and pass the boat back over. Prices were great and we would definitely rent here again. Thanks Danny!

name: gaye mayo
text: Thank you to Orange Beach Boat Rentals for an amazing time yesterday! My family had an awesome time going to Pirates Cove, seeing dolphins and going swimming! The directions and the GPS are fantastic and having a bathroom on-board is a lifesaver! The directions and it was nice to see that Jack wanted to make sure we knew everything about the boat before we left.  Thanks again Orange Beach Boat Rentals and we can't wait to come back the next time we're in Orange Beach!

name: Karla Thornton
text: Great time, great boat and crew.  Lots of dolphins and seagulls and pelicans.  Just a beautiful day with great tunes playing.  Everyone had a nice time.  Recommend highly!!

name: kevin stutting
text: Capt Danny was awesome! Best renting experience I have had in boat renting. A rental boat with a stereo that was loud and and a 150hp motor that wasn't throttled down. These boats have a head (bathroom) that keeps everything less urgent...

name: David Naylor
text:
Best part of our vacay. First, Captains Igor and Danny are good guys who are knowledgeable, friendly and patient. The boat was immaculate and so nice having a step down bathroom!  Our dog was welcome and he loved it!  They brought fishing stuff for my son when we changed our mind last minute, and got us out on the water quick. Their recommendations of where to catch a fish and where to see dolphins were spot on!

The boat itself was easy to use and had great technology. Good sound system and excellent depth finder / gps. Boat was in tip top shape and easy to use. While I am very experienced on a boat, a beginner could use this pretty easily.

We took the four hour trip. The only problem was we should have gotten the full day rental!!!  Next time!  I will definitely rent from them again.

Final part was the gas up and check for damages. They quickly assessed the boat and saw it was in good shape. Four hours of boat time and just about $20 of gas only, so efficient as well.  No hidden fees or charges at all.

We appreciate y’all making our day so fantastic!

name: Tommie Mccool
text:
Great Rental Company

We had an Amazing day. The check-in process was very thorough and informative. The boats were Amazing and very clean. They were fully loaded with a bathroom, GPS, xm radio etc.
We saw lots of dolphins, fished for a few hours, stopped by a beautiful sandy beach island and had lunch at Tacky Jack's.  We have rented boats from all over, and this company really stands out, we were impressed all the way around. Great Boats! Great Service! Great Day!  Top Notch Service. We will be back next time.

name: Ryan Files
text: We rented one of their pontoon boats a couple of weeks ago. Fantastic experience! The boat was in great shape and they provided a map that was extremely helpful for our navigation. Everyone there was a pleasure to deal with and I wouldn’t use anyone else after such a great experience. I highly recommend!

name: natalie mrocek
text:
AMAZING DAY!

Amazing day on the water. I am so glad we decided to rent a boat for the day. We saw lots of dolphins, got to hang out on a island, go fishing and had our best day on vacation on the back bays of Orange Beach on the boat.  Customer service was Awesome. We can’t wait to rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals again very soon. Highly recommended!

name: Richard Dias
text: Orange Beach Boat Rentals was fantastic. Captain Igor did an excellent job with boat preparation. There is a video that explains the safety features of the boat and of proper etiquette for traveling on the Inlet. Captain Igor then reviews any questions you have. Our boat was well-maintained and very clean. Our entire family had a great day on the water seeing dolphins and finally stopping at a beach. I would recommend orange boat rentals to everyone. When our family goes again no doubt where I will go to rent a boat.

name: The Nortons (Jenny)
text: Our family had a great time on the water thanks to Orange Beach Boat Rentals! Danny was very knowledgeable about the area and helpful at check in and the boat was perfect for a family! We saw so many birds and dolphin! Highly recommended!

name: ihyzey
text: We had a blast. Worth every penny. Danny was amazing. Customer service was awesome and you don't get great customer service too much anymore. You can tell they love what they do. We arrived and everything was ready to go. They made it so nice and easy.

name: Christopher McCarthy
text: Had a blast! Great training video. GPS and hand map made it SO enjoyable.

name: Natalie Whitehead
text: A great family excursion! We saw dolphins, caught fish, and had plenty of room on the boat for 5 of us. Plus, we went out in the rain, and the people at Orange Beach Boat Rentals told us to keep the boat out for a couple of extra hours no charge in order to make up for subpar conditions. We didn’t ask for it; they just kindly offered. Such great service!!

name: kenneth gossett
text: Came down here on vacation, we have used a few different boat rental places so far and we definitely saved the saved the best for last. Best boat rental by far. Very clean, very respectful and courteous staff, with top of the line boats! These guys will not disappoint!

name: Bill Knox
text: April and Capt Danny were amazing in helping us with our fishing trip.  Their prices were competitive, but their service was off the hook - much like my bait.  We will be back for more.

name: Jeff McLaughlin
text: Boat itself was very enjoyable. Family loved it. However, April whomever that may be sorely needs a class in customer service and has an issue with feeling the need to be correct. Even with a paying customer.

name: Kate Green
text: Rented a boat full day on May 19th. It was the best day we had on vacation by far. Family owned very friendly. We loved the boat super comfortable sat 6 comfortable and could have sat more. Will definitely rent again when in town.

name: Michael R
text: Wonderful Time for the Family! Thanks Captain!

name: Shell Mitchell
text:
Amazing Day! Highly Recommend!

Yesterday was our 2nd time renting with Orange Beach Boat Rentals and we love their boats and their Amazing customer service. We have rented from many other rental companies and they by far have the nicest boats. We love the convenience of the restroom and the garmin gps. The orientation is very detailed and thorough. We saw lots of dolphins, went to pirates cove and did a little fishing. Once again my families favorite day of our vacation. We highly recommend Orange beach boat rentals. Highly Recommend!

name: Heather Roaden
text: Best Day on vacation!! Kids had a blast catching fish! Customer service is amazing!!! Very clean and well maintained boats! Got to see alot of Dolphins!

name: Sydney Verant
text: I highly reccomend a full day boat rental so that you have time to go to the beach, go fishing , hit the restaurants (I reccomend pirates cove), and see the dolphins. Go to the beach earlier when there are less people and drive slowly to see the dolphins. There may be a shrimp boat throwing over their unwanted catch where the dolphins are hanging out. You can buy some shrimp right from the boat too, but dont feed the dolphins: it's illegal.

name: Sherrill Mitchell
text:
Excellent Boat rental company

We rented a boat from Orange Beach boat rentals on Saturday. We had a group of 8 and it was very comfortable. The boats were extremely clean, we loved having a restroom onboard, and they rode so smoothly. We had such a great day.  Everything about this company was professional and smooth, from booking the reservation, to being greeted and instructed during the orientation., they gave us all the local tips and recommendations, which was right on point. We highly recommend renting from orange beach boat rentals and will be back soon.

name: John
text:
Great boat rental company. Highly recommend going to Robinson Island area.. there’s lots of restaurants and bars. You can also park your boat on the sandy island just south of Robinson Island (many people go there).
The instructions and orientation of the boat is from a simple 10 minute video on an iPad they give you.

name: Debbie Mcneal
text: These guys are awesome. They give you the best service in Orange Beach. They take really good care of their equipment. Have no junk. Best boat ride and fishing trip I've ever been on. Please contact them for all your boating needs when your at beach. You want be disappointed.

name: Craig Anderson
text: Great experience! I have rented from several places in OBA, and this was the easiest by far.

name: Ryanne Riegling
text: We've rented boats from many different places and this was by far the best. Very good pricing, excellent boat! The catamaran has a bathroom in it, which was super helpful since we were out all day. The boat was outfitted with a GPS / fish finder and the company provided a very detailed map to go along with it. The gulf is quite a large area and this made it very easy to navigate.

name: Kevin Tuttle
text: Me my family had a great time anybody that complains about the $75 charge cost for running into sand bar are idiots or must be drunk  and not paying attention I had no problem  with the state-of-the-art of quipment that they supply I also went to Robinson beach but I did not beach the boat I went to the radar showed 2' and had no problem my family swam we caught fish the great thing about it was the bathroom for my small children was the excellent decision we had a great time rented for a whole day Jack the deckhand did a excellent job in explaining everything and showed great care for my children and safety I would definitely rent from them again no questions asked it was a great experience

name: Rachael Austin
text: Fantastic boat rental company! They are very thorough and make sure your boating needs are met. They provide great customer service and the boats are easy to operate and fully equipped. Will be renting from them again, hopefully soon!

name: Steve Vance
text: Great company that truly understands customer service. They went out of their way to ensure our day was trouble free and enjoyable with a very structured introduction to the boat and area. Although, the most important touch was their genuine care for my son who was sick the night before, checking on him even after our boat ride. Class acts.

name: Shqne 850
text: Had a great time! Knowledgeable staff, showed us fishing spots and where to go for some good food! Very clean boats. 10/10 I will definitely return!

name: Albert Garcia
text:
Absolutely Fantastic!!!!
We rented a boat yesterday from Orange Beach Boat Rentals, and had the BEST Day ever. Our family of 5, 2 adults and 3 kids spent most of the day at the island swimming and hanging out on the beach, the island was such a fun atmosphere, my kids played with all the other kids, we had a picnic on the beach, and got a nice tan. On our way back in we saw lots of dolphins, they are just amazing to watch, and our on private dolphin show.  Our check in process was super easy, Igor gave us a very detailed orientation and explained to us how to stay safe. The boat was Very nice, it had a full restroom, a nice stereo system, comfortable cushions a canopy to get out of the sun, our motor was super quiet and cranked on the 1st turn, in the past we rented from other companies, and their boats don't even come close to Orange Beach Boat Rentals. We can't wait to come back. We highly recommend!

name: Brenda O’Quinn
text:
Best Day Ever!

We had a Great Day. The boats were very nice. We saw dolphins, went to pirates cove and swam near the islands. The boat was very nice and had a lot of get up and go power. We were a family of 7, with 2 small kids, they napped perfect on the boat, as the back of the boat had a nice canopy and comfortable seat cushions. We couldn’t have asked for a better day on the water. We will be back in a few months and will only rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals, as they truly are the Best.

name: Kelly Robertson
text:
Amazing Boat Rental!
We rented an 8 hour boat rental yesterday for our family of 5. It was a perfect day. Igor did our orientation he was very nice and answered all of our 150 questions. The boats were very nice and clean, the restroom was such a nice bonus. The shallow water alarm was very helpful of keeping us away from the sandbars.
We spent most of the day on Bird Island, and stopped by Pirates Cove on our way back, then finished the day watching all the beautiful dolphins.  We have rented from many companies before and Orange Beach Boat Rentals does it right. We Highly recommend them, and we can’t wait to come back and rent again.
Robertson Family

name: Emma Whitlock
text:
Amazing Boats!
We had a Great day on the water. We spent most of the day watching dolphins, swimming, fishing. The boats were perfect, very clean and had lots of extras. We loved having the restroom, the shallow water alarm kept us safe, the islands were beautiful. It was an Anazing day. We can’t wait to go again. I highly recommend Orange Beach Boat Rentals, as they made sure to cover all the details to make our day perfect.

name: Timothy Thurnes
text: Friendly and helpful staff. Equipment is clean and in great condition. We really enjoyed the experience.

name: Keila Morse
text: It was not very luxurious but they had a small toilet on board.

name: Mike
text:
These people are top notch. Very nice and informative. We took our 6 year old out and let him catch fish. Captain Egor was busy but still was more than happy to answer any questions we had. He led us right to the fish. You get a map with Fishing spots,restaurants,dolphins and other attractions that’s easy to follow. I will be renting another boat from them next time I come.
As far as the prop goes: don’t run it in the sand and you won’t be charged. Pay attention to the channel markers and the gps mapping that is provided on the boat. It only takes common sense. As a boat owner myself I know how expensive props and lower units are so I completely understand there charge for running there boat aground.

name: Marylynn Dibble
text:
Fun day on the water!!!!
My family took a boat out yesterday with Orange Beach Boat Rentals. It was a Awesome experience from the time of booking till the very end. Fantastic boats with a nice Restroom, lots of room. It had a GPS on it with a shallow water alarm which kept me away from the sandbars. We went to pirates cove and had a cheeseburger in paradise, we saw so many dolphins and had the best day of our vacation. Orange Beach Boat Rentals really made us feel welcome, and even gave us some great tips where to take our kids fishing. We have rented from several other companies and this was the Best experience we have ever had, we will defiantly be back. Thank you again, my kids will talk about this day forever now.

name: Momma Savannah
text: Awesome day on the water!!!!!  My family absolutely had the best day on the water. The boat was Great, it had a nice canopy so my kids could stay in the shade, a Full RESTROOM, which was so convenient, a stereo system which was awesome while we were parked at the islands, and lots of storage for our stuff. This was not our 1st time out with Orange Beach Boat Rentals, and we will be back again next year, Thanks Again for a Awesome day on the water..

name: Jason Easter
text:
The BEST - only rent here!

My family and I rented a boat for the day & were EXTREMELY impressed!! Such great service, attention to detail, nice clean boats & most of all personal, professional service from a husband & wife team.  They went over in detail with us on how to operate the boat safely, understand the GPS and the shallow water alarm, and even gave us a laminated map with all the local waterfront resturants, fishing spots and where the Islands were. As another reviewer said -they have great reviews for a reason! We felt personally welcome & safe on the boat & they wanted us to enjoy our experience. We saw 24 dolphins- no kidding- all on our own as we cruised the back bay areas. Better than any dolphin cruise we have ever been on- our 2 boys (7 & 9) loved it! We rented some fishing equipment for our boys & it was perfectly prepared and on the boat for us when we arrived. Can't say enough about how impressed we were with Orange Beach Boat Rentals, as we have rented from other companies in the area and we will be back with them on our next trip to Orange Beach.  Call early to reserve as they do book up!

name: Brian Handke
text:
Awesome!!!
That is the only way this company can be described.  They go above and beyond on everything, the boats are great, the GPS is great, the maps are unbelievably detailed, the video explaining everything, Jack then went over everything again and even helped us load and unload the boat.  We rented for 8 hours and ran all the way up to Perdido Key bridge then down to Robinson Island and back and only used $40 in gas.  Got to see a bunch of dolphins, had a blast at "hermit crab island" near Holiday Harbor, and had an awesome time at Pirate's Cove, letting the kids swim while we waited on our food.  Really can't say enough good things about these folks, will definitely rent from them again when we come back!!

name: Kristy Santa Cruz
text:
Awesome Boats! We had so Much Fun!!

My family of 5 had a wonderful day on the water. The boat was spacious, very clean, and very well equipped with lots of extras, including a Restroom, GPS and large map, it even had a radio with xm radio. Much better than others that I had looked at in the area. I booked online, it was very easy, and they emailed me my confirmation, and directions.  Igor was very friendly, patient, and very informative during our orientation he explained to us how to stay off the sandbars, and gave us some great fishing tips too. We had a great, safe day on the water, we should have applied more sunscreen as we were all having so much fun and forgot.  Will definitely rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals again. Thank you so much for such a wonderful trip! Our kids can't stop talking about how much fun they had!

name: Meagan McClain
text: Thoroughly enjoyed our time on the water, great recommendations with places to eat and where to fish and see dolphins. Pirates cove will definitely be a place that we revisit. We will be using orange beach rentals again.

name: Adam Austin
text:
I COULDN'T BE HAPPIER WITH THIS TRIP!
I called to rent a boat for me and the wife to go out for a day! Booking was easy and Captain Igor met us at the boat launch to explain boat safety and great places to explore. Rachael and I spent all day boating! Robinson Island was our fun and the water was so clear that day. We felt like we were in the Bahamas. We explored some of the bay and stopped by Pirates Cove for a drink. We loved seeing the dolphins and the sunset on the way back was beautiful. The boat was clean and in good condition. Overall, very pleased with this trip!

name: Cazes Martin
text: Our family rented a boat for the day and had a perfect time. Boat was clean and  comfortable and ran perfectly. Igor and April were very friendly, attentive and professional and were genuinely focused on assuring that we had a nice day. I've been going to the Gulf Shores area for 30 years and had never rented a boat to explore the back waters - we'll have a boat day every year from now on!

name: Monica Sands
text:
AWESOME! AWESOME! AWESOME!
We rented a boat yesterday June 8th, 2017 from Orange Beach Boat Rentals.  Everything was just Amazing, we rented some rods and bait, and they had it ready on the boat when we got there, he showed us on the map where the fish were biting the day prior and gave my son some great fishing tips.  After fishing for a few hours, we did catch and release, we ran into a group of about 15 dolphins, they were so graceful and beautiful, we had our on Private Dolphin Cruise.  We then pulled into Ingram's Bayou, which was easy to find from the map that was provided to us and we swam for a while, then went back out and watched the dolphins some more. Then we pulled up to a secluded beach and found some nice treasures to take back with us " shells, driftwood etc."  It was such a perfect day, and Igor and April was so accommodating, we felt so welcome on their boats, and they really went above and beyond in many ways. There was even a restroom on the boat! The GPS was a huge plus and the shallow water alarm kept us away from the sandbars.  So glad we found Orange Beach boat rentals, we will make this a annual trip now.  Thanks Again so much from the Sands Family!

name: Sunshine S.
text:
BEST BOAT RENTALS ON THE ISLAND!!!

Starting from the time of booking "which we did online" to the emailed instructions & directions to our orientation, then a great day on the water,  up until we unloaded from our day on the water was smooth and enjoyable. We loved the boat, the restroom was a great bonus as well as the gps which made navigation around the shallow areas easy. We spent most of the day at the islands, found some shells, did a little fishing and saw lots of dolphins. We ate lunch at Tacky Jacks, we just pulled right up on the boat and tied up, super convenient. We have been coming to Orange Beach 1-2 times a year for the last 10+ years, and we will Only rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals from now on.  Great People and Great Boats!

name: Dusty Bias
text:
I have rented from Orange Beach Boat Rentals multiple times over the years. I have always had the best experience and really felt like we got the best bang for our buck. The boats are reliable, clean, and properly prepared to accommodate the needs of any boater.

The bays around Orange Beach can be challenging and confusing for someone who has never spent time boating in the area. Orange Beach Boat Rentals does a fantastic job giving a quick and thorough tutorial of the the local waters, preparing you for a fun and safe day boating.

name: Katy Marie Heick
text: We recently rented a pontoon boat from Orange Beach Boat Rentals and had a great experience! The reservation, payment, pick up, and drop off processes were easy peasy. Igor and Jack were friendly and definitely knew what they were doing. Would recommend and will be back next time we're in OB!

name: David Barajas
text:
This operation is phenomenal!! - No rigid fixed time slots, very accommodating and great services!

My family was in Orange Beach for a USSSA World Series torny and
my grandson had a very tight schedule..

I needed to start our day earlier than their normal time, and wanted to use the boat for 6 hours instead of their normal 4.. NO PROBLEM!

We had a great time out, saw lots of wildlife, birds, dolphins and
had a great time fishing.

Boats are clean, easy to handle, and staff is top notch!!
Made a great addition to our vacation.

If I'm ever back in this area I will definitely use them again.

Thanks to all!

name: Ron Thrift
text:
HIGHLIGHT OF OUR VACATION !!!
Thank you Igor a April for our smooth experience.
Great directions, pleasant boat orientation, clean and reliable boat
with a restroom aboard ! Map and GPS were great, XM radio jamming..
WE LOVED THE BEACHES, PIRATES COVE AND ABUNDANCE OF DOLPHINS ALL AROUND !
I am so glad that we have booked week in advance before all boats were taken. We will be back next year!
Highly recommend to any family visiting Orange Beach

name: Tomas Kratochvil
text:
Best Boat Rental!!!

Nicest boat we have ever rented, it looked like a personál boat and not a normal standard rental. The restroom was a huge bonus. Very comfortable and smooth ride. Igor was very professional and provided us with some local knowledge of where to go and we had a awesome day on the water. I will be reccomending Orange Beach Rentals to all my friends and family. Amazing day.

name: Caleb Santa Cruz
text: Very fun atmosphere! The boat was clean and comfortable. Our captain made it a very fun, safe trip and my family and I thoroughly enjoyed it. We will definitely be using A-Pair-A-Dice Charters again and I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Jackie Thurnes
text: Super friendly! Great advice on lunch, fishing and dolphin watching!

name: Archie Little
text: Great experience. Enjoyed the day. Nice friendly service.

name: Shell Mitchell
text:
Amazing Operation! Highly Recommend.

They run a top notch operation, our boat was Amazing, clean, had a full restroom, lots of other extras and a Yamaha 150hp motor that had some get up and go, these boats are Amazing unlike other rental companies who we have rented from  in the past which had 60hp motors, which were loud and smoked on us the whole time.  We saw 20 + dolphins, were able to visit Pirates Cove and the Flora Bama Yacht club in the same day, such a fun filled day, we can't wait to do it again. We will only rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals in the future, we highly recommend them. Thank you for truly making our day Amazing.
Thank you- The Mitchells

name: Brandon barenis
text: Had a great time. The boat had very good equipment and was also very clean! There was also a bathroom on board which other rental boats we looked at didn't have.

name: Kristy Beard
text: This was our 2nd time renting from Orange Beach Boat Rentals, and it was once again a Great experience. We had such a perfect day on the water we saw lots of dolphins, went over to pirates cove, and we all got way to much sun ;)  We love their boats compared to others we have rented in the area. The restroom is super convenient, the xm radio is great, and loved the power of the 150 hp motor, and the boat rides super smooth. Once again they exceeded our expectations. They also have a great map which makes it easy to navigate. We can't say enough good things about this company, they are truly a pleasure to rent from. We can't wait to rent again and go back out on the beautiful bays of Orange Beach.

name: Talk Time
text: We were going to rent a boat, but opted for a private shrimping cruise after talking to April!  Our captain was Matt, and he was amazing!  He was a family man and very knowledgeable about the area as well as the marine life.  We got to see and touch stingrays, flounder, shrimp, catfish, squid, jelly fish, and other fish!  The dolphins swam up close to the boat and sprayed us several times!  The dolphin cruise boats followed our boat for dolphin sightings for about 5 minutes.  We also got to hang out at Pirate's Cove.  It was the highlight of our trip!

name: Wendy GODWIN
text:
Best Rentals on the Island!

Nicest boats we have found and they had power (Yamaha 150hp)  We rented the boat on Memorial Day weekend and went over to Pirates Cove it's a awesome place to visit, then we went over to the islands and the kids played and swam, and we even saw dolphins while we were there. Then we went over to Tacky Jacks on the water, and just pulled in and got out and ate lunch, that was pretty cool.  They meet us on the boat at 9am (our scheduled time to arrive) did our orientation and gave us all the pointers we needed to find the dolphins and the better fishing spots too, and fitted the kids with life vest.  We rented a few rods from him, and he had everything already on the boat when we got there.  So just to sum it up, we went fishing, stopped by pirates cove, hung out at the islands for a couple hours, ate lunch at a waterfront restaurant, saw dolphins, and my kids even napped on the ride back to the marine. We had such a fun day and can't wait to do it again.

name: Fabio Soller
text: Awesome Day on the Bay!! We had one day to play while coming to mobile and we chose to rent this boat.. it's not a pontoon but more like a small catamaran  but we had a wonderful time the boat was amazing and it had a bathroom which is a huge plus, and a really nice stereo system..  We rented fishing rods and bait and fished all over the bay.  Everything was in perfect condition and captain Igor was awesome and made sure we had everything we needed . He gave us a map so we could stop and dock the boat and eat at some of the restaurants along the bay ... on our way back in the evening the dolphins were everywhere and they were jumping and playing . We kept our distance and didn't want to disturb them but they were so beautiful to watch ...if you make the trip to robinsons island it's about a 45 min ride and it's usually busy there but it's beautiful and a great swimming area, we had a fantastic day and highly recommend Orange Beach Boat Rentals to all our friends.

name: Kacie Pipkins
text: The boat was very nice. But just like another person said in the reviews if you rent from this company be prepared to pay the extra $75 dollars for prop damage. Me and my family has owned a boat for many years and simply hitting sand one time does not damage the prop. They paint fresh red paint on the bottom of the prop and if any lil bit of paint is gone they are gonna charge you. It's a complete rip off. And just like they did on the last persons review they are gonna come onder my review and try to defend there selves. We saw this review prior to renting from this company and didn't really think any thing of it. But like I said the boat was nice and Yes it has state of the art equipment on it but that still doesn't always prevent you from bumping some sand. So be prepared to pay the extra $75 or just don't stop at any island.

resp.text:
We are very sorry about your additional cost due to running into the sand.
The reason the paint looks shiny and wet is because it’s an Epoxy paint - hardest paint known, which cures with shiny Amino blush film on top.
Most of our customers do not have issues with bumping into the sand
also we only charge the prop fee if damage is medium to severe.
We are truly sorry,  Capt. Igor

name: Israel Pipkins
text:
I was satisfied with the trip up to the point I was informed I would owe an additional 75$ due to the fact I scratched some of the red paint,  that Orange Beach Boat Rentals, had hand painted on the skeg. Which is the fin below the propeller. This is painted solely for the purpose of seeing if this fin has touched sand. Keep in mind, this is hand paint that was painted on moments before rental. Which will come off just by operating this boat. I asked exactly what damage had been done to the prop, and I was told I had damaged the (Stuff) inside the the propeller.  When asked which part? Like, shaft, bearings, gears, or seals! He was confused and only could explain that if the paint was gone the lower unit was damaged! The boat was returned in perfect working condition. But I was still charged an additional 75$. I bought this mistake. There is no need for u to do so as well. Consider someone else for your rental needs or be prepared to pay an additional 75$ God Bless! And safe travels!
It is very unfair to assume everyone that rents from you is uneducated in the operation of a boats lower unit. You see I grease my own foot, change my own water pump, and props. I service my own Yamaha outboard. I understand you are used to dealing with those who do not do these things. That's why it's only fair for me to share this to help them out before they do business with you!

resp.text:
We are very sorry about your additional cost due to running into the sand.
Yes we paint the lower part of the motor so we know if lower unit been digging thru the sand.
Your statement that we painted it moments before the rental is false. The reason the paint looks shiny and wet is because it’s an Epoxy paint - hardest paint known, which cures with shiny Amino blush film on top.
Yes we brush it on by hand, because spray-paint is 4-5 times thinner. It does not come off at all unless you drag  4000 Lbs boat thru the sand. It’s a lot of wear and tear.
Prior every departure, there is 15min orientation on video which clearly explain the operation around sandbars,
the GPS shallow water alarm and there is a special section informing you if you run into the sand there is a $75 charge. No hidden fees, everything is loud and clear upfront.
I would like to believe, We have it almost foolproof, There is GPS which color-marks shallower waters less than  6 feet in blue color, Deep water is white color. You go less than 3 feet –alarm sounds.
While cruising sandbars are bright yellow visible from a distance by untrained eye.

We specifically ask in the video to not beach the boat due to our shallow access. We ask to keep the boat floating in at least 2 feet of water with motor trimmed up.
I am sorry my helper Stahl was not able properly explain the damage of the Propeller’s  hub.
(Rubber and composite bushing between the transmission drive shaft and Prop it’s self)
This is a sacrificial part to protect $ 2,600 lower unit.  Can’t be seen by eye, it’s inside the prop.
Cost of this Power-tech hub is $ 69.00 plus $ 6.00 shipping, labor 45 min on my end – No charge.
If prop shop does it, cost is $ 280.00 .  Damage does not stop here, as the propeller work in the sand the blades loosing the cup. (ability to scoop water and go forward, start just slicing water, Rpm running high and boat does not go fast anymore). Replacement cost $ 630.00
I am losing more than you  with your damage.

You present yourself as a motor educated person and trying to help out other people.
We thank you. We are honest and we go beyond, our boats are nicest on the island.

Captain Igor

name: Jennifer Hanger-Musson
text: What a great experience.   Igor was awesome and explained everything perfectly!

name: Carol Thrift
text: What a fun day on the water. The boat was super nice, had a full restroom, nice stereo system, comfy cushions, it was by far the nicest rental we have ever rented. We went to Pirates Cove and had a bushwacker and a cheeseburger, drove around saw tons of dolphins, then went over to the island and collected seashells and played in the water. It was a pefect day, we will defiently be renting from them again, Highly recommend Orange Beach Boat Rentals!

name: Loredana N
text: booked a pontoon when showed up they  told me -its rented out they apologize but they  can give me newer one almost 200$ more then we have agreed . they acknowledge their mistake but wouldn't do anything to fix it .we were  very upset especially kids  ((((

resp.text: PLEASE DELETE THIS FALSE REVIEW!!!!  I'm Sorry, but you are mistaken, you have written this review under the wrong company, you may be speaking of OB Watersports, but we are Orange Beach Boat Rentals, we are at the Wharf Marina in Orange Beach, not Tacky Jacks area in which you are speaking of. You are not a customer of ours, or ever spent money with us.  We take payment at the time of booking, there is NO way for us to give your boat to someone else, because you have already paid for it.  Please kindly remove this false review from our company.  If your still in the area we would love the opportunity to serve your family, we promise to give you the Best Customer Service possible.

name: Jim Paar
text: Great pricing, super clean boats, and love the extra attention to details. Thank you!

name: Alison Sturtz
text: Good

name: Brenda Highfield
text: Great fun on the water clean boat

name: Orange Beach Boat Rentals
text: Great specials for Orange Beach Boat Rentals this Fall #orangebeachboatrental

name: Stephan Searles
text: The Intimidator fishing charter was the highlight of my trip to the Gulf Shores!! Captain Johnny Greene and his crew are simple exemplary. Every stop we made we were catching fish. He knows all the great places to go to guarantee a great experience!  The fishing was non-stop once we dropped our lines. These guys are the best in class! I highly recommend the Intimidator Charter if you are looking for an fishing experience like no other and memories that will last a lifetime! Next time I'm down in Gulf Shores I'll be back out there fishing! Thanks again Captain Johnny!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Chad Rosson
text: Could not have asked for a better trip! I’ve been on many trips where watching the time was more important than putting you on the fish. Capt. Johnny Green went out of his way to ensure we caught all the fish we wanted and had a great time. Will definitely be booking again with the Intimidator.

resp.text: Thank you. I appreciate it!

name: Nick Tawbush
text: I have been Fishing in the gulf a few times with other charters and never have I had such results. The crew was outstanding, very helpfull and knowledgeable. They kept us very busy fishing. Captain Johnny is by far the best charter captain Ive dealt with. He knows were the fish are and he puts you on them. Theres no question who I would go on a charter with again.

resp.text: Thanks bud!

name: Jeff Fincannon
text:
Are you kidding me? This guy is awesome.

This was my third trip with Captain Jonny and he did not disappoint. I have been on many charter boats through the years, mostly all duds, but not the Intimidator. We have caught fish every time until our arms fell off.
The crew is very patient, friendly, great cooks and know how to catch fish. What else could you ask for. If you are fishing from another boat, I feel bad for you. Trust me, the people that walk by and see our catch at the end of the day feel bad also.

Thank you Captain for another wonderful trip that we all will never forget.

resp.text: Thank you very much!

name: C Summers
text:
What an amazing trip! The Captain had us on nonstop fish every time we stopped. We ran out of space in the boat for fish. My two sons talked about it all the way home. The captain is an expert. His mates made sure we always had bait, drinks and excellent hot food. They also kept the boat very clean. Boat had lots of room in the A/C. Plenty of bathrooms, sunshine and good fish talk. Thanks for the memories Captain Johnny!
Chris Summers- Watkinsville, GA

resp.text: Thank you Chris! iI was my pleasure having you and your family on board. Hope to see you again soon friend.

name: Andrew Sturgill
text: First time to see ocean let alone go on a fishing trip. Will definitely go back. Good people lots of fun. These guys know what they are doing for sure. 10 out of 10 stars.

resp.text: Thank you. I’m glad you came along with us!

name: Ralph Holland
text: Great trip with an excellent crew and the best captain I’ve had the pleasure of fishing with. We limited out all 3 days of our trip with some massive red snappers. Highly recommend if your in the Orange Beach area.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Gary Williams
text:
Captain Johnny and his crew are the best the crew and the Captain are so much fun to go fishing with they are always on the fish. This was my 3rd time fishing with them and it’s always so much fun.
Thank You Captain Johnny and Crew for the best fishing trips!!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Connie Blalock
text: We had a great time on The Intimidator. The Captain and deck hands were the best. Made sure the kids had a memorable fishing day at sea. Already planning our next trip with Captain Johnny Green and the Intimidator.

resp.text: Thank you!! It was such a great day!

name: Pat Hodgson
text: Jonnny Greene and The Intimidator will be one of the best offshore fishing experiences you will ever have. I have booked his overnight trip about 8 tines now and he and his crew have never disappointed. They work their butts off, answer any questions, feed you like a king and clean and bag all the fish when you get back. When I take my customers they are always blown away with the entire experience not to mention the fish in the cooler. It is awesome and a bucket lister for any serious anger. BOOK IT. Fantastic memories forever. I always look forward to the next trip.

resp.text: Thank you Pat. I appreciate your business and friendship!

name: Johnny Signs
text: 1st class captain and 1st class crew. I seldom ever write these reviews. Book your trip now - you won’t be disappointed.

resp.text: I genuinely appreciate your business and the opportunity to fish with y’all. Can’t wait to have y’all back again soon

name: Allan Shorts
text: best Captain on the gulf! i have had many trips since early’90s and Captain Johnny never disappoints! he is very good on advising weather conditions and safety!!

resp.text: Thank you!  It’s always a pleasure to fish with someone for 30 years!

name: Joe H
text: We had an awesome time this week fishing for Tuna at Orange Beach Alabama. I would highly recommend Intimidator Charters if you want to have a good time fishing. Thanks again Captain Johnny, Rheiban, Jake, and Robert!

resp.text: Thanks Joe!

name: Mike Orluck
text:
Great 3 day  trip! Captain and crew are top notch! They got us on the fish and kept us there. Exceeded expectations!

Thank you captain Johnny and crew.

resp.text: Thank you! I hope to see y’all again soon!

name: Doug King
text: Capt Johnny and his crew are the best I've ever fished with. I highly recommend the Intemidator!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review but y’all’s friendship means more to us!  Thank you for the Opportunity to show your party a good time.

name: Nicholas Foss
text:
Captain Johnny and his staff are top notch!
Our group went on a three day trip.  We caught a wide variety of fish and plenty of them.
I had an absolute blast!

resp.text: Thank you very much

name: James Cassidy
text: The Captain and Crew are very professional and fun!  We were on a two day excursion for fun and man did we have it!  We ate great, had awesome fun, decent weather, and a plus was we were able to catch some great fish!  If you are looking for the whole package I highly recommend Intimidator Sportfishing!  They make the experience all about the customer. I can’t wait to go again!

resp.text: Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a great review!

name: FLATLINE INC
text: Had an awesome trip. Great captain and crew.

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Joseph Cauthen
text: Our trip on March 3, 2020 seemed like it might be a washout as the predictions at first were for high winds and rain. We prayed for good weather and God answered our prayers and gave us a sunny day and light winds for our 6-hour trip. I cannot say enough about the great trip we had. From my first phone call to the end of our trip it was like talking to family. Everyone was courteous, informative and friendly. All the crew were experienced. We caught a lot of fish, red snapper which was out of season and we could not keep but also trigger fish, white snapper and vermilion snapper which filled up a bushel basket. The crew was very good at showing us the characteristics of each fish for instance like how to tell a red snapper from a vermillion snapper. I asked Captain Green to cut the trip a little short as three out of the 8 in our group stayed sick the whole time and could not fish. One had never been out on a charter boat. I think we would have caught even more fish but I did not want to see them suffer any longer. I felt real disappointment from Captain Green and the crew about me making that call which was really impressive. This crew wants to make sure your trip is special and I will certainly be booking again with them when I go deep sea fishing.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the time to put such a great review up.  I really appreciate it and hope to see y’all again soon!

name: Kim Petitt
text: I took my son and his friend offshore for a couple of days with the Intimidator and the crew. This was the most amazing trip I’ve ever experienced. The captain was amazing and the crew was top notch!  We were taken care of and caught an amazing amount of fish. We’ve already booked our next trip!  Hands down the best charter in the Gulf!

resp.text: Thank you for this opportunity. I appreciate you allowing us to share in the investment you made in time you made for your family on the boat!

name: Keith Harildstad
text: Great crew!  Braved the weather & our gang!  Fish on!

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Daniel NeSmith
text: Captain Johnny is amazing! Grady and Ruben were awesome.  Extremely courteous and knowledgeable.  Great times and BIG fish!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review.  We appreciate it!

name: Michael Bass
text: Best charter fishing boat in the orange beach area!! Capt Johnny will put you on the fish and send you home with a cooler filled with meat and a lifetime of memories with your family and friends!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity Michael. We look forward to fishing with you soon again!

name: Swainy 2016
text:
Amazing first trip!!

This was my first Off shore deep sea fishing trip. Captain Johnny and his deckhands were outstanding. They taught my friends and I everything we needed to know for our first trip. We had so much fun that day and I can not wait to come back soon with my family and get to experience everything again. The boat was so clean and well kept I could not believe it, most respectful crew in Orange Beach!! See y'all soon guys!
-- Christopher

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity!

name: Danny Brown
text: Great captain, crew and boat.  Capn Johnny works his tail off to make sure your hard earned money is money well spent.  Fishing with him for several years now and due to Covid my trip had to be postponed until June this year.  red snappers and tuna here we come!  Caught the snappers and tunas and wahoo and mahi-mahi and…..great trip

resp.text: Thank you so much, we appreciate your continued business. Looking forward to seeing y’all soon!

name: Eddie Mays
text: Another tremendous fishing trip on the Intimidator. Captain and crew are the absolute best in the business. They put us on a Red Snapper hole where all ten of us caught our limit. We also caught monster size grouper. Thank You Captain and Crew!

resp.text: Thank you Eddie

name: Jake Ell
text: The Captain and the crew of the Intimidator are non notch. I will be going back in the future.
