resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to fish with you and your party.  I appreciate the kind words

name: Shane Jackson
text: Had another great trip with the Intimidator team this year! Limit of big snapper, a huge grouper, and plenty of fish all around.  Already looking for a trip date next summer.

resp.text: Thank you bud! Hope to see y’all again soon!

name: Nick Gachassin 3
text: Capt. Johnny and his crew have provided us and our guests with many wonderful experiences and memories!  He and his team are hands down the most professional and skilled charter group in the entire Gulf of Mexico.  Whether you are looking for a trip for the family, friends or clients - you will be viewed by all as the hero for booking a trip on the Intimidator!  One note of caution, this experience can be addictive...we started 19 years ago with day trip, then after 3 years or so tried an overnighter and now all these years later we are hooked on the 3-day trip. In my opinion, there is nothing on this earth more peaceful, relaxing, or enjoyable than the time spent on the Intimidator.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for your patronage and friendship.  We look forward to our next adventure!

name: Mike Goraum
text: Took my kids out today for their first trip. Captain had us catching fish right away.  My girls had a blast.  They are ready to go again.  Recommend to all.

resp.text: Thank you very much. We enjoy seeing them have a good time!

name: Bryan Pate
text: I’ve been on multiple overnight tuna trips, but none like the ones with Captain Johnny and his crew on  the Intimidator!  Great group of people who know how to have fun on G-rated family trips but most importantly know how to catch fish!  Big fish and lots of them. Can’t recommend them highly enough...I’d give them 10 stars if I could!!!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Dave Dauenhauer
text: You wanna go fishing on some other fishing boat. Go ahead and keep catching bait! Once you go on the Intimidator out of Orange Beach Alabama you won't wanna fish with anybody else. Not for big fish or little fish! They do it all. From the Captain on down to the mates everything is first class. They even grill on a Big Green Egg onboard the Intimidator! Capt. Johnny Greene is by far above his class when it comes to knowledge and hospitality! Book your next trip onboard the Intimidator! You won't be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Fendall Laughlin
text: Boat is amazing and Captain Johnny is an A+ Captain. Went out with 15 buddies, caught all the fish we could ask for and had an absolute blast. Will be back for sure

resp.text: Thank you so much. You guys were the best group I’ve had in a long time!

name: Chris Turner
text: I would highly recommend the Intimidator Sport Fishing Charter.  My company sponsors several customer outings a year, and a deep sea fishing trip is always a big hit on the Intimidator.  Captain is a pro, mates are friendly and willing to help with any level of fisherman, from children to seasoned pros.  Everything was provided, boat and tackle is always top of the line...we were able to catch a big variety of fish, along with having a FUN time doing it.

resp.text: Thank you! You are the best!

name: Tommie Majure
text: Great trip and the hardest working crew on the gulf.

resp.text: Thank you!  We really appreciate that!

name: Roland Aldridge
text: I’ve been fishing 3 day trips on the Intimidator for 14 years in a row sometimes twice a year and I have never had a bad time. You will not regret it from a half day to a three day. Great people and a great Captain.

resp.text: Thank you very much!  We appreciate your continued business

name: Bryan Cooper
text: Highly recommend Capt Johnny and his crew!!! We went on an amazing 3 day trip and can’t wait to get back down to go again. Capt and crew are very professional, accommodating and knowledgeable in all aspects.

name: murray bartlett
text: Captain Jonny and his crew are amazing .They work  very hard to make sure everyone has a great trip . Captain Jonny holds his crew to the highest standards. resp.text: I really appreciate the kind words and look forward to our next trip!

text: Thoroughly enjoyed the experience with Imtimidator! Wasn't a great weather day but we still had fun and caught fish! Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you very much. It is always a blast when y’all show come!

name: Bud Isley
text: Top notch charter the customer service is great and they feed you like a king

resp.text: Thank you very much we appreciate it

name: Cooper Welch

name: Chris Cooper
text: I had an amazing trip with my family! We went on a 12 hour fishing trip and were amazed with how everything went. The mates were very helpful and informative, they were always right there a step ahead of the game. The boat was very clean with a satellite TV and air conditioning in the inside! The captain has been fishing for over 25 years of experience and was very respectful and treated my family just like he would his own! The trip was just as described and I look forward to fishing again with this crew!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a nice review for us! We appreciate it and look forward to the next trip

name: David Martin
text: Great crew, great Captain and a great time had by all! If you want to have a great deep sea fishing experience in the Gulf of Mexico, then the Intimidator is your ticket! The food was also amazing.

name: Stephanie Yeung
text: Fantastic charter! Captain Greene has some great spots where we caught fish immediately and pulled out some nice looking snapper. The captain and crew were very efficient and no sooner had I pulled out a fish that my line was already re-baited.  I would definitely recommend the Intimidator for a charter.

name: Bradley Sanders

name: Pete Madonia
text: Just came back from an overnight trip with Captain Johnny Greene on the Intimidator 7/23-24/2019. It was an awesome trip. The accommodations are comfortable, the food was great, and the Captain and his crew ( Rueben, Josh,  and Grady) we’re very professional and helpful in getting us many fish(yellowfin tuna, black fin tuna, red snapper, and mahi-mahi). These folks know how to catch fish and how to treat people. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a fishing trip in the gulf.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review. I appreciate the opportunity to fish with you!

text: Love Captain Johnny and the crew. We always have a great time and they are very professional.

name: David Fehr
text: Intimidator does not disappoint these boys give in awesome 110 percent.

resp.text: Thank you. Have a safe trip home and be safe with all that crazy weather!

name: Jim Ferguson
text: Took my son and 7 of his buds out on a Senior in high school fishing trip.  Amazing time was had by all.  Caught a great variety of fish YF Tun, BF Tuna, Amberjack, Wahoo, Grouper, Mackerel.  This was my 6th trip on the intimidator and Captain Johnny Greene has delivered every time.  The crew was very knowledgeable and attentive to our every need.  These guys take the art of fishing to a very detailed level and proven by filling the boxes with fish.  We elected to have all of our meals prepared on the overnighter and the food was very good.  I would Highly recommend this trip and I will be scheduling a return trip this spring.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your continued business. We always look forward to you and your family,  friends and colleagues. Thanks again

name: Viet Tran
text: We are from Pensacola and fish the area quite a bit.  A group of our friends from out of town were coming to visit and wanted to charter a large boat.  After asking around, the Intimidator Charter kept coming up as the best charter boat around so we booked them immediately for the busy July 4th weekend..  Captain Greene and his crew, JT and Cory, of the Intimidator Fishing Charter were class acts.  Captain Greene was very accommodating of our large group.  The boat was ready to go, clean, and fully stocked for our early morning trip.  The crew did an outstanding job getting us all on fish and keeping us there.  Every member of the crew worked their tails off making sure we were geared and baited up throughout a busy bite.  Everyone caught their limit and we went home with expertly cleaned and bagged fish.  I give The Intimidator my highest recommendation and will be booking a multi day trip soon!

resp.text: Thank you very much!

name: Marty Hermes
text: Easy booking  clean very knowledgeable of the best holes to fish for the big ones on Lake Michigan out of Frankfort mi . Book early for best dates!

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Dusty Ledbetter
text: Awesome Captain, Crew and Experience.  Results speak for themselves!!!

resp.text: Thank you very very much!

name: Andy Hargrove
text: Great trip with Capt. Patrick!  He was great with my 8 year old, put us on the fish, and made sure we had a good time.  I will definitely book again if we head out to Mobile Bay!

name: Eric Wittig
text: Captain Patrick did an awesome job listening what we wanted to catch on our trip and putting us on a load of fish. The morning definitely flies by when everyone is catching fish and you get to land some fish on a variety of tackle setups. I would highly recommend Ugly Fishing to anyone who is taking a trip down to the coast! Book now, you won’t regret it.

resp.text: Thank you sir for the review and for the business. It’s a real joy for me as a guide for anglers to be able to experience a variety of fish and or tactics. You and your dad did fantastic and I hope to be your guide again in the future.

name: Jamie Lindsey
text: Captain Patrick is awesome.  We had been on 5 trips with him and we always have a great time and catch lots of fish.  His wit and wisdom make the trip very enjoyable

name: Davina Hood
text:
Love our trips out with Captain Patric! He put us on some good fish to catch. We have booked 2 trips with him to date and for sure will book when we come back again. Captain Patric has us spoiled to fishing, which is only made better by family competition!
I definitely recommend using Ugly fishing LLC. This is definitely a new family favorite that our kids look forward to! Thank you for such a great time !

resp.text: Thank you so much for continued business and for the awesome review! It’s a real pleasure to be your family’s fishing guide and I absolutely love the competitive nature.

name: Bryan Viles
text: Captain Patric is a class act. He put us on the fish! We  connected with multiple trophy sized speckled trout! Definitely the guy to call if you’re in the area and looking for an excellent fishing experience.

name: Daniel Barbier
text: I highly recommend Capt. Patric if you’re in the Mobile Bay Area and want to catch fish. I was on a family trip in Dauphin Island and wanted to make a solo trip to try and find some bigger speckled trout and we did just that.  Within 45 minutes of leaving the dock, I had a 22” we each had a 20” in the boat along with some others that were in the 15-18” range.  Overall I was very pleased with the trip, Capt. Patric was very knowledgeable and the boat was really nice.  I’ll definitely be giving him a shout next time I’m in the area. Thanks again Patric!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Daniel! It’s my pleasure to have put you on the fish you were after. I hope you enjoyed your trip to South West Alabama. Please give me a shot again in the future.

name: George Moore
text: This was the best inshore charter. The boys wanted  to catch Shark and man we caught them. Two fifteen year old boy slept good that night.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for the business. It was a real pleasure to serve y’all. The boys were very appreciative of everything which makes my job that much more rewarding. I hope to guide y’all again in the future.

name: Todd McGarrity
text: I have fished with Captain Patric multiple times and have a great experience every time. He is knowledgeable and fun to hang with but most importantly - you can tell he LOVES what he does. Can’t wait to fish with him again soon!

name: Marc Nations
text: The day fishing with Patrick was great. He put us on fish quickly and took care of us all day. He knows his stuff and he made sure that we knew how to fish successfully. I highly recommend him as a Mobile bay fishing guide.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and thank you for choosing me to be your fishing guide. I hope to be your guide again in the future

name: Victor Menoni
text: Fantastic experience. Patric was very courteous and knowledgeable. Put us right on the fish. Nice haul of redfish and speckled trout. Highly recommended.

name: Vic Wiggins
text: I took my son and grandson Sheephead fishing with Patric and we couldn’t have had a better experience. Patric is extremely knowledgeable and really makes the trip a lot of fun. resp.text: Thank you for the review Vic. It was a pleasure to show y’all a small portion of the Alabama Coastal fishery. Thank you for booking and I look forward to our next trip.

name: Shane Taylor
text: 20 stars if it would allow it. Our family had a great fishing trip with Captain Patric. We had a family of 5 and his boat accommodated us very well. He worked hard taking us to several spots to get us on some fish. We were able to keep 38 sheepshead and 1 spotted trout.  I really respect how he will meet you at the boat launch that gives us the best shot at catching fish for the day. He's now our choice of charter while visiting the beach. Absolutely will be booking again soon. Thanks Captain Patric for a great day on the water.

resp.text: 20 stars would be awesome and I’d give y’all a 20 star review for being awesome customers! I am looking forward towards our trip you scheduled in March.

name: Beard Face

resp.text: Thank you for the review. It was a great pleasure to be your fishing guide today.

name: Susan Jernigan
text: Had the best day catching trout and sheephead today!! Highly recommend Captain Patrick and Ugly Fishing. First time for trout, catch 8 and had fun with this big sheephead!

name: larry bailey
text:
Been going fishing with Captain Patrick for four years now. Sometimes twice a year. Never disappointed, and have a blast. Best fishing guide around, and I’ll
Never use anyone else. We come from KY just to fish with him. He’ll put you on the fish and it’s an experience you’ll never forget or regret!  You want a fishing trip of a lifetime? Then plan a trip with Captain Patrick @ Ugly fishing !!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for the repeat business. I always enjoy guiding my Kentucky guys! Till next time my friend!

name: Tim Gentzlinger
text: Captain Patric of Ugly Fishing in Mobile Bay Alabama is a top notch fishing guide. He put us on a redfish bite like I have never seen before. He completed my quest to catch a redfish in Alabama within the first 5 minutes of the trip. Very knowledgeable of the area and a pleasure to fish with. Can’t wait to get another day on the water with him. Once again thank you for the memorable day on the bay. Fish on brother 🔥

resp.text: Tim, it was a real pleasure to be your fishing guide. You have know idea how happy I was to be the guy who put you on your first Alabama redfish. Thank you for booking and I hope you can do it again sometime.

name: Greg Pridgen
text: CPT Patric got us on the fish early and kept us on them all day.  He’s very knowledgeable of the area and was fun to be around.  We were able to land a few big Jacks in addition to a few nice Reds, some Specs and White Trout....  we even got an unexpected flounder.  Definitely plan to book him again in the future.

resp.text: Greg I really appreciate the review! I love a nice mixed bag day like y’all had. Thank you for your business and I hope to be your guide again some day.

name: Gail Moore
text: What a great fishing trip with Captain Patrick. Early we caught so many speckled trout we lost count. While we were doing this Tom and George each caught a big bull red. Then it was off to look for more redfish which we found and caught. Captain Patrick was so helpful with instructions and giving us different baits and lures to try when the bite would occasionally slow down. What a fun day. We will definitely book with Captain Patrick again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mrs. Gail! It was a real treat to be y’all’s fishing guide for the day. I hope to see y’all again.

name: Chris Gurner
text: I have fished with Ugly Fishing for several years now and can say that every year the experience is top notch. If you are looking for a guide service that knows where to fish and how to fish you’ve found it with Patric.

name: Bill Meadows
text: Had a blast fishing for trout, sheephead  and flounder with Captain Patrick. It wasis a very cold day and he didn’t hesitate to take us fishing and show us a great time!

resp.text: Thank you for the review but most importantly thank you for booking with Ugly Fishing! We aim to please 😃

name: Brandon Davenport
text: Had a blast fishing with Capt. Patrick was awesome. I’m not much on fishing but hooking into those jacks was amazing! Never thought I’d have as much fun or stay as busy on fish as we did both days. Going to try and get out there again next year for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brandon! It’s always a pleasurable day on the water with my boys from Kentucky! I’m pumped the jacks were so cooperative and those snapper were awesome as well!

text: I have been fishing over a handful of times with Patric. He is by far the best and most knowledgable guide in the Coastal Alabama area. He will put you on fish!

name: Jacob Chandler
text: I can not say enough good things about Capt Patric Garmeson and Ugly Fishing Charters. Over the last few years my family and I have been on several trips with Patric and not once did we come back without smiles on everyone’s face.  Capt Patric has a true love for his profession and it shows through the knowledge he freely shares with his guests. If you are considering trying Ugly Fishing I suggest you book early because his schedule stays packed!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and the continued support. You are correct I absolutely love my job and the fishery I get to guide on. I love taking the boys fishing but it was nice to actually be your fishing guide this last time around. Till next time my friend.

text: I can not say enough good things about Capt Patric Garmeson and Ugly Fishing Charters. text: Very knowledgeable of the Mobile Bay.  Taught me techniques and tactics that I didn’t previously utilize.  Highly recommend for anyone from beginner to expert in inshore fishing.

name: Marshall Short
text: It got real ugly out there!  He got us on to some monster reds! Patric was great! He has the best boat we've ever been on as well.

name: Chris Graves
text:
Patric kept us busy from the time he picked us up until the time he dropped us back off.
Couldn't have asked for a better day or trip.  My 10 year old son hasn't stopped taking about the 12 foot hammerhead shark!  Highly recommend taking a boat ride with Patric. We will be back.  Thanks again!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! It was a real pleasure guiding y’all on the Gulf. The hammerhead is certainly the highlight of my summer as well.

text: My family had a great time fishing with Patrick. Conditions weren't favorable for snapper so he put us on the trout and redfish. He was awesome with my 3 girls ages 9 to 15. Two of which had never been out a charter trip.

text: Captain Patric was outstanding, he was patient with the kids, taught the adults a few new things and most importantly, we caught a lot of fish.

text: Patrick is absolutely the best guide! We took my 5 year old nephew with us, he spent the day helping him so we could fish.
