resp.text: Thank you for the review. I really love my job which many people can see my passion when we are on the water. Thank you for the kind words.

name: Justin Williams
text: Had a blast with Patric. Highlight of the trip was definitely the hammerhead!! Will book again!!

resp.text: The hammerhead was a highlight of my career! As an inshore/nearshore Captain I don’t carry tackle big enough to handle a shark of that size. It was awesome! Thank you for booking and the awesome review!

name: Dan Walsh
text: Fantastic trip.  Knowledgeable and friendly guide.  Will hire again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and thank you for choosing me to be your fishing guide.

name: gary roberts
text: We been out with Captain Patric a couple times he always put us on the bite. The last time we went to a natural gas rig, there were multiple boats fishing we had the only boat catching fish. We limited out on red snapper then went after redfish. Captain Patric is very knowledgeable and makes fishing a great experience for everyone. I wouldn't use anyone else for my fishing trips

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experiences. Y’all are a pleasure to guide and it’s an honor to be your only guide! Thank you for the repeat business and I look forward to our next outing. And thanks for stopping by to say hello at the baseball field it was good to see you!

name: gary roberts
text: We been out with Captain Patric a couple times he always put us on the bite. The last time we went to a natural gas rig, there were multiple boats fishing we had the only boat catching fish. We limited out on red snapper then went after redfish. Captain Patric is very knowledgeable and makes fishing a great experience for everyone. I wouldn't use anyone else for my fishing trips

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experiences. Y’all are a pleasure to guide and it’s an honor to be your only guide! Thank you for the repeat business and I look forward to our next outing. And thanks for stopping by to say hello at the baseball field it was good to see you!

name: John Christian
text: Had a great trip with Patric and highly recommend. Patric is extremely knowledgeable and works hard to ensure his clients have a great experience. I can’t wait until our next trip!

resp.text: John, thank you so much for the review and for booking with Ugly Fishing. The boys did great and I hope to be your guide service again one day.

name: kyle lapp
text: Went out on with my 6 year old son and within minutes of being on the boat we were on some speckled trout. After catching many, we moved on to catch some redfish and that didn’t take long either. We both had a great time.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and most importantly thank you for booking with Ugly Fishing. It was a lot of fun helping Eastwood catch fish. I’m so happy the trip was a success.

name: Jeffery Carter
text: We had a blast.  Super knowledgeable guide. Caught a ton of fish and leaned even more along the way

resp.text: Thanks Jeff. I hope to share a little something with my guests each time out. I’m happy to know you were soaking in the info I was sharing.

name: J. Brongo
text: Excellent fishing.  Guide is top notch and the boat is very comfortable and clean.  I would highly recommend Patric to anyone who wants to catch fish!

resp.text: Thank you for the business and the 5 star review. I hope you make it up my way again for a future fishing trip. I’m not 100% sure I can top the results of your first trip but I will certainly attempt to do so.

name: Shane Brooks
text: I have fished all over the country with guides.  Professional & Sincere,  are hard attributes to come by and Patrick has them.  He wasn’t there to take us on a “boat ride” he wanted us to create some memories; And we did! -great job

resp.text:
Creating memories is what I do! Thank you for choosing me to be your fishing
Guide!

name: John Coll
text: Captain Patrick made this fisherman's dream come true. We started with world class Sheep Head and ended up successfully sight fishing for Bull Reds. We caught plenty of quality fish including a state record hooked by Pat. The whole experience was truly memorable.

resp.text: Thank you for the review John and It was an honor to share that day with you. Let’s do it again!

name: David Johnson
text: Best fishing experience I’ve had in years

resp.text: Thanks for the review David and I enjoyed being your fishing guide.

name: Tommy Copeland
text: Captain Patric was awesome my son and I had a blast and left with plenty of reds and specks ..Have done several fishing charters through the years ..Ugly Fishing out shined them all..will recommend it to anyone interested in charter fishing. Captain  was very knowledgeable and personable..thanks for a great time

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Tommy. It was a real treat to be able to provide the service for you and your son. I absolutely loved watching him reel in all those fish!

name: Tamara Akins
text: Absolutely the most fun!!!  Attentive and engaging.  Highly recommend Captain Patrick!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Tamara! I really enjoyed guiding and teaching you and Jerald on how to catch sheepshead.

name: Greg Kennedy
text: Patrick took us out Christmas week and we had a great trip!! The weather was questionable but with Patrick’s local fishing knowledge with cleaned up!! Filled the cooler with speckled trout, white trout, black drum and a redfish! We’ll be frying fish for weekends to come! Thanks for a great memorable trip! Well be back for sure!

resp.text: Greg, thank you for the review and opportunity to guide y’all. I really enjoyed teaching the three of you how to catch the winter time fish in deep water. I hope to be your guide again.

name: Joshua Knight
text: Patrick put us on fish all around the bay! Awesome boat, highly recommend, the man knew his stuff.Thanks again.

resp.text: Josh, thanks for the review! Two things I can always control. 1st my effort into putting customers on fish. 2nd the quality of my equipment. It means a lot that you noticed and that you highly recommend me and my company. Till next time my friend!

name: Vanessa Hale
text: Capt. Patric was great! He took great care of us, even baiting our hooks! Super fun day out on the bay!!! Thanks so much!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Vanessa. Y’all caught some great fish! I hope I can be your captain again someday.

name: Dan L.
text: Captain Patric is a true pro.  He's patient with inexperienced fishermen,  works hard for his clients, gets results, and is simply a pleasure to go fishing with.  Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Dan. It was a real treat to be able to teach Vaughn how to catch a fish.

name: Craig Newton
text: Very knowledgable captain that works hard to keep you on the fish!!

resp.text: Thank you Craig. Trying to learn a little bit each day and pass that along.

name: Ried Baker
text: A very knowledgeable captain. He was able to put us on top of some fish. It was a very good time.

resp.text: Ried, thank you for the review! Your fishing trip was a lot of fun! I’m still amazed by the size of some of the fish y’all caught!

name: Andrew Carpenter
text: Had a blast, and caught a lot of fish. Captain Patric kept us on top of the fish all day, and there was not a dull moment. He taught me a lot about saltwater fishing, and you could immediately tell he loves what he does and is very good at it. I will definitely be back and plan to make it into at least a yearly trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Andrew. It’s a real pleasure to take anglers like yourself fishing on Mobile Bay. The bay is my home and I thoroughly enjoy my job.

name: Kevin Gore
text: Went fishing with Captain Jeff yesterday morning. We had a great time catching red snapper, Spanish makrel and a nice jack. Captain Jeff is very knowledgeable of the area and I would highly recommend Ugly Fishing to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Kevin. Jeff is a   New addition to the team and he certainly has his heart in the job. Thanks for choosing Ugly Fishing as your fishing guide service

name: Danielle Davidson
text: We went fishing today with Capt. Patric on the eastern shore of Mobile Bay. Patric is an extremely knowledgeable guide with an affinity for making his anglers feel safe, confident, and fulfilled. We are experienced anglers that are new to the area and feel that we can now head out on the water with a solid plan. Patric is a fantastic teacher, we learned about the area, local techniques, and  seasonal patterns. No questions about recommending Captain Patric to anyone from novice to expert for a great day on the water, he will go above and beyond to make your personal experience the best it can be.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Danielle. It was a great honor to be your fishing guide. You and Nobel are both great anglers and it was a treat to be able to share with you what I have learned over the years.

name: Hank Arnold
text: Fished with Patric for redfish last week. Took some buddies from South Georgia that have fished for trout and redfish their whole lives, Patric impressed them in the delta. Limit of redfish plus trout, drum. lots of catfish and a bass. Lots of action, lots of over slot fish to throw back. Patric never quits, I tell him its like having a buddy with a cool boat that knows how to make it happen! Spent the day "whackin pumpkins". Thanks for the great time, we will be back, the "bucket list" keeps growing. KWE!!

resp.text: Hank, it is about time to go whack some more pumpkins sir! Thank you for the review and the detail you put into it. For those who don’t know a pumpkin is a term used for a redfish that is really orange in color much like a pumpkin. This coloration also tends to show up the most in the fall of the year.

name: Josh Ayers
text: Booked at noon same day last minute and Patrick had no issues taking us out for a few hours. Very patient with the rookies. Would definitely recommend for any bay fishing....

resp.text: Josh, thank you for your review! It is frustrating for me when I have customers calling and I can’t get them on the water. I’m so glad that we were able to work things out.

name: Harrison Balzli
text: Awesome morning out in the delta rivers. Went for reds and had our limit in less than a hour. They were the larger slots as well as quite a few bulls that were tagged and released for another day! Also had a few bags of speckled trout to bring home. Patric was a great host and really knows how to navigate these waters well and find the fish!Thanks for the trip

resp.text: Harrison, thank you for the review! It was a great pleasure to spend the morning with you and your father and I hope to be able to teach you more about Mobile Bay in the future.

name: rhoward2780
text: If you like catching fish, Captain Patric will put you in the middle of the action. Had a great day of catching red fish, speckled trout, and a variety of other fish. Ugly Fishing, LLC is the way to go on Mobile Bay!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review. It was quite enjoyable to teach you how to catch Speckled trout and redfish on artificial lures.

name: Amanda Griswold
text: Amazing!! Patrick is a very well educated guide. He made the trip enjoyable by sharing facts of the surrounding environment, his knowledge about different species of fish, and how to catch them. He did a great job keeping us busy and moving around as needed. As well as being patient, and stepping in to assist with casting if needed. It seemed he would do as little or as much as you wanted him to, and somehow could pick up on it without a word. It was an excellent trip. We asked for Redfish and got the most I’ve ever caught. We will be back to try out more fishing in the spring.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Amanda. I am really glad that we were able to get this trip put together on such short turnaround. Y’all did a great job listening and capitalizing on the bites. Nice work and congrats on catching some great redfish. Check out The post I made on Facebook and Instagram.

name: Jimmy Ray Smith (JRay)
text: On time and ready to catch fish. Patric took great care of us from beginning to end. Caught a bunch of red fish and trout.

resp.text: Your the man Jimmy Ray! Thank you for the review

name: jason pepperman
text: Went out after speckled trout with Patric on New Years Eve morning. He's very knowledgeable about the fish as well as the water we were fishing. He suggested a couple of different hard baits and we got the trout biting. We caught a lot of fish in just a couple of hours and I caught my biggest trout ever that morning. Great trip. Looking forward to going again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Jason. Teaching people new techniques and strategies while figuring out what the fish want is so much fun. I am very excited about being a part of you landing your trophy speckled trout. I look forward to our next outing.

name: The Barn at Big Oak Hill Ranch
text: We had a great day on the water today with Captain Patric with Ugly Fishing. He was very patient, incredibly knowledgeable of the area, and knew exactly where the fish were biting! We caught our limit on Red Snapper and Speckled Trout. Almost every cast was a bite! He even took great photos and video footage of all the action that we will treasure forever! We highly recommend booking with Ugly Fishing Charters and look forward to booking again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your story with everyone. I really enjoyed spending the day with you and your family and thanks for rescuing me.

name: Patrick Landry
text: This is my second charter fishing trip in Mobile Bay Area. Last year was my 1st & I went with a group charter that was good (3) at best. This trip with Ugly Fishing by Captain Patrick was great. Patrick called fellow colleagues to get the most up to the minute reports where conditions were good for catching desirable fish. He moved around looking for favorable conditions. We limited out on Speckled Trout and caught two 15-20 pound Jack  Crevalle's that were released. He cleaned and bagged our Speckled Trout. It was a Great Trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Pat. It’s very important that our clients feel as if they received maximum effort. Some days we can drive straight to the fish and catch them as soon as we begin and other days we have to hunt and peck to find them.

name: Joseph Steele
text: IT BE WAS FUN

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review!

name: Joshua Weaver
text: Took a trip March 2018.  Captain Patric is fantastic.  We did an inshore trip due to the East wind.  We caught a few redfish and trout early on and covered some water.  We then pulled into Weeks Bay and the last couple hours just hammered redfish.  It was a blast.  At one point, we had three on at once.  My kids (2 boys - 9 and 11) called it the best!  Without a doubt recommend Ugly Fishing and Capt Patric.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Josh! The conditions certainly were challenging but I try and roll with the punches that Mother Nature throws our way. I really enjoyed spending the day with you and your family. I hope to fish with y’all again in the future

name: BamaBassFishing TV
text: Booked a trip for speckled trout fishing with Ugly Fishing LLC on 3/4/18 with family and I can honestly say Capt. Patric Garmeson did not disappoint! He is very knowledgeable of the sport and lifestyle of fishing teaching us alot of tips and tricks on how to be better fishermen. He made sure to put us on some fish and make us more than satisfied. He went above and beyond to make sure our only worry was getting our fish to the boat he took care of any entanglement or hooked fish to make sure we got back into the water and fishing asap. We caught our limit on speckled trout and even got into a mess of redfish. We will definitely be booking with Capt. Patric again in the near future! -Chance Mosley

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! It’s our pleasure to provide a memorable experience.

name: Corey Mosley
text:
May 4 2018 I called to schedule my First speckled trout charter with my boys. We were taken out by Captain Patrick.

things started a little slow at first then he put us on some redfish.

we caught a nice mess of fish only keeping 4 nice size reds then we moved around looking for specs with a hit and miss here and there .

We caught  a shark we released.

time moved on and we went to another spot where we started getting hits.

the spec bite turned on and we sat in that one spot and  limited out of some really nice specs.
.
We had a blast out on the water all day

Captain Patrick was very knowledgable teaching us stuff and helping out .

he handled everything  all we had to do was fish.

We hooked up three and four specs at once multiple times  he definitly worked hard keeping our baits in the water to catch more fish

I will defintily be goin back again lots of fun to be had when fishing with him. Corey .

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Ugly Fishing to be your fishing guide provider. Captain Patric strives for a high quality fishing and on the water experience. We hope to work with you and your family again.

name: Bill Holland
text: Had a fantastic trip today with Ugly Fishing. Caught redfish, sheepshead and some of the largest speckle trout we've ever seen. Cptn. Patric was super, even when my grandson and his buddy (both 15) got lines tangled. We saw other boats struggling, but we got the fish. We HIGHLY recommend Ugly Fishing. Bill from Brandon Ms.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Bill. I enjoyed watching the boys catch fish and don't you worry about the tangled lines because they will happen almost everyday. I hope that we can do it again.

name: Arrow Networking (Carl)
text:
I have fished with some other fishing guides but Patric with Ugly Fishing has to be the most versatile fisherman there is on the Gulf Coast. Twice I booked at charter at two different locations we were vacationing at, once at lower Mobile Bay and the other time at Dauphin Island. How he can find fish to catch no matter where he is amazes me!
The other time we have been fishing with Patric was on Christmas Eve day, wind blowing, cold, but we filled the cooler with delicious white and speckled trout!
Don't think the price of the Ugly Fishing's charters are expensive. Patric works hard to make sure you have a great time and he has quite a lot of money tied up in his boat and tackle.
Patric is a humble guy but he is top-notch in my opinion. Whether you are a seasoned fisherman or a first timer, don't hesitate to give Patric a call.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for the review Kyle. I look forward to our next trip.

I enjoy learning the entire Mobile Bay and northern Gulf Coast to ensure that I can provide a very memorable fishing experience for all of our clients. Alabama may have a small coast line but we have a tremendous amount of high quality fishing.

name: Jason Haas
text: Just Passing on several people's opinions.

resp.text: Thanks for the recommendation pal!

name: Marcie Minear
text: Captain Ron is awesome!  He really knows his stuff!  He is the best of the best and I can’t wait to fish with him again!  If you’re looking for a fun night on the water, Night Shift Charter Service is the way to go.

name: Van Hodges
text: Captain Ron is awesome and we had a great time fishing. We did the midnight to 230am slot.

resp.text: Thanks so very.much.  do appreciate!  Really.wnjoued fishin with you, and "Lefty".  Good times

name: Scott Cobbs
text: Captain Ron Stone is an awesome guide and will put you on the fish!  Thanks Ron!

name: Riverrats Outdoors
text: I have had the privilege of knowing and fishing charters alongside Ron Stone and can tell you there is not a better guy. Ron has always been willing to go the extra mile and is a great example of what a Captain and Outdoorsman should be. You will not meet a better guy. You will not be disappointed if you decide to book a trip with Capt. Ron I'm willing to bet my name on that! Keep killin it bro!

name: Zac R
text: We had a great time with Captain Ron. If you're down in the Gulf Shores / Orange Beach, Alabama area his charter is definitely something you should check out. Our kids had a really great time. Captain Ron was wonderful with the whole family and it was one of the most fun things we did on our trip. Absolutely worth it.

name: Paige Waters
text: Great night charter! Captain Ron is awesome.

name: Jimmy Oswalt
text: Ron will put you a night of your life, Do not need to know how to shoot a Bow, he will teach you as the night goes on.

name: Jake Pin
text: Capt.Ron is phenomenal. He will make you feel right at home even if you’re a beginner, and girls don’t be afraid! Ron is prepared for anyone, my younger sister was hesitant thinking she wouldn’t be able to pull back the bow much less hit anything. That was far from true as she had the best shot of the night. He has left handed bows and extras of everything. If you’re worried about the boat not being sturdy.. don’t. We were all shocked at the stability of the vessel and Capt. Ron’s skill of maneuvering it. He wants to put you on fish, & that’s what you need. He saved our trip! Our deep sea fishing charter with a large local marina was cancelled 1hr prior to departure.. so we found Night Shift charter & decided to try something completely new to all of us. Admittedly due to lack of options and time restraints as we were leaving the next morning. We gave Ron a call just 5 hours ahead of time and luckily he wasn’t booked that night & gladly took us out. Truly Customers for life! Booking another trip soon.

name: Keith Masingale
text: WOW, Thank you Captain Ron!! My 2 sons and I had a blast. Captain Ron worked very hard to make our experience top notch.  Lot of rays, blue crabs and a few flounder. Captain Ron is very patient honest and straight forward, a real stand up guy. I would highly recommend giving Captain Ron a try!!!! We will see you next trip, we have a new tradition! 🐟

name: Ryan Parker
text: Fun times and great thing to do on vacation. Very family friendly and captain Ron will answer all your questions and explain everything to you. He provides drinks and good conversations with a fun fishing trip.

name: Dean watson
text: CAPT.  Ron did not disappoint... we found fish... Gigged them and shot them with the bows... and took them back to eat... was a great experience for the whole family !   would definitely do this trip again ...

name: cody bultsma
text: Capt ron was a hack of a man! Sure made me laugh! Really new how to get you on the fish and get you shooting stright

name: Doug Temple
text: Always an awesome time with captain Ron. Our annual bowfishing trip with him is something we look forward to each year.

name: Zack Kettells
text: Captain Ron does a great job. Highly recommend for anyone.

name: David Thompson
text: Just got back from our bowfishing trip and couldn't wait to write a review. Captain Ron was fantastic! We stuck five big flounder, one mullet, one catfish and five stingray. I've been bowfishing before but this was my wife's and brother in law's first time. The bows were new, well maintained and at a perfect draw weight. My wife had no problems at all and outshot me! The boat was comfortable and since Captain Ron only takes out parties of four or less we all had a lot of action. He was on time and very professional in setting up the charter. We had dolphins swimming all around the boat and had an amazing time. Captain Ron was very safe, polite, and great to talk too. If you have never gone bowfishing before, GO. It's a blast, and Night Shift Charter exceeded all my expectations.

name: Cody Kok
text: Just went out last night and couldn’t say enough about Captain Ron. If we come down next year we are going to go again!

name: Anne Kunkel
text: My 2sons and husband said it was the greatest time they have had he years! Mike was a great captain! They can’t wait to go back out! Caught lots of fish!

name: Michael Andress
text: Great people and accommodations we took 25 of our employees out on the 6hr trip and caught the limit on Snapper. I highly recommend Captain Mikes!

name: Daniel Paul
text: This was a great charter! They have a very large boat and the crew was a lot of fun to be around.  We caught our limit in Red Snapper and a few game fish/sharks as well.  I would definitely recommend them!

name: Debbi Smith
text: Our fishing trip with Capt. Mike and his first mate, King, was the highlight of my week at the island.  They definitely know where to put you on the fish.  The boat, the Lady Ann, is a big, fine vessel and her crew has everything you need to enjoy your fishing trip.  I sure hope I get to fish with them again.  Capt. Mike and King were the best.  They are professional, friendly, courteous, and definitely know where to find fish.  I highly recommend you book a fishing trip with them.

name: Jeff Hoehn
text: You could not ask for a more honest Captain on your fishing trip! We had a great trip only because of his honesty and integrity. We passed on a 2 day due to weather on his request and we are sooo glad we did. We did a one day instead and it was amazing. He has his customers best interest at heart not their money and that’s very hard to find these days! Thanks Captain Mike and mates King and Trey for an awesome trip.

name: Demico Thomas
text: I had a blast with this charter! Awesome staff, excellent experience!

name: Loren Steen
text: My experience with Capt Thierry left me with high regard for this man and his business.  He's a professional and a gentleman.

name: Jamie Lane
text: Would 100% recommend Captain Mike and his crew to everyone!   Captain Mike, Captain King and Trey were awesome guides and we had great fishing all day!  Could not ask for a better experience! Thank you for everything!

name: lance stewart
text: Had a great time fishing with Captain Mike, Captain King, and deck hand Trey. They are very polite and safety is their first priority.

name: Denise Keaton
text: We had one of the best fishing trips with Capt. Mike and crew.  The camaraderie with our friends was awesome.  I highly recommend fishing with Capt. Mike and look forward to doing this again.  The fun started before we left the dock and never stopped.  Capt Mike - YOU 'DA MAN!

name: Carolyn Owens
text: My Mom and I sent my husband, father, and 7 yr old son out for a morning of deep sea fishing for Father's Day and their birthdays.  It was my son's first time deep sea fishing and the crew was phenomenal. They had an absolute blast and came back already planning their next trip out.  Thank you so much for the memories!

name: Jenny Adams
text: The week of March 23, five of us took a private charter with Captain Mike and Josh.  The crew was professional, courteous, and extremely knowledgeable.  Captain Mike was determined to find a good fishing hole and he succeeded.  We caught plenty, released some, and had a fantastic time.  Josh, our deck hand, worked assisting with bait, equipment, and encouragement. It was a day my children and I will never forget.  I without hesitation recommended Captain Mike. Miss Ann, and support staff.  When we return, we will look up the Captain!!!

name: bruce burgess
text:
I have fished with Captain Mike's for 5 years and I would NEVER go fishing in the area unless I was on one of their boats.

The Captains do their absolute best to put you on the fish, and the crew is always fantastic.

If you want the full experience, plan on booking and overnight, or even a 3 day trip. You will not regret it.

Please note, while this company is amazing, they cannot control the weather or federal and local fishing regulations. My experience is that even if the weather gets in the way, Captain Mike's will do their best to accommodate your needs.

name: Griffin Hornsby
text: My dad and I went last Sunday.  I grew up deep sea fishing with my dad on his boat and had never been on a chartered boat.  The captain, the deck hands, and the whole experience was awesome.  Very kind staff and great experience.  I am looking forward to taking another trip this summer.

name: Keith Parrett
text: Great fishing trip! Everyone was great, from capt. mike to the deck hands. They work very hard to make sure you catch fish and are taken care of the entire trip. We had a group of 9 people and went on a 10 hour trip. We had pleanty of room to all fish at once and caught a variety of fish. The boat is in great shape and well taken care of. Thanks for the great time.

name: Misty Wilson
text:
My husband went snapper fishing on The Escape . He says:
Skipper kept us on fish the whole time.  Everyone caught a limit of red snapper early on, which left plenty of time to catch a mess of vermillions. The deck hands were attentive and knowledgeable.  My only complaint: some of the rigs were not well-maintained, needed to be retied, etc.
All in all, a great trip for the price.

name: Shaun Mulhall
text: Captain Skipper produced an awesome trip like always.  He works to get you on the fish.  His deck hands are personable, polite gentlemen.  Thanks again for the great tuna trip!

name: Brad Reinking
text: We used Captain Mike, King and Shelton for our fishing adventure and it was AWESOME!  All that I expected!  Great crew and caught our limit of Red Snapper even throwing some back!  Highly Recommend!

name: Sharon Bishop
text: Capt'n Mike is a legend in charter boat fishing, according to most people who know him. He can put you on fish! His crew, King and Grant make you fill comfortably and safe aboard Lady Ann. They are hardworking polite and professional gentleman. Fish for dinner!

name: Chad Hughes
text: I had a lot of fun on This fishing trip and I will go back they explained everything and they help you they even cleaned the fish just for a couple bucks. Thanks skipper for the great experience.

name: Albert Becker
text: Pure DISAPOINTMENT! We have booked a deep sea fishing trip four times and did not go out even once. In the beginning it was always the weather, at least we were told that it was too windy to go out but for sure it was not, at least it was not windy that it would have been a safety issue, maybe little shaky. After one day-before canceled trip and one last-minute (we were already on the boat!) we figured out that the problem was more that Captain Mike did not want to go out with only few people, I guess not profitable enough. I am sorry but in such a case I have to give a negative review, if you want your business to survive you have sometimes to do also the less profitable tours, just to keep customers coming and talking about your business. NEVER AGAIN, waste of my time.

name: Robert Pergler
text: Great day, great fun, great crew, great catch, what more could you ask for?

name: Christopher Thompson
text: Thanks but more importantly it was an awesome experience.

name: Joey Belmont
text: Great Boat, Great Captain, Great Crew!!!

name: Milo Gavin
text: Well run.

name: Juan1t0
text: awesome like always!

name: Mickeal Nelson
text: Awesome

name: alberto siller
text: No hassle rental. Boat was in as new condition and very clean. Very easy check in and checkout. Tyler was very friendly and easy to deal with. Very good experience and would definitely recommend this boat to anyone.

name: Eva Lord
text: Thank you to Wahoo Water-sports once again! We had an amazing day on the beautiful brand new pontoon boat we rented for the day in Orange Beach. The owner helped us himself to make sure everything was perfect for our day on the water. He provided a map of the area and made suggestions of where we should go for the day. We will definitely be renting from him again when we come back in July. Thank you!!!

name: Cyndi Montgomery
text: We rented two pontoons with a large group and had a great time. The staff were very helpful and communicative. The dolphins were a hit!

name: Olga Ascione-Spittle
text: I highly recommend Wahoo Watersports. Brooks who is the owner was so accommodating and had great recommendations for us too. He has beautiful new clean pontoons. We will be back!!

name: Mike Rogers
text: On Tuesday before Thanksgiving I called Wahoo and requested a Pontoon Boat for my family to tool around the Bay for the afternoon. I had called several other places but they were either booked, didn't sound interested at all, or were very rude. Brooks at Wahoo talked to us like a personal friend, fixed us up with a brand new pontoon and treated us like royalty when we arrived. We loved the boat. It was so nice and roomy and we just had the most incredible time. We took food aboard, fished a little, spent time looking at all the porpoises following us and came in about 5 p.m. with the joy of an incredible family time together.  My daughter replied, "Best day ever, Dad!!!" Such a special thanks is in order to Brooks who made this day so special for us.  Forget about all the other places that promise you the moon.  Ole Brooks delivered!! We will be back next year and the first place we will call to book our boat will be Wahoo Watersports. Did I mention that it was incredible?  Well, it was!!

name: Kathy Coleman
text: I called on a Tuesday afternoon and was able to rent a pontoon for a Thursday afternoon for 4 hours.  When we arrived they were ready for us and quickly took care of the business side then showed us how the boat worked, filled up the gas tank and got us on our way.  Boat was spacious and comfortable and we had a great time!  We asked for recommendations on what to see and they were very helpful.  Price was very reasonable and fuel was included which was helpful in knowing our final price!  Both employees were very nice and we are ready to go back next year on our vacation!

name: Shaun Ek
text: This is a nice little rental shop and overall I thought it was great. They took my reservation over the phone with no hassle, and even with only one day notice I was happy they had availability. They gave simple training and were friendly. The only thing I didn't like was that it takes almost 15 minutes from their beach to get out of the no wake zone, so that is a really significant chunk of time going super duper slow, so be aware of this if you plan to rent a wave runner for only one hour, you'll only have a bit over 30 minutes of actual fun time on the water.

name: Mark Austin
text: Had a great time with my wife, son and a few buddies. Very relaxing ride out to the gulf. The Captain and crew were very friendly and made sure we were taken care of. Fish on! We took back several fish and cooked up a small feast. Very delicious. Great time with the family.

name: breanne ballard
text: We rented jet skis for or first time through this company. We loved every minute of it! They explained everything thoroughly from how to use the skis to the map. Great prices and the guys helping us were great. Will definitely be going back!

name: Chad Hinders
text: I called on Monday and was able to reserve a pontoon for the next Sunday. The boat was ready to go and worked perfect for my family. The location is easy to get to and has easy access to great boating spots. Will be going back for our next rental!

name: Heidi Vallee
text: Brooks was helpful and easy to work with. Great experience touring the bay. Reasonable rate that included gas. Boat was ready right away- walk right up and we were off. Thank you!

name: Jennifer Madere
text: I can’t really say how the place was because the day before our rental we received a phone call that they have to cancel our reservation. I asked if they could assist with locating another place for us since we were out-of-towners. I received a call back about an hour later saying the rental was back on. We were very excited to get that call. The next day, morning of, on our way to the place we received another call saying our reservation was again cancelled. Just enough to ruin what we figured would be the highlight of our family trip. Very disappointed :(

name: Caitlin Marie
text: Super great service - called about a week before the 4th of July and they were able to rent us a pontoon boat. Nothing majorly fancy but it wasn’t janky either. It was perfect. Very friendly staff. We brought our super well bagged dog on board. It was such a fun time. We will definitely be using their services again in the future when we visit our favorite spot in Alabama.

name: Leigh Anne Bennett
text: Great prices and spectacular boat ride!!! Staff was friendly and helpful! A wonderful day on the Bay!

name: Bill Shumate
text: I had so much fun with our pontoon boat.  Reasonable rate and awesome deals on jet skis.

name: Carl Streeval
text:
This place is the one you want to rent from. Prices are the cheapest in the area, and the minimum time (1.5hrs) which turned to 2hrs is longer then everywhere else.
The staff are very helpful, I was able to call them several times while out on the water for directions and questions. Also the jet skis are very fast. You wont be dissatisfied with your rental or experience. Highly recommend

name: Anthony S
text: We had a great day with our boat rental from Wahoo. Very helpful and friendly staff and good prices in comparison with the area, especially since fuel is included in the price so there's no guessing game at the end. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to rent a boat.

name: Chris Oubre
text: Great owner. We had such a fun time. This owner went the extra mile, helping us with navigation and fishing spot locations. He even looked over our bait and gave us more appropriate lures.  This is the only place that I will ever rent a boat from again when I’m in Orange Beach.

name: Kelly Gomez
text: We had a great time on our pontoon boat rental! We loved that we were able to bring our own fishing gear and head out on our own adventure exploring the waters! We will definitely be back on our next trip to the beach!!

name: Tristin Miller
text: Very good staff and the jet skis were well maintained.   Fair priced and personable.  Will definitely be back and recommend to others

name: Jason Hitt
text: Great experience with Wahoo Watersports!! Brooks was extremely friendly and streamlined  in setting up our rental. And Tyler gets you in and out with a great personality! Awesome rates and they cover the gas which is an awesome perk!!

name: Michael Bearden
text: Best customer service experience I have had in the area! Great watercraft and flexible scheduling! They really go above and beyond to make sure you have the best experience possible. Ask for Tyler!

name: Shelby C
text: Love them dolphin cruise guarantee to see dolphins more than one well worth it me and my family loved it very good price. The captain let them Drive the boat!

name: Jeannie Darnell
text: We had a great time. Capt. Brooks is the best. He had us on fish in no time. The boat was nice, clean, and well maintained. We will definitely book with him again. Highly recommend him!

name: Ike Chimbandi
text: We rented a pontoon boat. Great price & extremely friendly service. We will be back, Thank you!!

name: T. Keith Hollis
text: Great service, great pontoon. Very helpful folks. No hassle rental. Highest recommendation.

name: Dennis Morgan
text: Great customer service and delivered exactly what we needed.  Rented a 24' pontoon boat for four hours and was the best price and clean boat.  Family had a blast!  Will definitely do business with them again.  Thanks for a great experience the Morgan family.

name: Nicholas Grafe
text: We had a party of 6 including an 8 year old and did the 2 hour dolphin tour. It was an incredible experience. The tour guide was super helpful with every step of the process. The employees are very customer service oriented. I highly recommend Wahoo Watersports to everyone! We will be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking your time to let us know! Our team at Wahoo Watersports continues to do our best to provide a safe, fun and enjoyable experience for our guests. Let us know ahead of time and we will do our best to accommodate, we look forward to having y'all back!

name: Jeremy Witherspoon
text: Great to do business with. Super friendly and considerate. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to do jet skis or anything else they offer. Tyler was super polite.

name: Rose Chikiar
text: This is an unforgettable experience. Forget using any other companies this one is the best! Tyler was a very knowledgeable and instructive guide. We saw dolphins, jelly fish, sting rays, and an eagle. You have to do the jet ski tour with these guys, worth every penny.

name: Kris Horning
text: We rented a pontoon boat and they were great!  Good price and super cool on timing of the return.

name: Zachary Marsh
text: If you are looking to rent jet skis, this is the place to do it! I checked out the other places in the area and none of them had better prices for the experience you get. ZERO no-wake zones to waste your time like the other places. Great military discount/incentives too!!

name: Samantha Wilkinson
text: I will totally be renting from them again they are great....very down to earth people....kind as well....the boat ride was amazing....had a lot of fun

name: Carolynn Gaylord
text: We had such a great time fishing with Captain Brooks & Will!  We caught a good bit of fish, the King Mackeral were biting!  Some boats were fishing we were catching!! Captain Brooks is a 3rd generation fisherman & knows how to put you on the bite!  Thank you Captain Brooks & Will!  I highly recommend you look him up when you are in Orange Beach!

name: Michaela May
text: Had a wonderful time doing the Jet Ski Dolphim tours. Our host Tyler was a hoot, took us around to all the hot spots. We visited sculptures submerged in water, pirate coves, a nest of a bald eagle, 3 different pods of dolphins and had 3 hours of ecstatic fun. All of us in our party fell in but it was a great time and we were all laughing and smiling the whole time. Would one hundred percent recommend, but get your sunscreen on! You also will be sore the next day in your legs so keep that in mind, just a factor of using muscles you dont normally. A fantastic time!

name: Jennifer Cotton
text: We had an awesome experience with Wahoo today. The boat was very nice, well maintained and the people were VERY PERSONABLE. Excellent customer service and warmth... what more can you ask for!

name: Chad Tucker
text: We had a party of 6 and rented 3 jet skis. The guide was very knowledgable and helpful. The 2+ hour dolphin tour was absolutely awesome and extremely high value. I would highly recommend this company to anyone who loves having too much fun. Thanks guys for the wonderful experience.

name: Chris Cash
text: Had a blast!!! Can't wait to go again!!!

name: Mike Sabin
text: Captain Brooks was a great!  His boat, Dark Thirty, was a trusty old gal. We were a party of 4 from Ohio and this was our first deep sea trip in the Gulf. We were here in November, off season, but caught 4 nice Bull Redfisf and 4 King Mackeral.  Loved it.  Great service.  First mate, Will, did a great job of rigging our poles and putting us on the fish. All in all, we highly recommend them.

name: Patrick
text: We went on a dolphin tour with Patrick as our tour guide! It was an absolute blast!! I'm going to recommend this to family and friends! We saw so many dolphins. Patrick was able to get us right on top of them and gave us an amplatude of options while we were out there!! I definitely will be coming back every year!!

name: Andrew Trefny
text: Brooks and Jason are awesome. Don't go out when it's choppy waters. These dudes seriously know what they're doing though. Support the locals for sure.

name: Alex Mounsey
text: I've rented at a couple places the past few years, and this is by far the best. Great wave runners and great hospitality.

name: Joey Roberto
text: Nicest pontoon boat I've ever rented!  Looks and runs brand new.  Great customer service!  Renting again from them today.

name: Charlie Gonzales
text: The best rentals we've found around Perdido. We rented a pontoon boat for 4 hrs and went out to the sand bars. The whole party had a great time.  Our boat was very clean and had Bluetooth radio.

name: Brayden Grimsley
text: Rented jet skis from here and loved it! Fair pricing, great staff, and a decent sized area to ride in

name: David Belser
text: Excellent equipment and very nice guys to deal with.  They had the better looking pontoon boats of all the other places.

name: Redmond Wilkerson
text: Unparalleled hospitality. We called them out of no where to book a fishing charter and didn't know what to do after and they called a taxi for us and gave us hotel recommendations that were perfect. We didn't catch any fish but was worth the experience itself.

resp.text: Thank you so much, we enjoyed having y'all!

name: Chickie Martin
text:
We have rented here in past years, but NEVER again....the pontoons were in deplorable condition, no one was on the premises when we arrived at our reserved time...someone arrived 20 minutes later !
Over the day fee of $450., we were charged more fees,.!

name: Billy Brooks
text: Great experience! Great equipment? Great service! Nice staff!

name: Lee “CHILLEDxFIGHTER” Wells
text: Great, helpful, and great prices

name: Nikki Mutschler
text: I would give no stars if it was possible. We rented a pontoon boat and 4 jet skis. 15 mins into our rental time one of the jet skis wasn't working. We had to tow it back to the rental place. Waited for 20 mins and no one was there. Asked for refund and owner refused to give refund!!!!

resp.text:
Hi NIkki,

We apologize for the inconvenience during your time with us. Yes, unfortunately, even the new 2015 jet skis have unforsseen issues that arise. We offered one of our functional jet skis to make up for the unfortunate situation, and you chose to decline.  As a business, we would lose money if we issued full refunds when working replacement equipment is available. Again, we are very sorry that you didn't enjoy your experience with us.

name: Tyler Jones
text: Hand an amazing time renting our jet skis from wahoo watersports! We rented 4 skis for the hour rental and we had such a good time we decided to go do one of the jet skis dolphin tours with pattrick and had a wonderful time we got to see dolphins and play around a bunch!! It was an awesome experience and I would highly recommend them as a family fun destination.

name: Garrett Orange
text: If looking to go out on the water this is your place to go very affordable and friendly staff

name: Shane Williams
text: They don't have a negative star; otherwise I would use it. Their equipment is old and outdated. Who knows if its even sea worthy.  Their equipment breaks down and they will not refund you. We had to drag a jet ski that stopped working just as soon as we left the marina... We were unable to get in touch with anyone other than the employee who sent us out on the unit. He assured us that instead of sending another ski that they would refund us for one of the units...The owner was disrespectful and very unprofessional! Do not use this company! Im posting to all my friends to warn all of their friends!

name: Clifford Hepler
text: If only 0 stars was an option. Pulled up at roughly 2:15 for the 2:30 dolphin tour. Chose wahoo over dolphins because of the interaction with the dolphins. When we arrived, about 4 ppl were outside. We parked, and the ppl had disappearef. Nobody in the building. Still no appearance by 2:30 so we left. Really would love to know how a business makes money when they cannot have sales due to no personnel around

name: Angie McCurley
text: Loved the dolphin tour and the guide knowledge of area and wildlife.

name: Adam Knapp
text:
I had an amazing day with Capt Chris. I was traveling through the Fairhope, AL, area for work and found myself with a free morning.

Capt Chris was consummate professional. He communicated clearly about where and when to meet him and the expectations for the trip. We were blessed with an idyllic day - blue skies, gentle breezes, and calm waters.

Capt Chris worked hard to put me on the fish. He explained the technique and put me in some productive water to start. We moved around a bit to find some more active areas, and boy did we find one. By the end of the day, we had caught a bunch of beautiful redfish, a black drum, and a speckled trout.

Fishing with Capt Chris was like fishing with an old buddy, and fortunately, one who has nice equipment and knowledge to find and catch fish. I hope I find myself in the area again to fish with him.

name: Jessie Smith
text: I highly recommend fishing with Captain Chris me and my son had an awesome experience and my son's first experience and we'll definitely be doing it again.

name: julesjrtx
text: Chris put us on the fish despite having to dodge the rain much of the morning.  A great guide, and a greater man.

name: Gary Sullivan
text: My wife and I fished with Capt Chris and couldn't have enjoyed our day any more! He was a great captain and guide. The sights, the fish, the conversation, and the information was all superb. We will absolutely be repeat customers with Southern Exposure Inshore Fishing!!!

name: Jamie Carabin
text: Chris is fantastic! Our family of 4 had a blast...slayed the red fish! Was really fun, some great memories for sure. Thank you Chris!

name: A Pettitt
text: I would recommend Southern Exposure to anyone looking for an amazing fishing experience!  Couldn't have asked for a better guide. Captain Chris has a wonderful personality matched with years of experience.  He treated us like family and put us on some very nice fish.  I will definitely be back to Alabama fishing with Captain Chris again.

name: Malcolm Carson
text: My son and I fished with Captain Chris on 7/1/15.  We had a very successful trip.  Catching fish was superseded only by our captain's personality, character and professionalism. We will definitely be calling him for a charter again.  Thanks, Chris       Malcolm and Maxwell Carson

name: Kathy Kawka
text: We had the best time fishing with Capt. Chris Tew.   He really knows what he's doing when it comes to fishing Mobile Bay and/or the inshore waters of Weeks Bay.  We've been on the water with him several times and it's always been great.  Fishing with adults is one thing but his kindness and patience towards our grandchildren was memorable and we'll definitely charter with him again. If you haven't chartered with Capt. Chris or gotten to know him you're missing a great experience.

name: Joey Duncan
text: We had an awesome trip. The people are awesome to just sit and talk with, and they are very knowledgeable on fishing and extremely knowledgeable on the area. Highly recommend.

name: MyFathers TwoAcres
text: Great place.  Very friendly service from a knowledgeable staff.  Will be back very soon.

name: Andrew Farrow
text: I stopped by on a trip to Sipsey fork. They have an amazing selection of flies and other items you may need for a trip. The guys here are extremely knowledgeable and are happy to chat with you for a while and give you some good recommendations for what you may need for any fishing trip. They also know and provide the dam schedule which was fantastic for planning a trip since you don't want to drive all the way out here just to find out you won't be able to fish cause the dam is generating.

name: Clay Gary
text: Had a great time. Guides were super nice. Highly recommend.

name: Rick Mason
text: Had a great time with Brandon our guide!  He knows where to find big Rainbow Trout!

name: Bryan Jenkins
text: Had an awesome morning being guided by MC. She did a wonderful job of teaching us the basics and it was my son’s first time. Needless to say he is now “hooked”.

name: Keith Crouch
text:
Great experience with Brandon as our guide.  My Father-in-law and myself are rookies in the fly fishing world.  Brandon is a great teacher and is very patient!  I will definitely be back and encourage anyone that loves to fish to give these guys a try and definately check them shop out!
Keith Crouch

name: James Huff
text:
We had a great time discovering and catching Rainbow trout for the first time!  The guided instruction was useful and memorable for future  use.......we intend to fish more.  All services were as advertised.  I am definitely planning to return with all the guys.

I would go to the fly shop first before going to the water.  I am glad that we got some instruction first before going on our first Rainbow trout trip!

name: Jason Cheney
text:
Extremely friendly and knowledgeable family.
They absolutely love to talk fishing.
Bought waders and boots for my wife and they took all the time she needed to make the right choice for her.

While my wife was trying on the waders & boots I learned a few things I was doing wrong chasing stripers on the lake from Mary Carole. Who incidentally just finished a guide trip with a client that landed a 20" rainbow!

Brandon and Mary run a great shop. Plenty of fishing gear and tying supplies.
They're quite a ways from our place in arley but I, and now my wife, really enjoy getting down there when we can.

Highly recommended whether you're a complete newbie or a seasoned veteran.

name: Tyler Hunter
text: Outstanding fly shop. They are very willing to teach or help you with anything related to becoming a better angler. I learned a lot of good stuff from Randy and Brandon.

name: Joseph Wolf
text: Quality service and instruction

name: Anthony Josey
text: Outstanding customer service, went above and beyond to make sure I found what I needed.

name: Carl Cathey
text: I stopped by outside of their normal business hours, and they were very accommodating.  Great folks, I'll go back for sure!

name: Connor Baker
text: Love this place! If you want to learn about Smith Lake or Sipsey Fork, book a guide trip with Brandon, he knows what he is talking about and it is a blast! I also have purchased two rods here.  Randy was very helpful and helped me find the right rod for what I wanted to fish! Can't recommend enough! Great shop and great people!

name: Leah Rasbury
text: We did the 11 mile trip yesterday and it was really nice! The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable and the shop itself is so awesome! Definitely a highlight, was playing Bama Cab in the van on the ride back to the shop after our trip!!! I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family!

name: Shawn Stevens
text: Great service and advice on fishing and supplies needed. Super friendly staff! Will definitely come back for a guided fishing trip!

name: Taylor Hall
text:
Cannot recommend this place enough! Booked a half-day wading trip to start learning how to fly fish and it was even better than I had hoped for!

Brandon is a fantastic guide who was incredibly patient and broke everything down in a very straight forward manner, making it easy to make decent casts and start working to get better. He took the time to teach us stuff so that we could come back and fish on our own.

You can tell he his guide service is VERY kid friendly!

I cannot wait to work on the stuff he taught us and take another trip to get additional instruction!

****edited: I was able to work my way back on my own to fish the same river and caught two beautiful rainbows on my own! Second trip fly fishing and I have to give credit to the guiding service because without the initial lesson I wouldn’t have figured it out so quick!!!

name: Jacob Maples
text: Great selection on everything from flies, rods, reeds, and outerwear. Awesome people who know the water and are more then willing to help.

name: Pat combs
text: Wonderful, owner helped us out a lot on Places to go.Hot slots!!

name: John Bibow
text: L@@@@llaall//well stocked, professional,  and helpful

name: Brandon White
text: Great people! I’ve made the drive from Birmingham multiple times to shop here. Most memorable was buying my first fly outfit and getting some great casting instruction. Highly recommended.

name: David Davis
text: Great folks!!!! Hospitable and friendly!!! Thanks as always!

name: Bo Turner
text: I want to give a big shout out to the guys at Riverside Fly Shop.  Yesterday I went out with the owner Brandon Jackson for a little private instruction and my first try at fly fishing.  These guys are incredibly helpful and patient with a clumsy beginner like me.  If you’re a fisherman and want to try something different or if you are a beginner and just want to give it a try I recommend these guys highly.  This would also be an awesome Christmas gift for an outdoorsy person.  It’s also worth the drive to stop by and take a look around their shop or ask questions.  Thanks Randy and Brandon for all the help!  I had a blast.

name: Vicki Raynes
text: Our vacation here was wonderful. We camped here and the site was very secluded. The owner of the shop was very informative about the best places on the Sipsy River to fly fish and what flies to use.  The view was wonderful and the River was beautiful. A great place to have a very private vacation.

name: Jon Nash
text: My wife surprised me with a guided trip on Fathers Day, and I learned more in that 4 hours than all of my previous fly fishing trips combined. Excellent, personalized, and patient instruction, and super fun. Brandon is the Bill Nye the science guy of guides, with the temperament of a monk. I had the time of my life. I left with a wealth of knowledge and stocked up on quality equipment at Riverside before heading home to Birmingham.

name: Clint Rice
text: This place has everything u need to fly fishing ,,,they even do tours to teach you how to fish ,,,the spot is perfect place to fish and beautiful as can be

name: Lee McKibben
text: Great experience. These guys really know fly fishing. Try one of their guided trips for rainbow trout. We did and had a great time!!

name: L J Donelson
text: The pros!  Great guide trips and lessons, prices are just right, and the staff are friendly.

name: Clint Rice
text: This place has everything u need to fly fishing ,,,they even do tours to teach you how to fish ,,,the spot is perfect place to fish and beautiful as can be

name: M Ashley
text: Great shop, better than many I have been to out west. Very helpful on what the fish are biting, caught fish on exactly what was recommended by them. Highly recommend.

name: Scott Lysle
text: It is a decent little shop.  They have pretty good tying materials and they do have kayaks to rent.

name: Ron Sparkman
text: Brandon was a great guide.  He taught us how to fish and where to fish.  We caught several and had a great time.  I highly recommend them!

name: Mark Howard
text: Brandon is an amazing guide!  Friendly and talented.  His expertise is absolutely wonderful. Visiting Riverside Fly Shop is a must for fly fishing enthusiasts.

name: JJ Yount
text: Great folks, great shop. Being new to the area and fly fishing, the guided trip was great for me. Randy helped me work on my skills and helped me learn the river.

name: Rick Carroll
text: Very knowledgeable staff if you are willing to learn,knows a very lot about the sipsey fork and fly fishing in general,just ask Randy or Brandon and they will let teach you everything they know!!

name: Nathan Purvis
text: Randy & Brandon are always a pleasure to see & do business with.

name: Danny Roberts
text: Nice to have experts on fishing if they say try this bet on it

name: Virginia Blackwood
text: Fantastic people! Great experience! Well stocked.

name: Steve Hawkins
text: If you want to catch trout in the south, this is where you need to be. The folks at the shop know this river and they know trout. The shop is outstanding for beginner and seasoned trout bums like myself. Drove all the way from maine not only to catch trout but to visit with randy. He knows flyfishing!

name: Tangy Bodie
text: The owner took time to talk to us about fly fishing and the other goodies they offer. Really neat shop and Beautiful scenery!

name: Shannon Franks
text: Fantastic service and knowledge of fly fishing not only in their area but anywhere in the state of Alabama and surrounding states. If you like to fly fish or want to learn , this is the fly shop to visit!!

name: Tina Aaron
text: We had 14 people today do the 11 mile canoe trip and had wonderful service.

name: Dustin Brumfield
text: great atmosphere and quality gear. The service and hospitality were top notch and very much appreciated.

name: taj101276
text: Great Fly shop at the Sipsey Fork. Brandon and his family are super people and I have enjoyed buying fly fishing gear & doing a guided fly fishing 1/2 day trip with them.

name: Bryan Shelton
text: Best guided trip I've been on very knowledgeable

name: Clay Snowden
text: Amazing staff that was willing to stay open late to talk with us because we came from out of town and even showed us where to fish. Will be going back soon!!

name: Dave Hall
text:
Great place for fly fishing equipment
Fly tying supplies

name: Dennis Sadler
text: Class A. Very helpful . A must go !!!

name: deborah fuqua
text: I can't wait to take my son here!! !🎣

name: Alton Ferrell
text: Great place and friendly help.

name: Marty Burrows
text: Randy is always helpful.

name: James Hall
text: Great customer service

name: Tim Locke
text: Interesting place

name: Dave Hall
text: Everything you need for fly fishing and fly tying

name: Christopher Foster
text:
Great time! Booked 4 hour trip and hit up a couple different rig areas. Started out slow but caught several Spanish mackerel (and some other random fish we let go) at the end which made for a hearty lunch for our group (5 adults).

Captain Chris was very friendly and polite, and did a great job! He even did a superb job of cleaning the fish!

name: chris rippy
text:
Captain Walter and mate Colin were 1st rate.
Took my son and I straight to the snappers and stayed on them.  Trolled for spanish and king on way back and wore them out.  12 in all and a great trip.

name: Nick Campanello
text: Took a 4hour snapper tour with captain chris. It was an awesome experience. Chris was polite, funny, and personable. He made it a great experience definitely put us on some snapper. We are still eating good a week after! 10/10 we had a blast in our trip!

name: James Wilson
text: This is the best offshore trip I have ever been on.  Walter took us straight to the fish and  kept us on them the entire time.  Everyone caught at least 10 fish in the 4 hours we were fishing.  Will definitely be back.  Thanks Walter!

name: Jon Daniell
text: Had a great time with Captain Chris!  Took a 6 hour snapper trip and hit limits with some time to spare!  Highly recommend!

name: Travis Elsberry
text: Chris was awesome.. The fishing was phenomenal as was his company with my family and I.. Absolute must do while here..

name: Jamey Hosmer
text: Captain Walter is the best captain I have ever been out fishing with. We caught so many good fish. We had the cooler over flowing. Not only was the fishing great but he is just an awesome guy to hang out with. He cleaned a ton of fish in no time. I will definitely use him again. Thanks Walter

name: Michael Humphrey
text: I've used Nicole fishing charter several times in the past 10 years.  Have never been disappointed.  Walter is great and knows where the fish are.  If Walter is full, he'll even help you find another trustworthy charter.  Great guy, great fishing.

name: Justin Royer
text: My family came down in between seasons but Captain Chris still put us on the Spanish Mackerel. We were killing them the whole time and Chris cleaned them all for us. We are currently frying up the fish for family dinner. We'll be back for sure for Red Snapper season.

name: David LaBorde
text:
Went out with Captain Chris 20 May 2019.  Can't say enough good things about our experience!!!  Captain Chris was prompt, attentive, courteous and a seasoned guide!  Chris took every chance given to make our trip a memorable experience.  He put us on the fish and within minutes it was " Fish On" !!  We caught our limit of vermillion Snapper " Beeliner" in short order.  My wife hooked a 9-10 foot Bull Shark and with Captain Chris's expert maneuvering of our big beautiful Grady White boat with 2 brand new 300 Hp Yamahas she landed it!!!!  We may never hear the end of all the bragging but with the pictures and the day forever captured in our minds and hearts all we can say is that we will be back and we will sign up with Captain Chris and Nicole Fishing Charters!!!!  Top Notch, First Class, Leading Edge Professional.

With heartfelt appreciation, Thank You Chris!!!

Kindly Yours,

Dave LaBorde
Master Sargeant USAF Retired
Automation Specialist BP Argos
DeepWater Gulf of Mexico

name: Craig McCollum
text: This was an amazing experience, Captain Walter was out of this world and a blast to have with us. Caught Reds, Amber Jacks and King Macarol. We will be back for sure!

name: scott monson
text: Captain Walter had us on the fish and was very knowledgeable about the area! Thanks again for the trip will definitely use Walter again!!

name: Romey
text: Captian Walter is the to go guy in Orange Beach if you really want to catch fish. We had  a great successful day!

name: Jeff Harvey
text: Great service and experience

name: J M
text:
(Translated by Google) Bus and catfish

(Original)
バスとナマズ

name: Rod Montrose
text: Terrific charter experience. Even though I'm not into fishing, I had a really fun time and caught some amazing Red Snapper. The captain knows exactly where to go and the crew is very friendly and helpful. Great for a family experience!

name: Dustin Merry
text: Had a awesome time!! Couldn't ask for nicer guy to go with!! Definitely be back for sure

name: Heather Devillier
text: My fiancé and two other family members went aboard Miss Carli with Captain Alex and Mate Jason and we could not have asked for better! Very informative and great individuals! Our 5 hour fishing trip didn’t disappoint. We limited out fast! Jason helped us with everything and Alex put us in the right spots. We will be back but for a longer trip next time! Worth it!

name: C Stark
text: We had the time of our lives with Captain Chris!!! Will definitely come back. Thanks Chris!!!

name: Michael Carroll
text:
When we pulled up, First-mate Jason met us at our vehicle. He asked if I needed anything and all I needed was ice. After he showed me where I needed to pay, I came back to him filling my cooler with ice. He carried my cooler to the boat after I told him I could carry it.

This was my family’s first off shore trip including myself. My youngest son and I bass fish often back home, however my other 3 kids and wife do not fish. All I was wishing for is that my kids and wife caught something. Needless to say, my wife and kids had a blast as they caught 11 snapper and 1 king mackerel. I only contributed 1 snapper to the cooler.

Captain Alex and First-mate Jason we very professional, personable and down to earth. I could not imagine coming to Orange Beach and booking a trip with anyone else. These 2 fine anglers made our trip and can’t wait to come back!

name: Kelli Peek
text: We highly recommend Pleasure Island Charters! Captain John and our deck hand were AWESOME! This was our first time deep sea fishing with just our family. They took time explaining everything, helping us, and snapping amazing photos to capture the memory. It was like fishing with extended family! We had 4 in our party and caught 300 lbs of red snapper! The price, experience, and people make this our forever charter choice!!

name: Pj Javier
text: What a great morning fishing with Captain Alex. Our group had a blast. We did the 4 hour inshore  trip and was having so much fun we added another hour. At the end all fish were cleaned, filleted, and bagged up. It's a no-brainer, if you're looking for a fun trip with fair prices, Pleasure Island charters is the way to go.

name: Karen Baker
text: We had an awesome experience with Captain Alex aboard Game On for an inshore charter this week.  The fog was heavy early on, but he took us right to some hot spots where we had success with some trout, typical black drum and a Monstrous black drum!  A very memorable time for all of us (including 2 teenage boys)!!  Thank you Captain Alex; we hope to be back again some day!

name: T Moore
text: Pleasure Island Charters has provided three very enjoyable outings for my family.    On our first trip, we had the excitement of catching many red snapper, but the small shark we caught was the highlight of the trip.   On another occasion, we  took a dinner outing, traveling to Lu Lu's, a well-known Gulf Shores' restaurant.  Then, our third trip with Pleasure Island Charters, we took the Miss Carli for a sunset cruise out to the old lighthouse and along the shoreline of the area.  The boat is very comfortable and accommodating with its indoor kitchen, restroom, and "living" space.  Also, Captain Al is a genial, self-assured, and competent captain which makes for an enjoyable trip!!

name: Bobby Warren
text: We went out with Captain John and Chasity and had a blast,  super nice people and showed us a good time. Hooked in to really nice Snapper and it took about 7 to 8 mins and we had our limit. Definitely will be going again soon

name: Matt Hoover
text: Had an awesome time with Captain Alex and Mate Jason. We caught about 300 pounds of fish between 4 people deep sea fishing! Will definitely go back again! Highly Recommended!

name: Sherri Rampey
text: Most exciting time of my life!  This charter has turned into an annual trip for us.  Have never met anyone awesome people.  Alex and Michelle Brewer make sure you are comfortable and every accommodation is met; not to mention the fact that you WILL catch a ton of fish. Will recommend this Charter to any and everyone!  Love me some Pleasure Island Charters - Miss Carli, and Alex and Michelle Brewer!!

name: John Tripple
text: Highly recommend Capt Alex. Works hard to be sure everyone is baited up and fishing. Willing to go to where the fish are, others may not want to travel. We did an inland trip and Alex was on them, no doubt. Don't hesitate.

name: Leah Richards
text: Our 4 hour inshore trip with Capt. Alex was fantastic! My husband, myself and our three teens went, and everybody had an awesome experience. We caught so many fish! The kids had a blast. He is very professional, worked really hard to keep everybody's hooks baited, knew exactly where to go. I would recommend a trip with them, and we will definitely be back!

name: Rebecca Chugalottajava
text: We had a wonderful time!! Captain Alex made sure we caught fish.

name: David Howery
text: We had a great fishing trip! Captain Alex knew exactly where to find the fish! We were catching so many that we got to pick the big ones to keep for our limit! All the fishing gear and tackle where in excellent shape. All in all a great day out in the Alabama Gulf!

name: Andrea Bledsoe
text: Last summer my son and I had our first deep sea fishing experience.  I was a little apprehensive at first but Capt. Alex and our deck hand Jason made our trip one to never forget.  We caught our limit of snapper everyday!  The Miss Carli is a wonderful boat that Capt.Alex has truly put his heart into.  We had such a great trip with great quality fishing that we booked a total of 4 trips in the 2012 season and have already booked 2 for the 2013 season.  We are counting down the days until we will be back on the boat with the Capt.

name: Sherry Cox
text:
Went inshore fishing with Capt. Alex aboard the Game On with my two sons yesterday morning (3/24/14).  We had a great time catching 15 Sheepshead and trying for some Redfish.  One son caught the most fish while the other son caught the biggest fish.  When asked by my sons what I caught, I told them memories.
If you are looking for a great inshore charter I would recommend Capt. Alex aboard the Game On for your memories.

Brent C.
Mathews, Al.

name: Matt Bledsoe
text: Went out with these guys on 5/15/13 on Miss Carli. Had a great time and caught a ton of fish! Will def be calling this guy again next trip! Full recommendation!

name: Janice smith
text: We have had two unforgettable excursions on the Miss Carli! One with adult friends, the other with our children (ages 11 & 12).  Captain Alex put us right on the fish! The crew took care of everything; all we had to do was reel  'em in! We caught our limit of red snappers both times.  There was plenty of excitement each time, and many laughs! The Miss Carli is beautiful, and very well-maintained. Comfortable seating for those seeking sun, and those who need the shade. I highly recommend the folks at Pleasure Island Charters. They love what they do, and it shows!

name: Tina Graham
text: We always have an AWESOME time with Alex(captain) and his crew! Successful day of fishing, can't wait to go out with them again!

name: Carl Aldrich
text: Had a great day chasing (and catching ) some nice Redfish.  Highly recommended.  Thanks capt Alex.

name: David Ryan
text: Our fishing trip with captain Alex on the Miss Carli was the highlight of our vacation this year for my sons and I. We booked the 8 hour trip.  We caught Red Snapper ( which we could not keep - not in season), White Snapper, Grouper , Wahoo, B-LIners, 2 large Bull Sharks, and more.  The boat is awesome.  Captain Alex is great and knows where the fish are. The crew ( Perry) was very friendly and worked super hard to keep us fishing all day. We had a great day on the water thanks to Alex and the crew.

name: Tracy Westbrook
text: Had a great time, highly recommend
